189b2(skyes rabs): 'gro dub glegs byed par 'gyur gyi snyam du rnam par bsam nas/ cung zad yul gzhan du song ste/ grogs po su zhig gi khyim du sman de mar gyi smin pa zos nas yi ger bris pa pi wang dang lcags kyi phur pa gnyis dang tho
189b3(skyes rabs): dang ral gri dang bcas pa'i mda' stan noms blangs te/ rimA g+hi mu tig gi tshogs ltar dkar ba'i kha ba dang ldan pa kha ba cani gyo raM las 'das nas 'gram ngan zhes bya bI'i ri rjesu thob par gyur to// de nas nor bzangs kyi
189b4(skyes rabs): ras de la bris pa ma lus pa yid la byas nas sa 'dzin la mi'i skad dang ldan pa'i spre'u yi bdag po la 'bras bu sna tshogs pa rnams kyi bdag tu byas nas smras pa/ spre'u'i bdag po myur du ni// sbrul rnams du mas kun khyab pa/
189b5(skyes rabs): 'gram ngan ri 'di las ni bdag/ da lhor khyed kyis sgrol bar mdzod// de nas spre'u yi bdag po des nor bzangs la smras pa/ khyer tshur shog la po dag gis rgyab tu zhon cig ces zer// skad cig ma nyid kyis spre'u de'i rgyab tu
189b6(skyes rabs): zhon par byas pa'i bdag nyid chen po des r-i de las rgal nas ma skyes pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i ri la zhugs par byas nas spre'u chen po de ldog par 'gyur ba la/ der che ba'i tshad lam 'gegs par byed cing mngon par rgyug par byed
190a1(skyes rabs): pa'i sbrul chen po// mda' 'phangs pas skye ba gzhan du nye bar khyer nas/ lam ma skyes pa'i sa 'dzin las brgal nas/ 'dod pa'i gzugs can zhes bya ba'i ri la song bar gyur to// de na yang sring mo 'dod
190a2(skyes rabs): pa'i gzugs can ma zhes bya ba yod do sdug bsngal dang ldan pa des kyang rog pa 'dzin mo'i gzugasu mngon par sprul nas nor bzangs kyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/ bskal pa chen po logs bdag gi khyo dog pa 'dzin pa gzhan dag
190a3(skyes rabs): rnams kyis g.yul ngor gshin rje'i gnasu nye bar khrid pa des na bdag ngu ba ste/ de bas na gal te khyed la rig pa 'dzin pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par 'dod pa yod na de bas na bdag las sngags rnams zung shig dang / bdag ni khyod dang
190a4(skyes rabs): lhan cig tu zlos spyod mar 'byung bar 'gyur zhes ze rA tro// mi'i bde ba chung ba snying med 'di ni spang byas nas// di ring shog cig bdag dang lhan cig na mkha'i dkyil du 'gro bar 'gro bar mdzod// ma la ya'i ri yi tsAn rnams kyi sna
190a5(skyes rabs): tshogs pa yi nags// ri bo rtse mo dga' ba rnams kyi re zhig mthong bar mdzod// de nas bdag nyid chen po des lo rgyus shes pa sring mo 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma 'di de zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas smras pa/ sring mo dgra ni
190a6(skyes rabs): rigs pa 'dzin pa nyid mngon par 'dod pa ma yin te/ gang zhig rig pa 'dzin pa nyid kyis don du gnyer ba gzhan la la zhig khyod kyis bslu bar gyis shig ces zer ro// de nas skad cig de nyid kyi 'bar bi mo lce'i tshogs ltar som
190b1(skyes rabs): skya'i sgra'i tshogs kyis khyab cing kun nas 'khyog pa'i mche ba kun nas btags pa las kun nas bslang ba'i sreg blugs 'dzin pa'i me tog gi rkan gyis bugs pa khyab pa/ 'phros shing mnga' ba'i mkha' snang dang 'dra ba dang
190b2(skyes rabs): mig sman gyi ri'i phug gi sgo dang 'dra ba'i ngo bo gdong mngon par bstan nas/ chu sgra bsgrags pa'i chu 'dzin pa ltar lto ba che ba lhod cing 'phyang ba'i nu ma gnyis kyis kun nas reg pa'i bum pa dang rje su mthun pa'i bus mo gnyis dang ldan
190b3(skyes rabs): pa/ brig dgra sta rnon po'i so dang 'dra ba'i chu'i rgyun 'dzin pa'i dus kyi mtshan mo ltar shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can nor bzangs la mngon par brgyug par gyur to// de nus nor bzangs kyis rgod cing de la smras pa/ bzang mo
190b4(skyes rabs): sngar byung ba dang 'dra ba'i khyod kyis rigs pa 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis bdag gi sems 'dod pa dang smra ba nyid du khrid pa ma yin te/ gzugs rnam par bsgyur ba 'dis khyod la bdag gis ji ltar 'dod pa bgyi zhes smras te/
190b5(skyes rabs): de bas na song shig dang yongasu dralnga pa 'dis ci zhig bya// gal te yang bdag la mngon par rgyug pa khyod kyis gnas por mi 'gyur na de bas na mda' 'dis khyed dus ring por 'jigs par 'gyur zhes zer ro// gang gi tshe des mngon
190b6(skyes rabs): bapar rgyug pa de'i tshe nor bzangs kyi bi bang brdungs par 'gyur te/ de nas bi baM sga des yid dang rna ba 'phrog byed pa// sring mo 'jigs ma legaso zhes// smras nas de nyid myur du nub// de nas nor bzangs kyis 'dod pa'i gzugs
191a1(skyes rabs): can gyi ri bo de las 'das par byas te/ so gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ri la song bar gyur to// de yang thabs gzhan gyis ni brgyal byar nus pa ma yin no snyam du rnam par bsams te/ sa 'dzin de la lcag
191a2(skyes rabs): phur ni// shin tu lci ba tho ba yis// sor bcu gnyis brtan byed phyir// yang dang yang du brdungs par gyur// phur pa de la zhon nas ni// slar yang gzhan gyi brkos par gyur// der ni gnas nas phur bu te// 'og nas de ni bton byar
191a3(skyes rabs): 'gyur// de ltar thabs ni chen po yis// brtson 'grus de wAn nor bzangs ni// mi 'amo ci mo thob byi'i phyir// ri bo de las brgal bar 'gyur// de nas so gcig pa brgal bar byas nas// rdo rje can gyis bya ba'i ri la spyong bar gyur to//
191a4(skyes rabs): de'i yang rtse mo la gnas par stag gi sen mo sbyar 'khyog cing rno pa'i mchu dang ldan pa/ bya rgod mo mthong nas 'di bya rgod kyi gzugs can sring mo'o snyam du bsam so// da ni thabs dang bcas par 'di las bdag nyid rdo rje can b+h+yaH
191a5(skyes rabs): 'dzin las 'da' bar bya'o snyam du rnam par bsdamaso te/ shing gi rtsa bar 'ongs nas nor bzangs gzu dang ldan rnams kyi// mchog tu gyur pa gzhu ni brdungs byas nas gzhu la mkhas// rtswa ni shin tu 'jam pa'i gtan pa nyid du
191a6(skyes rabs): 'dzin byed pa'i// ri dgos la ni rno ba'i mda' yis kun nas bsnun par 'gyur// ri dgas de yi khrag 'dzag pas// ri dgas lta bu'i mig ldan pa// phyi rol du ljon pags pa yis// lus ni bsgribs shing gnas par gyur// de nas
191b1(skyes rabs): bya rgod gzugs 'dzin des// g.yo ba dang bral gnas pa ni// shugs kyis ri dgas pags ldan pa// de ni bton nas rI la khyer// pags pa de ni phyag byas nas// yum ni rnyed phyir lam la ni// brtson 'grus ldan pa des sring me'i//
191b2(skyes rabs): 'og ni ral gris gcod par 'gyur// de nas seng ldeldang mos pa seng ldeng can zhes bya ba'i ri la 'ongs te// bsams pa rI 'di ni mun pa dang bcas pa'i phug gi sgo 'di las nges par brgal bar bya'o snyam mo// nges par gnas chen po
191b3(skyes rabs): 'di yin te gang du yon tan lnga drang ldan pa klu rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba sman tshon po dri brag rnams kyis bkag pa zhig yod de/ sman chen po de yang mun pa 'joms byed 'od kyis ni// grang dong dro dang dug nyams byed// sbrul dang
191b4(skyes rabs): srin po chom rkun las// byung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang spong bar byed// gang yang 'di so sor 'dzin pa'i klu des gnyid log par byas te/ ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang gi phyir sman chen po 'di ni mar me'i rtse mo ltar gnas 'di snang por byed do// de
191b5(skyes rabs): bas na ji srid du lto 'phye 'di nyid log pa de srid du brag 'di bton nas sman bzung bar bya'o snyam du rnam par bsams/ lci ba'i brag ni lag pa'i stobs kyi bsal bar byas te sman de mgo bor bcings la phug der zhugs te/ myur
191b6(skyes rabs): du phur bu'i rtsa dgas gis// ri yi phyogs dag mda' dag gis// ngal ba'i skyed byed phug byas nas// rnam par mi g.yo des byas gyur// de nas cung zad par song ste// lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis dag gis// ral gri bzung bar byas pa dag/
192a1(skyes rabs): byA rgod gzugs 'dzin des// g.yo ba dang bral gnas pa ni// shugs kyis ri dgas pags ldan pa// de ni bton nas ri la khyer// pags pa de ni phyag byas nas// lam ni rnyed phyir lam la ni// brtson 'grus ldan pa des sring me'i//
192a2(skyes rabs): 'og ni ral gris gcod par 'gyur// de nas seng ldeng mos pa seng ldeng can zhes bya ba'i ri la 'ongs te// bsams pa ri 'di ni mun pa dang bcas po'i phug gi sgo 'di las nges par brgal bar bya'o snyam mo// nges par gnas chen po
192a3(skyes rabs): 'di yin te gang du yon tan lnga drang ldan pa klu rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba sman chen po dri brag rnams kyis bkag pa zhig yod de/ sman chen po de yang mun pa 'joms byed 'od kyis ni// grang dong dro dang dug nyams byed// sbrul dang
192a4(skyes rabs): srin po tshwam rkun las// byung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang spong bar byed// gang yang 'od so sor 'dzin pa'i klu des gnyid log par byas te/ ci'o slad du zhe na/ gang gi phyir sman chen po 'di ni mar me'i rtse mo ltar gnas 'di snang por byed do// de
192a5(skyes rabs): bas na ji srid du lto 'phye 'di nyid log pa de srid du brag 'di bton nas sman bzung bar bya'o snyam du rnam par bsams/ lci ba'i brag ni lag pa'i stobs kyi bsal bar byas te sman de mgo bor bcings la phug der zhugs te/ myur
192a6(skyes rabs): du phur bu'i rtsa dgas gis// ri yi phyogs dag mda' dag gis// ngal ba'i skyed byed phug byas nas// rnam par mi g.yo des byas gyur// de nas cung zad par song ste// lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis dag gis// ral gri bzung bar byas pa dag/
192b1(skyes rabs): na bdag gis 'dir gcig pu 'di ci'i phyir yid 'phrog ma'i gtam nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir rnyed par 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams nas nye bar 'ongs te de la dris pa/ 'phags ma chu 'di gang du nye bar khyer ba yin// mi 'am ci'i 'bangs
192b2(skyes rabs): mo rgas pa des kyang nor bzangs la bltas nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyed mos tshal 'di las nges par byung nas gzho nu rig pa 'dzin pa 'di ngo mtshar ba'i ltad mo'i dbang gis bdag la dri'o snyam du rnam par bsams nas/ smras pa/ bzhin
192b3(skyes rabs): bzangs nyon cig/ yid 'phrog ma zhes bya ba ljon pa'i bu mo ste// sa'i bdag po mi 'am ci'i yid 'phrog ma// de yang skyes pa sngon du nye bar longs spyod pa// ji ltar slar yang 'dir ni mngon par 'ongs pa yin// 'di'i phas ni mi'i dri ni kun nas
192b4(skyes rabs): 'byung yin pa// yan lag las ni snom par nus pa ma yin te// nyi ma re rer bum pa'i kha las 'byung ba yi// dI yis chu yis de phyir de ni 'khru ba yin// de nas nor bzangs phrad 'dod de la smras gyur pa// dogs pa dang bcas phyogs rnams
192b5(skyes rabs): yang yang blta byas te// 'od kyis brgyan pa'i sor gdub 'di ni dogs dang bcas// yid 'phrog ma la 'dir ni rab tu sbyin par mdzod// des kyang de ltar bgyi zhes smras nas sor gdub dri bzung bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpas kyang
192b6(skyes rabs): chu'i bum pa de'i skyed par bzhag nas slar skyed mos tshal de nyid du zhugs par gyur to// de nas mi 'am ci'i 'bangs mo rgan mo yang dag par nye bar 'ongs te khrus kyi the mar yid 'phrog mi'i phang par sor gdub bzhag cing gnas te/ de nas
193a1(skyes rabs): sor gdub de ni yang dag blangs byas te// yid 'phrog mas ni khyim du bud med de la ni// 'phags mas 'di ni gang nas yang dag rnyed pa zhes// 'dod pas gang ba'i yid dang ldan pas dris par gyur te// de nas des
193a2(skyes rabs): gzhonu rig pa 'dzin pas sor gdub 'di dag gi lag tu gtad pa ste/ yid 'phrog mo la 'ad sbyin par gyis shig ces smras par gyur to// de nas mi 'am ci'i bdag po'i bu mos nges par 'phags pa'i sras bongs so snyam du rnam par
193a3(skyes rabs): byas mas nas/ skyur de la byu gis mas gal te 'dir 'khrugs par nus na shin tu yang don chen po dang ldan par zhes spyi ba smras// de sa smras pa/ re zhig 'byung bar bkra ste gal te bdag gi sa nus ber gyur na de bas ni gzhon du
193a4(skyes rabs): rig pa 'dzin pa de 'ong bar bag+ha zhes bya bo smras nas/ skyed mos tshal der song ste nor bzangs la smras pa/ bzang po yid 'phrog ma ni khyed la lta bar 'dod do zhes smras te/ de nas bud med kyis ni cha byad yid 'ong du byas te/
193a5(skyes rabs): mtshan mo'i mun pa 'thug pa nyid du gyur pa la// de ring bdag dang lhan cig phrad 'dod yid 'phrog ma'i// glo bur nyid du pho brang du ni zhugs par mdzod// de ltar bgyi zhes brtan pa 'dis ni shes byas te// sgeg pa'i tshe byad kyis
193a6(skyes rabs): ni yan lag bsgribs byas te// mi 'am ci'i g.yog rgan mo'i rjesu 'gro bzhin pa// mtshan mi yid 'phrog ma'i khyim du zhugs par gyur// de nas nor bzangs mthong nas dga' ba'i khur gyi yan lag le lo can// ci stor yang ni
193b1(skyes rabs): 'jigs pa nyid kyis de ni mal cha dor bar gyur// des kyang g.yo ba'i ri dwags mig ltar mdza' mo de la dpung dag gis// shin tu ring bar bral bar rid pa mi 'am ci mo la ni 'khyud// de nas des ci ltar yang nor bzangs kyi tshig gis
193b2(skyes rabs): ring por bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa sel pa yid la re ba'i 'bras bu thob nas smras pa/ e ma bdag gi don du 'phags pa'i sras kyi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal mang po nyam su myong ba ste/ rnam pa thams cad du bdag
193b3(skyes rabs): gi snying sra ba ste gang gi phyir bdag gis 'phags pa'i sras 'di kun nas ngal bar bya'o zhes zer ro// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'jigs ma de ltar ni ma yin te/ sdug bsngal mi bzod chen po la yang bsams par ma
193b4(skyes rabs): byas shing // bde bas rjes 'brel mi g.yo chos kyi lam yang dor byas nas// phal cher yun ring mngon par 'dod pa'i skye bo'i mdun du ni// gnyen bshes pas ni ma spyad pa yang skye bos byed pa yin// yid 'phrog mas smras
193b5(skyes rabs): po/ e ma bdag ni don dang bcas pa ste/ gang gi phyir bdag po ni don du 'phags pa'i sras la gnyis gshan pa la rtsa gcig pa nyid yin ste/ de bas na da ltar yun ring bral bas ni nyi ma dang 'brel gdung bas ni// zos pas
193b6(skyes rabs): 'di ni bskum pa nyid du mngon pa thob// bdag gis snying gi ku mu da ni mthong shar ba// shin tu dga' ba zla ba yis ni rab sad byas// de nas ying 'phrog mas mi 'am ci'i 'bangs mo rgan mo la bos te/ smras pa/ gang zhig 'phags
194a1(skyes rabs): pa'i sras 'dir gnas bzhin yab kyis gang nas kyang thos pas na de nas khro ba skyes mi legs par ci yang byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro// de bas na 'di 'dir rnyed pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyed mos tshal
194a2(skyes rabs): de nyid du 'phags pa'i sras la mtshan mo'i dus su rig pa 'dzin skyed mes tshal de nyid du srod kyi dus la 'phags pa'i sras khyed kyis khrid par 'os pa ste/ bdag cag nang bar de nyid sbyang ba dang bcas pa yon lag med
194a3(skyes rabs): pa la mchod pa'i tshul gyi 'gro'o zhes zer ro// noraraM bzangs kyis kyang mdza' mos yang dag par smras zhes bya ba smras nas skyed kyi dus su rgan mo de dang lhan cig rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyed mos tsha la du zhugs nas mtshan mo 'das
194a4(skyes rabs): par gyur to// de nas yid 'phrog mas tho rangs kyis dus la gos dkar po 'chang zhing nye gnas ma rnams kyi dri dang me tog gi phreng bu 'dzin pas skyed mos tshal de dang der nye bar 'ongs te/ nye gnas ma de rnams la smras pa/
194a5(skyes rabs): smyung ba dang bcas khrus byas gtsang // mi mo 'bad pa chen po yis// 'dod pa'i lha la brten byas te// de bas gcig pu mchod par mdzod// skyed tsha lo 'di yi phyi rol du// mchod gsum me tog mtshon cha las// khyed cag
194a6(skyes rabs): rnam par log mdzod cig/ bdag ni gcig pu nyid zhugs bigya// de nas nye gnas ma rnams kyis nye bar 'ongs pa'i dri dang me tog phreng ba la sogs po bzung nas skyed mos tshal du zhugs te/ rab tu dga' ba'i rgod
194b1(skyes rabs): pas rnam par kha bye ba'i so'i nor bu'i 'od zer rnams kyis bzhin kun nas snang bar byed pa'i yid 'phrog mas nor bzangs la dri zhim po'i kha dog gis byugs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas rgod cing smras pa/
194b2(skyes rabs): mdzes ma yan log med pa'i mchod pa la nye bar 'khor ba'i byug pa 'di bdug gi yan lhag la ci'i phyir sbyor bar byed/ 'o na 'dod pa'i lha'i mchod pa mdzod cig zer ro// yid 'phrog mas rgod cing smras pa/ khyod kyi tshig
194b3(skyes rabs): rnams nyid ni me tog mda' dang dri zhim pa// gzugs ni chu srin rgyal mtshan 'di ni gzhu ni 'dzin byed pa// de bas khyed nyid bdag gis slad du me tog rgyal mtshan te/ myos byed dbang phyug khros pas sreg pa su zhig dad par byed//
194b4(skyes rabs): de nas phan tshun 'di ltar rgod pa'i gtam gyis kun nas rje su tshogs pa 'brel pa de dag la der gnas par byed pa la btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa'i mi 'am ci'i bdag blo skyed mos tshal der 'ongs par gyur to// de nas yab 'ong byar
194b5(skyes rabs): shes nas langs te/ yid 'phrog ma 'jigs pa dang bcas pas nor bzangs la smras pa/ 'phags pa'i sras legs bdag gi bla ma'i skye bo kun nas 'ongs pa ste/ de bas na myur du ljon shing gi khyim 'dir zhugs par 'os
194b6(skyes rabs): so zhes zer ro// de nas nor bzangs kyis myur du langs te/ 'jigs shing gom pa bkod pas song ste/ ljon shing gi khang par zhugs par gyur to// de nas yid 'phrog ma nye bar 'ongs te mos dris par gyur pa/ bu mo bar chad med
195a1(skyes rabs): bar khyod kyis myos byed kyi mchod pas rtogs par byas sngam zhes zer ro// yid 'phrog mas smras pa/ bdag ni mchod pa myos byed pa la byed pa'i phyir ma lags// nus pa skyed mos tshal 'dir mngon
195a2(skyes rabs): brtsom pa// yid byung gnas 'di skad cig mu ni de nyid la// yab kyis skye blo bar chad med par dgag par byas// mas smras pa/ bdag gis bu mo ni sems mnyam par bzhag pa myos byed kyi mchod pa rdzogs par gyis shig dang /
195a3(skyes rabs): bdag ni nang 'khor 'dir yongs par gyur pa ldog par 'gyur zhes zer ro// yid 'phrog mas kyang me tog mtshon cha la mchod pa byas te/ de ltar bgyi zhes 'di ltar bsam zhing gnaso// bdag gis ni dus ji tsam nyid du 'phags
195a4(skyes rabs): bi'i sras sba bar bya bar nus te/ de bas na ma la smra bar bya'o zhes rnam par bsams nas smras pa/ gal te ma'i mgo pa 'di// ji ltar yang ni 'dir 'ongs 'gyur// khyed kyi sems ni dga' 'gyur te// yab ni gcig tu
195a5(skyes rabs): khros par 'gyur// mas smras pa/ bu mo gal te mag pa do// bdag gi 'dir ni 'ongs gyur na// khyed kyi yab ni dang byas nas// bdag mi shin tu dga' bar 'gyur// yid 'phrog mas smras pa/ gal te de ltar yin nA de bas na/
195a6(skyes rabs): ma la mag pa bstan par 'gyur// zhes smras na/ rgan mo de la smras pa/ song la ljon shing gi khyim 'di na gnas pa'i 'phags pa'i sras pa smra bar gyis shig dang // de nas byung ste ma la gsong por smra bar gyis shig ces
195b1(skyes rabs): zer ro// des kyang de ltar bgyi zhes bya bas so sor mnyan te/ ljon shing gi khyim na gnas pa'i nor bzangs la lo rgyus de smras par gyur to// de nas nor bzangs ljon shing gi khyim de las byung bar gyur to// yid 'phrog mas smras pa/
195b2(skyes rabs): mas mag pa mthong bar 'os so zhes zer ro// mas smras pa/ gzhonu rig pa 'dzin pa 'di// ljon shing khyim nas 'ongs pa ni// gang du yang ni mag pa de// bdag 'jigs rjesu 'gro 'gyur ram// de nas yid 'phrog mas rgod cing
195b3(skyes rabs): smras pa/ 'o na ma'i mag pa 'di nyid yin zhes zer ro// mas smras pa/ gal te de ltar yin na/ bdag gi bu mo khyod mya ngan bya ba yin pa ste/ de nas nor bzangs kyis kun nas nye bar 'ongs te yid 'phrog ma'i ma la mngon par phyag
195b4(skyes rabs): btsal bar gyur to// des kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyi bor snom zhing 'di ltar shes par brjod pa rab tu sbyar 'gyur te/ da ni bdag gi bu mo dang // rigs ni rnam grangs khyod dang ni// gang+gA rgya mtsho dag ltar ni// nam yang rnam chod
195b5(skyes rabs): ma gyur cika/ da ni de bas na bu mo khyod kyi yab la lo rgyus 'di dag gis smra bar bgyi zhes bya ba mngon par smos te/ ljon pa'i drung du mngon par song ste skabs dang mngon du 'gro bar 'di skad ces smras bya/ 'phags pa'i sras
195b6(skyes rabs): lags/ gal te ji ltar yang yid 'phrog ma'i bdag po 'ongs par gyur nas 'phags po'i sras kyis slar ci zhig byed par 'gyur zhes zer ro// de nas ljon pas smin ma bskyod pas gsal bar byas pa'i khro ba dang ldan pas smras pa
196a1(skyes rabs): rigs min lam la gnas pa de// gal te bdag gis mthong gyur nas// khrag ni rab tu 'dzin ldan pa// mtshon chas gcod de phyogs rnams dor// yid 'phrog ma'i mas smras pa/ phan par byed pa de'i steng du
196a2(skyes rabs): mi mthun pa bsams par byed pa ni rigs pa ma yin no// ljon pas smras pa/ 'o na 'di ltar phan par byed pa zhes bya bar smros shig dang / des smras pa/ yid 'phrog ma 'ongs pa tsam gyis bdag la smras pa de/ ci ltar zhe na/ rngon pa drag
196a3(skyes rabs): po las langs te// rgyal po'i sras de khyim du ni// bdag bcug nas nI de dang de'i// longs spyod rnams kyis yang dag bsten// ljon pas smras pa/ gal te de ltar bdag cag la de bden par phan pa byed pa zhes zer ro// de nas des
196a4(skyes rabs): ljon pa khro ba rnam par zlog pa shes nas slar smras pa/ gal te khyed ni dang ba yin na de bso na bdag 'phags pa'i sras la bden par smras pa ste/ khyod kyi mag pa de 'ongs na kho na zhes zer ro// gzhan yang / 'di ni ming tsam ma yin te/
196a5(skyes rabs): sa bdag sras ni bdag gi slad// gang gis bgrod dka'i 'di ltar lo ma// bdag gis bu mo'i phyir ni brtsegs// ljon pas smras pa/ gal te 'di ltar de bden pa yin nA de bas bdag gi mag pa de mthong bar 'dod pa ste/ de nas der nor
196a6(skyes rabs): bzangs nye bar 'ong ba'i phyir sgo srungs ma btang bar gyur to// sgo srungs mas kyang song ste byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po ni tshe dang ldan pa mthong bar 'dod do zhes zer ro// de nas nor bzangs kun nas nye bar 'ongs
196b1(skyes rabs): te/ ljon pa la gsong por byas mngon par phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de nas mi 'am ci'i bdag po khro ba'i lhag ma cung zad dang ldan pas shis pa brjod par byin te/ chu bo'i 'gram du khrid nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/
196b2(skyes rabs): zhon chu bo'i 'gram gyi sa la skyes par gyur ba ni// dpag tshad bsgrubs pa'i mda' rnams kyis ni nags 'dir byung byas nas// gal te nyin rer de nyid du ni bdag la phrad byed na// khyed la bu mo dang na nor yang de dang de sbyin bya// byung
196b3(skyes rabs): chub sems dpas kyang de ltar bgyi zhes mnyan nas tog tse blangs nas lcags ngar gyi 'bigs byed pa'i mda' rnams kyis ni nags de rtsa ba nas 'dron par bya ba'i phyir du brtsams te/ ljon pa yang rang gi pho brang du song bar gyur to//
196b4(skyes rabs): de nas yid 'phrog ma yid mi bde bas 'di ltar bsams te/ mda' rnams kyis ni nags thug pa// bdag gi dga' bo gcig pu nyid// 'jam pa'i lag pa badrog gis ni// ji ltar rtse ba nas 'don 'gyur// de nas lha rnams
196b5(skyes rabs): kyis bdag pos nor bzangs mnga' rnams rtsa ba nas 'dron par byed pa mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dis mda' rnams rtsa ba nas bton par nyi ma gcig gis nus par gyur pa ma yin no snyam du rnam par bsams te/
196b6(skyes rabs): gnod sbyin gzhonu rnams bos nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di gcig bu nyid mda' rnams 'don nus pa ma yin zhes smras pa/ de nas da ltar ni/ mche ba 'khyog cing sprin ni sar pa ltar ni nag/ phag gi gzugs can blo bur du
197a1(skyes rabs): byas nas kyang // ji srid nyi ma nub par ma gyur pa de srid du// skad cig gis ni mda' rnams kun nas gdon par gyis// de nas gnod sbyin gzhonu de rnams kyis de ltar 'gyi zhes bya bas lha'i dbang po
197a2(skyes rabs): la mngon par phyag 'tshal nas/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po grong khyer du 'ongs te phag gi gzugasu mngon par sprul cing mda'i nags de thams cad rtsa ba nas 'don par byed cing gnas te/ bdag nyid chen po 'jig rten phan rjes 'jug
197a3(skyes rabs): rnams la// skyo ba du mar nye bar bsags pa'i las dang ni// zug rngur gyur pa'i dge bas kyang ni skur po yi// lha'i skye bo yang ni grogs nyid 'gyur// de nas gnod sbyin phag gi gzugs tsan+da de rnams song ba dang byang chub sems
197a4(skyes rabs): dpa' yang 'ongs te/ ljon pa la mda' rnams kyis nags bdag gis rtsa ba nas bton te zhes bya ba smras par gyur to// de nas ljon pas rang nyid kyi mngon sum du byas te/ gzhonu 'di ni stobs dang ldan ne zhes bye ba smra
197a5(skyes rabs): zhing // slar yang rnam pararu bsams te byang chub sems dpa' la bkas gnang bar gyur te/ mdi'u dang bcas mda' rnams 'di// chu bo'i pha rol par dor nas// til gyi bre chen 'di btab ste// de srid slar yang 'ongs phyir
197a6(skyes rabs): mdzod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thos te chu bo de'i pha rol tu mda' rnams dor bar bya ba'i phyir brtsamaso// slar yang lha'i bdag po'i mthus shin tu stobs dang ldan pa'i rlung gis mda' rnams de blo bur nyid du chu'i pha rol
197b1(skyes rabs): tA khyer bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems drabs zhing de lA ti la rnams rab tu gtor de yang bad+d+ha bI phyir brnams par gyur to// de nas brgya byin mi'i bdag pos slar gnod sbyin gyi gluzhon+da de rnams tIl rnams bsdu byA
197b2(skyes rabs): phyir grogs ma'i gzugs kyi btang bar byaso// de rnams kyis kyang til de rnams btus te bre bo che 'gongs shing gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas til rnams kyi pra bo nI de bzung nas nyi ma de nyid la ljon pa
197b3(skyes rabs): la sten zhing gnaso// de nas mi 'am ci'i bdag po des e mA ngo mtshar che'o snyam du rnam byar bsams nas slar yang smras pa/ bdag gi gzho nu 'di tha mal pa'i skyes pa'i las la sbyar ba'i phyir rigs pa mA yin zer te/
197b4(skyes rabs): bdag gi sras rnams dang lhan cig tA la bdun// lcags kyi rang bzhin phag mo bdun po rnams kyang ni// lcags kyi rang bzhin glal te mangs ni phigs gyur no// de nus yid 'phrog ma nr-i khyod la rab tu sbyin// de ltar
197b5(skyes rabs): bgyi zhes bya ba yang byang chub sems dpas so sor thob par tA la bdun dang phag mo bdun yang grong khyer las phyi rol du mi 'am ci'i rgyal pos btsugs shing gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu
197b6(skyes rabs): mi 'am ci'i gzhonu thams cad lag pa na gzhu thog pa rnams yab 'khor dang bcas pa rjesu 'gro zhing 'bon gyi gnas song bar gyur to// 'khor rnams kyi rnam par bsams pa'i gdon la nye bar gnas pa'i ljon pa la sngon
198a1(skyes rabs): rol nyid du lcags kyi 'ben rnams thams cad rno ba'i gdong can+da gyis// slar yang 'phags pa'i sras kyis 'bigs par gyur pa ni// de ltar bsams zhing mchi ma dang bcas mig ldan pa// yid
198a2(skyes rabs): 'brog ma ni rnam 'khrug nyid du song bar gyur// de nas ljon pa'i bdag skyes de rnams kyis ni drer// 'dus pa chen por stobs kyis shin tu nga rgyal can// la la zhig gis rno ba'i mnga' yis tA la gcig/ phigs par gyur
198a3(skyes rabs): 'ga' zhig gis ni tA la gnyis// de tsam gyi dpung pa'i stobs dang ldan pa nye bar gnas pa'i mi 'am ci gzhon de rnams la// sngon du khu tshur brtan byas te// mi g.yo'i myig can mi g.yo bar// nor bzangs gzhun brdungs byas
198a4(skyes rabs): nas// rno ba'i mnga' ni 'phangs par gyur// de nas lcagasuM kI rang bzhin tA la de rnams phug byas nas// lcags kyi rang btsun page mo bdun po de rnams kyang // sna 'og mthong ba dang 'dra mda' ni 'dod ldan bya// sto na bcing rtsa
198a5(skyes rabs): rab tu zhugs par gyur// de nas blo bur nyid du legaso leg so zhes bya ba ngo mtshar bas kun nas 'khor ba'i sor mo dang ldan pa'i ma lus mi 'am ci'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa' la mngon du phyogs pa byung bar gyur
198a6(skyes rabs): te/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po yang mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// 'ben rnams rno ba'i gdong can gyis ni 'bigs 'gyur ba// bdag nyid chen po stobs chen ldan po de yis ni// rgod pa'i 'od kyi snang por byas pa'i so yi blong
198b1(skyes rabs): yid 'phrog ma'i bzhin ni de ltar blang bar gyur// de nas mi 'am ci'i bdag pos pho brang du 'ongs te/ slar nor bzangs la smras pa/ gzugs dang lang tsho mnyam par rnam par brgyan pa rnams// bdag gi bu mo'i dbusu 'jug pa
198b2(skyes rabs): khyod kyis ni// glo bur du ni lhan cig chos spyod rang gis ni// gal te rig par gyur na de bas de sbyin bya// de ltar bgyi zhes bya ba so sor mnyan nas/ byang chub sems dpas rang gi gnasu 'ongs te// mi 'am ci mo 'bangs mo rgan mo de
198b3(skyes rabs): yid 'phrog ma la btang bar gyur te/ gol te gzugs dang lang tshe dang // cha byad dang rgyan mnyam pa'i sring mo rnams kyis dbusu gnas pa'i yod 'phrog ma khyed kyis shes par gyur na/ de nas bdag gis khyod kyi chung ma
198b4(skyes rabs): nyid du sbyin par bya zhes zer ro// 'di yang shin tu dka' ba khyod kyis phas nye bar tshe bkod pa 'di la thabs gang yin pa zhes 'dri'o// de nas yid 'phrog mas smras pa/ bdag gi slong mo kun gyis nang nas ni// gos kyi sgribs
198b5(skyes rabs): bri'i rkang bu rkang gdub can// rkang gdub nyid po rab tu bsal ba ni// de'i dbus bdag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de bas na mtshan ma 'di la bltas nas bdag ni 'phags pa'i sras kyi sring mo rnams kyi dbus na gnas pa bzung bar bya/
198b6(skyes rabs): zhes zer ro// 'bangs mo des kyang byang chub sems dpa' la de ltar smra bar bya'o// de nas nor bzangs yid dga' ba'i mi 'am ci'i bdag pos yang dag par bos pa de dang der nye bar 'ongs te/ lang tshe dang gzugs dang / rgyan ma
199a1(skyes rabs): bar de rnams glog ltar snang bar gyur pa'i mi 'am ci mo rnams mthong bar gyur to// de nas ljon pas gzhonu de rnams la smras pa/ gang zhig khyed kyis mdza' mo de zung cig ces zer te/ de nas rkang pa
199a2(skyes rabs): gnyis kyis gsal bar byas pa des// gsal zhing 'od dang ldan pa'i rkang gdub kyis// sa la rnam par 'brel pas lta ba'i yid 'phrog ma// ngo che'i gdong can lag pa'i rtse mos bzung bar gyur// de nas ljon pa snying dga' bas
199a3(skyes rabs): nor bzangs la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pas bar chad med par bdag gi bka' rnams thams cad bsgrubs te/ de bas na yid 'phrog ma 'di khyod kyis lhan cig chos spyod ma so sor bzung bar mdzod cig/ gzhan yang gang phyir
199a4(skyes rabs): sngon du 'jam pa'i lus can khyod ni ngal byas pa// mngon par 'ongs pa brtse ba bral ba bdag gis don med khyod de ni// gzhonu dul ba'i ngo bo bzod par 'ongs pa ste// gang zhig bla ma'i skye bo mkhas rnams bzod min de ni tsi//
199a5(skyes rabs): nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'o na bla ma rnams kyis bka' rab tu sbyin pas bdag ni rje su 'dzin pa ste/ lci ba'i sems ldan bla ma rnams// gang zhig nyid ni bya ba ste// bka' ni rab sbyin mkhas pa nyid// de rnams la ni de nyid
199a6(skyes rabs): skye/ |de nas lha'i gzhonu lha'i bu mo dang lhan cig pa 'dra bar mi 'amo ci mo de dang lhan cig ljon pa'i pho brang du dus cung zad cig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpas mi 'am ci'i bdag po la smras pa/ lha lags gal te bkang
199b1(skyes rabs): drin yod na/ de nas yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu yab kyi pho brang du 'gro bar bgyi'o zhes zer ro// de nas ljon pas ci ltar gzhonu 'dod pa de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ bu mo rnams la smras pa/ bu mo rnams song la gyos pa'i
199b2(skyes rabs): rigs la mngon par 'jug pa'i yid 'phrog ma brgyan par mdzod cig ces zer ro// de rnams kyis kyang de ltar bgyi'o zhes bya ba sde sor mnyan naso sring mo khyi bo yon tan mthong dang lhan cig tu/ gyos po'i rigs la khyed ni de
199b3(skyes rabs): ring 'gro 'gyur te// sring mo de ltar mchi ma dang bcas mig rnams kyi// cho ga bzhin du mi 'amra tsi mo de brgyan gyur// bdag cag gis ni brgyan bya min// rang gi mdzes pas 'di brgyan pa// de ltar rgyan rnams 'di yis ni// lus
199b4(skyes rabs): la ngo mtshar bcas ltar gnas// de nas yid 'phrog mas rgyan rdzogs pa// sring mo rnams kyis rje su 'gro bar gyur pas dul ba dang bcas pas nye bar 'ongs te/ yun ring phyag rnams dpag med bzhin du chu skyes can// mchim
199b5(skyes rabs): dang bcas nye bar skye bos rnams ltas pa/ pha dang me yIs mchi ma dang bcas mig ldan pa// skad cig rkang pa micha ma'i thig pa rnams kyi spangs// khyed ni med par bdag ni brtan pa mi 'thob ste// bu mo nam zhig chen slar yang
199b6(skyes rabs): 'ongs par 'gyur// de ltar rjod par byed cing mas ni yid 'phrog ma skad cig tu ni kun nas brten te nus min du// de nas mi 'am ci'i bdag pos 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bu mo dang bral ba/ sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa'i
200a1(skyes rabs): bdag nyid ji ltar yang brtan par byas nas yid 'phrog ma'i mA la smras pa/ gsal ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni mkha' la cha ni gsum du song ba la/ sems rnams skyed cing skad cig lus kyi 'dzin
200a2(skyes rabs): ba rnams la nyi ma'i drod ni brtan gyur te/ gzhonu 'di ni khyod kyis bu mo chu bral pad+mo ltar ni rnying par 'gyur ba ste// de bas sdospong zhig slar yang 'ongs par gyur te mo brten pa ni yongasu dor bar mdzod// de nas nor bzangs kyi spyi
200a3(skyes rabs): bo'i gtsug tu nor bu bi bcang nas ljon pas smras pa/ nor bu 'di yoM mthu yis ni// mthu ni chen po khyod la yang // lha'i ltar ni thogs med pa// na mkha' las ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de bas da ni yid 'phrog ma la dmigs
200a4(skyes rabs): nas na mkhab dkyil du 'byung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar rgyas pa'i yab kyi pho brang du 'gro bar mdzod cig/ bdag gri bu mo 'di legs dang // dpal ldan rnams kyi khyed mdun 'gro/ tshig dang don dag ltar khyed cag/ phan tshun
200a5(skyes rabs): brten pa 'byung bar gyur cig/ de nas 'khrug pa'i sems ldan bla ma dag btud nas// skad cig tu ni mri 'am ci mo'i skye bo 'khyud byasU te// kun+da nas 'phros pa'i rgyanA dang rin chen 'od ldan pa// bza' mi gnyis ni myur
200a6(skyes rabs): du na mkha' la ni song bar 'gyur// phyir lci'i mog can mchi ma'i tshe ni grol bzhin pa// bdag po dang ni lhan cig na mkha' la 'jug po// mi 'am tso mo de la mchi ma byung po'i mas// ji srid mi ge las 'das pa de srid mthong
200b1(skyes rabs): bar 'gyur// de nas nor bzangs kyi rang gi skye bo dang bral bas skrag pa'i yid 'phrog ma la yang nas yang du mchi ma rnams phyis nas/ rdul gyi cha dang bcas pa de'i gdong ni des mthong nas// pad+ma rgyas pa chu'i'athigs
200b2(skyes rabs): bas rjesu 'brel pa ltar// nyin par 'gro zhing nyi ma'i 'di zer bzlog pa'i don du ni// lag pa gnyis ni btegs nAs snam bu chen po brkyang bar 'gyur// de nas glo bur nyid du glang po che'i grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to// sgrub cing
200b3(skyes rabs): yid 'phrog nor can mdzes pa la ni dmigs byas nas// rlung gis cung zad snam bu bskyod par byas pas 'gro ba ni// rig pa 'dzin po 'di ni na mkha' la ni 'ongs sam ci// zhes ni grong khyer skye bo mi g.yo mig can gyis
200b4(skyes rabs): mthong gyur// de nas nor bzangs na mkha'i dkyil nas yang dag par brgal ba mthong ste// yid dga' ba'i sgo ba rnams kyis rgyal po nor can la lha lags/ yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu nor bzangs 'ong so zhes bya ba
200b5(skyes rabs): smra zhing gnas par gyur to// de nas rgyal po dris bden nAm 'on te min snyam nas/ mdza' bo rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyis dod par bya zhes bya ba smras te/ stan las langs te mi 'am ci mo dang bcas pa'i nor bzangs
200b6(skyes rabs): nyid zhugs pa mthong nas/ 'di ni rmi lam yin nam 'on te ci snyam du rab tu dga' bas yang nas yang du 'khyud de/ 'di ma'i drung du khrid par gyur to// de nas kun nas langs te bral bar mi nus pa// rab tu dga'
201a1(skyes rabs): ba'i mchi mi'i chu yis mig 'gags pa// mas ni yun ring po nas bdag skyes de mthong ste// skad cig kun nas 'khyud de spyi bor 'o byas gyur// de nas yid 'phrog mas btsun mo la mngon par
201a2(skyes rabs): phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ bde ba'i 'phrogs pa'i sras kyis kyang // bdag gis don du rtsol byas po// gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams myong ba// 'phags ma'i bdag gi de bzod mdzod// btsun mos smras pa/ bu mo khyod
201a3(skyes rabs): ni bdag gi rigs la sngags par bya ba ste/ ci'i phyir khyod kyi steng du bdag ni khro ba dang ldan po byung bar gyur pa de bas na ltos shig/ lto 'phye chen po'i nor bu ni grib mas gsal byas sa 'og gi/ rgya mtsho las ni
201a4(skyes rabs): brtsol ma byas// su zhig rin chen rnyed par 'gyur// de nas dri ma med pa grags pa'i gter ni 'ongs pa yis// bdag nyid chen po thos tshan glal la gnas pa'i sras la ni// yun ring grong khyer lha'i rnam par 'byor pa
201a5(skyes rabs): lta bu yis// dus min zla 'od mi yis bdag pos byed du bcug par gyur pa/ rigs bzang pa dang khro ba phrag dog gis gtam thos pa'i rgyal po nor can gyi gnyis skyes 'di bsad par bya ba ma yin snyam du
201a6(skyes rabs): dgongs nas rang gi yul nas bton par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes rabs 'di dge slong rnams kyi mdun du 'di ltar bstan par mdzad do// brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan pa ni// nor bzangs rgyal sras bdag
201b1(skyes rabs): yod 'gyur// gzugs dang skal bzangs ldan pa ni// mi 'am ci mo grogs 'dzin 'gyur// de'i don du bdag gris ni// sngar ni sdug bsngal de de thob// phal cher 'dod pas khengs bdag nyid// nyon mongs rnams kyi snod du
201b2(skyes rabs): gyur// de phyir yul skyes bde ba'i cha ni dang por rtog byas nas// yid 'phrog yul 'dod rnams kyi yongasu smin la dka' ba ni// bdag nyid 'dod pa rnams kyis ring por 'di rnams yongs spungs skad 'dod pa rnams ni
201b3(skyes rabs): skad cig sgrol ltar yun ring po spangs par mdzod// mi 'am ci mo dang nor bzangs kyis skyes pa'i rabs te lnga pa'o// // bsam gtan gyis ni mar me snang bu yis// snang ba thob kyang mya ngan 'das mi
201b4(skyes rabs): 'gro// gang phyir byang chub thob par 'dod pa yi// de ni sems can phan rjes 'brel phyir ro// 'di ltar rje su thos te/ rigs byed kyi de kho na nyid yang dag par rtogs pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i bstan bcos rnams la goms
201b5(skyes rabs): pa'i srid pa dong bral ba'i blo mkhas pa du ma rnams kyi mdun sa rnams la grags pas khyab pa rang gi grub mtha' bya ba rnams rtse gcig pa/ khyim gyi gnas la lhag par gnas shing dus gcig gi tshe na byang chub sems
201b6(skyes rabs): dpa' bram ze 'bar ba can zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to// bdag nyid chen po de yang khyim ni gnas pa'i skyon shes pa rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon par 'dod pa ye byad kyis yongasu gang ba'i khyim na yang dgo' bo thob
202a1(skyes rabs): bar ma gyur cing dus gcig gi tshe na 'di ltar bsams te/ yo byad yod na rgyags pa skye 'gyur te/ de yod na nI rab zhig las 'gyur// rab ni med na ngo tsha bral ba ni// dri ma can gyi las ni skye bos 'dod/
202a2(skyes rabs): dga' min yang dag sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal skad cig tsam// sems spyi bde ba skad cig tu ni dga' bral dus// nor ni rnyed par bya phyir yid ni ngal rnams kyi// gal te de phyir 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal 'bras bu med// de ltar khyim
202a3(skyes rabs): pa rnams ni rtag tu sems 'khrug pa'i// rang gi skye bos gnyen gshin nges 'brel yid ldan pa// bde zhes bya 'bral med mngon po'i nga rgyal brten// khyim pa rnams lo yid bde cung zad kyang ni med// khyim zhes bya ba de
202a4(skyes rabs): ltar dka' ba spangs nas ni// 'tshong ba byed pa 'di ni myur du bdag 'dod pa// dka' thub rnams ni mngon paro 'phel phyir nags nang du// de bas rab tu zhi ba'i gnas ni bdag gi bsten// de ltar bdag nyid chen po dos
202a5(skyes rabs): bsams nas khyim na gnas pa yongasu dor te/ chu g.yo ba med cing 'bab pa 'gram gyi shing me tog skyes pa rnams kyi nye bar mdzes// bstan bcos rnams la goms pas dri ma dang bral ba'i shes rab dang 'dra
202a6(skyes rabs): ba'i chu bos brgyan par byas pa'i sa 'dzin gyi phyogs gcig na/ ri dgas kyi tshogs dbugs 'byung ba'i so rnams kyi rtsa sngon po gcod pas yid dga' bas pad+mo'i nags kyi tshogs na dang pa dang dang skyes dang / ngur
202b1(skyes rabs): ba rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yid dang rjesu mthun pa'i shin tu che ba nags kyi nang 'ga' zhig na/ khri snyan sa la'i pags pas brang gi mthil 'dres par byas pa'i gnas kyi khyad par thob pa/ kun dga'
202b2(skyes rabs): ba dang 'dra ba tshangs pa'i dpal gyis 'khyud par bya ba'i gzugs can chog shes pa gzugs dang ldan pa dang 'dra bar shing 'ga' zhig la brten nas rnal 'byor dang / yid 'brel bas dka' thub bya ba'i phyir brtsams te/ bas
202b3(skyes rabs): gtan la ni rtse gcig yid ldan dbang pos rnam rgyan pa// cho ga shes rnyed pas bde ba snying rje dang ni ldan pa dang // rgyan chen blo ldan gnyis skyes des ni gang zhig brten pa ni// shing nges shing nyid don de byas pa dga' bzhin 'dod /
202b4(skyes rabs): par 'gyur// rtswa yi gding ba bting byas nas// sna yi rtse mor mig brtan pas// bsgom pa rnams kyi mchog des ni// bsgom bye rtse gcig yid 'dzin 'gyur// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i la mau// bzhon pa nyer bsag
202b5(skyes rabs): ngal ba ni// bsam gtan pha rol phyin bstan pa// de nas de ni ngal sos gyur// 'dod pa dge ba rnams dang ni// chos rnam lA ni so sor gnas// rtogs bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa// rnam dag bdag nyid dben pa la// dga' dang bde/
202b6(skyes rabs): ba myang byas pa// zhi ba'i bdud rtsi myang byas te// bsam gtan lam ni thob pa'i phyir// bsam gtan dang po thob gyur// rtog med dpyod pa med pa dang // de nas dpyod pa la mkhas pa// de ni nang bdag nyid dang bcas// bsam
203a1(skyes rabs): gtan gnyis pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rim gyi dga' gnas bral te// dran pa dang ldan btang snyoms ldan// ban+d+hanA pa lus pade myang btsun// bsam gtan gsum pa des thog 'gyur// btad snyoms kyis ni song
203a2(skyes rabs): dag pa// bde sdug dag ni spangs pa'i phyir// dga' bas 'dod chags bral ba'i phyir// de nas bsam gtan byin pa brnyes// de ltar 'di ni bsam gtan bzhi skyes par byas pa/ gzugs dang ldan pa dang 'dra ba'i snying rjes 'khyud
203a3(skyes rabs): ba shrI ba la rtse gcig byas dud 'gro rnams la yang gnyen dang 'dra bar nogs de na dbugs 'byung ba'i rgyu gnas par gyur te/ ri dgas dang ni bug don rma b+hi skags rnams// bsnam bzang sbrul dang ri dgas rnams
203a4(skyes rabs): kyang de dang de// gnas nas slob ma ster ni nags kyi nang du ni// de dang nye bar 'ongs te rnam par ngal byas gyur// de nas dus gcig gi chen bdag nyid chen po des skyel mo grangs bcings pa'i de'i nang pa dang nye bar gnas pa'i
203a5(skyes rabs): ridags kyi bai mo gnyis ni bsam gtan gyi g.yo ba med pa'i mig gis phug ron mo myangal btsa' ba dang nye bar bcos rnams dang rtsa'i dum bu rnams kyang mtshos bzung nas// ral pa'i tshogs rnam par bcings pa'i
203a6(skyes rabs): cod pan gyi mgo bo la 'dug nas cung zad dma' ba'i tshang brtsams par byas te/ der sgo nga rnams gzhag nas rtsa dang sa bon rnams dang 'bras bu rnams za bar 'dod pas na mkha' la song ste nags gzhan rnams la
203b1(skyes rabs): gnas nas yang nas yang du 'ongs te/ sgo nga de rnams gzung zhing rnam par gyur to// de nas phug ron me nI srab pa'i mjug skyes khyab// de yi yan lag kun nas btsir bas drod ni bsags pa yi// tshang na sgo nga dkarA dang dmar
203b2(skyes rabs): ba'i yan lag can// phug ron phrug pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs 'byung 'gyur// de nas phug ron mo ni phug pa rnams mthong ste/ yang yang za bar 'dod pas mchu'i rtse phye ba ni// rang gi bkres chen ma bsams pri yang ku ta
203b3(skyes rabs): ni// ma rmongs 'khrungs pa'i 'bras bu rnams kyis de rgyas gyur// phug ron de rnams lus la skyes pa rab 'byung ba// ma ni sa bon 'dzin pa la ni blta byas nas// skrod cig rab g.yo rtse mo'i sgro can gdong rnams ni//
203b4(skyes rabs): rab tu phye zhing gnas gyur skad ni gudon byas pa// de nas bsam gtan dang rdzogs pa'i dus na shing dang 'bras 'don du// dbang po zhi ba thub pa de ni nags nas 'gro 'dod pa// phug ron mo ni rtsa dang shing gi 'bras bu 'dzin
203b5(skyes rabs): mthong nas// tshang dang ldan pa'i mgo la 'brel bzhin ma ni gnas par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpas nges par bri dag gi ral ba'i tshogs 'di rtswa dang shing gi bu'i dum bus tshang rnam par brtsams pa'i phug ron mo
203b6(skyes rabs): 'di bcas pa ste/ gal te yang bdag gis langs nas shing rnams dang sdong bu dang rtso ba dang 'bras bu rnams 'ongs pa'i phyir 'gro bar gyur na de nas nges par dka' thub ma 'di ni gnas 'dir 'ongs te/ 'di rnams dmar
204a1(skyes rabs): kha'i rkan dang ldan pa gsal byas pa// dri ring phug ron phrug gu mthong bar ma gyur pa// shing rnams la ni yang yang mya ngan gyis gnas te// na mkha' la ni 'phur nas 'khor bar 'gyur// e ma
204a2(skyes rabs): skye ba brgyar 'khor ba'i// bag chags 'di ni rje su 'jug/ dud 'gro rnams kyang phrug gu la// gang phyir mnyis gshin kun nas 'phel// gal ti bu rnams med gyur na// gnyen rnams grogs po nyid gang du// rang nyid na med
204a3(skyes rabs): lo gyur to// gnyen pa shes sa bon med gang las// gnyis gshin med pa la sems ni// mi bde rnams ni yod mi 'khor// yid mi bde med chags bral ba// zhi ba ldan pa bde bar gnas// bu zhes bya ba'i sdug bsngal rnams//
204a4(skyes rabs): nyon mongs kyi rmongs skye byas nas// rmongs pa'i skye bo la thob ste// phyi nas 'gyod pas gdung ba tsun+da// ba lang re lde mi 'dod kyang ni stobs ldan pa'o// re lde can gyi ji ltar nan gyis sbyor bar byed// skye bo blo ngan 'di ni dge dang mi dge
204a5(skyes rabs): bus// srid pa'i rgya mchi la ni las kyis bskul por 'gyur// de phyir phug ron phrug gu rnams ni ji srid sgro skyes par// ma gyur bdag gi ral bi'i tshang nas gnas pa ngo srid du// bsam gtan bdud rtsis nye bar bsag/ sa pa'i
204a6(skyes rabs): sems dang lus dga' ba// 'dir ni g.yo med gzugs dang ldan po nyid du gnas par bgyi// de ltar byang chubo sems dpa' rnam par bsams te phug ron gyi phrug gu rnams la rjesu brtsa bas bkres pa la rnam par ma rtsis par
204b1(skyes rabs): yang skyil mo krungs bcings nas bsam gtan gyi bde bas bdag nyid tshim zhing gnas so// phug ron phrug gu sgo rab tu 'phel ba de rnams ma dang lhan cig na mkha' la 'phur zhing song ba rnams la/ de dang nye bar gnas pa'i
204b2(skyes rabs): lha myos kun nas nye bar 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' la ltas nas ngo mtshar bas kun nas lhag par gnas pi'i blo dang ldan pas e ma'o bdag nyid chen po drang srong 'di sems can rnams la rjesu brtse ba ste/ gang
204b3(skyes rabs): gi phyir sder byung ba'i bsam gtan las langs te phug ron rnams kun bsrungs pa'i phyir slar yang bsam gtan gyis bdag nyid g.yo ba med par byas shing yang dag par gnas te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di yang phug ron
204b4(skyes rabs): 'di rnams song ba rnams lnga yang tshang 'di mgo bo la sde kun nas med par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de bas nu bdag gis ral pa'i cod pan na rnam par bsags pa'i phug ron gyi tshad 'di bshig par bya'o snyam du rnam par
204b5(skyes rabs): bsams nas/ 'ga' zhig sgo ba'i dum bu rnams kyis nang khyab pa// shin tu thob pa mchog gi tshad de de yis ni// rim gyi rim gyis mdab ma ltar ni 'jam pa yis// lag pa gnyis kyi mgro bo las ni nyer khyer gyur// lha
204b6(skyes rabs): mo de yang song ba la byang chub sems dpas bsam gtan las sems bzlog ste/ mgo bo'i yang ba nyid shes nas 'di ltar bsam zhing gnas te/ sgo rnams rab tu rdzogs pa phug ron phyug gu rnams// ma dang lhan cig
205a1(skyes rabs): gnas kyi nang du song ba la// nges par gus pa rtswa gcig pa ni su zhig gi/ de yi cheng ni bdag gis mgo la nyer khyer gyur// de ltar rnam par bsams nas bdag nyid chen po des langs nas shing dang
205a2(skyes rabs): ku sha dang me tog dang 'bras bu rnams 'ongs te khrus byas pa// 'phro ba'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i me la bsreg byas nyin phyed na// dri dang 'brel ba'i 'dam dang bral ba'i 'bras bu nyer zos te// sna'i rtse mor gnas pa'i mig ldan shing
205a3(skyes rabs): gi 'og tu ni// sems gcig pa ni slar yang rnal 'byor brtsams par gyur// de ltar bsam gtan gyis de kho na nyid rnam par mthong ba mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir nus kyang bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems
205a4(skyes rabs): dpar gyur pa na 'jig rten pa rnams la phan pa'i phyir nye bar 'tshe ba mang ba'i 'khor ba las yang kun nas 'khor bar 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu dang ba bskyed par bya zhes
205a5(skyes rabs): bya ba'o// drang srong 'bar ba can gyi skyes pa'i rabs te skyes pa'i rabs drug pa'o// / shes rab bam ni brtson 'grus kyang // bsod nams chen po rnam par dag pa 'am// mtho ba'i blo ldan chen po rnams kyis ni// 'di
205a6(skyes rabs): dog thams cad 'jig rten phan phyiraro// 'di ltar rje su thos te/ bstan btsos sna tshogs pa la yongasu 'dris pa dri ma dang bral ba'i yid dang ldan pa 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi gnyen du gyur pa dul ba gzugs dang ldan pa 'dra bar
205b1(skyes rabs): bzhag la phan pa la 'bras bu rtse gcig pa// mdab chags ngal ba rnams la shing chen po 'dra bar skyes bu yon tan thams cad kyi brtan pa/ snyan par smra ba nyid kyis 'jig rten pa thams cad kyis yid 'phrog pa legs par
205b2(skyes rabs): bshad pa rnams la rtsom pa po 'jig rten na mkhas pa gtsang ba dang bag dang ldan pa rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyal mtshan du gyur pa de dus gcig gi tshe na grong khyer 'ga' zhig du byang chub sems dpa' ke shra pa zhes bya ba'i ming
205b3(skyes rabs): can 'byung bar gyur te/ bdag nyid chen po des kyang 'tsho ba yongasu dag pa slar su zhig yin snyam du bsam so// bdag gis gang la gnas na bde bar 'jig rten la phan po bsgrub par nus snyamo// re zhig brtan po ni mi
205b4(skyes rabs): bden pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / chags pa dang / 'tshe ba'i skyon du rnams kyi rgyu yin pas de la gnas shing 'bad pa dang ldan pa yang nam zhig gi tshe zhi ba nye bar thob par 'gyur// ci'i phyir na/ mi'i bdag po sna
205b5(skyes rabs): tshogs pa'i ston+da pa'i mdab ma la bsam par nus pa yi// skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni dang ba skyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin// 'khrug pa mang ba'i 'dam can chu la gos ni 'khru bar byed bzhon pa// ni yang dkar ba nyi du 'gro/
205b6(skyes rabs): bar 'gyur ba nyid ni ma yin te// tshong yang nyo tshong gi dus na brdzun pa'i tshig mang bas chos las 'da' ba nyid do// zhing gis las kyang ba lang rnams la lcag dang dbyug pa brgyapa pas sdug bsngal skyed par byed de/ rnam pa thams cad
206a1(skyes rabs): du sman pa nyid bdag gis dag pa dang 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde bar byed par mthong ba yin te/ de bas na sman pa nyid 'tshal bar bya snyam du rnam par bsam nas dus ring pos de'i rtogs pa skyes
206a2(skyes rabs): bar gyur te/ lci ba'i sems ldan de la gnas pa yi// yon tan can dang nad pa rnams kyi nad gcod la// nam yang nad kyis gdung bar 'gyur min la// lus can rnams kyi lus la bsrungs byas bzhin// bar chad
206a3(skyes rabs): med par dam pa rnams la smra// de ni med pas mdun sa mdzes mi 'gyur// gtsang ba'i mar me bral bas 'od med pa'i// mtshan mo la ni ri me'i khyim bzhin du// 'gro ba 'dod pa bskyed cing mun pa 'phrog/ de ni bde ldan
206a4(skyes rabs): 'dun sar gang zhig 'gro/ shin tu dga' bar 'gyur te/ ri bong can ni sharA la zla tshes ltar// chen po 'gro ba'i don ni byed pa yi// yon tan brten pa gsal ba'i de nyid mthong // zla ltor rnam dag sems ldan rnams kyis
206a5(skyes rabs): ni// skye bo yon tan ldan las 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar 'gro ba'i lam ni gnod byed sel bA la mkhas pa// yon tan mang ba rnams kyi mngon sum du ni gter dang 'dra// de ni shes rab yongasu 'dris pas dag pa'i blor
206a6(skyes rabs): 'gyur te// kun nas yongasu 'dres pa med kyang gnyen ltar gyur pa yin// de nas dus gcig gi tshe na legs pa'i blo can gyi slob mas rje su 'gro bzhin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yul gzhan du song ba la glags rnyed pa
206b1(skyes rabs): dang 'dra ba'i nad kyi bud med 'ga' zhig gi bdag po srid pa gzhan du nye bar song bar gyur to// des kyang 'jam pa'i lag pa gnyis kyis brdabs pas kun nas dkar dmar du byas pa'i lci ba'i 'o ma 'dzin pa mig gi mchi
206b2(skyes rabs): ma'i thigs pa rnams kyi bzhin bkrus pa/ rgyan rnam par bkrol po/ skra lo lhob pa dang rnam par grol ba'i khur g+hi sku kun da ra'i me tog kun nas dor ba/ kun ta'i ljon shing ltar sbrang byed kyi me tog 'gegs pa/ me tog
206b3(skyes rabs): mtshon cha'i bud med dang 'dra ba// kyi rgyud khyim tha bas khyod gang du song snyam du rnam pa mang po de ltar smre sngags 'dron cing 'byung pos bzung bar 'gyur te/ de nas dran pa rnam par rmongs pa nyid kyis smras// rang gi skye bo
206b4(skyes rabs): mchi ma grol bar nyer 'ongs dang // di ring bdag gi khyim 'dir ci phyir ngu ba zo ba ste// 'jigs pa bral po bdag gi khyim thabs gson pa yin// de ltar smras nas rgod dang bcas pas mi 'khrugs par// ri bong can
206b5(skyes rabs): gyi gdong can khyad par rnam bsams te// shin tu mthug par dga' bas kun nas 'khyung byas te// bdag po shi ba la ni mal gyi steng gnas smras// de ring bdag la mngon par mi smra ci phyir 'di// mdza' bo khro ba
206b6(skyes rabs): dga' ba la gnod dor bar mdzod// gal te bdag ni nongs par byed pa 'byung 'gyur na// khyed kyi yod ni khros pa don med 'byung ba min// kye legs btsums pa'i mig ldan g.yo sgyu nyid kyis ni// 'on kyang khyod kyi skyon bcas
207a1(skyes rabs): nyid ni bdag gi shes// de ltar rgod cing 'phyang 'dod pa'i yid can gyi// de la nye bar smras nas 'gram du 'od byud 'gyur// nges par khyod ni zla 'dra bzhin dang ldan pa su zhig gi// 'dod pa dga' ba
207a2(skyes rabs): gzhonu ma ni gzhan la dga' bar byed// de bas song la yun ring khyod kyi 'dod pa 'bras bcas kyis// chags la rtse gcig la 'di ltar bdag gis gegs mi byed// shin tu ring shar me lus ri bong can mtshan mthong
207a3(skyes rabs): nus ni// mchi ma'i chu yis lta bu 'ogags pa dbugs ni byung byas te// de ni khyod dang phrad pa'i yid re ltar gyis dul ba la// mal gyi dbus su yan lag rnams ni rgyags bzhin brtul bar 'gyur// mdzes pa khyod
207a4(skyes rabs): ni nges par 'jigs te bdug gi tshogs 'di ni// mnyan nas gang gis khyed ni rtsub ba nyid du nyer song ba// yongs shig bdag ni khros pa min zhes kun nas brjod bzhin pa// des ni de yis mig ni sor mo rnams kyis phye
207a5(skyes rabs): bar gyur// de nas de'i rang gi skye bo'i tshigs des nges par 'di dka' thub mo 'byung pos bzung ba ste// gang gi khyo shi ba la yang 'khyud nas 'di ltar mang po skye ba nyid nye bar song ba zhes bya ba brjod de dub pas kun nas ngal bso
207a6(skyes rabs): gnyid kyi dbang du song bar gyur to// khyim skye bo'i sgra med pa mthong nas des srog dang bral bas bya ba dang bral ba'i lus khyo bo de phrag pa la bkal te mtshan mo yongasu smin pas 'od med pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i nam
207b1(skyes rabs): mkha' la grong khyer gyi sgo rnams rnam par grol bar gyur pa'i sgo dang ldan pa rnams la/ mchil pa skad 'don pas khyab pa'i grong dang grong khyer gyi shing rnams yod pa dang mkha' snang gi rnam pa'i mar me'i rtse mo rnams yod pa dang / lhag
207b2(skyes rabs): ma dang bcas po'i gnyid kyis khyab pa'i mig dang ldan pa'i skas kyis rim pas mtshan pa'i rkang pa byas nas 'gro po rnams so sor gnas par gyur pa dang / nyi ma sprin gyis bsgribs pa'i dus ltar kun nas 'od med pa dang 'dra ba'i nor
207b3(skyes rabs): ldan yod pa dang / tho rangs kyi rnga'i sgras kun nas gang ba'i bar dang ldan pa'i lha'i khang pa rnams yod pa dang khyim bya'i sgra kun nas thos par gyur pa dang ldan pa'i grong dang grong khyer rnams yod pa la bud med des gang dang gang du
207b4(skyes rabs): byin par gyur pa de dang de nyid du/ dus ring nyid kyis rnam par rnyings pa yi// dri ma can gyi gos ni gon bzhin pa// pheg rdob byed pa'i sgra ldan byis rnams kyi// kun nas 'od mdzes pa yongasu bskor// de ni mthong nas byis pa rnams rgod 'gyur//
207b5(skyes rabs): mig ni mtsho ma dang bcas bud med rnams// 'gyur te rang nyid kyis brid kye ma rmongs// dri med blo ldan mi rnams kyis 'di smras// de nas dus kyi rim pas rnag dang bcas pA shu dang pags pa lhung bas dkar rtsis r+t+ti s+yo byug pa dang 'dra bar
207b6(skyes rabs): rus pa'i lhag ma can lus de des 'dzin par byed cing dus gcig gi tshe na/ ri'i gnas bzhin rnams dang dur khrod rnamasu kun nas 'khor bar gyur to// dus gang gi tshe yongasu ngal ba dang ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe shing gi rtsa ba 'ga'
208a1(skyes rabs): zhig na ngal bsro ste/ de'i lus dri ma dang bral ba'i chu bo la khrus byas nas nyi ma'i 'od zer rtsub pas bdag gi khyim thab kun nas nga lA zhes bya ba brjod cing // skad cig tu ni keng rus dkar po de// rim rje'i gyis
208a2(skyes rabs): pad rtsa ma yin pas ni byugs// de'i mgo las skyes pa 'phongs pa'i mgo lA ni// gsal zhing ut+pal sngon po'i phreng ba bcings par gyur// kun nas dmar ba'i ma dbo ma nags kyi nang nas ni// nye bar btus nas rna ba'i bu gar nye bar
208a3(skyes rabs): sbyor bar gyur// dpral ba dkar po'i ri mo mthong la btsag gis ni// thig le kun nas rdzogs par byed pa nyid du gyur// so rnams rtsu ba gsal ba mang ba'i rgya skyegs kyis// tshon gyis dmar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa byas par gyur// kun
208a4(skyes rabs): nos 'khrugs pa'i pad+ma'i rtsa ltar dkar bI'i 'od// lag pa gnyis pa me tog rtsa ni sbyar bar 'gyur// srab pa'i mar me'i rtse mo'i mig sman gyis nag pa// mag mtshams gnyis kyi shul bdag rim gyis byisngo bar gyur// rgya chen
208a5(skyes rabs): mig gi bug pa dag la rgod bcas pas// mig thur yang nas yang du 'khor zhing gnaso// de nas sprin med zla bri'i 'od zer gyis dag pa// pad+mo'i lo ma'i nang na chu nI bzhug byas te// rgod po sngon du 'gro ba tsA ni g+ho keng rus des// dga'
208a6(skyes rabs): pas rnam par lta bar byed cing kun nas smras// khyod kyi lus ni rgyan rnams nges par byas pa ni// skal bzang nyid kyis dga' ba nyid du nyer song ba// dri ma med pa'i chur me long 'di la khyod// rtse lden re zhig bzhin gyi zla ba rnam lta mdzod//
208b1(skyes rabs): de nas mtshan mo 'ongs pa dang mi'i rus pa bzhi sa la bsgos zhing de'i dbu su ni mdab ma rnams kun nas bkram ste pad+mo'i mdab ma rnams kyi mal cha rnams bkod nas/ keng rus de la 'phags pa'i sras tshur shog/ a ka ru dang spos
208b2(skyes rabs): kyi bsgos shing gnas pa'i khang pa bdag gis brtsams pa 'dir glang po che phrug gu'i so'i rang bzhin rkang pa dang ldan pa 'jam pa'i mal cha dang bcas pa la zhugs shig ces smraso// de nas mon lugs rnams kyis ni dum byas te// keng
208b3(skyes rabs): rus de yis kha la dgos par byas nas ni// de la de nyid du ni rmongs byas kun 'khyud de// me yis snang bar byas pa shing khang mthar ni nyal// de nas byang chub sems dpas slob ma dang rjesu 'gro ba skye bo'i drung nas mngon par 'ongs
208b4(skyes rabs): te/ skye bo rnams kyi drung nas bud med de gdon gyi gzung ba mthong nas slob ma la smras pa/ yang dag ma yin kun+da brtags kyis// de ltar skye bo 'di rmongs pa// shin tu bdag 'dzin byed bya ste// tsai ltararo dngos po med pa yang // bdag
208b5(skyes rabs): gi nad ldan rnams kyi nad// sman rnams kyis ni zad par byas// bud med de yis gdon thabs kyis// bdag gis zad par byed par 'gyur// ji ltar me tog mthe bo ni// med par sor mos 'dzin mi 'gyur// de bzhin thabs dang
208b6(skyes rabs): rnam bral ba'i// bya ba 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// slob mos smras pa/ blo dang ldan pa rnams la ni nus par bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba ci zhig yod de/ bdag nyid chen po de yang snying rje'i kha lo sgyur bas rab tu bskul bar
209a1(skyes rabs): gyur pa'i yid kyi rta khyim du mi 'gro zhing // nyin mo byed pa nub pa'i dus kyis mtshams bgrod par dka' ba la ma brtsis shing / nges par bud med de khyim dang yongasu 'dris par dur khrod kyis nyid la mngon
209a2(skyes rabs): par dga' bar byed snyam du rnam par bsams te/ 'bar ba'i sreg blugs 'dzin pa'i snang bas n+ya gro d+ha'i shing la gnas pa'i bya rgod dang bya'i mtha' ma gsal bar byos pa/ mes 'jigs pa dang 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la
209a3(skyes rabs): sa pa'i gla ngo bo che'i tshogs ltar nag pa'i yun ring po nas mun pas lta par gyur pa dang 'dra bar lce sbrang gi tshogs kyi yu lus mi snang bar byas pa dang / bar med par rtsub pa'i skra shad kyis si'i dkyil khyab pa dang / me'i
209a4(skyes rabs): dbus su btsos bzhin pa'i kha zlum pa'i mi lus dang ldan pa dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba sar pa ltar kun nas dkor ba'i sdug pa rnams kyi khyab pa dang / 'ga' zhig tu ri mor bris pa'i bum pa'i gyo mo rnams kyis par mtshams med
209a5(skyes rabs): pa dang / phyed tshig pi'u shi ba'i gos dri ma can gyi dum bu rnams kyi kun nis khyab pa dang / nye bar gnas pa'i sha za'i bud med kyi skye bo rnams kyi mi'i sha rnam par 'god par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan blo bur du byung ba'i skyes
209a6(skyes rabs): pa rnams kyi sha chen 'tshong bar gyur pa dang / gang zhig tu tshig par gyur pa'i lus las 'pho bar gyur pa'i tshil gyi thig pa'i phreng ba rnams kyis gsol ba'am shi bar gyur pa dang / rab tu tsha ba'i me lces kun nas domar
209b1(skyes rabs): skye'i rtsa bas steng du chu 'dzin pa ltar sngo ba'i sin d+hu ra dang rams kyis bcos pa'i snam bu gnyis dang 'dra ba'i du ba'i tshogs chen pos steng nas bsgribs par byas pa dang / skye bo ma lus pa rnams yid 'byung ba skyed par 'dod pa nyid dang
209b2(skyes rabs): 'dra ba'i mi rtag pa gsal bar byas pa dang / shi ba'i lus kyi rang bzhin g.yul por gnas dang 'dra bar shin tu 'jigs pa swa hA'i bdag pa'i rlung gi shugs kyi rnam par 'dar ba yi// kun nas spyan drangs ltar ni 'bar ba'i 'od
209b3(skyes rabs): ldan mi rnams kyis 'byung ba'i lci spyang pho mo'i tshogs ltar g+ho ka'i sgra ldan pa// dogs pa med pa'i yid can des ni dur khrod zhugs par gyur// bud med de ni gang na gnas par 'gyur snyam du kun nas 'khor zhing // des sha za mo
209b4(skyes rabs): rnams kyi lus kyi bya ba de rnams kun nas mthong nas/ slob ma'i bsrung ba'i sngags kyis gtsug pud 'ching bar byas par gyur to// der yang mi'i khrag gis dpral bar thig le byas nas ni// gser skya'i smin mtshams gnyis ldan
209b5(skyes rabs): chen po'i lta ba tsano// khyo bos 'dzin par byas pa rno ba'i so ldan pa'i// dgra sta la ni la la zhig gi gdong mthong gyuraro// khrag gri chang gi gang ba zla ba ltar dkar pa// thod pa'i snod ni gzhan gyis sa lA rnam bkod nas// g.yo ba'i chu'i
209b6(skyes rabs): dbus gnas pa'i zla ba ltar g.yo ba'i// dgra sta g.yam pa la ni brdar bar byas par gyur// me'i tsha bas btsum par byas pa'i mig ldan pa// gzhan dag mi ni phyed ni tshig pi'i lus ldan pa// lhung zhing dro ba'i rkang dmar cha ldan zhu ba ni//
210a1(skyes rabs): blo bur du ni dur khrod dbus nas 'gugs par 'gyur// khrag 'dzag pa yI rkang dmar cha yis nye bar byugs pa yi// rdo lA kha chu skyes bzhin pas ni rnam par bzhag pa ni// skyes pa'i dum bu
210a2(skyes rabs): bcag pas yang dag 'byung ba'i 'jigs sgra ldan// gzhan dag gis ni rdo bas rnam par gcod pa nyid du 'gyur// mdza' bo'i lag pa'i mthil gyis nye bar khyer bar byed bzhin pa// ya ba'i me tog ltor ni mngon par
210a3(skyes rabs): dmar po dmar ldan pa// thod ba yang dag glanas pa'i khrag gi chung gri gzhan drag ni// 'gyur ba'i gdong can sha dang nye bar bcas pa 'thung bar 'gyur// sha zo mo de rnams kyang 'di ltar bya ba la rtse gcig par yang dag
210a4(skyes rabs): par mthong nas// e ma'o mtshan mo rgyu ba 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin ni drag pa ste// drag pa zhes bya ba rnam par bsnams nas phyogs gzhan la// sha dang 'bras kyi 'ga' zhig tu// chung bcas nya yis 'ga' zhig kyang
210a5(skyes rabs): sA'i mthar thug khyab pa ni// ri yi gter mas 'ba' zhig tu// dur khrod me li grib mras ni// gosal bar byas pa'i lus ldan+do pa// shugs dang bral ba'i ril grir ldan// phyogs skyong rnams kyi snang bar byas// rig
210a6(skyes rabs): bi'i dngos grub mngon par 'dod pa'i// brtan par bzlas pas rab 'gul chu// bdag nyid chen po rab 'byung pos// dbus su byin gyis brlabs par byas// thal ba rtse gsumo rnams bkod pas// bar du 'gro bar byas pa/
210b1(skyes rabs): ni/ me tog dmar po kun khyab pa'i// dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur// 'ga' zhig tu yang khrag gis mngon par dmar bar byas pa'i so dang ldan pa'i ri dwags skyon can rnams kyi kun nas dbugs phyung bar gyur pa'i
210b2(skyes rabs): phyir rgyu ma'i dra ba rdol ba/ mdab chags rnams kyi mchus mig phyung ba'i bu grwa rnams kyi 'jig su rung bri'i gdong dang ldan pa/ shrI bi'i chom rkun pas 'tsho ba'i yo byad phrogs par byas pa'i bud med mthong nas yid 'byung
210b3(skyes rabs): ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ kye ma 'dod chags dang ldan pa rnams kyis 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid du 'dug pa ste/ gang rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i lus la bde ba'i blo skye bar 'gyur snyam nas smras pa/ yang yang kun nas nyams
210b4(skyes rabs): pa 'dod cing 'dod pa ni// skye bo'i myig gi bung ba'i tshogs kyi gang zhig la// de ni de ring bud med ljon shing las byung ba'i// yid 'ongs mdzes rgod me tog ji ltar mthong mi 'gyur// yan lag med pa khyod kyi rgod pa'i bdag
210b5(skyes rabs): nyid kyis// gang la mnga' ba stan sngon du yang dag 'gegs pa ste// khyod kyi de rnying bud med lus can de la ni// skyon can btsan thabs kyis ni ci phyir mda' mi gtong // gang zhig yang yang 'dod pa'i bdag nyid 'khyud byas pa//
210b6(skyes rabs): pabags pas g.yogs la 'dod chags can gyi skye bo gang // de ring do 'di rus pa'i rang bzhin lus 'di ni// sna ni 'gegs pa nyid ni spangs nas 'gro bar 'gyur// mchi ma dang bcas mig ldan pa'i ngo gdong 'di ni ci phyir 'dud mi
211a1(skyes rabs): byed// ri bong can gyi gdong can skyon dang bral ba'i mthun pa bdag la don med khros pas ci// de ltar nges par rjod par byed pa'i bdag pos gang la mgo bo rnams zhugs pa// de yi rkang pa gnyis po la nI 'di yi khyed
211a2(skyes rabs): rnams kyis ni so rnams gnas// bde bu myong zhing smig rgyu rjesu 'chol zhing kun nas skye bar gyur pa'i 'dod pa can// ngal ba byis pa'i skye bo sems kyi ri dgas sngon du gang gis bkri bar byas pa ni// 'bad pas 'dod pa'i lha yi rngon paso
211a3(skyes rabs): de ni brtsams par gyur pa ji ltar gang gis kyang // snang rung min pa'i gzugs can gyis ni chung rol pa'i rang bzhin 'dra ba rnams chad byas// de ltar bdag nyid chen po de bud med kyi lus mthong bas 'dod chags dang bral bu yang
211a4(skyes rabs): dag par byung bas skyes par gyur pa/ kye mya mi ro'i dri mi zhom pas spyi'i dbang po skyo bar byas pa/ sdong khang gi me'i du bas yang dag par rog pas bdag nyid mi gtsang ba rloms par byed pa ni 'di lta ste 'di yang chu 'dzin lto ba'i 'od ni
211a5(skyes rabs): 'phrog pa'i du ba 'dis ni yun+do ring por song ba yi// dur khrod las byung rnam par 'phro byed 'od ni 'phro ba dri ma can+da du khyer bar byed// chu gter rlabs ldan chu la khrus ni byas ltar bgrung pos khyabA pa rim gyi nub pa ni// ri bong n+dan ni zla
211a6(skyes rabs): tshechos gos rlom lta bur 'dzin cing ji ltar yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ slob mas smras pa/ bdag gi sdug bsngal mi bzod cing // the tshom byed par gyur pa yang // gzhan gyi rjes 'dzin bya ba'i phyir// so so'i skye bos nus pa min// byang
211b1(skyes rabs): chub sems dpas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pas yang dag pararla mngon par smras te/ da ni de bas na ma me'i khyim rnying pa 'di ru dur khrod kyi sreg lugs 'dzin po'i snang bas rtsig nges la bris bI'i b+hu kye khrag gi rtse gsum pa gsal bar byas
211b2(skyes rabs): ba la rje su zhugs te/ mtshan mo'i lhag mda' bar byed cing / de nas shrId+hi gi kun nas mtshan pa'i sgo dang dril bu'i tshogs ldan pa// rgyal mtshan la lhung rma byi'i mgrin pa rdul ni 'byung ba'i sa ldan pa// phyi dang nang du me tog rnying po ro
211b3(skyes rabs): skud rnams kyis nyer bsags pa// ma he'i mgo bo gang la bya rgod 'di ni nges par gnas par yin// slob mas smras pa/ mkhan po ji ltar bka' stsol po bzhin du bya'o zhes zer ro// de nas ke sha bsom me'i khyim dar zhugs
211b4(skyes rabs): nas cung zad gnyid ldog par byas te/ so sor rnam par snang bar byas nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa phyi rol tu byung la re zhig mtshan mo'i lhag ma ci tsam yod pa de shes par byos shig/ des kyang de ltar bgyi zhes so sor mnyan
211b5(skyes rabs): nas mngon par byung ste smras pa/ mkhan po tho rangs nyid yin te de ltar na/ mtshan mo chad par shes nas shing gi tshad 'dra la ni bzod pa can nyid la brten paru byed// zad par gyur pa'i bud shing ldan pa ro bsregs mi'i 'od
211b6(skyes rabs): rnams cung zad dri ma can 'dzin te/ nyi ma shar ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba rnams kyi rigs par 'gyur ba'i sa 'dzin rnams kyi grib ma rnams// bar ni sngo bar byas pa'i bung ba ltar ni ser skya'i 'di ldan sa phyogs mnyam par skye ba
212a1(skyes rabs): yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyir byung ste slob ma la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pas nud pa rnams nad med par bya ba'i phyir grong khyer du song zhig dang / bdag gis kyang khyo shi ba thabs gang gis kyang 'gyur ba med par
212a2(skyes rabs): bya'o zhes zer ro// slob mas kyang de ltar bgyi'o zhes bya bso de la gsong por smras te shin tu ring bar grong khyer du song bar gyur to// byang chub semaso dpas kyang bud med dka' thub can de slar gang na yod par gyur snyam du bsams
212a3(skyes rabs): nas de lta ba'i phyir kun nas yongasu 'khor bar gyur to// na chung de yang langs te bdag po'i lus de la bzung nas chu bo la mngon par 'gro bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par song ste de'i nyal ba'i gnas
212a4(skyes rabs): mthong nas 'di ltar bsams par gyur te 'dir ni dka' thub can ma de nyal bar 'gyur pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na pad+mo'i mdab ma rnams kyis mal ni byas pa 'di srab pa'i drod kyis mdab ma dud kha rnying byas pa// mtshan ma nye bar
212a5(skyes rabs): mnan pas dbus ni nam nub cing // mal ni de dang bral bas rnam snang 'gyur// de nas bdag po'i lus 'dzin pa de chu bor 'gro bzhin pa mthong nas oM ma thabs dang bcas par 'di ni nad dang bral bar bya'o snyam du rnam par bsam
212a6(skyes rabs): nas bdag nyid chen po des bud med shi ba'i lus phrag pa la bkal te// bud med de la rjesu 'brang bar gyur to// des kyang rus pa'i keng rus de 'gram gyi shing gi sdong po la bcings nas bzhag cing smras po/ re zhig 'phags pa'i
212b1(skyes rabs): pa'i sras stod cig/ da nI khyod ni shing 'di la// gdong pa 'khru ba'i chu de ni// ji srid bdag gI sA khyed la 'ong // gdong pa bkrus pa gnyis bral bsdu// dkar drang dmar ba'i mig ldan pa// 'gi wang u shir mdab rnams kyis// khyod ni
212b2(skyes rabs): brgyan par 'gyur ba yin// de ltar mngon par smras nas de'i chu'i chu bo la 'jug cing rang gi grib ma kun nas dga' ba'i me long gi dbus ltar dri ma med pa'i chu las rnam par bltas nas nges par bud med 'di bdag gis khyo 'phrog
212b3(skyes rabs): par 'dod do snyam du rnam par bsams nas/ bdag nyid kyi grib ma 'di ltar kun nas sdig shing gnas te// 'khyog cing rgyas pa'i smin ma kun bskyod cing // rgod par gsal bar byas pa'i so'i phreng ba can// skyon can ma mi phang
212b4(skyes rabs): 'dod nges par bud med khyod// bdag gi mdza' bo khyod ni yid 'phrog 'dod ma yin// rgod pa yid du 'ong bas rnam par chags byed pa// yid 'phrog mig gi mtha' mas rnam par blta bas kyang // bdag gi mdza' bo dul ba ngo tsha med
212b5(skyes rabs): pa khyod// ci ltar bdag las g.yo ba can khyod dgos med gyur// khyon rgod pa gsal bar byed cing bdag gi ni// mdza' bo lce sbyong mo yang bsam par mi byed// de ltar na yang rmongs ma ldog par mi 'gyur te// don med kun nas
212b6(skyes rabs): 'khor bar byed pa 'gro bar gyis// skyes pas kun nas 'ongs te gal te brtan 'dod na// de nas skye bo la ni bud med chung bar 'gro// 'dod par ma byas khyod ni gal te nan gyi 'dod byed ma// rgod pa'i dngos po la ni gang gis gtang mi
213a1(skyes rabs): byed/ bdag gi khyod ni 'di ltar kun nas skrag byas kyang // nan gyi bdag gi mdza' bo 'di ni gal te 'dzin// de bas khyod la skyon nyid bzed par mi 'gyur te// gang phyir phrag dog yid ni shin tu
213a2(skyes rabs): gdung bar byed// bdag gis de ltar khyad par rtsub par smras kyang ni// nga rgyal dang bcas ci phyir ni rgod 'gyur// ci'i phyir tha mal pa'i khyim la 'di brjod pa// mdzes ma don med ngal pa kyog po 'tshong ba ni// de ltar gdon gyi
213a3(skyes rabs): dran pA nyams pa khro ba dang bcas pa// des ni ngi gdong khro gnyer mig g.yo bar ni byas pa s+ho// dri ma med pa'i chu'i nang ni gnas pI'i'u sgra sgrogs shing // rang gi grib ma la yang rdo ba rnams kyi kun brdungs 'gyur// rang gi grib dang
213a4(skyes rabs): lhan cig chu la gnas pas phrag dog bcas// de ni 'di ltar byed cing yang yang rtso do pa'i thad gnas pa// 'khrul 'khor shin tu dri med gsal ba'i so'i phreng ba can// de las skyes pa'i ngo mtshar dang 'dra rung ba'i rang bzhin dang /
213a5(skyes rabs): de nas bud med de gal te bdag gis de ltar rdo ba rnams kyi kun nas brdungs par gyur pa yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur na de'i phyir bdag gI 5 skye bzung na der 'gro bar 'gyur te// gang du slar 'di mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa zhes
213a6(skyes rabs): bya ba bdag nyid kyi grib ma de la smras nas lus de phrag pa la bkal te song bar gyur to// ci'i phyir skyes pa 'di slar bud med 'dzin cing 'bros par gyur pa re zhig 'di la dri bar bya'o snyam du rnam par bsams nas/ ke sha'i
213b1(skyes rabs): drung du nye bar 'ongs te smras pa// bdag gi khyo dang ldan pa 'gre zhing rnam par 'gro zhing rnam mthong nas// khyed ni kun nas dogs par gyur pa ci phyir 'bros// bdag nyid chen po bdag ni sha za'i bud med min// de bas dogs pa dor cing
213b2(skyes rabs): bdag la nyer bstan 'dir// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sring mo bdag ni khyod la 'jigs pa ma yin te// 'on kyang skyes pa gzhan la sdang bar byed pa'i chung ma 'di bzung nas gang du mi rnams yed pa ma yin pa der
213b3(skyes rabs): 'gro bar bgyi'o// khyod kyi khyo bo 'di ni lhan cig chos spyod ma// bdag gis 'di la mnyes gshin par ni gzhan yang lha// khyo ni mdza' bo yang ni mthong nas ngo tsha bas// bdag gi mdza' bo mig gnyis po ni 'dzums par byed//
213b4(skyes rabs): ji ltar kun nas mthong ste yang yang rnam par dga'// gsal bar byed cing 'jam par byas nas ngo mtshar byed// de ltar bdag gi lhan cig chos spyod ma 'di la// khyod kyi mdzu' bo 'di ni 'phrog byed kun nas rtogs// bdag gi
213b5(skyes rabs): bud med 'di ni dga' bar byed mthong nas// mdzes pa'i mig ni brla dang 'o 'dzin gnyis mdzes pa// thub po rnams kyi sems kyang gzhan du 'gyur po ste// bud med khyod ni 'dod pa can 'dam lta ci smos// de bas 'di ni ri bong can
213b6(skyes rabs): gyis dkyil 'khor ltar// bzhin ldan rang gi mdzes pas lha dbang bud med ni// ngo tsha dang bcas dbu ma ltar ni dbang chen gyis// lus la bzung nas sa 'dzin rnams kyi phug rnamasu// bdag nyid kyis ni yun ring gnas par bgyi
214a1(skyes rabs): ba lags/ des smras pa/ 'phags pas 'di ltar kun nas dogs par bya ba ma yin te/ khyod kyi chung ma tshul khrims bzang ldan phyir// 'di ni ji ltar skyes pa gzhan lnga sdang // gzhan gyis khyim thab
214a2(skyes rabs): spong pa'i sems ldan pa// de bzhin bdag gi khyo bo 'di yang yin// rang gi bzang me 'di ni khyed kyis rnam brgyan cing // bdag kyang mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis tsog car gnas par bgyi// tshul khrims sdug bsngal mnyam pa
214a3(skyes rabs): rnams la grogs po nyid// shes bya'i grags pa 'bras bu dang ni bcas par gyis// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod ni bdag po'i tshul khrims zhes// gal te bud med mchog bden nam// de bas chu bo 'di brtan nas//
214a4(skyes rabs): bdag cag 'dir ni gcig tu gnas// des smras pa/ blo ldan 'phags pa'i sras kyis ni// tshul khrims ji ltar ma shes nas// khyed la 'di ltar ma shes nas// khyed la 'di ltar smra 'gyur ba// de bas dogs pa yongasu dor// de
214a5(skyes rabs): ltar bgyi zhes bya ba yang byang chub sems dpas mkhas blangs chu bo'i 'gram gyi shring gi rtsa ba la rus pa'i keng rus de bzhag nus rgyan byed pa'i phyir btsams pa lo bud med des kyang bdag nyid kyi khyo shi bi'i lus la brgyan par
214a6(skyes rabs): byas te// gnyid kyi dbang du song bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas de gnyid log par shes nas// gnyis po de dag skye ni thag pas dero bcings te// lus gnyis bkrus pa'i pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba// 'gram gyi mtha'
214b1(skyes rabs): mar gom pa sgra med nyer song nas// chu bo de la ma dpyad par ni dor bar gyur// mya ngan gyis nI ha ha zhes brjod thangs shes pa// de nas gnyid kyi dbang song de la des ni rab bsangs nas// bdag gi mdza' bo khyod kyi bdag po 'di ni
214b2(skyes rabs): 'phogs pa ste// de ltar shin tu phongs pa'i yi ge dang lhun de smras gyur// de nas gnyis po bdag kyang shi ba'i lus gnyis chus khyer bar gyur pa kun nas mthong zhing kyi hu dA ha ha zhes bya ba brjod cing chu bo de'i 'gram nas mngon
214b3(skyes rabs): par rgyug par gyur te/ de dag de ltar myur rgyug cing // ro gnyis rnam par mthong ba dag/ dbu ba 'khor zhing g.yo ba yis// chu bo de ni rgod dang 'dra// de nas bud med de chu bo'i 'gram nas rgyug cing shi ba'i ro la mig mtsha mas
214b4(skyes rabs): yongasu gang ba dang ldan pas yang nas yang du 'di ltar ngan pa smra bar gyur pa// gang zhig u shi ri'i rnam pa'i byugs rnams kyis// gsal ba'i dris ni bdag gis khyod brgyan pa// gzhan gyi khyim thabs 'phrog pa khyod
214b5(skyes rabs): brgyan pa// gzhan gyi khyim thabs 'phrog pa khyod kyis ni// mnyes gshin 'bras bu de 'di gsal bar byas// bdag gi bstod tshig bar mtshams ma chad dang / lag pa yang dag 'dzin dang gus lto dang / shin tu drag po'i
214b6(skyes rabs): sems ldan khyod kyis ni// ji ltar gsum po 'di ni bsam ma byas// shin tu 'jam pa bdag gi bud med ni// skal bzangs gal te yang ni 'dir 'gyur na// de lta na yang rtag tu rjes 'jug 'dir// 'phags min bdag ni/
215a1(skyes rabs): dor bar byed mdzes min// bud med rnams kyi yid ni gso ba ste// skye bo'i grags pa 'di ni mi bden 'gyur// bdag nyid dam pA di ring dor nas 'gro// skyes pa rnams la bden nyid khyod kyi bzhag
215a2(skyes rabs): gzhan gyi bud med la ni chags pa rnams 'grel khyed nyid la// mnyes gshin med pa'i so mas ldan brtse dang dul ba rnams bral ba// bdag gi tshig ni phongs shing phongs 'di gnas pa ma yin te// tsha ba'i
215a3(skyes rabs): lcags la nyung ba'i chu ni rnam par blugs pa bzhin// de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar shi ba'i lus la ngan pa smra bzhin pa de la skad cig gis sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / skad cig gis khro ba dang ldan pa
215a4(skyes rabs): dang / skad cig gi skye sngags 'don po de smras pa/ mnyes gshon pa dang bral ba'i yid ldan khrel dang rnam bral ba// 'jig rten smod pa la ni rgyab phyogs g.yo bye mngon brtson pa// mnyes gshin skyo bo ngan pa la
215a5(skyes rabs): gang zhig 'di ltar mngon smra ba// rmongs pas don med dgon par ngu ba deste ni byed par 'gyur// bdag gis ni khyod la yang dang yang du smras pa ste/ ci ltar khyod kyi khyo bo 'di dag gis bud med ngo tsha byas thur du lta
215a6(skyes rabs): ba'i gdong can la yang rgod sgregs pa dang bcas par lta ba nges par 'di bdog gis bud med 'dod pa zhes zer ro// de la yang khyod kyis dad par bya ba ma yin no zhes de ltar smras nas bdag nyid chen po des lhan cig
215b1(skyes rabs): skyes pa ma yin pa'i smre sngags 'di ltar byas par gyur to// sgeg mo des ni bdag gi mig ni 'dzin byed cing // kun nas 'dzeg pa'i mchi mas mig ni bkag byas pa// bud med khyed ni srog dang mnyam pa des bdag gi/
215b2(skyes rabs): mdza' mo 'phrogs to nyi mar ldan pas mtshon mo ltar// bdag ni de dang bral bas brtan pa rnyed 'gyur min// rtag tu rjes 'brel glang chen gyis ni glang mo ltar// bdag dang bral bas des kyang brtan pa thob mi 'gyur// ri
215b3(skyes rabs): dgas mo ni nus med ri dgas dang bral ltar// de ltar byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don zhing bud med de gos kyis mgrin par bcings te gus par byed cing smras pa/ de byas tha snyad phyir shong cig/ rgyal bar nges
215b4(skyes rabs): byar bdag tsAg 'gro/ yang na bdag gi mo 'ongs shigo// bdag nyid ngan pa de sa 'phrigs pa// de ltar byang chub sems dpas 'gugs par gyur pa de 'jigs pas yid skyo nas smras pa/ da ni bdag gi chung ma de
215b5(skyes rabs): yod bar tso'i phyir nus te 'phags pas bka' drin mdzod cig dang / bdag gis sringamo'i bu mo yod// cung zad nu ma mngon 'byung ba// slob ma bzang la sngags bzhin du// bdag gi khyed la de sbyin gyi// byang
215b6(skyes rabs): chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag la lha'i bu mo gzhan gyis kyang dgos pa yod pa ma yin te/ mchog gi gdong can chung ma de khrid la shog ces smraso// gal te khyod kyi de mo'o// bdag gi bud mdo g.yon lha'i
216a1(skyes rabs): mig/ rdo ba chen po 'di yis ni// khyod kyi mgo bo phye mar bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo ba blangs nas bud med de la kun nas brdung bar 'dod pa bzhin du khro gnyer gsal bar byaso// de nas
216a2(skyes rabs): bud med de 'jigs pas 'phags pa bku' drin mdzod cigo dang // bdag ni phongs po dang gnyer 'dun med pa rnam par 'jigs pa 'os pa ma yin te// nongs par byas kyang bud med skye bo ni// rang bzhin gyi phongs skyo bzangs
216a3(skyes rabs): brtse bar byed// de ltar khros 'di sdud mdzod cig/ blo gros brtan pa bdag ni bsad bya min// de ltar smras nas byang chub sems dpa' rkang pa dag la gtugs par gyur to// de nas bdag nyid chen po des 'jigs pa de
216a4(skyes rabs): shes nas smras pa// gal tre khyod kho cag gi tshig byed par gyur na de bas na bdag gi rdo ba nyid khyed kyi mgo bo la phrog par 'gyur ba ma yin no// des smras pa/ khyod kyi bka' ni bdag gis 'dra' bar bya ba ma yin te/
216a5(skyes rabs): 'phags pas smras par 'os so zhes zer ro// byang chub sems dra bas smras pa/ gal te khyod ni 'da' bar mi byed na bde ba dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dri bas na nyon cig dang / khyod kyis khyo bo shi ba yi// lus po de ni
216a6(skyes rabs): phrags par khyer// de ltar rmongs pa rnams shos na// mun pa bzhin du dor bar gyis// yang dang yang du 'gro 'gro zhing // yang dang yang du steng du 'byung // skye dgu'i bdag po lag thob pa// skyo 'di pho long bzhin du byed// nan
216b1(skyes rabs): gyis dus min gsod par byed pa su yi 'di// mi rtag pa nyid gzugs ni mnan nas 'byung ba min// rab tu drag pa'i shugs dang ldan pa rlung gis ni// 'gro ba chu gter tshogs ni rings min 'byung ba bzhin// dus mtha' dus
216b2(skyes rabs): la rab tu stobs ldan mes 'bar ba// yang yang lho zlum po'i nya'i kun nas khyab// sa 'og gnas pa 'jigs pa'i sbrul ldan pa// rgya mtsho chen po yang ni zad par 'gro ba min// sna tshogs pa yi dpag bsam shing gis bIr
216b3(skyes rabs): brgyan pa// lha'i bud med rnams kyis pad+mo'i chu brten po// gser gyi phung po mau yI rnam par zhu ba ni// ri rab kyang ni ras byol bzhin du yang bar 'gyur// mchod sbyin brgya'i yid ni 'phrog pa rnams spangs nas// lha rnams kyis ni
216b4(skyes rabs): grong khyer lha min rab tshwa ba// 'byor pa 'bar ba gang du yang ni 'gro 'gyur te// smin rnams zed la sgeg pa med pa'i glog bzhin no// 'di dag kyang ni mun pa rnams rgyas 'bigs byed pa// nyin dang mtshan mo'i khyad par dag ni
216b5(skyes rabs): ldan po ltar// 'gro ba'i mar mo nyi bsil ba'i 'od zer dag/ dmar po'i stobs ldan dkyil 'khor snang bar gyur pa min// gang zhig skye ba dang ldan cung zad sa gsum po 'diro yod// de dag thams cad nyid ni nges par
216b6(skyes rabs): 'jig pa'i mtha' ma can// de ltar shes na ske dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rjes 'brel ba'o// 'jig rten la ni rnam skyo zhi ba nyid la yid gtang bya// gang zhig blo ngan gnyen 'dun rnams la gnyis gshin nges zhugs byed // de ni
217a1(skyes rabs): tha mA yongs gdung mya ngan byed cing nyer 'gro ba// 'jigs pa'i chu srin la brten chu bo'i dbus dag zhes// rgya mtsho rA gzings dang bral bas rab tu ltung ba ster bar byed// su yi rnam bral yod par mi
217a2(skyes rabs): 'gyur te// skye bo mnyes gshin de ring mi 'gyur ba// bzang mo 'byung bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur ba// de nas khyed kyis mya ngan bsang bar gyis// de ltar bud med des byang chub sems dpa'i tshig yang dag par shes nas
217a3(skyes rabs): dran pa nye bar rnyed pas smras pa/ e ma'o khyod kyi gdams sdug gi mar me 'dis gang nas kyang 'ongs pa ci yang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa mun pa bsal po zhes bya ba'o// khyed la brten nas bdag gi sems// ji
217a4(skyes rabs): ltar sos pa nyer song ba// de bzhin yang dag lam 'jigs nas// khyed kyang mya ngan 'das thob shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpas dud med de rang bzhin du gnas pa bzung nas gnyen 'dun rnams kyi mdun du khrid par gyur to// /
217a5(skyes rabs): thabs 'di ni bdag gis bud med 'di la gdon de kun nas gsal bar byaso zhes bya ba yang rang gi slob ma rnams la smras par gyur te// bdag nyid chen po der song ba la yang 'jigs pa dang 'dra ba grong khyer de las nad rnams
217a6(skyes rabs): slar rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ro// de nas der la la zhig blo gros gsal ba'i nye gnos pas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di ltar yang dag par bstod cing gnas te/ khyod kyi shes pa lhag byas nas// blo ljon rnams kyi blo rnams
