244a1(skyes rabs): byung nas lhung bar gyur// mdun du yod bzhin rnams la yang // 'bras bu mang ba de dag gis// za 'dod de yi kha las ni// 'bras bu kun nas 'gugs par 'gyur// de ltar spre'u tru gA de dag/ bya ba ngan pa de dang pa//
244a2(skyes rabs): snying rje bzang po'i sems ldan phyir// bu dag gi ltar nges bzod 'gyur// kun+da nas mnyam pa'i sems ldan pa// bde dang sdug bsngal ma bstod pa'i// kun gtso dam pa rnams kyi yid // glang du yang ni nge lo mi 'gyur// de nas dus gcig
244a3(skyes rabs): gi tshe na kun nas rtsub cang gshog pa'i tshogs rgyas pa 'khyog cing rtsub pa'i sen mo'i rtse mo dang ldan par rang bzhin gyi drag po'i mig can gang du yang sha'i zas ma rnyed pa na mkha'i mthil du kun nas 'khor te/ rno ba'i spu gri ltar
244a4(skyes rabs): mchu rno ba spu gri can zhes bya ba'i bya rgod sgra dang bcas shing shugs dang ldan pa ma dpyad pa byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la nye bar 'jug pa 'bras bu myang bsu bskyod cing dkar la srab pa'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i spre'u'i phru gu dag
244a5(skyes rabs): 'jigs pas kha phye zhing rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdong pa dang ldan pa/ skad shin tu rtsub po dag gis bzung nas shin tu myur ba bar snang la 'phur te kha ba can gyi ri'i rtse mor gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpas kyang kyi hud kyi hud
244a6(skyes rabs): ces bya ba brjod nas gal te bdag gis bya rgod 'di rnam par gnon pas brnyas par gyur na/ slar 'di 'phur nas shin tu dka' ba'i rtse mo gzhan la gnas nas mchongs shing 'gro ba'i phru gu gnyis po 'di bsad par gyur na rnam pa
244b1(skyes rabs): thams cad du spre'u'i phru gu gnyis po 'di bdag gis blta bar nus pa ma yin te/ mngon par 'phel ba'i sdug bsngal gyis khyab mig ldan pa// skad ni rtsub pas rkan gyi bu ga mtshan byas pa// lto ba las 'dzag khrag gas spunA ni
244b2(skyes rabs): brlan byas po// bkresi paM dang ldan khra ltar shin tu rnams 'jigs pa// bya rgod 'dis ni sha ni rnam par gcod pa yi// shin tu spre'u'i phru gu gnyis po 'di la ni// 'bras bu rnams ni blangs nas de dag 'ongs pa yi// mdun du de ring
244b3(skyes rabs): bdag gos smra bar nus sam ci// g.yo ba dag ni mtsho chu 'thungs pas 'gyur ram ci// 'bras bu'i don du shing la 'dzegs nas gnas sam ci// yang na ri yi phug 'dir zhugs par gyur ta ma ci// 'on te sbrul 'ga' zhig gis
244b4(skyes rabs): 'dir ni de dag bsad// ri dgas bdag po khyod ni thur lta mi gnas pa ci// phru gu de 'dir gang du song gyur smra bar mdzod// de ltar rab tu mchongs 'gro kun nas phongs mig de dag gis// 'khrug pa'i tshig ldan ci ltar bdag gis de/
244b5(skyes rabs): dag nyan par 'gyur// de dag med pas yun+da ri pos ni nye bar dmigs byas nas// phyugu kun da ltar ni dkar ba'i so'i phreng bar ldan// mya ngan gyis ni kun nas nyer 'ongs de dag bya 'gyur to// 'chil bas bzung ba'i nya rnams
244b6(skyes rabs): ltar ni 'dar bar gyur pa rnams/ de bas 'di 'dir dus thob pa bdag gis sems te// ji srid stag gis sen mo'i myu gu'i rnam pa 'dzin pa'i mchus ni lto ba rnams phug nas// bya rgod 'di 'jigs ldan spre'u yi phru gu dag la
245a1(skyes rabs): sgyu ma rnams ni 'gugs mi byed// de srid bdug gis seng sde kha ba can gyi ri rtse'i mtha' mar mgrin lha'i gdong can 'dug nas ni// thabs ni sngon 'gro mnyam nyid kyis 'di bdug gis chos dang ma bral gnas pas khyed
245a2(skyes rabs): par 'gyur// de ltar rnam par bsams te bdag nyid chen po des bya rgod dang nye bar 'ongs te smras pa/ kye mad pa chags kyi mchog bdag gi lag par pha ma dag gi spre'u yi phru gu ba 'di dag gzhag pa ste/ de bas na khyed kyi 'di dag kha phye ba'i sa
245a3(skyes rabs): rnams kyis phongs pa'i gdong dang ldan pa skad rtsub pa dag bsad par rigs pa ma yin zhes zer te/ nges par khyed kyi yang phru gu rnams// sngar ni 'byung ba 'am yod pa ste// ci 'dra khyod kyis de rnams la// mnyes gaushin gzhan yang de lta bu// de
245a4(skyes rabs): ltar snying rje la dmigs nas// spre'u yi phrug pa mi bsad cig/ nad pa 'di dag zos nas kyang // khyed la tshim pa gton du med// kye hud de yi 'tshe ba smad// 'di 'dra ba dag la chags pa smad// gang zhig lus 'di rgyas pa 'di// gzhan la 'tshe bas khyed
245a5(skyes rabs): par 'gyur// mi shes pa ni chags pa skye// skyon dang bcas pa'i lus la yang // de rgyas don du mi shes pas// ngan 'gro'i rgyu'i las ni byed// bdag dang bdag gi med med phyir// gang zhig thams cad stong pa mthong // yang dag min pa'i rnam rtog/
245a6(skyes rabs): skyes// yid kyi mun pa de 'gegs min// gango tsha mun pa med pa'i phyir// mkhas pas de nyid thob 'gyur na// de tshe thar pa'i phyir 'gyur te// dge mi dge la rgyab kyi phyogs// seng ge las gzhan sha za su zhig yod min te// drag pa 'am zhes 'di ni
245b1(skyes rabs): sa la gsal ba ste// seng ge'i skyes gnas dka' ba yang ni bdag rten pa// chos las 'das min srog chags 'tshe ba 'di mi 'dod// nags 'di las ni ri dgas ma po bsten pa dang // ri dgas dgras ni bsad pa'am rang nyid kyi shi ba// mkha' gro
245b2(skyes rabs): mchog lag na mkhar 'khor zhing ltas nas ni// myur du 'gro ba 'ongs te de'i sha za 'gyur// me yi lce dang 'dra bar lus lu gdung byed cing // bkres pa chen po yang ni de bas bzod byas te// dmyal par nges par lhung ba'i phyir ni mi dgye pa// 'di
245b3(skyes rabs): 'dra ba ni bag yod dor bas ma byed cig/ nang du sems can rnams rus tshig ni chags pas tsheg tshig sgra yi hUM byed kyis ni 'jigs// me stag tshogs ni kun nas rgyas par byed cing mo lce chen po dmar zhing 'od mod 'jigs par ldan//
245b4(skyes rabs): g.yo ba'i 'bar bri'i tshogs ldan dmyal ba'i sreg blugs za ba rnams ni mkhas pa brjod bzhin pa// skye bo'i rnam par song pa rnams kyang mi bde byed na kun nas reg pa slar yang smos ci dgos// lcags kyi bum pa can la 'bar ba'i sgeg
245b5(skyes rabs): thugs 'dzin pa reg pas kun nas gdud pa li nI mig/ shin tu sgra sgrogs bskol ba kun nas bskyod pa'i myur nag gis ni kha dang mgrin pa gong ba'i phyir// rtsig pa la nI ri mo bris bu'i 'chis bzhin dmyal ba'i mi nI bris pa yang ni mtho
245b6(skyes rabs): byas te// ngan 'gro thob phyir rnam par 'tshe byed su zhig kyang ni drag pa'i rang bzhin las ni 'gyod mi byed// ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal nam mthong nas// gang zhig mi dge las mi 'gyod// mi'i rnam pa de la yang // yang na rdo bi'i snying can yang //
246a1(skyes rabs): de nas bya rgod des byang chub sems dpa'i chos bstan pas dang ba'i blo skyes shing mngon du phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ ri dgas kyi bdag po khyed kyis byis pa rnams kyis mtshan nyid gsal par mdzad pa ste/ da ni mkhas
246a2(skyes rabs): pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid khyed kyis bshad por 'os so zhes zer ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dang ba'i yid dang ldan pa 'di shes nas smras pa/ gal te de lnga yin na de bas na mkhas pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid nyon cig ces ze ro// rnyed dang ma rnyed/
246a3(skyes rabs): bya la phan par smra ba'i grogs po la'am sdang ba la// bstod pa dang ni smad po la 'am yo byad che ba la 'am rgud pa la// gang zhig nye bar zhi bas rnam par dag pa'i yid kyis rnam par 'gyur mi 'gro// de ni shes rab can rnams kyis ni steng gnas
246a4(skyes rabs): 'od zer ldan rnams kyis ni nyi ma bzhin// yang na mkhas pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid zlos pa 'dis khyod la ci zhig bya ste// sne'u yi phya gu 'di dag rnam par gtang bar gyis shig/ bdag nyid kho na bdag gi khyed la rab tu sbyin par bya zhes ze'o// khyed kyis sha ni
246a5(skyes rabs): zos shig khrag kyang btung bar gyis// g.yo ba med pa bdag gi mig dag kyang thon cig/ de ltar smras nas rnam par 'dzums dang bral ba'i mig can de// yun ring rnam par 'dar ba med pa'i luso can gyur// de nas rnga be che yi skad kyis phyogs
246a6(skyes rabs): mtha' gang zhing // lha'i bdag po'i grong khyer dbusu zhugs te brdungs par gyur/ bya rgod la ni seng gis lus byin spyi bo btud rnams kyi// grub thob rnams ni na mkha' la gnas dga' bar yang ni gyur// bskyod pa'i gser gyi so 'dzin
246b1(skyes rabs): rnams ni g.yo bar 'byung ba ste// lha'i tshogs ni brgya byin dang bcas ngo mtshar de nyid gyur// sbrul gyi dbang phyug rnams kyis kyang ni bstod pa brjod pa yis// de yi steng du me tog char rnams rab tu lhung bar byas// de nas gnya' ral can gyi phug nye bar//
246b2(skyes rabs): spre'u yi phyug pa dag ni mkha' gros gzhag/ sen mos lus nI phig pa mi g.yo ba// 'jigs pas rgyal bye rnam par zlum po'i mig/ rim gyi nye bar 'ongs te byang chub sems dpa' la// bya rgod mchog des kun nas bslang zhing gnas pa ste// dul ba'i
246b3(skyes rabs): byisam pa can ni de'i mdun gnas pa// gus pas bstod pa 'di 'dra yang ni brjod par gyur// brtse ldan khyod kyi mtho 'di e ma gang du ste// khyod kyis 'jigs byid sang+ge nyid 'di gang du yang // khyad par gyi rgyu su zhig gis kyang yun ring phyir// khyed
246b4(skyes rabs): kyi thub pa su zhig ri dag bdag ltar 'gyur// shes rab la dmigs ga nyid kyi// yid ni bde sdug mnyam pa can// de srid srog ni nor gyi ni// rgud pas song ba mchog tu nyo// gal tau khyed 'dra med 'gyur na// dam pa'i skye bo'i zab pa brtan// sgrog
246b5(skyes rabs): bsngal rgya mtsho gting zab pa// tshe la skye dgu rnams nub 'gyur// khyed kyi chos kyi brtan pa 'di// dge bo 'di ni mnyan bya ste// dgra rnams la yang bdag gi ni// de nas brtsams te brtse byed 'gyur// khyad la bdag gis dri bar bya ste dka' thub 'dis go 'pha
246b6(skyes rabs): ji lta bu zhig mngon par 'dod ces ze ro// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'khor ba thog ma med par sgrub par byed nus pa/ rab tu gnod pa'i sdug bsngal rgud pas kun gdungs pa// 'gro ba 'di ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho los bsgral phyir// de bzhin
247a1(skyes rabs): gshegs pa nyid phyir bdag gi bsgrub par bya// bya rgod kyis smras pa/ shes rab chen po dang ldan pa khyed la sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang 'di lta bu rnam pa thams cad du rnyed par dka' ba ma yin te/ zab pa thob par
247a2(skyes rabs): dka' ba min pa'i las rnams bza' dang rnam par shes pa po// bston bcos la ni zhugs par gyur pa'i blo ldan gzhan phon byed la chagos pa'i bdag nyid can// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi srid pa 'dis byed dag rnams
247a3(skyes rabs): dam+ba rnams la rtogs pa po// khyed cag lta bu rnams dang gti mug gcod 'brel sred dang srid par bdag cag la 'byung shog/ phug dang nye bar bdag gis daMr// spre'u yi phru gu dag bzhag pa// da ni de bas dam pa bdag/ btang ba'i
247a4(skyes rabs): phyir ni khyed kyis 'os// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ e ma'o khyed ni shes pa gsal ba ste/ gang gi phyir khyod kyi bdag gi man ngag bzung // rtogs byas smra ba po'i tshig gis gsal byas kyang ni rags pa gang zhig gis
247a5(skyes rabs): mo 'dzin// dngos po chung po de yi bstan bcos yul la don med par ni blo gros ngal bar 'gyur// gang la khyim gyi sgo ni lta ba'i phyir ni nus pa med de snang ba yod pa la// de ni rab rib skyes pa khab kyi bu kha shin tu chung ba ci ltar
247a6(skyes rabs): mthong bar 'gyur// nye bar ston pa po ni yod kyang bag med pa'i// byis pa blo gros dman pa nyid ni 'dor ba min// yang dang yang du drang ba nyid du nyer song ying // khyi yi mjug ma 'byeg po nyid du slar yang 'ong // rab tu dbang po'i
247b1(skyes rabs): bstan bcos rnams kyi lAm ni nyer bstan pa// blo gros dman pa min pa lam min mi 'gro ste// gsal zhing bzung po'i yid ldan lus ni kun khyab pa// gnyis 'thung dbang po gsal ba 'od mas 'dzin rnams ltar// dbang po'i tshig
247b2(skyes rabs): 'di shin tu bsnams pa ni// mkhas pa rnam par 'gyur ba byed pa min// gdengs ka legs par bzung ba'i lto 'phye ni// skyon byed chung ba yang ni nus pa min// gnod pa'i 'bras bu skye bo la rgyus dang dbang phyug byed// bA bla sbrul gyi
247b3(skyes rabs): la yi nang du spangs pa ni// shin tu mi zad pa'i dug ni byed par 'gyur// dbang po'i dgra rnams kyis ni brgyal zhing bag maud las// skye bo la ni 'dod pa don min lhung bar byed// rab tu 'brel ba'i kha dog bzang pos mthong gyur pA'i// 'od zer
247b4(skyes rabs): me la mchod byed phye ma la ba ltar ni// dbang po'i yul la chags pa mi mkhas skyes bu la// rang gi chos kyi lam nas lhung bar byed pa ste// bcings pa lhod pas lte ba'i rtse pa bkag pa ni// shing ni smin pa'i rtse las 'bras bu 'byin pa ltar// /
247b5(skyes rabs): gal te rang bzhin gyis ni rab gnod dug gi shing // sbrul dang mtshon cha'i mo rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur na// dam min skye bo 'khrug cing rno ba'i sems ldan pa'i// su dang lhan cig dper ni slar yang mnyan par 'gyur// rgyu med par
247b6(skyes rabs): ni khro bas rtsub cing dro bas smra// rmongs pa khro gnyer gyis ni mi mnyam byas pa'i mig/ bu ga du ma las skyes 'jigs po'i lto 'phye ni// grog mkhar las ni lhag par 'jigs par byed pa ltar// skyon can brag gi dkyil ni brtan
248a1(skyes rabs): par gzhan gnod phyir// lhan cig mngon par smras pa sna tshogs ral gri'i spos// rmongs pa ngo tsha med pa su zhes bya ba ni// yul du song bar gyur la sdug bsngal skyes mi byed// g.yo sgyu'i khrab ni 'dzin pa'i ngan rnams
248a2(skyes rabs): yun ring du// bsgrib par dka' ba dbang po'i dmag tshogs dbus song ba// gnod kyi sdug bsngal skyed cing dam skye brtse med pa// ral gri'i so wAr sa la lhung bar byed par 'gyur// cha lugs dul bar yang ni ying 'ong smra ba yang // dam
248a3(skyes rabs): min skye la mkhas pas yid ches mi 'gyur te// gzugs bzang lus can dang ni 'jam po'i skad gyur yang // rma byo sbrul rnams 'phro bzhin pa ni ci mi za// gal te sems ni grong mi gse bar 'dod gyur na// yun ring po 'am blo yi bud med
248a4(skyes rabs): rnams 'brel ba// de bas mkhas pa'i chu gter 'byung ba yod pa lnga// dam pa'i yon tAnra sa bon bdag nyid la dor mdzod// yun ring dam pa dang ni 'brel pas dag pa'i yid// bdag nyid ldan pa'i mi ni dam min 'brel mi 'gyur// yid
248a5(skyes rabs): 'phrog pad+ma'i me tog spyod yul dang ldan pa'i// bung ba nam yang shing ro lA ni gnas mi byed// gzhu dang ldan pas mda' ni 'phen par ma byas pa// ji ltar gzho nur song bI'i dga' ba kun 'byung ste// yon tan mda' rnams kyis ni shin
248a6(skyes rabs): tu ring 'phangs pa'i// bde bzhin skyon rnams dgra ni rab bsad legs blo yi// shin tu rnam dag 'phrog bya min pa mang bcos pa// yon tan rnams kyi rab brgyan 'phags pa'i skye bos mchod// kun nas nye bar dmigs nas mi la skye min nam//
248b1(skyes rabs): lha'i mchog gi rgyan rnams la mang ngo mtshar ba// bde ba shin tu rjes 'dod cing // yon tan rnams ni 'byung ba 'am// de bas dam min skye dor nas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen brtan par bya// 'phags min skye bo dang 'brel ba// dam pa nam yang dga'
248b2(skyes rabs): phyir min// 'jug ngogs chu'i khrus byas pa'i// dkar po las gzhan gos dkar lngar// blo ldan mdun pa 'bigs shing 'gro ba'i sdig pa rab tu 'joms par byed dang 'brel pa yiso// drag pa yang ni dri ma can gyi rang bzhin spangs nas bzang po
248b3(skyes rabs): nyid la dmigs par 'gyur// skye bo gang zhig skom pas gdungs pa yang ni 'thung bar mi 'dod de nyid skad cig gis// chu 'dzin gyis ni lto ba la gnas chu rnams kyis ni bdag po chu ni ba tshwa can// de bas na ji ltar song zhig ces bya ba byung
248b4(skyes rabs): chub sems dpa' mdab chags de la smras pa/ bdag nyid chen po de la bskor ba byas te na mkha'i dkyil du 'phungs nas kun nas 'khor zhing khrag gi mngon par dmar ba'i sen mo dang kha'i slar ldan pa'i stag gis sho nye bor
248b5(skyes rabs): bgos bzhin pa dang // tshil nye bar rgyas pas 'tshe ba'i dpung pa dang ldan pa dang // mngon lugs sar pa mya nga bas kha'i nang na dri zhim par byas pa dang / sa'i steng nas 'byung ba dang // dri mi can dang bcas shing 'khyog pa'i
248b6(skyes rabs): mche ba gnyis ldan pa dang / cung zad 'dam gyis nye bar byug pa'i lus can dang / shin tu ring po ma yin pa la gnas pa'i bya rgod kyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dang / nye ba'i shing rnams la ngas par gnas pa'i skad sgrogs pa
249a1(skyes rabs): bya rog gi tshogs kyis mthong bzhin pa'i bag rgod gzhan mthong bar gyur to// de mthong nas kyang 'di ltar bsams par gyur te/ ji srid du stag 'di zas kyis tshim par byas par gyur te/ rang gi gnasu 'gro ba de srid
249a2(skyes rabs): du bdag gis mtha' gtsug tu gnas par big+ha ste gnas nas kyang rim gyi mchog gi yid ldan tshim pa rnyed pa stag dang de nyid du// 'brel pas rang gi khyim du song bA sgeg pa dang bcas par-I pag gi sha ni nye bar sbyar nas tshil dang
249a3(skyes rabs): 'brel ba ni// bya rgod kyang ni rang gi tshang du myur du song bar gyur// ri dgas bdag pos kyang ni king shu ka phreng ltar dmar nyi ma ni// gser ri'i rtse mor 'od zer gsal ba la ni gnas gyur na// shing gi yal ga rnams kyi tsha la gnas pa'i mad
249a4(skyes rabs): chags spyod pa yis// bskyod cing 'jam pa'i gnya' ral mtha' can rang gi 'dug sar song bar 'gyur// de dag bya rgod kyi sen mo rnams kyi lus rnam par 'bigs pa dang ldan pa dang / byang chub par gyur pa dang / brgyal ba'i dbang gis btsun
249a5(skyes rabs): bar byas pa'i mig dang ldan pa ste'u yi phyag gu dag mthong nas/ snying sdug bsngal bar gyur pas chus mngon par gtor bas 'di dag gis rgyal ba sel bar 'gyur snyam du rnam par bsams te/ chu'i 'gram rten mngab chags rnams
249a6(skyes rabs): kyis bkag pa ni// bar mang mdab ma rnam par dmar bi'i shing rnams kyis// rim gyi 'ongs pa'i bung ba can gyi pad+ma gnas// kun nas ze'u 'bru kham pa'i mtshor ni rnam zhugs 'gyur// mtsho chen po der rnam par zhugs nas kyang / myur du
249b1(skyes rabs): brgyal te rnam 'phyar gnya' ral can// de ni brag phug nye bAr skad cig 'ongs// sder mo bkod pas rtswa sngon rnam par mnan// bya rgod sen mo rnon mos yan lag brang// de nas yal ga'i ri dgras phrug de dag/ skad du myur bar ge sar dang
249b2(skyes rabs): bcas pa'i// chu ni 'dzag pa gnya' ral can gyi blug/ seng+ge'i gnya' ral chu yi spangs par gyur pa ni// lci ba'i brgyal ba bsal bas 'du shes skyes pa ni// mig rnams kun nas bskyod pa'i mdab ma ltar ni yid 'phrog phyed pa nyid du
249b3(skyes rabs): gyur pa ste// 'phro zhing gan rgyal gdong can yal ga mchod 'gro ba// shin tu bya rgod la 'jigs kun nas 'dar zhing mi brtan yan lag can// de dag ri dgas bdag po'i sder mo'i mtha' 'ongs gnas par gyur// kun nas
249b4(skyes rabs): bskyod pa'i mngab ma ltar ni yid 'phrog lce yis ni// de nas des kyang mnyes gaushin pas ni skad cig lhag par gyur// mdab ma las lhung yongasu smin pa'i 'bras bu zar bcug nas// mnyes gshin pas ni skad cogaM rang gi phrug
249b5(skyes rabs): ltar du bzlog nas/ mkha' snang sgron ma rgyas pa'i rang gi phug tu zhugs te de dag lnga ni kun 'khyud bde bar mtshan mo de nyal gyur// rim gyi kyang kun nas rnyings pa'i shing ma la ta'i mA tog gi rtse mo ltar kun nas 'od med pa'i
249b6(skyes rabs): mtshan mo byed pas grol bar gyur pa'i nub phyogs kyi cha dang ldan pa dang / rang gi khyim gyi gnas nas blangs pa tsam ri dgas rnams kyi sos rtswa'i myu gu zas bzhin pa dang / shar phyogs kyi mtshams kyi kun nas dmar bar byed bzhin
250a1(skyes rabs): pa'i rgya mutsho'i chu dang ldan pA dang / kun nas chang par gyur pa'i skar ma'i tshogs dang ldan pa dang / pad+ma'i nags rab tu sad pas shin tu dga' bar gyur pa'i rten can dang / shing rnams kyi sal ga/
250a2(skyes rabs): la 'jug cing bskyod pa'i rma bya'i mjug sgro'i tshogs kyis yid shin tu 'phrog pa'i nags kyi nang dang ldan pa mtshan mo'i 'das pa la breg phug dang nye bar ljon shing dang shing 'gal po'i me tog mthar kun nas spyod pa'i bung ba'i
250a3(skyes rabs): phreng ba rnams kyi gus pa dang bcas par nye bar glu len bzhin pa ltar ma smras pa'i las can nyi ma gser gyi bum pa bzhin du ni/ lha'i dbang pos phyogs ni mnan pa la// rim gyis spre'u yi phru gu dang ldan pa dang / 'phro ba'i gnya'
250a4(skyes rabs): ral 'phyang ba byung bar gyur// de nas 'bras bu bzung nas 'bras bu la ni chags// rang gi phrug gu lta ba'i phyir ni dga' ba yang // ri dwags bdag po'i gnas ni myur du 'brang 'dod pa// spre'u yi paM mo de nyid ni myur du byung bar gyur// 1
250a5(skyes rabs): bar 'ongs pa nga rgyal rgyas 'byung song ba ni// dal ba'i go bar 'jam pa'i ngag bye dang ldan pa// phyag byas nas ni pho mo de gnyis seng+ge yis// 'jig rten rig pa bde ba sngon 'gros smras par gyur// spre'u yi phru gu dag gau ni// ji ltar byung
250a6(skyes rabs): ba go rims kyi/ de nas mtha' mar de dag gi/ bya rgod phyogs pa smras par gyur// de nas rgud song snyam nas ni// phru gu dag de'i mya ngan gyi// bya rgod kyis brang yan lag rnams// spre'u dag gi rigs par gyur// spyod pa dang ldan ri dgas bdag/
250b1(skyes rabs): ldan zhing ldan pas 'di smra 'gyur// khyed kyi spre'u yi bu bsrungs te// bdag cag kyang ni shin tu srungs// chos gtam gang 'ga' rgyas byed cing // yon tan mnyam pa rnams kyi mtshan// grags pa'i kha bas kun nas g.yogs// gang
250b2(skyes rabs): kyi ri ni g.yo ba med// gang rnams lus ngan khyod kyi ni// yon tan grangs med 'jal mi byed// gzhan rnams gnya' ral nyid thob nas// 'di rnams phyi rol gnas par rlom// rgya mtsho'i chu ni mi g.yo mdab chags rnams kyi bdag po
250b3(skyes rabs): 'byung zhing 'khrug par byed// chu gter tshogs kyis bkab pa'i zla ba'i 'od ni rab tu 'gro bar mi byed de// slar yang khyod kyis sdig pa gcod byed gnas pa la ni dag pa'i sems gnas pa// gzhan nyid 'gro ba'i phyir ni rdul dang
250b4(skyes rabs): mun pa dag gis nus pa ma yin no// phrug gu 'di dag bdag cag gi/ bskyangs nas gang zhig dge khyod kyis// thob pa shin tu chen po des// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par shog/ de bas phrug gu dag 'di ni nye bar bzung nas// 'bad par
250b5(skyes rabs): ldan pa khyod kyis mngon bskyangs pa// gnyen mdun mang pos khyab pa'i tshang tshing ldan// rang gi khyim ni nags kyi nang du 'gro// phrad 'dod de dag la ni song de zhig der smras pa dam pa de la gus pa nyid du phyag byas te// zhi ba'i gan su
250b6(skyes rabs): phyag gu dog gi rgyab nas pa// nags gzhan du ni dal bu dal dbus 'gro 'gyur te// pha mas 'gro pos zhim pa'i rgyab tu bzhon pa ni// phrag pa'i spu rnams tshogs la shin tu sbyar ba dag/ cung zad mi rnams phrad 'dod de dag bzlog nas
251a1(skyes rabs): ni// yang yang ri dgas dbang po la ni lta bar gyur// bcol ba de ni bcol ma kun gyis snying po ste// snying po shes rab spyod yul can des gtad byas nas// phrag pa las khur sa la bzhag par byas pa ltar//
251a2(skyes rabs): ngal ba spyod pas dga' ba chen po thob par gyur// shin tu dka' ba cung zad gzhan// srog chags btsal ma srungs las med// de nyid slar ni gtad pa las// ma rnamaso mi rnams la bde gzhan med// de ltar na bcom ldan 'das
251a3(skyes rabs): dris dud 'gror 'jug par myur ba na yang shin tu yun ring bar srog chags rnams bcol ba mngon par bsrung bar mdzad de/ de'i gnas skabs na yang shes rab la kun nas 'dris par mdzod snyam du rnam par bsams te gang
251a4(skyes rabs): zhig chos kyis bcol ma des// legs par skyob cing gtad pa de// shin tu bde bar 'dod pa yi// khyed rnams kyis ni bskyang bar gyis// seng grer skyes pa'i rabs te skyes pa'i rabs gnyis pa'o// // lha dbang nyid kyang shin tu
251a5(skyes rabs): lci ba ni// dpag med gnas ni stobs lnga ni rong thob na// snying rjes rnam par dge ba'i yid ldan rnams// gzhan la phan po'i 'bad pa 'dor mi mdzad// 'di ltar dz+dza su sa te/ sa gsum pa la phan pa rgyun mi chad pa phrad par 'dod pa dang
251a6(skyes rabs): 'dra ba'i byang chub kyis so sor skyong bzhin pa dang / sdug pa'i bu ltar mnyes gshin pas brlan pa'i snying rje'i mas byed nas rnam par log pa dang 'dra bar 'khyud pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / gus pa dang bcas par lha las byung bab dpal
251b1(skyes rabs): gyis kun nas mnan pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa'i lha'i tshogs kyi gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od zer rnams kyis nges par kun nas snang bar byas pa'i zhabs kyi pad+mo dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pas dus gcig gi tshe na byang chub sems
251b2(skyes rabs): dpa' lho rnams kyi bdag po byung bar gyur te/ bod snang bsA kun+da nas zhugs pa'i gzugs dris ni// mtho ris gnas pa rnams kyi mdun sa rnams mdzes 'gyur// rnam dag skur ma'i tshogs kyis dkam bi na mkha' ni// mtshon mo gtsang
251b3(skyes rabs): ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i zla ba ltar// nga rgyal 'dzin pa che ba'i zil gyis gnon pa yang // lha ma yin rnams de yi zil gnon bzod mi 'gyur// rab drug gshog pas brgyab cing 'byed pa'i rgya mtsho la// rab grol mdab chags bdag po la ni
251b4(skyes rabs): lto 'phye ltar// che ba'i bdag nyid la ni gnas kyi khyab par 'dod// dpal ni bsten byas der ni gus dang bcas// rnam par 'byor pa'i phyir ni mtho ris skyong byed pa// bstan pa'i bdag nyid la ni glog ltar gnas par gyur// bag+na med rgyu yang lha
251b5(skyes rabs): rnams bdag po nyid der ni// lha mA yin ni 'jigs par byed pa des gnas pa// dul bar 'dod cing lam bzang kun nas 'jig rten ni// mi 'khrug pa'i bsam pa dang ldan blta bar ma byaso// de nas dus gcig gi tshe na ri'i nags kyi
251b6(skyes rabs): nang 'ga' zhig la sna tshogs pa'i ri dgas kyi tshogs kyi khyab pa dang / dri ma med pa'i tshu'i rkyen rnams la pad+ma rnams kyi dris dri zhim par 'jam pa'i rlung dang ldan pa dang / skyed mos tshal rnams kyis dga' bar gyur pa'i mtha' dang ldan pa dang /
252a1(skyes rabs): mdab chags kyi tshogs du ma rnams kyi shing rnams lhag par gnas pa dang / phan tshun min par brnab sems lngas rnam par bzlog pa'i ri dgas dang sbrul dang ldan pa dang / nye bar zhi ba'i gnas dang / gtsang po du ma
252a2(skyes rabs): chus kun nas spangs zhing pa'i shing a ti mu ga dang / ma la ti dang chu shing gel ba dang ldan pa dang / thub pa'i skye bo du ma rnams kyi me mchod pa'i du ba rnam par rgyas pa nyid kyi sprin dang bcas pa dang 'dra ba dka' thub pa dka' thub kyi nor
252a3(skyes rabs): can la la zhig dka' thub kyi nags la lhag par gnas par gyur te/ nags dang nye bar gnas nas nI// kun nos ri dwags mdab chags rnams// de'i lo mA'i nag su nye bar song nas/ slob ltar ni ngal bso gyur// drang srong chen po de snying rje
252a4(skyes rabs): bsnams pa bzang po dang ldan pa'i gnyen mdun ltar nyi ma re re zhing sdig pa zad par 'dod pa dang 'dra ba'i sna tshogs pa'i shing rnams kyi shin tu dga' ba'i nag su 'ongs te/ rtswa dang 'od ma'i mdab ma rnams za zhing // ri mtha' rnams
252a5(skyes rabs): la nyin mo gnas nas ni// gzhonu bac+doMs pa'i glang po'i tshogs kyi yul// ma dran pas ni bde bar gnas par gyur// de nas der ni glang mo'i phrug bA ma// rab g.yo pad+ma ltar mA dzas rna ba can// brtsa ldan de ni rnyog med bsam pa can// thub pa
252a6(skyes rabs): bas bu bas lhag pa'i mnyes gshin byas// skyes pa dang ni bud med skye bos kyang // yul 'dug pa la dga'i dud 'gro la// yon tan dang bcas de med 'ga' zhig la'ang // mi rnams la ni bar med mnyes gshin 'gyur// nye bar 'ongs te/
252b1(skyes rabs): phrug gu des kyang ni// rim gyis thub pa de'i lag tu gtad// 'od ma'i mdab ma 'jam po gus pa yis// pad+ma'i rtsa ba 'jam po slar yang bzung // shing le'i khang par nye bar 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// gnyid chung bas ni rnam 'brel mig ldan pa/
252b2(skyes rabs): ri dgas rwa ni rim bzhin nyid du des// yid 'ongs rnams ni kun nas reg par gyur// bskyed pa nye bar 'ongs te rgyab phyogs nas// sprin ni rab 'byung bas gar byed pa'o// rma bya bskyod cing sngo ba'i gdong can ni// sgro dang bcas par bskyod pa mthong
252b3(skyes rabs): bar 'gyur// de ltar dga' 'gyur phrad 'dod de la ni// ri dgas mdab chags tshogs des yang yang du// thub pa de ni rgod cing 'di ltar ni// gnyis 'thung phru gu bskyod dud dpral 'bur can la smras// 'di ni khyim gyi dbu su brgyan pa ni// bde bar
252b4(skyes rabs): shing lo'i nye 'khor 'di ni gnas// ri dgas mdab chagasna tshogs ldan skad cig tu// ci phyir sdig pa med par g.yo med gnod// du mI'i tshogs rnams btsag pas sgra'i sdang ba ste// mdab ma rnam par g.yo ba nad las gnod byed 'di// skad ni
252b5(skyes rabs): bkug pas rnam mdzad lag bzhi// thub pas khyad par shing dang myur nag thigs rnams spangs// chung shing rtsa ba nas 'don cing // shing lo'i nye 'khor du btsugs pa// rna ba'i tha mar de bzung nas// thub pa des ni phyi rol khrid// maunyes gshin pa
252b6(skyes rabs): ni log pa brgyad // slar yang nye ba ru ni yongs// bu khyod ji ltar bskyod pa zhes// des ni rgod cing dga' bas reg/ ri dgas phyug bcas skad cig rol// dga' ba rtswa rnams rtsad 'don cing // khrus phyir pad+mor 'gro bzhin pa// dka' thub nor can de
253a1(skyes rabs): rjes song // ri dgas pags pa phreng bar bcas// de yis dpung par bkal nas ni// pad+ma rnams khyab pad+mo ni// thub pas dal bus 'jug par gyur// des ni chu zhim 'thungs nas ni// skad cig tu ni bzhin btud
253a2(skyes rabs): gyur// dogs mthar khrus byed de la ni// phru gus slar ni skyong bar gyur// de nas rim gyis shing lo'i khang par 'ong nas pad+ma yi// glang mo'i phru gus drang srong chen po nges ni de ldan pa// sreg blugs mthong nas me lce'i rtse mo bskyod cing me mchod
253a3(skyes rabs): nas// de la rA ba byin nas ni rgyo shugs i gu d+hA rnams zos// de nas dus gcig gi tshe glang mo des phrug gus rjesu 'gro bzhin pas ri be dang nags kyi nang rnams kun nas bskor bar byed cing dpyad dka' ba'i smin pa'i nod kyis skye ba gzhan
253a4(skyes rabs): du nye bar khrid por gyur to// thob pa des kyang nyi ma nam mkha' lhag par 'jog pa la dbang bskur bar byas pa'i mi'i bya ba dang ldan pa dang / pad+mo'i mdab ma rnams kyi kha sbyar la 'bras bu rnams rnam par gzhag pa la kha zas rnams 'dod
253a5(skyes rabs): cing slar glang mo de phyug pa de bzung nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ phyug gru de med pas bdag glo 'bras bu dang rtso za ba star ma byas te/ gsal bar rang gi tshog su nye bar zhugs nas de yun ring por song ba byung bar gyur snyam du rnam
253a6(skyes rabs): par bsams te/ de blta ba'i phyir langs nas kha zas ma zos par phyir shing lo'i khang pa nas phyir byung ste ri dgas kyi phyug gu rje su 'brang bzhin pa/ chu dang bcas pa'i spre'u blugs 'dzin pa kun nas 'khor zhing / snas kun nas sbyang
253b1(skyes rabs): ba'i shring gi ze'u 'byas khyab pa// rkang pa rnam par bkod pas rtsa'i myu gu kun nas chad pa 'ga' zhig tu sen mo'i rtse mo nas lhung bas mon lug gi dum bu chad pas kun nas 'dres shing sa'i tshogs 'byung ba dang / gzhan du chus bkug pa'i
253b2(skyes rabs): 'od mA'i rtse mo chad pas bor chad med pa'i glang mo de'i rkang rjes kyi rje su 'brang nas phrad par 'dod pa nyid kyis smras par gyur pa/ phru gu rdzu su 'gro ba ma// de yi gom pa rnams 'drod ma// kun nas 'od med rI mo srab// nor 'dzin steng du gan
253b3(skyes rabs): pa yin// cung zad par du song nas kun nas dkyil 'khor du byas pa'i lag pa dang ldan pa dang / yun ring por 'dzum par byas pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ srog rnam par chad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang gi rkang pa rnam par bkod pas
253b4(skyes rabs): sa'i dkyil mdzad pa dang cung zad lto ba dma' bas sa'i rdul 'byung ba la lus kun nas 'od med pa dang ldan gasgom pa'i phyug gu des nu ma nu ba dag gis kun nas reg bzhin pa mthong bar gyur to// mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba
253b5(skyes rabs): min pa'i dbang du song bar gyur te/ thub pa des ut+pal dmar 'odi sdong bu ltar 'jam pa/ mA'i 'o ma 'dzin dag kun nas rig bzhin pa/ glang po'i phyag gu des ni mya ngan gyis mthong nas// mchi ma'i chu yis mig ni 'grags pa byung ba
253b6(skyes rabs): gyur// mchi mas kun nas khyab pa'i mig ldan de mthong nas/ kun nas 'ongs bzhin rab tu skyo ba'i ral pa 'dzin// yun ring ma'i nu ma 'thung ba la chags pa// dka' thub nor can la ni phru gus bsu bar gyur// glang mo'i phru gu de'i steng du gzhag
254a1(skyes rabs): nas ni// lag pa dkar ba'i bar dang ldan pa'i bgrang 'phreng gis// dpral 'bor mchil ma'i chus ni rab tu spangs nas kyang // dka' thub nor can brtse ldan ngo bos skye sngags 'don// skom pas kun nas skam pa rkan ldan
254a2(skyes rabs): khyod kyis kyang // yang+ga nas yang du ma'i nu ma reg bzhin pa// dgra yi yid kyang nges par 'gyod pa ste// dka' thub dang ldan brlan sems ldan pa smos tsI dgos// mi shes me'i nu ma don med ci phyir reg/ da ni bu khyod spre'u blugs chu ni 'thu
254a3(skyes rabs): bor byas// de ltar 'di ni smras nas chu ni kun bkag nas// de ni de'i chus ni rim gyis bkang bar gyur// g.yon can 'chi bdag la yang kun tu bka' yis ni// khyed kyi ma 'di srid pa gzhan du song ba ste// de bas shog tsa ga dka' thub nag
254a4(skyes rabs): su sbyor rgyu gtsog/ de ni yun ring khyod kyi bdag ni kun nas bsrungs// de nas dka' thub gan su rI ma~M gyi de 'ongs nas// shing lo rnam par 'phyang ba lagu pas kun dmigs te// mig+na gI tshwa'i thigs pa rnams kyis bzhin spangs pa// don
254a5(skyes rabs): 'phongs shing 'phongs pas slar ni 'di skad smras// 'jam pa'i shing gi mad ba tshigs gang gi sna'i rtse mo las khyod kyi bkug pa ste// chu lta ro bsil ba'i lan nI mang bar gang gisu ljidi yi nyi ma'i 'od zer la ni sbyangs// gang gi chu ni rgyas
254a6(skyes rabs): pa khyod kyis nu ma dag ni mnyes gshin pas blangs 'thung ba ste// gnas 'di la ni ma de med pas de ring bu khyod ci ltar rol par 'gyur ba yin// de nas 'bar ba'i sol ba'i phung po'i dbusu gnas pa gser gyi snod dang rje su mthun par
254b1(skyes rabs): dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa dang / ri rab kyi rtse mo la dmigs pa'i brgya phrag bcu'i 'od zer dang ldan pa yod pa la// phru gu de 'jam pa'i rtswa sar pa kham cig dang chu thog gcig zos pa dang 'thung nas// de nyal ba'i phyir rtswa sngo bsangs dang shing gi
254b2(skyes rabs): lo ma rnams kyi mngal du bkram nas yang nas yang du mchi mas kun nas khyab pa'i mig dung ldan pa'i thub pa des smras pa/ mchen mo grang gang nyal gyur pa// khyod kyi steng du nam bzhag nas// ma de med por ci ltar ni// de ring sgrags pas
254b3(skyes rabs): khyod 'dir nyal// phru gu de nyal du bcug nas mtshams bsnyen pa dang smyung bar gnas pa dang mA'i bya ba can gyi thub pa des shing los byas pa'i khang par zhugs te// cung zad gnyid bsal bar byas nas mtshan mo'i bar du yang dang yang du
254b4(skyes rabs): mngon par phyung nas mnyes gshin+da pa dang bcas par blta zhing gnaso// sna tshogs pa'i mdab chags kyi tshogs gnyis sang pos khyab pa'i mtho rangs kyis dusu kun nas langs te/ ri dwags kyi lpags pas g.yogs pa'i rtswa'i mal
254b5(skyes rabs): nas snga rol nyid du shing lo'i khang pa'i sgor 'ongs shing // rim dang rim gyis 'phreng bas bskor ba'i lag pas de la kun nas reg cing ngu baM las log par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig gis mche ba gnyis pa'i phyag gu
254b6(skyes rabs): de la shin tu mnyes gshin pas rnam par 'brel bA zhen pa drag po can gyi drang srong de la kun du bltas nas 'di ltar bsams par gyur te// gnyen mdun mnyes gshon pa yongs dor nas// thub pa 'di ni nags na gnas// 'di nyid der
255a1(skyes rabs): yang lhag pa nyid// mcho gnyis phrug gu mnyes gshin pa// de bas na re shig bdag 'gro ste drang srong 'dra so sor rtog pa'i stobs ma thob pa gdul bar bya'o snyam du rnam par bsams te/ yod du 'ong ba'i rgyan rnams
255a2(skyes rabs): kyis 'byung ba yi// dbang po'i mtshon ni'i tshogs ni 'phro zhing sbas pa ni// 'jig rten bya ba'i 'bad pa rnam par ma nyams pa// der ni myur bar lha'i dbang po kun nas 'ongs// kun nas nye bar 'ongs nas kyang thabs dang bcas par thub pa ni dge
255a3(skyes rabs): ba'i phyogs kun nas 'gegs par byed pa'i mnyes gshin pa 'di ni phrug gu 'di las bsal bar bgyi snyam du rnam par bsams nas// bdag nyid chen po des glang po'i phru gu de shi bar gyur pa de yang dang yang du rkang pa rnam par rgod pa
255a4(skyes rabs): byed po/ cung zad ma yin par yang yang sdug bsngal dang bcas par ngo gdong gtogs par byas nas nyal bar gyur pa rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mi snang bar ston cing gnas// thub pa des kyang ma dpyad par las de 'di ci yin zhes bya ba
255a5(skyes rabs): de dang bral bar dogs pas yang dag par 'ongs te/ bu khyod la yang rgyu mtshan med par dgra bo 'chi bdag gis ci rdzogs pa nyid du gyur tam zhes smras nas/ mchog tu ma dga' ba'i yongs nas shi pa dang 'dra bar bya ba dang bral ba
255a6(skyes rabs): de mthong ste/ yang nas yang du 'di ltar smre sngags 'don po byed par gyur te/ gang gis pad+ma'i rtse ba yang // ci ltar yang ni 'dam nas 'don// 'di de 'dus kyis khyer ba ste// mche ba ma skyes sngon rol du// me'i khang pa'i nang gnas pa// bdag/
255b1(skyes rabs): gi sreg blugs za mchod cing // sgor ni rna ba dag bskyod cing // su zhig mdun du sdod par 'gyur// lce'i sen mo srab pa yis// rim gyi rab srab sna bdun gyis// su zhig sna yis bdag lags las// pad+ma'i rtsa ba slar 'dzin 'gyur// gal te khyod kyi ma
255b2(skyes rabs): 'tsho 'gyur/ khyod ni shi bar song mthong nas// rkang pas sna'i rtsa mnan te// srog ni skad cag gis stong 'gyur// myur du 'jig rten pha rol spong // khyod ni mi de don byas pa// gang gi khyod ni ma mthong ba// shing bdag dbang nyid der song ba// gal
255b3(skyes rabs): te bdag gis byed mi 'gyur// mnyes gshin khyod kyi steng du bu// sdug bsngal dug gis brgyal ba'i mthu// yid 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba min// de rnams bstan po de bzang skyes// de rnams thar pa'i gnas na gnas// sbrul dang 'dra bar skrag pa
255b4(skyes rabs): ba yi// mnyes gshin gang rnams skyes ring byas// brtan pa shin tu dge ba ni// dmigs par 'dod pa bdag gis ni// so sor skye bo nyid sbyin gyis// sems 'di phyi nas 'gyed par 'gyur// nyi ma na mkha'i dbus gnas la ni dbang bskur phyir// 'gro
255b5(skyes rabs): zhing chu skyes rnams kyis stug pa'i mtsho ru ni// ma yi nu ma rab tu dor nas su zhig ni// sna rtse bskyod cing sna ldan du ring bdog rjes 'gro// yid 'phrog byed pa'i glang chen phru gu nyid ni mtho ba'i shing rnams gcog byed cing // mche ba dag gis chu
255b6(skyes rabs): bo'i 'gro ma gyi sa rnams ni ku sha dang bcas dum dag 'dzin// smon chus sngo ba'i 'gram pa phug pa khyod kyis mdzes pa'i gdong ni bdag gi ma mthong ba// rol pas sgeg par byed pa'i rna ba mchog rlung gi 'khor ba'i bung ba can gyi gdong // rnam
256a1(skyes rabs): bar ma chud srab pa'i mchi ma'i thig pa rnams kyis brlan par byas pa'i rma ngar can// mig gis bzung bya ltar ni bzhin gyis snying las phyi rol du ni byed bzhin pa// 'ongs nas thos pa'i skye gnas can rnams
256a2(skyes rabs): legs pa'i tshig ldan rnams kyang ring bIr sgra byas pa// srab pa'i dga' bas dga' ba la ni brtan gzhan dag brtan par bya phyir nus pa min// de ltar phyug pa dang ni nyo bar ri dregos lpags pa lhung zhing ring ba'i lus ldan pa/ sA la gnas
256a3(skyes rabs): shing glang po che'i phrug gu la ni mig gnyis gtang byas pa// ngu bar byed cing mya ngan gyis gdungs thub pa la ni snying rje swar+t+r-i su 'ang // khyim gyi gnasu ldan shing me tog la ni 'khor ba'i bung pa'i skad rnams kyis// de nas lha'i bdag
256a4(skyes rabs): bo skad cig de las lug go ljon shing ltar 'khyog po'i ral pa'i khu ro bu can// kun nas 'brel zhing phrag pa la bkral ba'i dbyugs pa la 'phyang ba'i chu dang bcas byi'i bung ba dang ldan pa dang / brang gi mthil bags pas g.yogs pa dang lag
256a5(skyes rabs): dar gyi bA ra la pad+ma'i phyed pas bskor ba dang / rtswa ku sha cung zad blangs pa dang / rkang byi'i bol nA rab tu 'phyang ba'i shing lo'i gos dang ldan pa dang / dbang po nye ba rA zhi ga gzugs dang ldan pa dang 'dra bar tshang ba'i dpal badzin cing / dka
256a6(skyes rabs): thub pa'i gzugasu mngon par sprul te drang srong dang nye bar 'ongs nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po rang gi skye bo rnams mnyes gshin pa dmigs bzhin pa'i 'di'i shi ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzod bzhin du 'di ltar smre sngags 'don
256b1(skyes rabs): ba'i khyed kyis glang po che'i khrus dang rje su mthun pa 'di ci zhig bsgrub par byed de/ yul rnams la ni 'dod pa'i shun pa bsal bas nye bar sbas pa 'di// lus 'di gang du gnyen 'dun rnams dang yang dag 'bral ba'i skyon spangs pa
256b2(skyes rabs): thub pa'i skye bo dang 'gal gang du mnyes gshin 'brel pas blo na long ba yi// khyod kyi smre sngags 'dron pa 'di blo dang ldan rnams kyi rgod bya'i dngos po yin// gal te ngu ba'i sdug bsngal sgra 'don rnams kyi mchi ma 'don rnams
256b3(skyes rabs): la// myur por ltar ni mig rnams mnyes gshin 'byung ba 'dzin pa yi// gshin rje'i yul du song bIb dga' bo rnams kyi 'os par 'gyur ba ni// sa ni ma lus 'di ltar tshe'i bar du rab tu ngu bar 'gyur// dge ba'i 'bras bu chung
256b4(skyes rabs): bA nyid phyir tshe dang phun sum tshogs rnams kyi// gnas pa 'di ni srog chags rnams kyi myur du 'jig par nye bar 'gro/ sreg blugs 'dzin pa'i grogs po'i shugs kyi bskul baM chung ba'i 'od can ni// srab cing rdo ba'i dum
256b5(skyes rabs): bu'i me'o me stag rnams ni chu la ltar// mnyen mdun rnams la mnyes gshin gus med brtan paM yang ni rtsad nas bton nus sems stobs kyis// rags pa'i dka' ba ltar ni mtho ba gsang med 'jigs pas rab tu stug
256b6(skyes rabs): bsngal bskyed pa ltar// gal te khyed ni nagasu 'ongs te glang po che ltar rang dga'i bde ba 'dod pa yi// ci phyir mnyes gshin 'di ni shin tu brtan par slar ni zhags pa bdag nyid la 'phen byed// sngon gyi bskal par dka' thub bzing
257a1(skyes rabs): ba rnams kyi gnyis skyos mdun song rnabs kyi mtha' ma can// stong phrag brgyad cu'i dus kyis brtsis pa'i grangs ni gang la tshe'i 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur// tshwa ni 'gro ba zhes byar shes nas yo byad rnams ni ngon
257a2(skyes rabs): te dres ni nagasA bsten 'gyur// tshe ni nyung ba lo yang blo glos med pa rnams kyis sred pa dA lta ci ltar dor mi byed// ston kar nun nas zad pa'i chu can chu 'dzin pa// glog gi ljon shing lhan cig skyes pa dor bar byed// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro
257a3(skyes rabs): bA 'di la rang bzhin las// phan tshun du ni rnam par bral ba ci ma mthong // dngos po zhes bya de de rnams kyang gsol byas nas// yud tsam chags pas lhan cig pa'i spyod yul yang // mnyes gshin pa'i skye bo la yang skad cig
257a4(skyes rabs): gi/ skye bo sel bar byed de mar me snang ba ltar// ji ltar gzhu dang ldan pas mda' ni steng du 'phangs// ring du song nas kyang ni slar ni lhung bar 'gyur// de bzhin du ni lus ni yongasu bsgyud pa yang // 'badra pa dro dang de yis lhung ba'i
257a5(skyes rabs): mtha' can nyid// byiso pa dang ni gzhi nu dUr bya ba rgas ldan pa// mi gres la ba dang man ngag la ni mkhas pa 'am// gdug pa'i bdag nyid 'chi bdag 'di ni mi bltos te// bsreg byo la brten rab tu song zhing me ni ltar// tshe 'od 'gro
257a6(skyes rabs): pa'i rang bzhin myuraro du rtogs nas ni// mau spyod rnams kyang 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mu shugs ltar// de bas mkhas pas zhi ba'i phyir 'bang bya ste// rtag tu chos kyi lus la skud par bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gzhan du 'gro zhing skyes
257b1(skyes rabs): bu chos can// gang zhig la ni srid pa'i mtha' ma rje su 'gro// mkhas pa rnams la de ni grogs ldan 'dod pa ste// gzhan ni grogs dang bcas yang grogs ni med pa nyid// rtag tu rgas dang na ba'i tsha ba kun 'byung ba'i// srid pa gsum la 'tsho
257b2(skyes rabs): bA'i yid ni su zhig 'gyur// gang zhig zung la rab tu 'bar bar nyal 'dod pa// de ni sra brtan bag med rnamasu kun nas zhugs// dam pas don med 'phel ba'i phyir ni brtan byed pa// mnyes gshin rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig tu ni rigs
257b3(skyes rabs): min te// sngags ni mA rnyernyid par yang 'tsho ba 'dod pa ni// dbugs dbyung drag po'i sbrul tshang lag pa su zhig gtod// skye bo srid pa'i rtse mo las kyang 'joms par brtson po ni// sgron ma bzung ba ltar ni bdag gi rnam mthong ste//
257b4(skyes rabs): de ltar bag med pas ni gnyen po ma byas pa'i// rmongs pa rnams la mi rtag pa 'di rgod pa 'dra// lus can rnams kyi tshi gnas pa// ring du gnas pa mthong ba min// chu ni shin tu 'beb pa la// rdul gyi char pa 'phangs pa ltar// mnyes
257b5(skyes rabs): gshin spyan gyi mi nus te// 'ga' zhig du brten gcod phyir gang // rmongs pa des ni nam zhig na// skye ba'i lcags sgrog che gcod 'gyur// 'di ni shes rab dgra ste yi// blo byas rnams kyis gcod pa ste// de bas dam pas mkhas pa
257b6(skyes rabs): rnams// shes rab nyer 'phel 'dod pas bston// gang phyir shin tu phra rags sam// ring ba dang ni nye bo 'am// mi rtag phyir ni de rang nyid// mkhas pa yis ni mi byed do// de bas gzugs sogs tshogs pas ni// skad cig 'jigs las
258a1(skyes rabs): yid 'byung ba// 'dod chags bral te chags bral ba// yod bzhin rnam grol rtogs par byed// bdag ni rnam grol zhes shes nas// ye shes mthong ba rnam dag pa// bdag la skyes pa zad shes bya// srid pa yang ni
258a2(skyes rabs): mthong mi 'gyur// ji ltar mdab ma la sogs pa'i tshogs med par// pad+ma yid ni 'brog par yod pa ma yin to// de bzhin du ni gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs las ni// tha dad par ni mkhas pas rig byed mthong ma yin// de nas
258a3(skyes rabs): thub pa des 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gsal bar mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig la mnyan nas sdug bsngal kun nas sel ba leg sngo leg so zhes bya bas mngon par bstod nas smras par gyur pa// khyod kyi kha'i zla ba las//
258a4(skyes rabs): 'byung ba'i ngag gi zla tshes 'di// tho ba ste bdag gi mun pa 'di// myur du 'das par gyur pa yin// mkhas pas man dag ston pa la// byis pa yang ni byis min 'gyur// nyi ma nges par 'char bA la// pad+ma zum pa nyid ni dor// byang chub
258a5(skyes rabs): sems dpas smras pa// 'dir mang du smras pa ci zhig bya ste// bde dang sdug pa byed phyir brten nas yod dang med pa'i las ngag brten par shes nas ni// blo gros legs pa gnas pa 'byed pa'i rang gi dbang po rnams kyi dpyad ni khrid
258a6(skyes rabs): byas min// nyi ma nges par 'char ba la// dran pa ma nyams dbang po'i yul la rgyob kyos phyogs pa dngos grub mchog ni thob pa ste// bla ma'i skye bo las ni 'di ltar rjes bstan blangs nas skye bos tha mar gdung mi byed// drang srong chen po
258b1(skyes rabs): legaso legs so// skad cig las yongasu gcod par byed pa'i khyed kyi blo ste bdag ni kun nas ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa skye ltos shig dang / nyan pa po gang don ni ma lus thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten de ni nyan du zhugs// gang zhig
258b2(skyes rabs): 'chad pa po'i tshig ni lan gnyis smras pa 'bras bu byos pa der yang shes// gang zhig gsal bar lan du mar yang smras shes pa min te lder so'i rnam pa can// de la kun du ngal ba don med mkhas pa nyid kyis myi smra'i brtul zhug
258b3(skyes rabs): mdzes pa yin// bdag ni lha'i dbang po zhes bya ste bdog gi mthus slar phyag gu 'di 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba brjod nas/ rdzu 'phrul b+hi glang po che'i phyag gu de bslangs te gnas par gyur to// thub pa des kyang mchog tu ngo mtshar
258b4(skyes rabs): bar kun nas song bar gyur// gsal ba'i cod pan 'od zer rnams kyis nyi ma'i snang ba skyongs byas pa// dri med mu tig har dbus nor bu'i 'od can mgrin pa mnan pa ni// slar yang byang chub sems dpa' lha'i dbang po'i gzugs ni
258b5(skyes rabs): 'byin byas te// thong gshol 'dzin pa'i snam bu ltar sngo 'jam pa par snang sten par gyur// thub pa des kyang phrug gu des rje su 'brang bzhin pa// yid rab tu dga' bas slar dka' thub kyi nagasu zhugs par gyur te/ de nas dus kyi rim
258b6(skyes rabs): pas glang po phrug gu nyid dor nas// skyon chu'i dri ni bsgos pa nags kyi mtha' dang phyogs kyi bar// mche ba 'debs pa rnams kyi ring du byas pa'i glang po gzhan// ri bo chen po'i nang du tshogs kyi bdag po byung bar gyur// glang po des ni dus gcig
259a1(skyes rabs): tshe n+ya bil ba'i shing las ni// bud med 'o 'dzin 'od can 'bras bu bsags pa blangs nas ni// bkag nas thub pa la ni chu gter chu yis brlan bu byin// lhan cig byed pa'i yul ga 'bras bu can rnams de la
259a2(skyes rabs): byin// dam pa brtse ba dang ldan yon tan bsgrub pa mkhas pa la// dI zhim brlan pa ltar ni rang bzhin gyis nA bstod byed pa// sngar ni pan byed bdag nyid che la su zhes bya ba yau// snying dang bcos pa'i yid la rje su chags pa ring por mi
259a3(skyes rabs): 'gyur ram// mon lug rnam par gcag ltar dri zhim mdzad pa'i sgron chu'i phreng // bu khyod skyes pa chen po 'di ltar smr-i bzhin par gyur to// ri bo'i rtsig pas phrug pas mdzad pa'i phyogs gcig ldan pa ni// metsho gnyis kun da ltar dkar
259a4(skyes rabs): de la thub pa des reg gyur// slar yang rna ba'i ting ti shags kyis bzlog par gyur pa yi// 'khor bu'i bung ba rnams kyis kun 'thungs skyon chu'i dri zhim pa// glang po'i dbang po gzhan gyis mche bas lhag pa'i yan lag mchog/
259a5(skyes rabs): glang po la ni sme ba rnams kyis mkhas pas 'di ltar smras// glang po'i dbang po sgron chu dri zhim 'thung bar 'dod pa yi// bung ba rnams la rna bor rnam par brdeg pas ma bgegs shig/ shin tu gus pa med pas smad pa'i gang phyir
259a6(skyes rabs): sbyin chen yang // don gnyer rnams la kun nas dga' ba byed par mi 'gyur ro// tshogs ni bskyang phyir 'od ma rnams kyi mun pa can gyis nags la gal te rtag tu 'dod// gnod pa'i rtse dang lcags kyus las ni 'byung ba gal te sdug bsngal
259b1(skyes rabs): rnams ni khyod mi 'dod// sa skyong gis btang de bas glang po bdag khyod glang po rnams kyi rje su ma 'gro zhig/ chags pas sdug bsngal chen po la ni mi mkhas pA ni su zhig zhes bya btang ma yin// de ring khyod kyi dpral 'ber skyugs
259b2(skyes rabs): bas rnam par 'brel ba'i skyon chu'i gnas ni bsgoms byas te// ma la ni rtswa sngon rtse mo bcag pa tha mar mche ba gnyis kyis gcad pa mthong nas ni// tshogs ni skyong ba rnam kyis dor ba me tog zas can nges par khyod la phrad 'dod/
259b3(skyes rabs): ste// de bas khyod ni song zhig bung ba rnams kyi nye bar glu blangs gdong can bdage slar mthong // de nas rim gyis mche ba gnyis pa'i mchog de tshogs kyi nang du thob pa la// thub pa des ni shing los byas pa'i khang par zhugs te/
259b4(skyes rabs): bsdam gtan la rtse gcig pa byung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar na bcom ldan 'das des skye gnas thams cad du 'jug par gyur pas nam yang gzhan gyi don la g.yel ba nyid du ma gyur to snyam du rnam par bsams nas de'i chos
259b5(skyes rabs): la rje su 'jug pa rnams kyi gnas par bya zhes bya'o// brgya byin gyis skyes pa'i rabs te skyes pa'i rlabs gsum pa'o// / yul gyi 'dam la nub pa'i 'jig rten pa// 'dam bzhin du ni rgal bar dka' ba las// shes
259b6(skyes rabs): rab las byung thabs ldan brtan pa rnamaso// rgal b.ri don du 'bad par byed pa yin// 'di ltor rje su thos te/ thos pa dang / dul ba dang / gtong ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / bzod pa'i yon tan gyi nor bu rnams kyi gter dang // mdun sa dang
260a1(skyes rabs): mdun sa ni blo gros kyi bdag nyid chen po rab tu grags pa dang / legs par spyod pa'i ston ka'i dus ltar dri ma med pa dang / rgya che ba'i rigs kyi na mkha' la zla ba dang 'dra ba dang / zla ba'i dkyil dang rje su mthun
260a2(skyes rabs): ba'i bzhin gyi pad+ma dang ldan pa dang / pad+ma'i lte ba ltar dkar ba'i lus dang ldan pa dang / gzugs dang ldan pa 'dra ba'i tshul gyis phun sum tshogs pas kun nas btsangs pa'i yid dang / cung zad dbang po'i dgra rnams kyis pham par
260a3(skyes rabs): ma byas pa dang skyon rnams kyi gnyen po rgyal ba dang rang gi phyogs ltar yon tan rnams sngon du song ba dang / the tshom med pa dang lus dang 'dra ba'i chos dang 'dra ba dang / dal 'byor yang dag par thob pa dang / skad cig mar yang yul
260a4(skyes rabs): gyi skyon rnams kyi yid la glags ma rnyed pa ka shI ka'i rgyal po'i blon po khwa can zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' byung bar gyur to// 'dod pa me tog rnams bzhin du// 'dzum pa rnams ni 'ga' zhig kyang // bdag gi skyed mo'i
260a5(skyes rabs): tsha lo bsrung ltar// so sor 'dzin gyur blo yang phrogs// sa 'dzin rnams kyi ri rab ltar ni mtho ba'i mdun// dpag/ bsam shing rnams lta bur yongs 'du sa rtol ni// de ni kun du mkhas pa rnams la 'byung 'gyur te// 'dod dang ldan pa
260a6(skyes rabs): rnams la nyi ma ltar ni lhag/ ji lta ji ltar bstan bcos rnams dben las bsal ba// slob ma rnams kyis 'di yi tshig ci thos 'gyur ba// de ltar de ltar 'di rnams kyi ni blo rim gyis// ston ka'i yon tan gyis ni chu lter dang bar 'gyur// de
260b1(skyes rabs): ltar 'dod pa thams cad la mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan yang bdag nyid chen po de lugs kyi bstan bcos rnams smod pa'i skyon rnams la shin tu nub pa'i yid can ka sha'i rgyal po bzlog par nus pa ma yin te// gnas skabs sngon du 'gro
260b2(skyes rabs): bar yang 'di la dben pa'i sar skyon rnams las rnam par gcod cing smras pa/ lha ljags lus 'phags rgyal po la sogs pa skyon la lta ba gnyen po rgyal po gzhan rnams yod pa lha'i skyon rnam yod pa rnas la rtse gcig pa nyid ni rig pa ma yin no// /
260b3(skyes rabs): lhas gzigs shig gang zhig 'thungs te bla ma la yang khro bar byed de rgyu mtshan med par slar ni du// 'khrul bar 'gro ste ma dpyod pa yang byed par 'gyur pa nad kyi gzhar ni 'gyur pa ste// 'jig rten pa'i mdun du yang ni smad g.yogs
260b4(skyes rabs): gsal bar byed de smyon pa bzhin du byed// de ni ngo tsha bral byed gti mug skyed par byed pa su zhig zhes bya chang 'thung 'gyur// gang zhig rtse zhing ji lta ba bzhin mi smra ba ste khros pas reg par gyur// gnyis ni myong bdag ni pham zhes bya ba'i
260b5(skyes rabs): nyon mongs pas ni bo rgyal phyir slar tshogs 'gyur// shin tu bshang gci bkag pos rnyed par sla ba'i nad rnams kyis ni lhag par gnas par 'gyur te// tshe lo de ni skyon mang tshogs kyis dri bcas skyes pa su zhig ces bya rtse bar 'gyur// /
260b6(skyes rabs): sbrul las rgud pa dang yang dgra bos kyang ni slar 'jig rta las kyang ni lhung ba ste// bkres skom ngal ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu che ba nyi ma'i 'od zer drag po bas kyang che// bya ba rnams kyi tha ma dam pa'i skye bo la ni smad pa yang dag 'gro ba
261a1(skyes rabs): las lhung ba// de ltar skyon dang ldan pa'i ri dgas shor ba shes nas mkhas pa su zhig de la brtan// stobs ni nyams pa thos pa rnams zhum pa// sdug bsngal gyi rgyu mun pa rnams kyi rgyu mtshan te// 'dod pa'i me'i
261a2(skyes rabs): sreg blugs bdag nyid sregs pa'i phyir// bud med rnams la shin tu chags pa mi'i gdung ba'o// mi skyong tshig ni rtsub pa skye dgu rnams la ni// 'jigs pa gnas kyis khyad par gyis mi zad// lto 'phye'i dbugs kyis rnam par byung ba byed
261a3(skyes rabs): yi// dug gi me yi 'phrog par byed pa'i 'od zer ltar// phongs pa de ni zhi yang bla'i// bsil ba'i 'od ltar dbang phyug gi/ rags pa mtshon pa yang min te// drag po'i dpya can lto 'phye bzhin// gang gis smad pa lugs med pa// de na smad
261a4(skyes rabs): tshul shes rnams kyis ni// ring ba nyid du spang bya ste// sa skyong rnams kyis dug bzhin du// ma dpyad mi can dpa' bo dang // shes rab kyi rgan smod byed pa// dbang po ma rgyal sa skyong la// nam zhig rgud pa zhon mi 'gyur// de ltar rnam par rgyal ba'i skyon
261a5(skyes rabs): 'di rnams shin tu ring po nas thob pa yang rgyal ba'i dpal ni nub par byed do// dbyung ba'i stobs kyis sa dbang rnams kyi bdag byas kyang // shes rab rgan pa rnams kyi tshul gyis skyong bzhin yang // si'i bdag po'i dpal 'di rnams 'gyur/
261a6(skyes rabs): 'gro ba ste// mnyes gshin dor ba'i lus can rnams la 'god byed ltar// dbang po'i dgra ni rnams rgyal yon tan drug po ma 'ongs pa// tshul gyi mig dang ldan pas chen chun tsho gas ni lha byed pa// rlung gis gdungs pa'i me lci rnams ltar
261b1(skyes rabs): g.yo ba yang // nor can ma yin bdag pos dpal ni nye bar ster bar byed// de bas na bdag nyid rnam par rgyal bsdu lha yi rtag tu gnas par bya zhes zer ro// de nas rgyal po de'i yul rnams kyis dbang po 'phrogs pa'i phyir snying stong pas yang
261b2(skyes rabs): ngo bskyung gi phyir smras pa/ grang zhig khyed cag lta bu bla ma rnams kyis bdag la gdam drag byas pa de ni bdag gis 'da' bar 'gyur pa mo yin zhes zer te/ byang chub sems dpa' rang gi khyim du song nas kyang // rdza rnga gling bu'i sgra yis nung
261b3(skyes rabs): gang ba// glu bcos sgra ldan sgeg dang bcas pib gar mkhan ldan// sa bdag des ni myos pa nyid kyis mig dmar ba// btsun mo'i 'khor na yang dag rgyan zhugs par gyur// de nas sgeg bcas btsun mo'i lag gisra gtad pa nyi yid na//
261b4(skyes rabs): 'brog byed khu byug mig ltar dmar ba ni// yid 'byung me yi bud shing rgud pa rnams kyi gzhi// lte ba kha phye'i ut+pal gyis brgyun chad 'thung gyur// de nas rim gyi nyi ma nub par nyer snang la// mdab chags rnams ni rim gyi tshang rnams song
261b5(skyes rabs): sdong po la// sa bdag de yi mdun du mar me 'dzin pa rnams// gus pa dang bcas 'ongs te mar me'i snod rnams slar// de nas srod dus ri bong gis mtshan rtse yod parA// skad cig des ni 'dod pa'i rten can chang 'thungs te// rgod pas bsku
261b6(skyes rabs): ba'i mchu ldan gar mkhar mo'i gdong // sgeg pa'i mig can la ni lta ba bcings par gyur// de ltar chang ni yongasu 'phel bas rmongs pa'i bdag/ grags shing yid ni 'phrog pa'i gar dang gli'i sgra// ji ltar yang ni mtshan mo'i tha mas
262a1(skyes rabs): 'gyur te// mi bdag de ni kun nas 'od med zla gzugs ldan// de nas der rol pa'i blon po kha cig kha can gyi shes rab kyi muche ba'i bdag nyid mi bzod par gyur pas ka sha'i rgyal po la 'di skad smras par gyurate//
262a2(skyes rabs): lha'i steng du chags pa dang bral ba'i snying dang 'dra ba khra n+dan mthong ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag cag rnams thos te ji ltar 'di lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la brten nas lha 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir 'bad par bya ste/ de bas na de'i steng du ltas yod
262a3(skyes rabs): ches par bya ba yin zhes ze ro// rgyal po de yang rmongs pa'i rang bzhin gyis ma dpyad pa nyid du byang chub sems dpa'i steng du monyes gshin bya g.yel bar kun nas slong bar gyur to// byang chub semos de bas kyang gtam de yid ches pa
262a4(skyes rabs): rnams lo kun nas nye bar dmigs te/ grogs po su zhig mdun du 'di lngar smras par gyur to// gdug pa'i bdag nyid rol pa'i blon po 'di rnams kyis rgyal po 'di bdag gi khrosu bcug pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad du skye ba ngan
262a5(skyes rabs): pab rnams kyi skye ba ni cig tu gzhan rnams la gnod pa nyid kyi phyir ste/ 'gro sdang dam min skye dang sbrul dag gi nAng na// bdag steng gdeng can mchog de dmo mIna? skye be min// lto 'phyo'i gdings ka ri ni ra bu chen po yod pa ste/ skyon
262a6(skyes rabs): rnams ma lus 'byung ba nyid ni skye bo ngan// rang bzhin gyis ni skyes pa zhes bya khe ba nyid// me la brtan pa'i nim pa'i mdab ma dor ba ste// dam min skye bos dam pa'i skye bo'i spyod byas kyang // nad rnams gnod byed tshig ni dug gi cho sa
262b1(skyes rabs): dor mi byed// skye bo la ni 'byung bar byed cing 'phreng ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa sbrul gyi drug/ yan lag pa gnas spyan pa lA ni drug zha'i sngags rnams kyis ni zhi bar nus// bzang min rgyu za ra tshig ni dug ni chen po'i rnam gcod gnod du /
262b2(skyes rabs): pa ni// sgo sor 'jigs dang yid lnga gdungs pa srog dang bral ba'i bar du 'dzin par byed// skyon ni mang mthong skad cig gis 'jig kun+da nas skrag par bskyed pa ni// sbrul rnams kyi nA rgyu ni yin te du sa'i rdul gyis nye byar bsregs pa ni/
262b3(skyes rabs): rgyal srid las byung chen po nyid ni gang zhig khyim dang 'dra ba kun nas spong // de nas longs po'i tshogs shes min pa'i rgud pa chung yang dri la reg mi byed// gal te rgud skyo de sdug bsngal gyis ni brten bya mi skyod mngon phyogs nyid du khrid// /
262b4(skyes rabs): shes reb dang ni rig stobs rnam par bral ba yang ni skyes phyi'i dpal mthong 'gyur// gal te ri dgas bdag pos 'bad pa med par la ni mang po grogs nyid 'gro// lce sbrang gis kyang de la rjes 'gro mche bla gnyis pa'i bdag po'i sha za
262b5(skyes rabs): 'gyur// de bas na bdag cag lta bu rnams la sa'i bdog po 'di gnod ma yin no// zhes smras nas gnyen 'dun dang grogs po'i skye bo dang yo byad rnams kun nas dro ra tau// khri snyan gyi pags pa dang shing gi shun pa dang / rIl bya spyi blugs
262b6(skyes rabs): 'dzin cing rtag tu 'bras bu med pa bdud kyi yid la re ba 'bras bu med par byed pa/ shing rta dang 'dra bar nges po la gnas nas dri mo med pa'i chu dang 'brel pas rlung bsil ba dang / du mi'i ri dgas kyi tshogs dang 'dab chags kyi tshogs kyis
263a1(skyes rabs): khyab pa/ dka' thub grub pa'i thub pa rnams kyi rten dang / shin tu dga' bar gyur pa dang / shin tu shing rnams mang ba nyid kyis nyin mo byed pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams kyis 'jug pa ma thob pa dang / sa 'dzin pa'i nye bar
263a2(skyes rabs): brten pa 'ga' zhig la borten nas dka' thub spyad par gyur te bsam gtan bzhi rnams thob nas ni// nim gyis bsgom pa rnams kyi mchog bdag nyid chen po dka' thub che// des ni mngon shes lnga la gnas// de nas blon po de ni dka'
263a3(skyes rabs): thub spyod bzhin pa// rab tu zhi ba mchog ni rnam por mthong bzhin pa// dman pa'i chu lon can ltar mchog gi bu lon can// ring nas spangs te dgos pa med bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas ka shi'i rgyal pos dus gcig gi tshe na brang la gzhung
263a4(skyes rabs): ma par bzhag pas go cha dang ldan pa dang / dri ma med pa'i rgyan rnams kyi nor bu'i 'od zer gyi dkrigs pa gser bcad pa ltar dag cing yan lag rgyas pa/ 'phro bar byed pa'i rta rnams kyi mchog chas las sil sil g+hi sgra 'dab chags
263a5(skyes rabs): kyi tshogs kun nas skrags par byed pa'i shing rta'i mchog la zhon ri dgas shor ba'i ltad mos snying 'dren par gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dang bcas pa'i nags la rje su zhugs par gyur te/ shing rta'i shugs kyi dbang gis skyod
263a6(skyes rabs): pabar byed pa'i brgyan// rnams kyi 'od kyis 'tsho ba'i lag pa gnyis snang byas// shugs ni gsal ba'i ri dgas rjes tshol mi skyod ni// mtshon cha la mkhas shugs ldan bcas par rab 'gro 'gyur// des ni shin tu ring ba'i ri dgas rjes
263b1(skyes rabs): 'brangs nas// ri dwags ltar ni rgyas shing mdzes pas bskyod pa'i mig/ mig gi mtha' mar gzhu rgyud 'dzin pa mang ba dang bcas// mda'i stan ni myur du mi skyong de byas 'gyur// de nas ri dgas mo yi grogs ltar ring du song ba la// bskyod pa'i
263b2(skyes rabs): rmig pa gnyis kyis na mkha' 'jam par byed pa ltar// shing rta 'dren pas 'dzin pa rta rnams sgra sgrogs thag pa chad// de nas gzhu rgyud mda'i ltong rnam bral myur du khyer bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpas ka shi'i rgyal po
263b3(skyes rabs): mthong nas bdag gi yul du rgyal po 'di 'ongs pa de bas na/ bdag gi 'di ngan 'gro'i rgyu dam pa ma yin pa'i grogs po mang ba byed pa chung ngu myang ba'i rgyal po nyid 'di las gdon par byas te/ lan bzang por 'jug par gyur pa
263b4(skyes rabs): zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas/ skad cig ma nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po'i mthus mtsho ba gnyis pa'i smon chu'i phyogs rnams kyi bar dra dang ldan par byas pa dang / ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / cong log dang / gsor gdung gis
263b5(skyes rabs): 'jigs pa dang / rgyal mtshan mthon po'i rtse mo rnams kyis mngon par gdungs pa'i nags kyi shing yal ga dang ldan pa dang / chu'i khur gyis lci ba'i chu 'dzin pa ltar brtan pa'i sgra can rdza rnga dang ldan pa dang / kun nas grang bar
263b6(skyes rabs): gyur pa'i chu skyar ltar dkar ba'i dung rnams kyi sgras rna ba 'don par byas pa dang / mngon du phyogs par 'ongs pa'i shing rta'i 'khor lo rnams kyis mtha' mas dma' bar byas pa'i sa'i steng dang ldan par byas pa 'di dang 'di nas
264a1(skyes rabs): mngon par 'jug par gyis shig/ da ni gang du 'gro zhes bya bas 'thab mo ba'i tshogs kyi sgra sgrogs pa dang / kun nas gzhu bkang ba dang / go cha gon nas krol ba dang / ca n+do'i sgra 'byung bas ri dgas kyi tshogs
264a2(skyes rabs): kun na sa skyugs pa dang / rgyug ning thab mo la brtson pa lus 'phags rgyal po'i dmag tshogs nye bar ston cing gnas te/ rdul gyi mun pa can gyi bar ni 'dres byas pa/ glang chen rnams kyi sna'i chu thogs rnams kyis rmod//
264a3(skyes rabs): skyong rnam/ sa kyi cod pan rin tsho na dri med pa'i// 'od zer g.yo ba rnams kyis 'ga' zhig sgron byed 'dra// glang chen rnam par 'phyang du rnams kyi ni mdzes gyur te// rnam rgyal ku mu da rnams ltar ni 'ga' zhig tu// de nas rim gyi rim gyi ring
264a4(skyes rabs): po nas ni de// lus 'phags rgyal po'i zla ldan mig ni mtshan mo 'phel// de nas shing rta la gnas rna ba'i mtha' ma 'brel// gzhu rgyud mda' dang bcas pa las las byas par gyur// 'phro ba'i lto 'phye lto ba'i pags pa'i 'od ldan
264a5(skyes rabs): pa// la la zhig gi ral gli shubs nas bton par gyur// 'dzag pa'i skyon chu'i thigs pas gos pas gdong ldan pa// g.yer ka dang bcas glang mo rnams kyis kun nas bsgribs// 'phral 'bur lcags kyos gtad pa la ni lag pas
264a6(skyes rabs): gzhan// shin tu glang po che ni kun nas longs par byas// rgya chen brang gi mthil nas gzhu ni gzung byas te// rnga ma dang bcas rgyug pa'i rta la gnas pa ni// gzhan gyis mda' 'dzin nas ni sgro ldan rno ba ni// sor mo rnams kyis stan na sar
264b1(skyes rabs): pa ston par 'gyur// de nas mngon par phyogs par gyur pa'i dmag de mthong nas ka shi'i rgyal po'i kun nas skrag pa'i dbang gis 'dar ba yang drag par 'byung ste/ da ni su la skyabasu 'gro zhes zer ba bdag gis thos te/ ji ltar
264b2(skyes rabs): bdag nyid chen po khwa can de dka' thub kyi nags 'dir zhugs pa de nyid bdag la bka' thub kyi stobs kyis lus 'phags rgyal po'i stobs 'di las srung bar byed par 'gyu ro snyam du rnam par bsams nas/ shing rta 'dren
264b3(skyes rabs): pa la smras pa/ shing rta 'dren pa shing rta 'dren pa// de yi dka' thub nags gang du// khra can bdag nyid chen po yis// lam shes pa yi lam de ni// bdag gis shing rta drang bar gyis// de nas 'dren pas de ltar bgyi zhes slar mnyan nas//
264b4(skyes rabs): lcug gis kun nas bskul bas myur bar 'phel ba ni// rab rgyas sna las skyes pa sgra can shugs kyis ni// rta rnams thug pa rab tu bkrol ba byas par 'gyur// de nas myur bar dka' thub nags nas na 'byung nas// pad+ma'i phreng bas byas
264b5(skyes rabs): pa'i lag pa brkyang byas te/ dogs pa rnam par dor nas spyil por zhugs mdzod ces// dka' thub nor can des ni mI skyon de la smras// de nas shing rta mchog la rim gyis bcas nas ni// lag pa kun nas bzung ste 'jigs
264b6(skyes rabs): bas 'khrug pa la// ri dgas dang ni rma bya chu skyur bar med pa/ dka' thub nag su thub pa mchog des khrid par gyur// sa'i bdag po des kyang spyil por song ba ni// ngal bas kun nas khyab pa'i yid re bcas// shing rta rta dang rkang thang
265a1(skyes rabs): rnams kyi khyab pa ni// stobs kyang kun nas khyab pa'i dbang gis rnam par mi snang gyur// de nas rgyal po des gsong por smra ba byas shing spyil po'i gnas dang rjesu mthun pa'i stan 'ga' zhig la kun nas nye bar gan
265a2(skyes rabs): te// thams cad du blta ba btang pos lus 'phags rgyal po'i dmag tshogs de mthong zhing byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ khyod kyi dka' thob nagasu bdag ni zhugs pa la// dgra'i dmag de myur bar nyid du gang du song // khyad par
265a3(skyes rabs): du ni yang ba dkar po chus zad pas// chu gter rnams kyi 'phreng ba rlung gis gdungs pa ltar// khra can gyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod rnam par gdul ba'i phyir bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi che ba'i bdag nyid bstan par byas pa ste/ 'dir ni
265a4(skyes rabs): lus 'phags rgyal po'i dmag tshogs gang na yod ces zer ro// gzhan yang / gang du gnyen rnams las kyang 'jigs// dgra 'jigs gcig pur ma zad kyi// rgyal srid de ni skyon meng ba// sems bca su zhig don du gaunyer// 'di ni gdon
265a5(skyes rabs): bya bsad bya 'di// de ni rang nyid mina? blang bya// bsam pa yang 'di dmyal ba'i phyir// sa skyong bya 'di smos ci dgos// de bas rgyal srid bde ba chung // tha mar 'jigs pa chen po ca ni// dror nas gcig tu dag pa ni// rab byung nyid la khyod brtan/
265a6(skyes rabs): mdzod// bodag la chags pa zil gyi nono// dka' thub nags dang rgyab phyogs pa// srog tshogs rnams ni de lta bu'i spyod pa byed de gang gis ngan 'gro brten par 'gyur te lhas gzigs shig/ srog lugs du bi'i bla bres no// sra
265b1(skyes rabs): ba'i srin dang rjes mthun pa// me tog skyes pa'i shing gi nang // pad+ma sngo ba'i mtha' ldan pa// mtha' med pa yi sA skyes ldan// swa skyes mthug pa'i grib ma yis// bsil bar byed pa'i sa phyogs can/ bung ba lhang bas kun skrag pa// kun
265b2(skyes rabs): nas 'dar ba'i lte btsun// dka' thub can rnams bu mo yis// mi tog btud par gyur pa ni// srub bzhin pa yo gtsub shing sgras// kun nas mid 'byung mtshon byas pa// kun nas dka' thub mo rnams kyis// shing le'i khang sgo bcug
265b3(skyes rabs): bzhin pa// zhi ba shing lo rnams kyi gnas// zhi min skye bo dang ni bral// mnyen mdun chags pasna dka' thub nags// skye bos 'gro ba nus pa min// legs pa rnams kyi bar chad 'di// mnyes gshin gal te skye mi 'gyur// mdza' bo
265b4(skyes rabs): rnams chad mya ngan med// lus can rnams yid srog mi 'gyur// bdag la chags pas 'jig rten 'dri// bya min stobs kyi byed du bcug/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i rgyu nyid phyir// dgra las mnyes gshin shin tu dka'// bdag la chags
265b5(skyes rabs): pa'i rmongs po las// de lta bu ni su zhig byed// gang gi smad pa sgra med pa rnams kyi// 'dren ni skad cig der 'gro 'gyur// gang tshe nyid du kun nA bsnyen// 'jig rten mnyes gshin tshon po 'di// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dgu'i// de tshe spang bar
265b6(skyes rabs): nye bar song // mnyes gshin chen po rnams bcang // gzi brjid ldan yang skad cig gis// skye bo la 'ongs khong nang rnams// mar mo la ni phye leb ltar// yan lag rnams la kun nas tshad dang khong na lhag pa dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jig
266a1(skyes rabs): ba dang // gnyer sems dang ni gnyid sad pa dang nyin mtshan la yang shin tu mun can phyogs rnams dang // mchi ma dang bcas mig dang brtan min gnyid ni mdza' bo'i skye bo rnam chung ngus su brtan// mnyes gshin
266a2(skyes rabs): sbrul gyi brtab pas rmongs pa'i yid can rnams kyi rgud pa 'di rnams 'byung ba yin// long spyod 'dod pa glang byo 'ching ba mchog shes rnam par gcod par byed pa rjes song ste// 'dod chags grub po skyod pas bskul ba brgyag pa'i dbang
266a3(skyes rabs): gogs dam pa min pa'i lam rgyug cing // mnyes gshin dka' ba chung ba nyid kyis bcug par mi nus pa ni glang po che kun nas rmongs shing slongs mo pa'i sdug bsngal nyon mongs lcags kyu'i rma ni bzod par byed// gnyen mdun mnyes gshin
266a4(skyes rabs): pa ni dgra bo bzhin dang drag pa'i glang po bzhin dang me bzhin du// gang gi ring nas yongasu spangs nas 'gro ba de la longs nad rnams ni kun nas 'dzud mi byed// gang zhig 'di la btsas pa'i sdug bsngal bskyod pa mi mkhas pa'i skye bos
266a5(skyes rabs): 'khyud par byed// rtag tu sman min za ltar mi zad rnam par rgod pa rnams ni de la nyon mongs byed// grang zhig gnyen 'dun 'ching ba bcas nas srid pa'i 'jigs pa gcod phyir nagasu seng ba ni// de ni mkhas pa rnams kun gyi ni nyi ma
266a6(skyes rabs): bzhin du 'od ldan rnams kyi mdun song ba// de la sems ni 'byung bas byas pa rno ba'i mda' yo bya ba'i 'bras bu med pa'i gzhu// skyes pa'i 'bras bu bla na med pa zhi ba'i bde bo thob par gyur cing des ni rnyed// de nas rgyal po de rab byung ba
266b1(skyes rabs): la nges par byas pas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ dri med rgya chen blo'i grags pa can khyod kyi// 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kun nas rgya che ba// mthong nas bdag gis yid kyang myur bar byed pa ste// dka' thub kyis ni dbang po nyid thob
266b2(skyes rabs): ba'i phyir// oM ma rdzu 'phrul 'di ni dka' thub kyis mos la// gal te blo ldan rnams kyi blo'i stobs kyis kyang // de ltar skyon ni mang ba dri ma can gyi ni// skad cig gis 'jigs sa la rgyal po nyid kyis ci// de nas rgyal po des rta'i kha lo ba gding
266b3(skyes rabs): mchi ma dang bcas pa de la rgyan rnams byin nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du rab tu byung bar gyur to// shing rta'i kha lo ba yid mi dga' ba des kyang rgyal po de la bskor ba byas te/ dka' thub kyi nags de nas shing rnga mchog blangs nas rnam
266b4(skyes rabs): par phyung bar gyur te// 'jam pa'i rmi gau pa gnyis kyis sgra ldan rab tu 'phro ba'i 'dun gyi rnga ma can// rab tu srab pa'i kha chu'i rgyun gyis mal gyi dbul spangs pa// mi skyong dang ni rnam par bral bas sdug bsngal gyis ni rnam 'khrugs
266b5(skyes rabs): de rnams// shin tu lci ba ltar ni bka' bas shing rta de ni dal zhing rgyu bar gyur// rgyal po'i khab tu yang rim gyis rjesu thos pa 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i grong khyer pa'i skye bos phyir byung ste/ rgyal po gang na yod ces bya ba dris par gyur pa
266b6(skyes rabs): dang / kha can drung na rgyal po 'di// rab tu byung zhing nye bar gnas// mtsho ma'i mig bcas kha lo ba// 'di ltar brjod cing mya ngan byed// de nas skye bo rnams kyi rgyud pas rgyal po rab tu byung ngo zhes bya ba thos nas/ rgyal po 'khor thams cad du
267a1(skyes rabs): kun nas 'khrug pa nyid du song bar gyur to// de nas ka shi'i rgyal po'i btsun mo bdag po rab tu byung ba thos pas sems mchog tu smre sngags 'don par gyur to// a ma dpal gyi brgya med nyid// shin tu g.yo ba'i lhan
267a2(skyes rabs): skyes kyang // gcig pu gang du yang song ba// dka' thu bA nag+na su dor nas song // dpal la klan ka byas pas ci// bdag gi yid lA shin tu drug/ gdu byir des dor bdag 'tshe ste// glang po ches ni glang mo bzhin// bzhon pa shin tu 'jam pa dang // rab tu
267a3(skyes rabs): bod bar gnas pa des// bya dka' rab byung nyid la ni// yid ni ji ltar des ni byas// zla tshes zlo 'brel ltar dkar ba// gon pa'i gos ni bar dor nas// ji ltar rang bzhin gyis rtsub pa'i// shing lo rnams ni des gos gyur// li khri dang bcas
267a4(skyes rabs): sor mo can// gang gi lag pas bdag la ni// thig le byas pa de ring des// ji ltar ku sha rnams 'ongs gyur// nor bu dang bcas gser gyi snod kyi phul ba ni// dri zhim zhim pa'i chang ni dga' bas rab btus te// des ni lag pas sam ni
267a5(skyes rabs): shrishing lo sbyar bas sam// sgom pas gdungs pa chu ni so sbyong ci lhur 'thung // sa skyong cod pan nor bu'i 'od rnams gang zhig ring reg pa// grogs po rnams kyis gus dang bzlas pa'i 'dud pa rnams kyi lhur// de rnams rkang pa'i senA mo
267a6(skyes rabs): rin chen 'ang rnams 'phro byed de// nags kyi sa'i rdul rnams kyis ni nges par sngo bar gyur// ngal zhing me tog rnams ni mngon du 'dzin par byed 'gyur ba// ze rangs du su rim gyi lag pas yal ga gzung byas nas/ don byas ljon
267b1(skyes rabs): shing bud med rnams ni rlung gis 'dar byas pa// gang rnams de la ze'u 'bru'i sor mo rnams kyis yang yang reg/ de nas blon po rnams ci ltar yang bstan pa nyid la dmigs nas ngu ba'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang cig tu rnam par bzlog nas
267b2(skyes rabs): rgyal po de'i sras che ba la dbang bskur ba byas par gyur te/ rgyal po des kyang dka' thub drag po spyod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i man ngag gis// rim gyis bsam gtan rnams rnyed nas// mchog tu zhi bde thob 'gyur te// legs phyir
267b3(skyes rabs): dbang po yang dag bsdams// de ltar mgron po de yis ni// byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa// zhi phyo ri mang po gting ring ba'i// 'dod pa'i 'dam las kun bton gyur// de ltar mchod bya'i thub de la// gzhan gyi don ni ston mdzad pa'i// khyed
267b4(skyes rabs): cag brtan zhing gus ldan pa// nges par leg phyir 'byung bar shog/ khra can gyi skyes pa'i rabs te skyes pa'i rabs bzhi pa'o// // sa gsum phan mdzad bdag nyid chen po rnams// lha'i bde ba yang ni rnam par 'dor// gzhan
267b5(skyes rabs): gyi sdug bsngal shin+da tu lci bas ni// brtse ldan rnams kyi sems ni sdug bsngal byed// 'di lta ro rje su thos te/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma lus pa rdzogs pas byang chub dang nye bar rang gi 'od kyi yan lag snang bar mdzad pa'i byang chub sems
267b6(skyes rabs): dpas dus gcig gi tshe dga' ldan gyi gnasu 'khrungs par gyur to// bdag nyid chen po des kyang de na gnas pa'i lha rnams la chos las ma 'das po'i gtam gyis mal dam pa mngon par gsal bar mdzad nas/ 'di ltar
268a1(skyes rabs): bsams par gyur te/ rdzogs ldan gyi dus na 'jig rten pa chos la rtse gcig pa bde bar lam bzang po la 'jug pa yin te/ rtsod pa'i dus 'dir ni rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang chags pa dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams
268a2(skyes rabs): kyi dbang du gyur pa'i srog chags rnams bde ba'i cha yis rmongs pa'i bdag nyid rnams ngan 'gro gzhan gyi dbang du song ba ste/ de bas bdag gis byang chub rtogs nas 'khor bA nas 'don par rig zhes zer ro// yul dbus na yang dad pa rnam
268a3(skyes rabs): par dag po'i yid can 'jig rten pa yin te// gang zhig 'di zas gtsang ma zhes bya ba grong khyer ser skya na mi rnams kyi bdag po yin pas 'di ni shin tu yang dam pa rnams kyi spyod pas drang srong chen po rnams kyang lhag pa yin te/ de bas
268a4(skyes rabs): na 'di nyid kyi btsun mo'i mchog sgyu ma lha mdzes kyi khong bar byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba rnam par bsams nas/ mtshan mo nyal ba'i rmi lam du// kha re ltar dkar lci zhing mche ba drug pa'i skyon chu yi// dri yi bsgos pa'i gdong can mam
268a5(skyes rabs): bA gnyis pa'i gzugs byas+t+ra nas/ sa yI bdag po zas gtsang dag gis btsun mo'i lto bar ni// 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad phyir de ni zhugs par gyur// de nas btsun mo sgyu ma lho mdzes chen mos rgyal po la rmi lam de sgra
268a6(skyes rabs): zhing gnas te// lha lags de ring bdag la rmi lam du ston ka'i chu 'dzin ltar dkar ba mche ba drug pa glang po che'i dbang po lte ba g.yas po kha phye nas khong par zhugs zhes zer ro// de nis rgyal po de rmi lam gyi 'bras bu shes pa
268b1(skyes rabs): gnyis skyes rnams kyi mdun du rmi lam de brjod cing gan so// bram ze de rnams kyis kyang de la zhus pa// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras la 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smra'o// rgyal po de yang yid dga' ba gnyis skyes de rnam
268b2(skyes rabs): la gus pa mdzad nas rnam par btang bar gyur te/ btsun mo btsun mo'i nang 'khor bcas// rjes gnang de nas dus gcig tshwa re// lum bi'i tshal du song bar gyur// me tog khur ni 'dzin pA yi// yal ga kun nas 'dzin gyuraru po'i// btsun /
268b3(skyes rabs): mo'i lci ba myur du phye nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'byung 'gyur// de nas 'khrungs pa tsam gyis gser gyi gnya' shing ltar dkar te/ mig ni stong dang ldan pA'i ka bras ram+ba gyis 'dzin par gyur// me tog man+da rA yi tshogs dang
268b4(skyes rabs): lhan cig dro yang dbu la ni// mkha' las dri ma med pa'i chu'i rgyun dag bab par gyur// 'gro ba rnams kyi mgon gcig de ni stobs byed kyis bzhag pa// brtan zhing rim gyis sa ni gom pa bdun ni der byas nas// shin tu dro mtshur ba'i
268b5(skyes rabs): tshig 'di zhi ba gsungs pa ste// bdag ni skye ba tha ma zhes te mun pa rnams mad phyir// de nas bcom pa bsil med 'od zer ltar 'bar zhi ba yi// bdag nyid can de'i 'od ni nor ldan ma ni snang byed cing // nyi zla dag gi 'bar ba'i 'od rnams
268b6(skyes rabs): kyis ni mi phyed pa'i'o// 'jigs pa'i mun por dmyal ba rnam pa rnams la 'jigs par gyur// bdag nyid chen po chos kyi rgyal po 'di yang 'di ni dbang bskur ro zhes bya bar rab tu dga' bo'i yid dang ldan pa'i lha rnams kyis na ma hrI/
269a1(skyes rabs): dkyil la rba rnams brdungs par gyur to// btsun mos ni khyogs la zhon nas byang chub sems dpa' blangs te rang gi khyim du song bar gyur to// de nas shin tu ngo mtshar ba'i yid dang ldan pa'i zas gtsang mas btson
269a2(skyes rabs): thams cad btson ra nas grol bar mdzad de/ grong khyer ser skya kun nas mthong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams kyi sna tshogs pa'i tshong khang gi lam shin tu dri zhim pa'i dri'i chus sa'i steng du chag cha ga btab pa dang / me tog sar
269a3(skyes rabs): pa rnams bkram pas lam rnams kyi bar 'dres pa byed du bcug go// 'dres pa'i ri dgas kyi ni pags pas g.yogs par byas pa'i phrag pa'i phyogs// me'i 'od can ral pa rnams kyi tshogs ni kun nas 'dzin byed cing // dkar min min
269a4(skyes rabs): pa'i las rnams kyi ni mngon sum dkar min zhes bya ba// ni mkha' las byung skye bo rnams las sa'i bdag pos thos par gyur// de nas rgyal po de mngon par bzhengs te drang srong chen po de byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba shes pa la 'jug
269a5(skyes rabs): bar byed pa mngon par mkhyen te gsong por smras nas/ ar+g+ha rab tu sbyin pa la sogs pa bkur stis rim gror byas te/ gdan yongasu 'dzin pAr byas pa 'di la bde ba dris nas ma mi'i pa par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ston zhing
269a6(skyes rabs): gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de re zhig bdag gi sras 'di la ci tshe ring bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur ram gzigs shig ceso// de nas dkar min byang chub sems dpa' blangs te mthong nas kyang 'di ltar bsems par gyur te/ ji ltar
269b1(skyes rabs): bsams par gyur te// ji ltar mtshan gsal rnams kyis 'di// rgyan dang 'dra bas brgyan byas pas// de ltar 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ba// gsal chen sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur// gang tshe sangs rgyas 'di 'byung ba// de tshe bdag ni shi
269b2(skyes rabs): 'gro 'gyur// 'di las chos gtam thos gyur pa// gang dag lus can de don byas// drang srong tshon po dag pa'i sems// 'di ltar sems par byed pa de'i// mig dag ni ga rdzi'i rtse mo dud// ngu ba'i mchi ma 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas zas gtsang
269b3(skyes rabs): mas mchi ma dang ldan pa'i mig can dkar min la gzigs 'khrug pa dang bcas par gsungs pa/ nges par 'di ni tshe thung ba ste de nas bcom ldan 'das mchi mA dang bcas pa'i mig can du yang dag par gyur pa// kyi hud ma phyed
269b4(skyes rabs): ba nyid sras kyi pad+ma bdag gi gshin rje mche ba gnyis pa'i bdag pos rtsa ba nas 'don par gyur zhes smraso// dkar min gyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po mya ngan gyis chog cing cho ga ste// bdag ni bdag rang la rje su mya ngan bgyid do// gang
269b5(skyes rabs): gi tshe 'di ni yul rnams dor nas rga ba dang 'ching zos pa'i lus can rnams gzigs nas yid skyo zhing dka' thub kyi nagasu seng ste/ sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe na bdag ni shi ba nyid du nye bAr 'gyur zhes pa de bas
269b6(skyes rabs): na mya ngan gyis bdag mig 'di mchi ma dang bcas par byas zhes smras nas/ drang srong chen po de song ba dang don 'grub ces bya ba'i mtshan byang chub sems dpa' la byas te/ dus ring po nyid kyis bla ma rnams kyi drung nas shes pa thams
270a1(skyes rabs): cad rtogs shing // rigs mthun pa la grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i bud med blang bar gyur to// ci ltar 'di rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba'i nad mi shes pa nyid du bdag gis sra su gyur cig ces bya ba rnam par bsams nas/
270a2(skyes rabs): zas gtsang ma'i pho brang gi nang nyid du btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dubu su 'jug pa rgyun mo chad pa'i grwar dang glu lta ba thob pa la rtse gcig pa byang chub sems dpa' byed du 'jug cing gan so// des kyang glags 'dzin ma la gzhonu sgra gcan
270a3(skyes rabs): 'dzin zhes bya ba'i sras bskyed par byas nas// dus gcig gi tshe glu dang nye bar 'brel pa btsun mo'i 'khor lo 'os pa'i skyed mos tshal rnams gsan nas phyi rol tu 'byung ba'i phyir blo byas te yab kyi rje su gnang ba'i shing rta mchog la
270a4(skyes rabs): zhon nas mdzes par byas pa'i sor skya'i mal gzigs shing kun nas gshegs par gyur to// dngosu yid 'byung ltar ni snang ba dang ni mig che ba// mig la mngon dga' nang 'khor los ni de thos nas// de mthong ba'i slad du phrad 'dod pa yid
270a5(skyes rabs): dang ldan pa yi// grong khyer bud med rnams kyi bya ba sna tshogasnga 'byung bar gyur// de nas la la zhig rgyan ma rdzogs pa rab tu rlon pa'i thig las dpral ba'i dbusu mngon par brgyan pa dang / rna ba las ut+pal kun nas 'pho ba dang / mig
270a6(skyes rabs): cig mig sman gyes bslus nas langs te/ migo thur 'dzin pa'i pad+ma dang lag pas yan lag mi dang rje su 'dra ba'i gzhonu 'gro ba 'di la ltos shig ces bya ba grogs mo la ston zhing gnaso// la la zhig ni e maM'o skal pa dang ldan pa
270b1(skyes rabs): grags 'dzin ma ste gang zhig 'di'i lhan cig spyod ma snyam du rnam par bsams nas yun ring por mig mi g.yo zhing 'di mthong bar gyur te/ slar gzhan dag kyang lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin pa'i skar khung gi ka ba shing 'dzin pa dang 'dra
