270b2(skyes rabs): bar mdzes par gyur to// la la zhig 'di ltar rgyal po'i sr-is+ya mthong bI'u lta mos shin tu myur bar khyed kyis 'gre ste/ nu ma'i 'gram nas lung bzhin pa'i mu ti gA ha rA phyed ma bcings pa 'di kun nas thogs shig/ e ma'o khyed ni shin tu
270b3(skyes rabs): g.yo ba'o zhes brjod cing bla mi'i skye bo 'di khros pa mthong ste ci'i phyir khyod ngo tsha med pa zhes bya bo gzhan dag la klan ka byas pa'o// slar la la zhig lci ba'i 'o ma 'dzin pa'i phyogs gcig tu kun nas reg pa'i phyed phye ba'i sgo rje su 'dzin
270b4(skyes rabs): par gyur pa'o// la la zhig ni khyed cig pu nyid kyi gzhonu mthong ba'i ltad mo ni ma yin te/ re zhig nang du 'gror chug shig dang bdag kyang rgyal po'i sras mthong bar 'dod po ltad mo dang ldan pa zhes 'di ltar smos par gyur te/ de ltar
270b5(skyes rabs): rnam par song ba'i phyir// gzhonu mthong 'dod de rnams kyi// ske rags dang ni rkang gdub sgra// khyim rnams la ni rab tu rgyas// de nas mi dbyang sras ni lam la rim gyi gshegs mdzad cing // lag pa rab 'dar dbyigs pa ga mdzes pa
270b6(skyes rabs): bral ba dang // gnas gtsang bas ni kun nas sprul pa yan lag kun nas sgyur// shin tu dkor ba'i mchog gi yan log rgan pa rnam mthong 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la dris par gyur to// re zhig khyod kyi smos shig/
271a1(skyes rabs): slar 'di ni gnu bdungs pa ltar sbyar zhing kun nas yan+ta lag stobs chung ba/ yongasu smin pa'i ka 'i me tog ltar mgo bo las skyed pa dkar zhing / mgro rab tu 'dar bas ci yang ston pa 'dra ba 'di su zhig mthong
271a2(skyes rabs): ba yin/ kha lo sgyur bas gsol pa/ gzho nu lags rgas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa/ lus dang dbang po rnams la gsal ba 'phrog par byed pa/ 'dod pa'i gtam dor bar byed cing khros pa ltar gzho nu ma rnams
271a3(skyes rabs): kyi lang tsho'i nga rgyal sel bar byed pa dag gis 'di gnas skabs 'di la drang bar gyur pa'o// ces so// de nas bdag nyid chen po des slar gsungs pa/ gal te rgas pas gzhon pa nyid 'di 'di ltar 'jig par byed na rnam par 'gyur ba'i
271a4(skyes rabs): lus 'di la chag pa su zhig ceso// kha lo sgyur bas gsol pa/ gzhonu lags rgas pa gcig bur ma zad kyi na ba yang khams 'khrugs pa las yang dag par byung ba lus can rnams kyi don med pa chen po ste/ de las gzhan ni shi ba
271a5(skyes rabs): zhes bya ba thams cad 'phrog pa la mkhas pa shin tu don ma yin pa ste// gang zhig yongasu bsam par gyur pa yang lus can rnams la sdug bsngal chen po skyed par byed pa zheso// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'chi dang na dang rga ba'i
271a6(skyes rabs): dgra rnams gsum po 'dis// e ma 'gro ba zhag rer rje su bcings pa ste// 'jigasba chen po zhes bya mi zad yod pa la// ci ltar 'di ni yul rnams la ni rtse gcig po// de ltar kha l-i bas ni shing rta myur du bzlog/ khyim du 'gro phyir
271b1(skyes rabs): slong zhig slar 'dir ci 'dug/ 'chi ba dang na dang rga ba kun+da nas dogs pa yi// bdag ni skyed myos tshal la dga' bar 'byung mi 'gyur// de nas rgyal pos byung bar gyur pa'i sras dang rnam par bral bas dogs pa can gyi yid kun nas skyo ba'i
271b2(skyes rabs): yid can byang chub sems dpa' gsan nas dkar po min pa'i tshig de rje su dran te/ kho lo sgyur ba la btsun mo'i 'khor du 'os pa'i skyed mos chel nyid du gzho nu khrid par gyis shig ces bya ba'i phrin btang bar gyur to// kha le sgyur po des
271b3(skyes rabs): myur bar 'di skyed mos tshal nyid du zhugs te gsol pa/ tshe dang ldan pas blta bar 'os te 'dir ni// cung zad me tog rgod pa gsal pos mdzes pa dang ni ldan pa yi// dal bu dal bus ma l-i yi'i rlung ni rgyu bas gar ni byed bcug pa// skyed
271b4(skyes rabs): mos tshal gyi ljon shing bu mo 'di rnams kyis ni 'od med snang ba ste// mtha' ma rnams la 'khor ba'i bud bi'i tshogs kyi phreng ba'i rtse mor sgra sgrog so// de nas byang chub sems dpab shing rta la babs te rga ba dang na ba dang 'tsho ba la bsams
271b5(skyes rabs): nas kun nas 'khrug pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa/ zug rngu nang na yod pa'i mche gnyis pa'i bdag po ltar 'di ltar gsungs par gyur te/ blo chung rnams kyi brten gcod nyams mi dga' bo'i mtha' mo can// zhi ba'i bdag nyid rnams kyi yongs
271b6(skyes rabs): spangs lto 'phye rnams ltar drag/ 'gro ba'i chen chung gzhon pa la yang 'dod rtse gcig pa yi// kun nas 'khrug pa'i yid ni yul rnams kyis ni 'phrog pa yin// de nas rgyal po des gar dang glu la mkhas shing gsal ba'i bud med rnams byang chub
272a1(skyes rabs): sems dpa'i thugs 'gugs pa'i phyir spyod mos tshal der btang bar gyur te// de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' can du mngon par 'ongs nas rgyags pas spobs pa skyed pa dus kyis bya ba de dang de rnams
272a2(skyes rabs): 'byung bar byas par gyur to// de nas la la zhig gis ljidi la smras por gyur pa/ gzhonu gzigs shig ma lA yA'i rlung rnams 'drin dri zhim me tog shing rnams kun nas 'dar byed rgyu ba ste/ bung bas tsuM d+hiTi shing gri ste mo rab tu che bar gyur
272a3(skyes rabs): ba l+ya ni bskor bar byed// gzhu brdungs pa la bya ba rnying bar byed ba ci phyir 'di ni khyed kyi gnas pa ste/ sgra ni ring ba khu byug me tog gzhonu can la bskul ba shes bya bdag gi dog s+ho// gzhan yang rang gi rdul gyi yan lag 'tshe byas pa/
272a4(skyes rabs): gzhonu lhan skyed snyo ma bu mo ni// bung bas mchog gis 'khor bar byas pa ni// skad cig ma ltar srab pa yongasu dor// gzhan dag gis kyang slar 'di la gsol pa/ bung bA ljon shing bud med skye bo longs spyod pa// me tog rdul gyi 'od
272a5(skyes rabs): med 'brul byaM daM mthong nas// rlung gis kun nas 'dar ba'i gzho nu 'ad mo skyes kyi// pad+mo yang dang yang du bsdigs mdzub 'dra bar byed// la la zhig gis kyang 'di la gsol pa/ ji srid bdag gi khyed kyi phyir me tog rnams rgyu ba 'di rnams
272a6(skyes rabs): bri ba'i me tog rdul gyis par rnams med pa ni/ bdag gi mig la gnod pa zhi min 'gro ba rang cig gnyis// gzhonu ring po nas ni de srid 'di ni rnam par bzlog/ gzhan dag rnams kyis kyong rgo pa dang bcas par mngon du gnas
272b1(skyes rabs): shing 'di la gsol ba/ spyad pyod kyis ni rnam par 'drar ba'i ze'u 'bru ku ba la yi gzhu rgyud kyis ni kun nas bcings// me tog gis byas gzhu ni dung chag lta bur dkar ba'i grib ma brang la rnam bkod nas/ zab pa'i phyir ni brnyed par byed pa'i bud
272b2(skyes rabs): myed rnams ni khyed la kun+da nos brdeg par 'dod// mI ga cig btsums par byas pa 'dod pa'i lha ni nges par me tog gi mda'o drang por byed/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sring mo rnams dam pa ma yin pa'i smra ba 'di rnams kyis
272b3(skyes rabs): cho ga ste/ bdag gi yid skyo ba sreg blugs za ba lu chu'i rgyun ltar sgeg pa'i gtom rnams kyis kun nas glags de ltar rnyed pa ma yin te// snying mo rnams zhes de de yi// tshig ni shes nas bud med rnams// bzhin ni thur du lta zhing gnas// ngo
272b4(skyes rabs): chos rnam par skrag pa ngo// gzhon mo'i tshogs de ngo mtshor bar gyur shes nus ni/ bdag po'i b+h+yo can rgyal po'i sras po yid byung yang // me tog gis ni mda' rnams nges par dong ba la bzhag nas// ngo che dang bcas yod byung bas ni gzhu ni
272b5(skyes rabs): phab par byas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nags de la dga' ba ma thob par gyur te// nyin ma nub 'dod pa la shing nA la zhon nas bud med de rnams kyang khyim du song bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
272b6(skyes rabs): sgeg pa'i gtam la brnyas par gyur cing mal gyi dbus na rnam par bzhugs te/ rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba rnams nyid yid la bzhag nas gnyer sems la rtse gcig par gyur to// de nas gtsang ma pa rnams kyis bdag nyid chen po de yi skye
273a1(skyes rabs): ba'i mal skyong bar byed pa rnams la 'phrul kho nar gnyid pa dang mi smra ba gnyid byas par gyur to// der yang la la zhig rnams rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgra dang dbugs kyi dbang gi sau gsal ba dang / rnam par 'jog pa'i kha
273a2(skyes rabs): chu'i cha yis tha ma byas pa'i gdong rnams 'byung bar gyur to// gzhan dag rnams la ni 'jam pa'i stong du kun nas gram pa dang rab tu lhod pa'i smad g.yogs ltung ba nyid kyi brla rab tu gsal ba dang / 'o ma 'dzin pa dag gi steng du mu ti gi har
273a3(skyes rabs): rnam par 'khrugaso bar gyur pa dang / rnam par gtor mi mnyam pa'i lag ngar gyi ljon shing dang ldan pa shi ba rnams dang 'dra ba'i las rnams gnas par gyur to// gzhan dag gis kyang rdza rnga la rnam par zhugs par byas pa'i nyis 'gyur/
273a4(skyes rabs): gyi dpung pa'i rten la rnam par bzhag pa'i gdong can stan las rnam par lhung zhing de lta re nyid du nyal bar gyur te/ la la zhig gi gnyid kyis sor mo rnams kyi 'bad pas 'a phrog pa'i lag pa las ma mchu dang rnam par 'brel pa'i bu ga dang
273a5(skyes rabs): po can du bud med kyi mig gi 'bras bu ltar sngo ba'i gling bu lhung bar gyur to// mche ba gnyis pa rnams kyis rnam par gnon pa'i pad+mo rnams ltar gnas skabs sna tshogs pa'i de rnams kyi gzugs mthong nas mar me rnams kyis rgod pa dang /
273a6(skyes rabs): 'a'adra ba ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhon ma de rnams la smad pa mdzad nas mngon par bzhengs te/ phyi rol tu gshegs nas kyang mos pa blangs te gsungs pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di ni kan nas rgal 'dod yid// dka' thub nagasu
273b1(skyes rabs): 'gro phyir brtson pa ste// de phyir bdag gi nges pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir// shugs chen dang pa sngags ldan rta de khrid las sheg/ mos pas kyang gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyis bskal bzhin pa rgyal po'i chad pa la gus pa ma byas par de
273b2(skyes rabs): ltar bgyi zhes bya ba slar mnyan te/ mchan khung g.yon par ral gro bzung nas/ rta'i mchog ngang pa sngags ldan khrid nas 'ongaso// byang chub sems dpa' zhon pa'i rta de la phyis rta kha khrid pa'i mos pa dang lhan cig tu gnod sbyin rnams lag
273b3(skyes rabs): mthil du rmig pa rnam par bzhag pa mtho rangs kyi dus su na mkha' nas drang srong chen po a rA la'i spyil po dang nye bar 'jug cing gnas par gyur ces pa'o// de nas rgyan rnams gsal ba'i rin chen gza bidz+rad kyis// gsal ba des ni sku
273b4(skyes rabs): la phrog par mdzad nas ni// rlabs dang ldan pa khu byug mgrin pa ltar nag pa'i// mgo skyes rnams ni rim gyi ral gris bcad par mdzad// dad pa'i chu'i rten ni ut+pal gsal bar byas pa ltar// rgyan ni gsal ba de ni kun nas mthong ste mas
273b5(skyes rabs): ba ni// rab tu stobs can mya ngan sreg blugs za bas kun gdungs pa// mu tig dang mtshungs chu thigs rnams ni btang bar gyur/ byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ chos la mngon du phyogs pa 'am skye bo dka' thub kyi na gsu mngon par
273b6(skyes rabs): 'jug pa la skyes bu dam pas sdug bsngal bya bar 'os pa ma yin te/ de bas na song zhig dang bdag gi bla ma'i skye bo la 'di skad tsos smes shig/ mi zad dka' thub kyis bdag ni// lus 'di yang ni zad 'gyur te// bdag gi go 'phang rnyed pa'am/
274a1(skyes rabs): de nyid mthong rnams kyi mthong gang // mos pas kyang de ltar bgyi zhes byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par phyag 'tshul nas rta dang rgyan rnams blangs te/ rim gyi grong khyer du 'ongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lo rgyus
274a2(skyes rabs): de mi'i bdag po la zhus zhing gan so// zas gtsang mas kyang de'i rnam par nges pa gsan nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu rnam pa mang pos skye sngags 'don par gyur to// byang chub sems dpas kyang rngon pa'i gzugs 'dzin par byed byi
274a3(skyes rabs): lha'i bu la rang gi ri bing can gyi 'od zer rnams ltar mdzes pa'i na bza' gnyis kyis gos dmar po dag nyos nas mnabs te/ rim gyis rim gyis a rA la'i spyil por phyin par gyur to// a rA las ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ongs po mthong
274a4(skyes rabs): ste/ legs par 'ongs sam logs par 'ongs sam zhes brjod nas rang gi shing le'i khang par khrid nas spa'i gdan la bzhugasu bcug cing bde bar sngon du 'gro bas smyo ba byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas de la dris pa/
274a5(skyes rabs): khyed rnams kyi chos ci lta bu/ ci ltar yang ni rtogs 'gyur te// de nyid mthong 'dod bdag la ni// dam pa bdag gis gsungs par 'os// a rA las smras pa/ skal ba chen po mnyon par 'os zhes ze ro// rang bzhin dang rnam par 'gyur ba dag
274a6(skyes rabs): go skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba rnams de kho na nyid ces bya ba brjod pa ste/ rang bzhin yang 'byung ba chen po lnga dang / nga rgyal dang gsal ba zhes bya ba'o// rnam par 'gyur ba rnams ni dbang po rnams dang / de'i yul rnams dang lag pa dang //
274b1(skyes rabs): rkang pa dang / ngag dang / bshad sgo dang po rtags dang / yid ces pa'i zhing 'di rnams rnam par shes pa zhing shes pa zhes bya bar brjod pa yin te/ zhing shes pa yang de kho na nyid shes pa rnams kyi bdag gsal bar smra ba yino// grang zhig skye ba dang
274b2(skyes rabs): zhi ba'i chos kyi bdag nyid de ni gsal ba zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o// mi gsal ba nyid ni de las bzlog pa ste de ltar mi shes pa dang las dang sred pa ni 'khor ba'i rgyur rnam par shes par bya'o// gsum po la gnas pa'i shed bu ni
274b3(skyes rabs): snying stobs 'da' bar byed nas 'jug pa ma yin te/ rkyen dang bral po dang / nga rgyal dang / the tshom dang / rnam par kun+da nas 'chos pa dang / khyad par med pa dang / phabasnga ma yin pa dang / chag pa dang / mngon par lhung ba rnams te/ de la rkyen dang
274b4(skyes rabs): bral ba zhes bya ba ni phon ci log tu 'jug pa'o// bdag ni mngon par smra ba dang / bdag ni shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nga rgyal lo// gang zhig the tshom med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang 'dug pa'i ri lu ltar gcig pa'i dngos pos mthong
274b5(skyes rabs): ba de ni the tsho mo zhes bya bar shes par bya'o// gang zhig bdag de rnams nyid blo dang lus rnams so// gang zhig tshogs 'di de ni bdag ces bya ba mngon par kun nas mchongs pa smra ba yin no// khyad par med pa ni slar rab tu sdud pa dang ma sad
274b6(skyes rabs): ba dag gi rang bzhin med pa rnams kyi khyad par shes pa nyid de de ni khyad par med pa ste zhes bya bar shes par bya'o// swA hA byed pa dang / bshad byed pa dang / bsang gtor mngon par bsang gtor logs pa rnams ni thabs ma yin pa zhes bya
275a1(skyes rabs): par shes par bya'o// dngos po gang la shes rab dang // yid dang ngag dang / blo dang lus rnams kyi chags pa nye bar 'gro ba de ni chags pa zhes bya bar brjod pa yi no// 'di ni bdag gi yi no// 'od bdag ces bya ba
275a2(skyes rabs): gang zhig sdug bsngal rlom sems pa do ni mngon par lhung ba'o// srog chags rnams kyi 'khor pi'i la lo zhes bya ba'o// muna? dang gti mug dang rga ba dang 'chi ba dang skye bo rnams te/ gti mug chen po ni 'dod pa zhes bya bar min btags
275a3(skyes rabs): pa'o// mun pa ni khro ba zhes bya bar shes par gyis shig/ slar ni sdug bsngal dmus long nyid mun par brjod pa yin te/ ma rig pa 'di tshigs pa lnga dang ldan pas rmongs pa bcings pa yid can skye ba lags pa'i sdug bsngal chen po la
275a4(skyes rabs): yang nas yang du 'jug pa yin te/ der yang bdag ni mthong ba po dang / nyan pa po dang / shes pa po dang / 'bras bu dang rgyu zhes bya ba 'di ltar ma shes nas 'khor bar yongasu 'khor ba yin te/ rgyu 'di rnams kyi ni skye ba'i rgyun gyi 'jug pa
275a5(skyes rabs): mthong ba yin te rgyu med pas skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'o// de la thar pa 'dod pas rab tu sad pa dang rab tu ma sad pa dag dang gsol ba dang mi gsal ba dag shes par bya'o// bzhi po 'di rtogs nas zhing shes pa sdug bsngal thams cad las/
275a6(skyes rabs): rnam par grol to mi bzad pa'i go 'phang thob por 'gyur zhes bya ba ste/ thog mar khyim gyi 'ching ba khong nad sa bon dor nas ni/ rtags ni bzung nas thar pa'i bde ba nye bar 'dod pa yi// cho ga shes dang ni ldan pa bla med go 'phang
275b1(skyes rabs): thob 'dod pa// tshul khrims rnam par dag pa nyer bzung nags nang gnas par bya// phyis ni chags pa chags bral dag las rab tu byung ba'i 'jigs pa dang bde ba dag shes nas dbang po'i tshogs thams cad tshar bcad nas
275b2(skyes rabs): yid kyi zhi ba la dmigs te/ de nas 'dod pa rnams dang / sdang ba la sogs pa rnam par dben pa las skyes pa'i bsam gtan dang po rtog pa dang bcas pa thob pa yino// des kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa la snang zhing slong
275b3(skyes rabs): ba dang ldan pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par rtog la de rnams kyang yid kun nas 'khrug par byed pa shes nas rnam par bral ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba'i bdag nyid can bsam gtan gnyis pa thob pa yin// /
275b4(skyes rabs): dga' ba des kyang yid 'phrog par gyur pa 'od gsal gyi lha rnam su skye ba yin te/ gang zhig slar dga' ba'i bde ba de las sems 'don par byed pa de ni gsum pa bde ba dang dga' ba dag dang rnam par bral ba'i bsam gtan
275b5(skyes rabs): gsum pa yin no// de tsum gyi bde ba la yid nub pa de dge rgyas kyi lha rnamasu skye ba so sor thob pa yino// bde ba de lta bu thob nas gang zhig btang snyoms byed pa de ni zhi ba bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnam par bral ba'i bsam gtan nye bar
275b6(skyes rabs): thob pa yin te/ de ni tshe ring ba nyid kyi kha cig ni grol ba nyid nges par byed pa yino// ci'i phyir zhe na/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnam par gcad pa'i phyir dang / sems la bya ba med pa'i phyir ro// bsam gtan 'di yis 'bras bu che ba'i
276a1(skyes rabs): lha rnamasu thun mong gi 'bras bu mkhas pa rnams smra ba yin te/ ti nge 'dzin de las langs nas lus can rnams kyi skyon rnams mthong ste/ lus rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir ye shas rtogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan
276a2(skyes rabs): de yang spangs nas khyad par 'dod pa gzugs les shin tu 'dod chags dang bral ba yin te/ lus 'di la sdug bsngal rnams gang zhig yod pa de rnams ni drang por blo yis kun nas lta bar byed cing sdug cing mthug pa'i yang rdzas rnams
276a3(skyes rabs): la yang na mkhar lhag par mos pa skyed par byed de/ na mkha' la song ba'i bdag nyid mngon par bsdus nas na mkha' mtha' yas pa mthong zhing khyad par rtog pa'i phyir dang / bdag nyid la mkhas pa yin pa'i phyir bdag nyid la bsdus te cung
276a4(skyes rabs): zad med ces bya ba ni ci yang med pa zhes bya ba'i 'du shesu nye bar song ba lus dang bral ba'i grol ba zhes brjod pa yin no// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te sems pa po yod na// grol ba ga las 'byung bar 'gyur// dge dang mi dge'i
276a5(skyes rabs): bya ba rnams// de yod la ni 'jug pa yin// ji ltar yang chu dang sa rnam par bral bas sa bon ni gang gis kyang rab tu bcugs pa mthong ba ma yin te// de'i rkyen las rnam par gtsugs pa mthong ba ma yino// de bzhin du bdag kyang bzung bar
276a6(skyes rabs): bya'o// las dang mi shes pa dang sred pa dor bas thar pa gang zhig nges pa yin pa de ni bdag po yod pa la de yongasu dor ba dmigs par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de yongasu ma dor ba ni thar pa ga la yod/ de ltar nga rgyal yongasu dor ba ni bdag
276b1(skyes rabs): yod pa ga la 'gyur// nga rgyal yod pa la yang smra ba'i rgyun mi gnas pa nyid yin te zhes bya bar gsungs nas/ spyil po de las a rA la'i// blo gros chen po de byung nas// dka' thub dka' ba drag rnams kyis// lus ni skam zhing bzhugs
276b2(skyes rabs): bar gyur// dka' thu ba 'dis ni de kho na nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin snyam du dgongs te langs nas// kun nas stobs chung ba'i lus can byang chub sems dpas chu bo nai rany+dza la khrus mdzad nas/ dga' mdzes kyi phul ba'i
276b3(skyes rabs): bsod snyoms gsol nas dus kyi lto 'phye'i rgyal pos mngon par bstod pa/ de na rtsa sha'i phreng bas rgya che sngo ba'i spros// kun nas dmar ser yan log can gyi sku khyab pa// mtsho skyes rnams kyi rab tu g.yo ba'i 'dab ma can// sut+pa
276b4(skyes rabs): sngon pa'i madrab ma sred pa'i phreng ba ltar// de nas gom pa dal gshegs nas// blo ldan gser gyi ri wAr 'od// byang chub shing gi 'og tu ni// byang chub phyir ni de btsugs gyur// de nas bu mo rnams lhan cig me tog gi gzhu blangs nas
276b5(skyes rabs): ni/ de yi yid ni dkrug pa'i phyir// yid kyi skye gnas kun nas 'ongs// shir Sha'i me tog sar pa ni// de yi mdun du bsgom byed cing // 'bras bu kun g.yo lta ba ni// la la zhig gi cung zad bzung // grogs mo'i rna bar gzhan gyis ni//
276b6(skyes rabs): rgod pa sngon 'gro tso'ang smras// blo ldan de la lta ba ni// sgeg dang bcas par gtad cing gnas// gzhan dag me tog du bi ni// mig ni ngo mtsha bor byed cing // gos ni mtshan ma las lhung ba// ska rag lhod pa bkag par gyur// zla ba
278a1(skyes rabs): ltar mdzes lang co 'di ni gang du ste// dka' thub 'di ni gang du a ma 'di ni 'gal// yul rnams nyamasu myong nas 'di ltar rigs pa ste// yongs su smin pa khyed kyis 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir// phan par 'dod pa
278a2(skyes rabs): nyid kyi khyed la smra ba ste// dus min yongasu da lA du 'jug pa ci phyir lus// de lta rI lA la 'dud pa'i yan leg can ni smra ba ste// yan lag med cing so sor gnod pa'i tshe de la// de ltar la la 'dod pa'i yano lug smras par gyur//
278a3(skyes rabs): khyed la don 'gror phrad 'dod bud med rnams la ni// blo ldan khyed kyi rje su mthun min ci phyir 'di// 'di ltar de la mngon par smras gyur la la zhig/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams ni sen mos btubs byed cing // gang gi tshe de rnams la byang
278a4(skyes rabs): chub sems dpas brnyas pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba sbyin par mi byas pa de'i tshe bdud kyi bka' byed rnam pa du mar 'gyur ba'i gdong can de rnams la smras pa/ 'jigasu bcug nas 'di bslang bar gyur cig ces bya ba'o// de nas seng
278a5(skyes rabs): gi'i gdong la ni// hUM byas pas ni yang yang du// me stag 'od ni 'phro bo yi// 'bur ba'i gdong las grol bar gyur// de rnams de yi bka' byed gdong las byung // lhung zhing skad cig gsungs te// rab rgyas myi nga nu me tog nyid// byang chub sems
278a6(skyes rabs): dpa'i steng du 'phangs// me ldan 'khor lo su zhig gis// rnam rgyal ze'u 'bru'i tshogs ldan pa// ut+pa la yi mgo phreng gyur// so bsdams gzhan dag nyid kyis ni// grogs bzhin kham pa'i smin ma tsan// kha ba'i rtse mo steng du 'bebs// kun da'i
278b1(skyes rabs): phung po nyid du 'gyur// gzhan dag gser sgra'i mig can+da ni// ral gri dang bcas dpung pa bteg/ ljags kyi ka bi'i grib ma 'dra// skad cig mi g.yo nyid du gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub shing gi 'og tu bzhugs byas nas// 'phro
278b2(skyes rabs): ba'i mig gi me can dka' bzhin du ni byed rnams kyis ni tshogs// dkar ba min par 'gro ba'i grogs kyis kun+da nas rab tu bskul bzhin pa// nags kyi me ni kun tu chu dang nye la so bzhin du zhig pAr gyur// me tog rgyal mtshan dang
278b3(skyes rabs): ldan pa 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas par song ba na// bcom ldan 'das de bsam gtan bzhi bya las bzhengs te 'di bsams par gyur te/ gal te skye ba sngon yod na// las rnams kyis ni 'jug pa min// las las byung ba'i skye ba med//
278b4(skyes rabs): las med na yang lus n+dan gyi// gzugs dang skal bzang skal ba sogs// dbye ba ci ltar 'dod mi 'dod// 'on te sngon du las yod na// me skyes pa la ga l-Is te// mkhas pas 'di ltar 'gal mthong nas// 'khor ba'i thog ma rtog mi byed//
278b5(skyes rabs): gal te rgyu med 'gro yin na// su zhig las rang nyid smra 'gyur// rgyu med par ni thar pa yang // rtag tu grub pa nyid du 'gyur// rgyu med pa ri no lcags kyang ni// bskyed pa nyid du 'gyur ba min// la la dbang phyug rgyu yin pa// mi ma byas pa rnams
278b6(skyes rabs): smra bar byed// gal te dbang phyug gzhan gyis byas// de 'dir dbang phyug nyid ga las// 'on te ma sprul nyid skyes pa// de lha gzhan ni cis mi skye// de phyir dbang phag smra ba 'di// bdag gi slad du don med nyid// de ltar 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di// yang
279a1(skyes rabs): dang yang du 'khor bzhin pa'i// nam yang mkhas pa rnams kyis ni// thog ma dmigs par 'gyur ba min// na mkha'i khams 'di ni rlung dang ma dang chu dang sa rnams kyi kun nas 'brel pa ni lus zhes brjod pa yi no// de yang rnam
279a2(skyes rabs): par shes pa'i khams la brten nas 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa'u bya ba rnams byed do zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar gnas pa la skyes bu nye bar btags par byas zhes byas// zhes zer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang
279a3(skyes rabs): chub thob nas du ma rnams kyi mi shes pa'i rab rib bsal bar mdzad do// grong khyer sor sbyar byon nas zas gtsang ma la legs pa'i lum gasngal bar mdzod de/ de lhor bcom ldan 'das de 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi nye bar
279a4(skyes rabs): zhi bar bya ba'i don du yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar nus kyang shin tu ring por 'khor ba na kun nas 'khor bar gyur to zhes bya ba ste/ blo chen de ni byang chub phyir// lag tu gtad ltar sbyin byas te// yun ring shes rab pha rol phyin// dam pa bde
279a5(skyes rabs): par gnas pa yinaM// e mo gal te chos ni mun pa 'joms// bde gshegs kyi gsungs 'di ni rnam dpyod nas// dri mas khyab pa'i lta bas mthong ba'i phyir// skye bos 'di ni gzhan 'dod rten mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri med
279a6(skyes rabs): gsung yang yod pa zhes bya la// rmongs pa lam ngan song ba'i skye bo 'di ni kun nas 'khor// ri bong mtshan pa mngon par go sher la ni gang zhig mi zum pa// dman pa'i blo de song zhing ji ltar ltung bar 'gyur ba min//
279b1(skyes rabs): yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni// seng ge zhabs 'bring bas byas 'di// chos 'dod rnams kyi phreng ba byas pa 'di// skyes pa'i rabs kyi phreng ba byas pa yi// dge ba cung zad gang zhig bdag gi bsams// de
279b2(skyes rabs): yis 'gro ba 'di ni bde gshegs kyi// 'dod pa la dmigs thar pa'i phyir gyur cig/ rab 'gro gnya' ral can brgya byin// khwa can don kun grub ldan pa// lnga yis lhag po'i sum cu 'dir// thub pa chen po'i skyes rabs rnams// rig
279b3(skyes rabs): paspyi'i bstan ba cos cha ni rnam pa mang po shes nas sangs rgyas kyi yang gasmyung / phyi ma'i snyan dngags mkhan skye zlo bas swA ni stan ngag 'od rnams kyi ni rab gsal byas// kho che re nye bar 'tsho ba'i skyon gyis rnam par gdungs pa sha
279b4(skyes rabs): nanu phyi rol 'gro 'dod byas// ri dbang kha ba can la seng ge zhabs 'bring las ni srog rnams der nas mab+h+yo ris song // rgyal po'i sras slob dpon seng ge zhabs 'bring bso mdzad pa'i skyes pa'i rabras kyi phreng ba rdzogs//
279b5(skyes rabs): dge slong dpal ldan blo gros 'byung gnas zhes bya mkhas pa ni// sems can rnams la chos dang zang zing kun nas 'god mdzad cing // tshad ma dang ni lung rgyud rnams du ma la 'dris pas// 'gro ba'i mnga' bdag gi ni spyod pa 'di la
279b6(skyes rabs): gnyis po dag/ gzhal du med cing dri ma med pa kun nas bsags te de las 'di// nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri mchog bzhin du myur spangs sngon du 'gro ba ni// de dang de'i skyes rabs yongs bzung 'gro ba sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni
280a1(skyes rabs): gdon byas te// mthar yang thub dbang rnams bzhin mtha' dag bya byas sangs rgyas khams gsum du ni khyed 'byung shog/ lcang lo can gyi bum pa zhes bya mkhas dang lhan cig 'di nyid du// gang zhig rnal
280a2(skyes rabs): khrims 'byung gnas skad gnyis pas ni 'di ltar cho ga bzhin// bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa shin tu rnam dag yangs pa ni// skye bo ma lus pa la phan pa'i don du yis yang dag bsgyur// rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di tA
280a3(skyes rabs): ka de bil zhabs dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas sbas dpal gyi sgye'u ri'i rtsa chos skor dben sa'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur//
280a4(skyes rabs): bkra shis// bde leg/
281a1(skyes rabs): 'jig rten kun tu dga' ba'i zlos gar tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa'o//
281b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ lo kA nan+dan+yA Ta ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten kun tu dga' ba'i zlos gar zhes bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo// bung ba'i phreng ba mi gsal sgra sgrogs rkang pa mud ba ma rnams
281b2(skyes rabs): bskyod pas// ge sar khA 'bus ro bcud dang bcas rdul phran tshigs pas khyab gyur cing // sbrang rtsi rgya chen thig les rnams khengs mai tog thal mo sbyar ba 'dis// bdag gis rgyal ba'i zhabs lnga mchod pas khyed rnams la ni zhi bar mdzod//
281b3(skyes rabs): gzhan yang byams pa'i thugs ni rgya chen dga' bas megul nas yang dog 'khyud gyur pa// khyod kyi snying rjes bdag cag kyang ni de bzhin btang snyoms mtshungs mdzad rigs// legs pa'i lha mo gragaso 'dzin mdzad bzhin bdag cag
281b4(skyes rabs): gis ni rjes mo 'gro/ bdud kyi bu mos phrag dog gis smras khyed rnams sangs rgyas rtogs par shog/ rdzogs byang chub la bdud ni khro bas skad cig gzhu bkang de yi sde tshan rnams// gang gis rnam par bros pas bub cing log 'dren zhabs
281b5(skyes rabs): kyis mnan te mngon skad 'byin// lus med bu mo myos byed ma rnams mchi mchog 'chi med rnams kyis mthong nas dga'// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i sngon 'gro gzhan gyi mi thub mas ni khyed rnams skyong bar shog/ dga' byed kyis mchod pa'i
281b6(skyes rabs): mtha' las mdo 'dzin pa'o// snyan ngag tsan+d+ra dA sha yA// zlos gar 'jig rten kun tu dga'// sngon med zlos gar rab sbyar bas// de ring tshogs la bdag gi ston// de ni nges par snyan ngag nyid// shar phyogs dzaM dU ra Na'i rigs las ni// lha mo rgyal ma
282a1(skyes rabs): yid kyi shing rta las// gang 'khrungs khur na 'khur bar mi nus kyang // de'i bu zhes rab tu grags pa thob// gzhan yang rab 'byam rgyan dang bcas shing tshigs bcad rkyang ba mkhas pa'i 'jug ngogs rgya chen rnams// gang gi
282a2(skyes rabs): dngos po gcig gi brjod byas la yang rgya chen zad par ma gyur pa dang / gang gi byA kAr Ni ni nyung zhing rab gsal yongs rdzogs gzhan yang mjed gyur nas// 'jig rten chags dang 'jig rten mun pa'i tshogs chen rab tu 'joms mdzad gyur// /
282a3(skyes rabs): de nas da ni rol cha dang bcas te rtsom pa na re zhig rang gi 'phags ma la bos te/ kye 'phags ma re zhig 'dir byon ceso// de nas de'i gdung ba'i shug dang bcas te rab tu zhugs nas/ kye 'phags ma bdag 'ong so bka' sgos shig ce so// mdo
282a4(skyes rabs): 'dzin pa nas kye 'phags pa ci'i phyir khyod sdug bsngal bar byed/ zlos gar ma nas ci'i phyir sdug bsngal mi 'gyur te/ ji ltar khyod kyi ming tsam gyis kyang ni// gnas rnams yang dag 'dren nus bu gcig po// nges par bdag ni rab tu
282a5(skyes rabs): byung nas ni// rang lus 'bras bcas bsgrub par bye zhes spro// mdo 'dzin pa nas 'dri ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zlos gar ma nas kye 'phags pa de byang chub sems dpa' ma yin na nA mkha' las kyang ma lhung zhing rnam par
282a6(skyes rabs): 'dzin byed kyi mthil brtol nas kyang ma byung ngo // zhes smra zhing gang zhig 'dir snying rje skye ba'i phyir 'tshe bar spro ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod do// mdo 'dzin pa nas/ 'phags ma de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni/
282b1(skyes rabs): snying rje'i sa bon la skyes pa'i// byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'khrungs// pha rol phyin pa'i yal 'dab rgyas// dpag bsam shing bzhin dgos 'dod rnams// sdug bsngal ba des chog go// 'di'i bsod nams kyi stobs las de bzhin du dpal
282b2(skyes rabs): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i rol mo rtsom par mdzod cig dang / zlos gar ma nas/ kye 'phags pa 'dir yang dus gang la brten yang dag pa'i rol mo brtsam par bgyi/ mdo 'dzin ma nas/ kye 'phags ma 'dir re zhig gsar du
282b3(skyes rabs): mngon par byung ba lhan cig byed pa'i snying mi'i dris yongasu khyab pa me tog gi phyed ba len pa sbrang rtsi byed pa'i rigs kun tu dga' zhing rtse ba mye tog gi dus la brten la glu long zhig/ 'di lta ste/ pad+mo rnams ni ba mos rigs nyams
282b4(skyes rabs): 'od ldan gang zhig sha rA nas dbugs rnamasa'i byin// de bzhin mkhas pa'i lho phyogs rlung rnams kyis ni 'jig rten yang dag tshim par byed// phyogs rnams pa lA shA yi ljon shing me tog sha dral bzhin du shin tu dmar// bsil zer
282b5(skyes rabs): 'od zer 'gro ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bzhin gsal po yang dag gnas// yol ba'i nang nas ngo mtshar che// ngo mtshar che zhes// ngo mtshar tsho zhes so// mdo 'dzin pa nas/ rna bar thos nas/ 'di su zhig yin/ nges par brtags pas/
282b6(skyes rabs): kun nas shes te/ rigs 'dzin ma yis gzhonu gtsug na nor bu 'di mthong nas// rab dga' g.yo zhing rang gi lag pa'i pad+ma gar rtse zhing // na mkhar rkang gdub rtse la gos kyi 'od zer reg gyur nas// gang ldan ri bo'i rtse mo la
283a1(skyes rabs): ni rab tu rgyu bar byed// bdag cag rnams kyang ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa phun sum tshogs pa brtsam mo zhes zer nas/ gnyis po nges par zhugs te/ mngon du phyogs nas gnaso// de nas rig 'dzin ma rab
283a2(skyes rabs): tu zhugs te gar byed cing ats+tsha rI aM oMts+tshiR+Sha aM/ gang gi skye blo 'di 'dra sa chen steng // lha rnams kyis kyang shin tu mthong bar dka'// rab tu dga' bas gzhan gyi dbang gyur pa// dga' bo'i grogs mo pad+ma wa tId la// bdag gi khur nI
283a3(skyes rabs): yang dag gtad byas nas// nam zhig 'ong bIr gyur te bdag mi shes// zhes nas yongasu zhug so// gang gris 'ongs pa dang 'dug pa'ang mi dran par dga' ba'i grogs mo'i bsti gnasu phyin te/ bdag nyid ngo mtshar che nas rab tu zhug s+ho//
283a4(skyes rabs): 'dir ji ltar sbra ngo rtsi byed pa'i rkang pa'i khur gyis me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i rdul gyis tshogs pas khyab pa'i rdo leb kyi steng nA ga ge sar gyi srang lam du byas pa la dga' ba'i grogs mo pad+ma ba ti ni sbrang gi bu mo dang lhan cig gnas shing
283a5(skyes rabs): cung zad cung zad spyi zhing 'khod de/ drung du nye bar 'ong so// de nas sbrang gi bu mo dang pad+ma can rab tu zhugs te/ pad+ma can nas/ kyai sbrang rtsi'i bu mo bdag gi snying myos pa snyam byed do// zhes dga' bI'i gro rin chen phyed ma la lta bar byed cing /
283a6(skyes rabs): ci'i phyir ni de tsam du yang mi 'ong bar gyur/ rig 'dzin mas nye bar thos nas kye pad+ma can sems gtor bar mi byed ces zer/ 'dir de dag gnyis na re a ro dga'/ a ro dga' zhes smra zhing gnyis po rta brtab bor langs song nas/ a i
283b1(skyes rabs): ci yin ci yin rig 'dzin ma nas kun gyi lha byed rnams kyis blta bar 'os pa bdag gis mthong ste/ mig gi 'bras bu thob bo// gnyis po nas khyod kyi myi mthong smros shig/ rig 'dzin ma ni slar yang de nyid smra bar byed do// gnyis pos yang 'dri zhing
283b2(skyes rabs): rig 'dzin ma la pad+ma can rab tu 'khyud do// bdag ni rab tu dga' ba'i gzhan dbang du gyur te gal te bdag gis dbyangs can ma la bar snyed na ni smra'o// gnyis po nas/ khyed kyi dga' ba de shin tu ci mo zhag zhugs pa 'dra'o// rigra 'dzin ma nas
283b3(skyes rabs): 'di ni gzhan mthong nas kyang de la dga' ba chen po mthong ngo // gnyis po nas bdag nyid gcig po 'gegs pas chog gom/ bdag cag la yang cha shas legs par dgos mdzod/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ bdag gis mthong ba dul ba'i mdangs
283b4(skyes rabs): ldan pa// 'od zer rab tu 'dren pa 'phro ba can// phyogs bzhi chos rnams ma lus sgyu rtsal tshogs// yongasu zhugs rnams mig ni dga' bar byed// gnyis po nas/ legs ldan ma zla ba 'am ci zhig/ rig 'dzin ma khros te/ de bzhin du bdag gis
283b5(skyes rabs): ma smras pa rang mchog go// kye 'di ni ri dgas kyis mtshon te de la mtshungs par byed dam/ gnyis po nas/ yang na myos byed dam/ rig 'dzin mi nas/ gang de'i sbyor ba dang bral na hUM zhes byed cing byin za'i rtse mo la phye ma leb dang 'dra ba ni dul ba'i
283b6(skyes rabs): mdangs dang ldan zhing mdzes par rab tu brkyang ngam/ gnyis po nas/ gang ji ltar yin pa smos dang / rig 'dzin ma nas bdag gi smra bar bya yis legs par de legs par nyon cig/ 'di nas rig 'dzin ma skye bo'i gtam phan tshun smra ba las gzhon
284a1(skyes rabs): gtsug na nor bu 'di 'dra'o zhes thos pas ya mtshan che bas dga' ba dang lhan cig sA ke tir grong khyer du bdag gis byin no// de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyi lha mo 'od kyi blo gros ma la khye'u zhig yang dag par 'khrungs te/ gzhan
284a2(skyes rabs): gyi skrun par mi nus shing gzugs dang phun sum tshogs pas rnam par spras pa mchog gi snying rje can gang 'dod pa kun sbyin pa gzhon gtsug na nor bu zhes pa bdag gi mthong ngo // de yang mthong ba na/ kun gyi mngon par 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs
284a3(skyes rabs): ba grub pa'o// rgyal po gang zhig gis bu mo'i ched du de'i sku gzugs dang dbyibs kyi bkod pa thad ka la ri mor bris te khyer ba la bar du rig 'dzin ma rnams kyis brkus te 'khyer bar byed do// gnyis po mngon par 'dod pa 'phel tAM/ slar yang de
284a4(skyes rabs): gang na yod/ reg 'dzin ma nas/ nor 'dzin 'di nyid na'o// gnyis po nas/ khyod kyi mkha' la 'gro ba 'bras bu dang bcas te thob bo// gang ji lta ba de bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa yod 'phrogo pa rnams// khyod kyi gang bar thob bo// rig 'dzin ma nas/ kye ma
284a5(skyes rabs): rings dang khyed cag gi yang mngon par 'dod pa yongasu 'gyur gyis/ sbrang rtsi'i bu mo nas/ gang las bdag cag la 'di'i skal pa sus ster bar byed/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ yang skyon cig 'dug zer/ gnyis po nas/ skyon gang yin smros shig
284a6(skyes rabs): rig 'dzin ma nas/ gang gis na de khyim thab bya ba las phyir phyog so// mA d+ha bi dang pad+ma pa ti dag 'jig rten yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni shin tu dkon no// bi d+hA rI nas/ bdag gi de'i ngo mtshar che ba gzhan yang dran te/ yang bzhin gyi nor bu'i gtam gyis
284b1(skyes rabs): yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni ji lta ba bzhin du de la lhan cigu skyes pa'i gtsug na nor bu'o// mA d+hA bi nas ats+tsha raM aM bir+yA d+hA ri nas ci'i phyir 'di ngo mtshar che/ na mkha'i spyod yul gyis skye bo de mthong ngam+ba/ mA d+hA bI nas/ bdug cag gis mthong
284b2(skyes rabs): bAbI'i thabs 'ga' zhig yod dmA/ bIR+YA d+hA rI nas ma yin te bdag gis khyer 'ong so// gnyis po ngo tsha zhing rtsub rtab bor phyogs rnamasu blta zhing / de grang na gang no zhes// rig 'dzin mas bdag gis steng gos kyi seb nas/ thAng ka la ri mo
284b3(skyes rabs): bris pa de phyung nas/ bstan no// gnyis po ngo mtshar nas nges par bltas te/ gnas tshul ni rin chen phreng ba'i phyogs 'dra ba zhig go// mA d+ha bI dang / pad+ma pA ti dag nas/ khyod kyi don med pa'i dga' ba 'phel bar byas te/ khyod bzhin du legs
284b4(skyes rabs): pa'i nyams dang bcas so// grogs mo dga' ba bdag skyon ci mchis smros shig/ pad+ma can yun rang du nges par bltas nas/ 'di la skyon cig mchi so// rig 'dzin ma khros te/ skyon gang smos dang / pad+ma can sbrang gi bu mos mthong nas
284b5(skyes rabs): sbrang gi bu mo nas// smra b.rI ma nus pa'o zhes zer/ rig 'dzin ma nus/ kye pad+ma pA ti gdung bar ma byed cig/ khyod kyi yang bdag gis thang ka gcig ri mor bris te lha mo 'od kyi blo gro sA ma lo byin pa dang / nye bar bsdus nas/ de yang mngon
284b6(skyes rabs): par dga' nas 'di tsam zhig bag ma dang mna' ma'i gdong ba mtho ngo zhes smra'o// 'dis lhan du mna' ma byas nas shin tu spro'o zhes smra'o// pad+ma khros te/ dga' bi'i grogs mo de bzhin du btse bar rig sam/ spring gi bu mo dga' nas
285a1(skyes rabs): de nas de nas zhes zer/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ de nas rgyal po chungs sbyin gyis mngon du mthong ngo // gnyis gar gyis bltas nas smra ba/ 'di ni gzho nu'i rje su 'ongaso// 'on kyang byed po'i dbang laso de nas gnyis pos
285a2(skyes rabs): ri mo bris la mngon du bltas nas/ gang na spyod pa'i mi gzhonu la ston du bcug go// de nas des yun ring du bltas nas/ shugs nar phyung ngo // mA d+hu bA nas/ de'i mtshan nyid gang yin rig 'dzin ma nas/ lci ba'i skye bo ni rje su chagaso zhes
285a3(skyes rabs): pa'o// pad+ma ba ti ni gang mnyan par bya ba mnyan nas duso// rig 'dzin ma ni des skrag nas/ ji ltar bdag gi bdud rtsi'i char byin pas/ dug gi rnam par khyab par gyur// de 'dis slar yang ji ltar bcos par bya zho sngo// yol ba'i nang du'o//
285a4(skyes rabs): de bzhin du de rnams gcig tu 'dir su 'ong ngam sA mo// de nas drang srong dpon slob gnyis rab tu zhug so// gnyis po'o// bu'i rwa ngo bzhin mnyes gshin pa// yid gdung gang gis mi shes pa// de nyid gcig tu skyes bu ste// 'jig rten na ni bde mchog
285a5(skyes rabs): thob// spyod pa'i bu nas/ bu mo pad+ma can ma bA ti me tog thur song pa las ci ste yun ring du 'gor ro// ci'i phyir khyab 'jug gis ni mtshon byed ma zhes stobs kyi khyer gyur ram// tsha zer byed pas zla ba'i che zhos mi bzod 'od kyis rang nyid rnam
285a6(skyes rabs): zhugs sam// yang na rig 'dzin thabs dang phrad nas rig 'dzin yin zhes phyag byas khyer gyur tam// 'di las bdag gis sems 'dor rang dbang med par yong dag rab tu myos par 'gyur// slob mas smras pa/ kye mkhan po de ltar sems/
285b1(skyes rabs): gdung mi 'tshal/ mkhan po'i mthu stobs ni sa gsum na sus kyang 'da' bar mi nuso// zhes zer nas gnyis po yongasu zhug so// drang srong gis phyogs rnamasu bltas te/ mchi ma 'dzag cing / gal te bung ba'i rig kyi lus ni rnam khebs
285b2(skyes rabs): zla rnams 'bras gyur nas// gdung ba'i zhugs shing tshang tshing gis sgribs pa'i khron pa rnamasu lhung ba 'am// yang na zla dang 'thabs pas de'i mi bzod brtsi zhing rgyug pas lhung // yang na byis pa gcig bur ngu 'am bdag ni shin tu gdung
285b3(skyes rabs): bar byed// thams cad kyi mnyam du thos shing mthong nAs rtab rtab par gyur nas/ rig 'dzin me nas/ yab yin nam ji ltar yin zhes zer ro// pad+ma can sbrang gri bu mo dag ngo che dang bcos bzhin du bdag cag gi ji ltar smras g.yab
285b4(skyes rabs): kyi thos so// zhes zer ro// pud+ma bA ti nas sbrang shing tshang tshing 'di'i chang du zhugs na yab kyis ma mthong ba phyir log pa srid dam snyam nas zhugaso// rig 'dzin ma ni rta ba rtab po nye ba ra btud de phyag byaso// drang srong nas/ dge bar
285b5(skyes rabs): gyur cig zer/ bris sku de mthong nas/ bu mo rin chen phreng ba ma 'di ci yin zer/ rig 'dzin ma nI skrag nos bdag ni nges par 'jigs pas na sku mi nu so// yab nyid kyis tinge 'dzin gyis de bzhin du mngon du mdzod cig ces zer ro//
285b6(skyes rabs): drang srong gis bsam gtan bsgom so// rig 'dzin ma ni shin tu 'jigs par 'gyur te// 'dir yab kyis ci smra 'am snya mo// drang srong nas bu mo 'jigs des chog go// kye 'di la ji lta ba de bzhin bdag dbang che'o zhes zer yang thams cad
286a1(skyes rabs): dga' ba dang bcas par gyur to// bdag cag rnams kyis 'dis dbugs phyung ngo snya mo// drang srong nas/ sngon nas 'di'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni nye bar thos te/ mngon par 'dod pa 'di ni mchog
286a2(skyes rabs): yin no// rig 'dzin ma nas/ legs ldan gyis/ bdag cag rnams rje su bzung ngo // sbrang gis bu mo nas/ kye pad+ma pa ti/ the tshom nges chog don rnams grub// yid kyi shing rta las byung ba'i// nges par dka' thub skye bo i// mngon par
286a3(skyes rabs): 'dod 'bras med mi 'gyur// drang srong nas/ bdag nyid chen po 'dir 'ongs pa// rtse zhig ri mo las thob pa'ang mchod par 'os par bya'o// zhes smra/ rig 'dzin ma nas me tog blangs nas phulo// drang srong gris dra laM phul te nges par
286a4(skyes rabs): bltas te/ e ma mkhas pa zhig gis briso// 'di lta ste/ yang dag gnas kyis rab dbye 'dug stangs lha tshul dang // phra sbom zug dang mtho dman rtsigs pa'i cha rnams dang // zhi ba chags rnam dag mig ni rab tu g.yo ba 'dra/ ya
286a5(skyes rabs): mtshan ri mo dag ni nges par smra ba bzhin// e ma bdag ni yid kyi shing rta rab tu dga' bar tshigaso// 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid chen pa de nyid ni// yul rnams la ni kha phyi phyogs// gang gis de phyir gus pa yis// 'di ni ji ltar 'byung
286a6(skyes rabs): bar 'gyur// bu mo rin chen phreng ba ma yang khyod kyi grogs mo dga' ma dag gang na yod shes sam/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ legs ldan khyod nyid mthong nas chang tshing gis/ rab di zhug so// drang srong nas/ pad+ma pA ti khyod kyis ji lnga
286b1(skyes rabs): yang bslabs sam/ bu pad+ma can 'dir shog/ pad+ma can ni ngo tsha bas 'dar zhing / nye bar phyin to// drang srong gis pad+ma can mthong ste/ 'tsher do des chog go// yid ches sems ni the tshom med par lta byed cing // lus ni rnam par g.yo med brtan
286b2(skyes rabs): zhing bkur 'dod med// byis pa'i blo glos ji bzhin khyod kyis rab dgrar 'gyur// rang bzhin gyis mdzes ldan ma ci'i phyir 'di ngo tsha// pad+ma pA ti ni phyag 'tshalo// drang srong ni spyi bo lA nye bar gtugs te mngon par 'dod slar thob par gyur/
286b3(skyes rabs): cig ces zer/ rig 'dzin ma gang gi skye bar gnas pas kye dga' ba'i grog mo byed pa po yi no// gzhan du ni legs ljon gyi dbyangs ci'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur// bdag kyang don 'di la de bzhin du mngon par chagaso// drang srong slob ma
286b4(skyes rabs): ma bram ze nas kye mkhan po myur du mdzod// rig byed kyi dus tshod la song ngo // drang srong nas/ ji ltar nyi ma gung gi dus la nye bar 'ong ngam/ 'od lta ste/ da ni rab shing gi grib ma rnams la rig 'dzin rnams kyang bsnyel bso'i mtha'//
286b5(skyes rabs): bi'i bsil grib 'og tu ri dgas rnams ni skyug lhud byed cing gnas pa dang / gtsugs shing yur chu rnams nyal zhing gnas pa dang / btsugs yu 'gro med rtse mo rnams la lha'i sred rdzas rnams kyi du ba yang dag 'khrigs// dpal
286b6(skyes rabs): ldan chags bral bsod nams mchog gi mngon brjod po// ma lus sa stengs grags pas 'gro ba gcig nyid rgyal// gang zhig zlos gar rang dbang nor gyi rab dga' gar// dpal ldan tsan+d+ra go mi'i snyan ngag len zhing gnas// 'dir
287a1(skyes rabs): thams cad nges par zhugaso// yan lag dang po rdzogs so// / de nas sngar 'jug mA rab tu zhugs te// 'dir ni rgyal rigs lci'i 'jig rten 'dra bar mthong // ri mo'i rig sa'ang brag ma'i ltad mo 'di bzhin
287a2(skyes rabs): na// gal te 'di ni bden pa yin nA ji ltar 'gyur// de ci gzhan du sngon med mthong bar 'gyur zhes zer nas yong su blta zhing zhugs so// rgyal phran grong mtha'i shin tu mdzes ma rnams// 'di rnams 'dir ni de bzhin rnam par smras// rgyun

287a4(skyes rabs): yo ma can rab tu zhugs te/ k+She kun ta khyod nyon cig gsungs// 'di bzhin du bag ma'i lhung mo lA btang snyomasu byed pa ci yin/ kun tA li ka nas/ kle hany+tse lo ma can lha mos ni bag ma ldudu mor byas mod kyis/ 'on kyang gzhonu 'dir skra
287a5(skyes rabs): 'jug gam/ de nas bdag gisuM yid phyir mi ldog par byed do// lo ma can ni/ gang gi skye bo lci ba'i dka'// nam zhog gzho nus 'da' byed dAm// rin chen 'byung gnas dus bslabs kyis// tsI ste mtshams las 'da' 'gyur ram// kun+da
287a6(skyes rabs): ta nas/ 'dir lha mo nyid tshad ma'o// lo mi can nas/ gzhonu gnyen gyi spyod yul du 'jug pa 'di rnams song ngam// kun tas/ ma song ste 'di bzhin 'jug pa gzho nu la smra ba ni lha mo 'od kyi blo gros ma nas/ bdag la 'phags pa gau

287b2(skyes rabs): byed cing gnyis pa yang gar byed do// lo ma can nges par bltas nas/ kye de bzhin yin na 'dir 'phags pa gau ta mas legs ldan ma'i spyod pa'i rje su 'gro zhing de bzhin du 'dir slar 'ong ngam zer nas/ de nas lha mo 'di bdag cag gis slar
287b3(skyes rabs): 'ding ngo // zhes de dag song ste rab tu zhugaso// de nas rtse grogs bzhad gad pa rab tu zhugaso// nA mnyam dga' ba thub pa'i skye bo'i rjesu 'jug cing yang dag par spyod pa la lha mi 'od kyi blo gros ma'i skyes 'di'o// bdag cag gis snying la zug rngur/
287b4(skyes rabs): gnas te/ de'i ri mo bris pa la yang bag mi'i ltad mo 'di smra zhing / bag ma'i mtshan nyid do// 'dir bltas nas slar yang ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'dir yang de'i blo rnam par bya ste/ gal te 'jig rten pha rol tu/ bdag
287b5(skyes rabs): cag 'das par gyur na yang // rigs rgyud rnam par chad gyur nas// mtshun la chu bikun rnam par 'chad// yang ji ltar smra na/ nyams dga' ba'i bya ba 'grub par 'gyur snyam nas nges par bltas nos/ der na mnyam dga' ba'i snga 'jug
287b6(skyes rabs): man+t+ra rab tu dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal nas mthon byung ngo // zhig 'di la 'dra'i snyam ste/ kye mnyam dzu la/ na mnyam dga' ba gang na yod// na mkha'o la khyod ci zhig smra// de 'di na rab tu dga' ba'o// tshal na zhug so// der nye bar 'gro bar bya'o zhes
288a1(skyes rabs): rab tu zhugs nas bltas pa ba na gang zhig sbrang rtsi byed pa'i bshog pa'i rlung gis rab tu bskyed nas me tog rnams ni kha bye ze 'bru'i rdul du 'khrigs shing gdong na bung ba rnams ni d+haM sgregs shing 'khor bas 'khrig so/
288a2(skyes rabs): nAn mnyam dga' ba ma mthong nas// an+d+ha lAs 'dra na bzhugs zer te/ gal te gdug pa can gyi rig 'dzin mas 'di nas brkus te khyer ba ma yin nam/ zhos smras pa na/ rig 'dzin mA rab tu zhugs te/ mya ngan dang bcas nas/ ji skyid bdag
288a3(skyes rabs): gis dga' ba'i grogs mo la/ gzho nu'i tshul 'di nye bar smras gyur pa// de nas dga' grags pad+ma bA ti lA// mgo la zug rngu yang dag skyes par gyur// lus ni nyal ba tsam thob pa ma yin pa shin tu gdung ba 'phel bar 'gyur te/ grogs mo
288a4(skyes rabs): skye bo yang shin tu gdung bar byed do// skabs dga' ba'i grogs mo spangs te 'ongs kya ma 'ongs pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gzho nu'i thugs kyang shin tu gdung bar byaso snyam nas/ lha zhing gzho nu'i na mnyam mthun pa de bltas nas re zhig
288a5(skyes rabs): bor du 'di gang 'gro bAlta bur bya'o snyam// bzhad gang bas bltas te 'dra na re zhig rtsed ma'i ri'i steng na chu'i 'khrul 'khor steng du 'bab cing rab tu dga' ba dba' rlobs dz+ha rI'i sgra 'byin pa'i steng nA na mnyam mthun pa blta bar bya'o// zhes
288a6(skyes rabs): steng du phyin gar byed cing hI hI b+hau zhes so// de nas mya ngan med pa'i tshil gyi rin chen rdo leb yangs pa'i steng na cung zad smra bar byed cing bzhugs nas mchiso// nye logasu phyin no// rig 'dzin ma ni 'di re zhig gzho nu dag yang chesau pa'i gtam
288b1(skyes rabs): gung yin pa mnyam par bya'o snya mo// de nas rab tu zhugs pa na 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo // shugs nar phyung ste/ kye ma 'jig rten rnams ni yul mngon par zhen par 'gyur te/ gang des phyin cing 'gro ba gang zhig la brgyur
288b2(skyes rabs): skyes gyur pa// badre ba gad de lan cig ma yin mngon du ma gyur med// dpal mo gang dri mdzes pa'i rnga ma g.yo zhing rgod pa ltar// gang zhig ma thob med cing slar yang de bzhin chags// bzhad gong nye byar gnyen te khyod kyi bde lcogs

288b4(skyes rabs): zer/ 'dren pa ni ji ltar gau ta mra 'am/ nA mnyam bde bar 'gyur tA ma/ 'dir bzhugs shig/ bzhad gad pas rang nyid bsams te/ ji ltar du yong na mnyam mthun pa ci zer zhing brtags pa na shin tu lci zhing de yang dag par mI dga'o// de
288b5(skyes rabs): nas re zhig/ 'di ltar lha mo'i skyes smra ba'i skabs ma rnyed do// 'di bzhin re zhig smra'o/ snyam nas gsal bar/ kye na mnyam dga' ba gzigs gzigs/ 'di ltar thab shing ljon pa'i dra ba'i// bu ga lus pad+ma'i 'dab mar ni// sbrang rtsis myos pa'i/
288b6(skyes rabs): shung ba glu len cing // pad+ma'i steng ni chu rgyun rab tu 'bab// rig 'dzin ma ni leg so// gau ta ma leg so// bdag cag la rje su brtse bar mdzad do snya mo// 'dren pa nas/ na mnyam 'dir ci zhig lta// kun kyang bye zhing rgyas ldan pa// ko sar nges par
289a1(skyes rabs): ltung ba yis// 'gro rnams gnas shing mi rtag pa/ ji ltar 'di gsal po smras// rig 'dzin ma ni ji ltar gsung ba thos nas bdag nyid shin tu gdung bar byed do// bzhad gdabs rang nyid bsams te gzhan ga
289a2(skyes rabs): yin smra'o snyam ste/ rab tu gsal bar kye gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbrang rtsi bstan zhing mri'i 'khrul 'khor rab g.yo las// chu 'dzin lho nas rgyu rgyun dbusu rnam 'bab pa// mthong nas rma bya mdongs rnams rab brkyang gar byed pa// na mnyam
289a3(skyes rabs): dga' ba chu rgyun dro shal rnams la gzigs// 'dren pa nas/ na mnyam chu rgyun khang pa 'di nyid gcig pu 'am/ mngon 'dzin dngos po'i rgyun rnams ni// skad cig skad cig mngon par 'jig/ glu byed rgyu ni gyi kha ngo pa bzhin// 'gro ba
289a4(skyes rabs): thamade de bzhin 'jug/ rig 'dzin ma ni snying brtan par bya'o// gzhan yang mnyam par bya'o snyamo// bzhad gad pa bdag gi gnas la rnam par bsams te/ gdung bas sreg pa'i mya ngan grol nub rnams// blangs te gang dang gang
289a5(skyes rabs): ni 'dir smras kyang // sbyin sreg mar rgyun 'ab bA bzhin de dang de// lhag par shin tu yongasu 'bar bar byed// de bas 'dir dgon pa stong parA du bar bya'o snyamo// de nas mngag 'jug ma rab tu zhugs nas/ lha mo 'od kyi blo gros mas/

289b1(skyes rabs): bkas bkra shrIs kyi dra ba 'di blo dang ldan pa khyod kyisna nges par byin cig ces so// rig 'dzin ma ni mi bzod par gyur te/ a e 'dir gang bag mar byas sam sna mo// de bzhad gang bas bzung ste/ yong su g.yog so// mngag 'jug sa
289b2(skyes rabs): shin tu dga' ste/ e ma lha mo mngon par 'dong po yid kyi shrIng ni shin tu yang / de so zer nas/ yongasu zhugs nas song ngo // dren pa nas/ na mnyam skabs med 'di bzhin bkra shis kyi d+ha bA bsgyur ba ci zhig/ bzhad gadra ba na de sem mo//
289b3(skyes rabs): 'dren byas yad dris bya na/ bzhad glad pa nas/ bdag gi tshig gang zhig yal par mi 'dor na smra'o// 'dren pa nas/ na menyam sgros dang / bzhad gad ba nas/ khyod yongasu ldan pa'o// rig 'dzin ma ni sdug bsngal te/ e ma dpa'
289b4(skyes rabs): ba'i grogs mo'i khrus rdzogs pa ni/ ji ltar mthong snyam mo// 'dren pas// de dag gis sems la bltas nas/ ci skye bdag yongasu len+da pa yin num/ gzhad god pas/ shin tu'o// 'dren pa nas/ 'di bzhin byid pa ji ltar/ bzhad gang
289b5(skyes rabs): ba nas/ 'di bkra shrIs drwa ba la dris/ 'dren pa nas/ na mnyam yongasu len pa zhes bya ba ni sprin med pa'i nad yi no// 'di lta ste/ gti mug skye marnye 'dzin bzhi ba 'thor zhing phyir log sgrub par byed// rnam g.yo'i yid 'ong myos pa'i gnas
289b6(skyes rabs): dang bsam gtan gyis ni gdug pa'i dgra/ sdug bsngal 'byung gnas bde ba 'joms byed sdig pa'i rang bzhin gnas yin te/ yongs 'dzin gdon bzhin blo ldan rnams kyang nyon mongs dang ni nyams par byed// rigs 'dzin ma ni
290a1(skyes rabs): zhing gzhan ci zhig lta sta mo// 'dren pa nas gzhan yang na mnyam/ yongasu 'dzin pa byas gyur kyang // bdag ni nagasu 'gro bar byed// de na skye bo gzhan rnams kyang // yongasu sdug bsngal ci zhig bya// rig 'dzin ni
290a2(skyes rabs): dga' ba'i grogs mo gzho nu'i rje su 'di bzhin 'jug na/ le gso snya mo// bzhad gad pa nas/ kyo ji ltar 'di bzhin der ni 'jigs bcas 'bab// mi dbang gtsug ni 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba yis// zhabs la btud dang rgyal po'i phun tsheg
290a3(skyes rabs): yongs spangs nas// khyod ni nags dang gnas pa ci'i phyir// rab tu bsngags/ 'dren pa nas rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas las gzhan gang zhig kyang mchis sam/ gzigs mdzod/ ji ltar der na dga' 'gyur rab dga'i sa gzhi rnams
290a4(skyes rabs): dang ni// mtho ris gang+gA rnams kyi bskyed pas byangs gor ma'i steng // gang zhig dga' zhing dga' ba'i ri dgas tshogs rnams bsnyen bkur cing / grogs des nags kyi nang du gnas gyur pa ni skal pa bzang // gzhan yang na mnyam//
290a5(skyes rabs): sbyong pa'i brag ri skye bos dben zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas bzung na// phyag yA ri dgas rnams kyi spyod yul nags kyi ri mos yongasu bskor// so gr-i'i'u dus na bung ba rnams ni rnga sgra snyan par rab sgrogs shing // lam zhugs nyon
290a6(skyes rabs): mongs me yang bdog cag rnams la 'byung mi 'gyur zhes sgrogs/ rig 'dzin ma ni kye me shin tu lci mo zhog smras mnyam mo// bzhad gang pa nas/ kye snying rje med pa ji lta bu gnyen mthun gyi skye bo rnams la mnyes gshin pa'ang khyod
290b1(skyes rabs): la mi 'dug go// 'dren pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi gnyen lnga de bzhin du mnyes gshin pa ni 'dri lta ste/ 'jig rten thams cad mar me bzhin// skad cig skad cig gis skye lding // snyun chags dbang gi 'jig cing 'khor// skye ba med drug mya dran 'ad
290b2(skyes rabs): gzhan yod na mnyam mnyes gshin pa'i rtsa bar mi shes pa las te/ shes rdul gyis g.yogs gyur pa'i// snron las sa bon ma zad las// sred pa'i rgyu yis dbang sgyur nas/ skye ba'i myu gu skye bar 'gyuraro// rig 'dzin ma no/
290b3(skyes rabs): bar dul ba 'didri 'dra ba ni/ thub pa'i skye bo la yang ga la sna mo// bshad gang ba nas/ gang yang 'dir re zhig 'jig rten po'i chos kyi rje su yang 'jug par yang mdzod cig 'dren pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi chos yang gang yang yin/ bzhad gang
290b4(skyes rabs): banas/ yul gyi rjesu mngon par dgo' bo// 'dren pa nas/ yul gyis cho ga tshogs gzigs mdzod// yul ni dug bzhin thos tsam nyid mngar ldan zhing // rnam par smin pa rab tu tsha ba dug bzhin yul// yul ni dug bzhin bsrung
290b5(skyes rabs): bar ma nus rA ba g.yo'i shugs// shin tu rmongs byed mun pa stug po dug bzhin yul// yang na 'dod pa'i dug ni gzhal zhing brtags gyur na// rang bzhin mi mtshungs yul las dug ni mchog yin te// dug gis skye ba gcig nyid du
290b6(skyes rabs): ni rab 'gro zhing // skye ba dpag med du yang yul dugo rab tu 'gro/ bzhad gad pa nas/ kye re zhig pu'i gdobo yongs mdzod dang de nas nagasu lhan cig tu 'gro bar bya'o// 'dren pa nas/ 'di ni ma rnyed do// dper na bya ba 'di ni spong du di ring phyin pas
291a1(skyes rabs): shol byed pa// de 'dir skad cig yud tsam 'das gyur skye bo rtog byed de// mi bzang gshin rje khros pa rgod cing yongasu rtog pa'i// zur gyis blta bas be con madrangs kyang rab tu dmar bar byed// rig 'dzin ma ni/
291a2(skyes rabs): ngu zhing kye ma grogs mo dga' mo/ bdag gis 'di bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol tu yang khyod kyi sngon du 'gro zhing lam bstan par bya'o zhes rang nyid smra'o// bzhad ga pa ngu zhing / kye 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad spong ba ni snying rje ba yang med dam
291a3(skyes rabs): 'dren pa nas/ bdag gi rang gi lus kyang yongasu gtong bar byed do// bzhad gad pa nos ci'i phyir stong // 'dren pa nas/ gzhan gyi don du'o// bzhad gad ba nas/ de khyod bdag gis bya ba btang nas/ ci ste gzhan gyi bya ba la bdag nyid
291a4(skyes rabs): la sdug bsngal byed// 'dren pa nas/ dman pa bdag nyid mo shes pa dud 'gro rnams kyang gnas dang zas skom rang 'byung spyod cing rnyed par sla// gang zhig 'dod rnyed shin tu skom tshe chu rnams kyang ni 'thung bar byed// gang zhig
291a5(skyes rabs): gzhan phran drin du brtson byed skyes bu de yi ni/ rang gi gzi brjid kyis ni bde byed 'di ni skyes bu chen po'o// rig 'dzin ma ni snying gi dbugs phyung ngo // snyam nas skabs rnyed de srod thag ran gyi bcings pa'i mchid grolo snyamo// bzhad gang
291a6(skyes rabs): pa nas/ kye ci'i phyir du khyod gzhon don sgrub par byed/ 'dren pa nas/ gzhan don gyi ri mo mngon par mi shes pa gzigs mdzod/ gang zhig pal med rta mgyogs kyis bgrod nyi mas snang bar byed// gang zhig khur grangs med par nor
291b1(skyes rabs): stan rtag tu 'jig rten 'dzin// de ni nam yang rang don ma yin de'i rang bzhin nyid// chen po gang rnams 'jig rten pan dang bde ba'i ro gcig ro dang ldan// bzhad glang pa nas/ kye de bzhin du khyod ni bdag gi ma yin pa bram ze'i don dam gzhan gyi
291b2(skyes rabs): don lhag pa zhig yod do snya mo// 'dren pa nas snying rje yun ring du ma reg pa yi no// bdag mtshon skye bo nang du gdung bas bsreg ldan pa// gnyen bshes 'jig rten sdug bsngal gnas pa ci'i phyir bde// 'jig rtemakun gyi sdug bsngal
291b3(skyes rabs): bdag gi lus kyi khur// dam pa mnar med gnas pa yang nI spro bar byed// rig 'dzin ma ni mngon 'dod kyi skabs rnyed do snyam// bzhad gad pa nas/ kye 'jig rten thams cing de bzhin du khyod kyi gnyen yin nam/ 'dren pa nas/ ni mnya me de
291b4(skyes rabs): bzhin te gang gi mngal du dang po bcings shing gnas// gang gi pang du bag ma'i tsha zhing brtses// gang zhig rnam bral mtshan rings mya ngan byas// 'jig rten 'di rnams sngon nas gnyen bshos tshogs// rig 'dzin ma ni/ kye ma 'di'i thug
291b5(skyes rabs): shin tu rgya che'o snya mo// bzhed gang pa nas/ gnyen 'dun 'jig rten rnams kyi don mdzad pa la de las ci'i phyir ring du sdod par byud ces zor// rig 'dzin ma ni dA legs par smraso snyam mo// 'dren pa ni shugs nA ra zhes phyung nas dron 'dod ba'i
291b6(skyes rabs): skye bo shin tu rnyed par dka'o// bzhad gad ba nas/ don bye bar smra ba ni gang / 'dren pa nas/ lus la sogs pa cung zad slong ba'o// bzhad gad pa nas/ don bya ba'i skye bo rnams kyi nang nas lhag par che ba gang yin/ rig 'dzin ma ni/ legs
292a1(skyes rabs): par dris so snya mo// 'dren pa nas/ gang zhig sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba'i// skyabs gan so// rig 'dzin ma ni shin tu dga' nas 'dir mngon par 'dod pa'i skabs rnyed do snyam nas/ 'tsher bzhin du nye bAr btude/ phyag
292a2(skyes rabs): 'tshal nas/ du bzhin du bdag ni shin tu mnar bar gyur pas/ skyibs gnas// mthu chen po bdag ni skal ba dman te rje su brtse bar mdzod cig/ 'dren pa ni shin tu mnyes te gzigs nas/ bzang mo ma 'jigs shig bdag no 'jig
292a3(skyes rabs): rten kun gyi gnyen du gnas// 'gro rnams don grub mtshan du nye bar bcings// ma 'jigs ma 'jigs mi dkar mig can ma// de ring ci sgrubs bdag la myur du smos// bzhad gad pa ni ya mtshan du gyur nas/ e ma gzugs bzangs rab tu//
292a4(skyes rabs): mdzes pa brkyang ba 'd-i ga las yin snya mo// 'dren pa nas/ don gang bya ba smros shig/ rig 'dzin ma ni mgo stong de chags pas bstan nas mthu chen po khyod kyi lus so// bzhad gad pa ni mi bzod cing dga' nas/ 'di ni ji ltar gdug pa can gyi
292a5(skyes rabs): rig 'dzin mA lta bu'o// de re zhig sgrar chug snyam mo// gsal por smos pa/ kye na mnyam par zur par zur/ 'di ni gdugs pa can gyi sring mo ti/ 'di na mnyam dga' ba lus slong bar byed do// snyam mo/ rig ma 'jigs nas/ bdag nyid bsam
292a6(skyes rabs): paji ltar 'dis bdag gzhan du shes te/ bdag gi grogs mo dga' ma'i don shin tu 'grub pa lha ma 'ga' zhig gi gzhan du bcos so snyam mo// 'dren ma mnyes nas lus rab tu slong ba sring mo de srid nas spobs pa can gyi skye bo slongs mo
292b1(skyes rabs): bdag gis mthong ngo snyamo// bzhang gang pa ni// dbyug pa'i shing phyar te phar song par song sring mo gdug pa can gyi ske bo slongs mo pa bdag gis mthong ngo snyam mo na snyam dga' ba sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor thams cad las lhag pa'i
292b2(skyes rabs): rgyal srid kyi 'khur bar nus pa'i lus slong byed dam zhes smra/ 'dren pa nas/ ji ltar skong khri'i skye bo sun 'byin par byed ces bzhad gad pa rgyab tu byas nas shin tu dga' nas bzang mo bdag gi lus slong bar byed pa de de bzhin
292b3(skyes rabs): bden nam/ rig 'dzi ni ma nas/ mthu chen po gzhan du nus shing slu ba ma yin no// khyed kyi lus mthong ba tsom gyis kyang gang gi gdung ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzad na/ de yis bdag la gnas par mdzod cig/ 'dren pa ni mi
292b4(skyes rabs): dga' bar 'gyur te/ spobs chen gang lngas gnod byed 'dir// re zhig bdag gi skal pa min// mngon 'dod bdag gis bsgrub bya ba// de lta na yang ci zhig smos// rig 'dzin ma ngu zhing / bdag gi yid bcugs grogs mo ni// mgo pa
292b5(skyes rabs): zug rngu dang ldan ste/ de'i mthu chen po khyod kyi mthong ba las gtong ste/ nye bar zhi ba gzhan med do// bzhad gad pa shin tu 'jigs nas/ kye 'di ni sgyu ma sprul nas gzhan du smra brla byed de/ gzhan du de bzhin 'di yis 'chos shing ston par byed
292b6(skyes rabs): do'adren pa ni/ de'i gtam yang mi nyan par khyod kyi yid bcugs grogs mo gang na gnas/ rig 'dzin ma nas/ 'di ni de bzhin du ri bo gangs ldan gyi rtse mo la gnas// rol po'i ri bo'i zhol nyid du// bos nas der bdag re zhig 'gro'o// rig 'dzin
293a1(skyes rabs): ma nas/ ci ste mthu chen po 'khor dang bcas pa na mkha' la 'gro zhing 'dren pa rnyed par dka' ba ci yang ma mchiso zhes gnyis po gar byed cing na mkha' la song ngo // bzhad gad pa nas/ khyed cag rab tu zhugs te/ bdag
293a2(skyes rabs): bram ze ni slar yang dri ma bskul pa bzhin du yongasu spangaso zhes smra/ 'dren pa nas/ na mnyam khyod rang yang long mdzod/ bzhad gad pa bdag nyid 'jigs par mthong nas rig 'dzin ma 'dzum zhing bzhad gang ba'i lag pa nas bzung nas
293a3(skyes rabs): yongasu zhugaso// 'dren ma ni ya mtshan che nas grogs po ltos ltos// nyi ma'i gzugs ni des lhung rnam par 'jug pa bzhin// sa chen ri bo dang bcas 'og tu 'gro ba ltar// ta ma la'i nags tshal sngon po'i 'gram rnams ni// chu 'dzin rab tu bsal/
293a4(skyes rabs): gyur ri mos mtha' rnams bskor// bzhad gang ba nas/ kye khyod kyi ya mtshan che yang bdag ni bram ze te// 'di nyid du ni gang zhig la brten nas chu snod bzung nas bsod snyoms la brten nas/ khangad kyis 'gro'o zhes zer/ 'dren pa nas ma 'jig
293a5(skyes rabs): par re zhig ya mtshan che ba ltos shig dang / ri bo khang bzangs 'dra zhing chu 'dzin g.yo ba'i bla re la brten pa// chu klung ngur bI'i sgrog gis 'gram bcings lam chen rdul rnams 'thul ba ltar// chu gter yongasu bskor ba'i 'obs chen bzhin du
293a6(skyes rabs): rab mtho'i 'gram ldan pa/ sa chen dkyil 'khor gnas gcig bzhin du yang dag gsal por kun nas mtshon// rig 'dzin me nas a ho gzho nus nye bar gzigs so// bzhad gad pa nas/ gting zab mo 'jigs pa'i 'og gi sa chen po'i
293b1(skyes rabs): mthil mthong nas/ bdag nyid nges par 'jigs par snang nas gzugs gzhan la steng du bltas pa dang / shin tu 'jigs te/ kye gangs ri'i rtse mo tshogs pa bzhin du na mkha'i mthil khengs nas 'jug pa 'di ci zhig yin/ rig 'dzin ma
293b2(skyes rabs): rnam par rgod cing / A ho bram ze 'di ni mtshan nyid yin// 'dren pas gzigs nas 'di ni nges par skar ma rnamaso// bzhad gad ba nas/ skar ma la 'di 'dra ba'i tshad go la yin/ 'dren pa nas/ de ni 'di bzhin rgya chen po'i tshad dang ldan no//
293b3(skyes rabs): bzhad gad pa nas/ sa'i mthil nas chung ngu ru mtshon pa ji ltar yin/ 'dren pa nas/ de yang ring po nas shin tu phra zhing // rnam par mdzeso// bzhad gad pa nus/ yang 'di myi ltung bar 'jug pa ji ltar yin/ 'dren pa nas/ bdag cag shin tu mthen
293b4(skyes rabs): por gnas kyang mi ltung ba bzhin no// bzhad gang ba nas/ yang 'di nyin par mi mthong ba ji ltar yin/ 'dren pa nas/ nye bar btud na nyin par kyang 'di bzhin mthong ngo // rig 'dzin ma nas/ gzho nus 'di rnams thams cad sngon gzigs
293b5(skyes rabs): ba snyam byed do// bzhad gad pa nas/ kye na mnyam dga' ba chu gter gyi rlabs rnams las rlung drag pas rab tu bskyod pa bzhin du ka la'i sgra sgrogs pa'ang 'di ji lags/ 'dren pa nas brtags nas 'di ni na mkha' chu klung geng+gA'i sgra ste/
293b6(skyes rabs): 'di lta ste/ lhag ma nyal ba bzhin du chu klung rnam spangs lha lam mthong po'i phung po las// phyogs kyi glang chen rnams ni rtse zhing sna yis chu 'thor thigs pa zer ma rnams// yang dag tsham pa skye 'gyur chu thigs mu tig 'bras bu'i 'od
294a1(skyes rabs): par mdzes palta A slod bdun po rnams ni gse ru g+h+ri pad+ma 'dzin cing khrus la rab tu 'jug rlung srong bdun po 'ang rnams ni phyag byunga'arnam ma mas thams cad kyis phyag+sa byugasas pa'i ma ru// jag
294a2(skyes rabs): rten kun gyi phan mdzad phyir// gzhan yang gtsug gi rIn n+da wAR+YA// bud med rin chen ron chen byA/ mtshungs pa yang dag po gyur cig/ rog 'dzin ma shin tu dgo' ste/ de rnams ma rmongs pa'i tshig gi sde ji lto ba bzhin du mchog sbyin snyam ma
294a3(skyes rabs): bzhad gang pa nas/ kye na monyam 'di yis mkha' la 'gro ba'i stobs kyis bdag cag yongasu phyin te/ de nas 'dir na mkha'i gang+gA la yud tsam+ba cig ngal so zhig ces zer ro// snyan dag tshogs rnams glu yis snyan par rab sgrogs bskyed pa'i
294a4(skyes rabs): gnas// chags bral sman gyi sgrogs shing brjod pa de ni rgyal bar byed// gang gis rang nyid rnam byung rnam gshegs gzings kyi ya lA ga ye// lcags lngas nye bar blangs nas ts+tshin+d+ra gi misi rab kyi sbyar/ hrIs pas rig tu zhug so// m+b+ha sa~M slong
294a5(skyes rabs): de nas rlung gi sum ro tu zhugs te// d+hani chen byung bam/ drenas so nas sa di nam kyi phyir du sbyar bdag gis byed+hA ba~M t+ta dbugs byung // ra ni myug yongams kyi
294a6(skyes rabs): ba su ma nas na rgyas pa 'de bas mi spongs so ma sem 'ab kyi pa su po ba na ma shes ga
294b1(skyes rabs): bar byed do// bdag gi don grub pa de rnams dgos pa yang mi shes te/ rin chen phreng ba ma 'ongs na yang 'bras bu med do snyam mo// bdag gis rab tu gdung ba'i phyir spang ba'i thabasu gyur pa bzung nas/ de nas grogs mo dga'
294b2(skyes rabs): mu'i drong du 'gre'o snyam mo// yongasu zhugs nas bltas pa na de'i grogs mo dga' ba pud+ma b+hU ti ni yongasu sde brtul rkang 'thung gi zla ba nor bu rdo bA'i steng ni thig lo blo gros ma'i lus kyi steng du nye bar brten nas gan so// 'di ni
294b3(skyes rabs): stong pa'i mthar gcig pu gnas zhes nye bar zhugs te/ de nas pad+ma pA ti dang / thig le'i blo gros ma'ang ji ltar lta zhing rab tu zhugs pa na rang nyid bsam te shugs nas phyungango // legs ldan me tog mtshon can gyis kyang rang
294b4(skyes rabs): lus sreg pa'i tshor ba ji ltar shes par ma gyur te/ shes nas gzhan rnams ji ltar bsreg par byed/ sbrang gi bu mo nye bar btud de/ grogs mo dga' ma di rang mnyel bar ma gyur ta ma/ pad+ma pA ti ni slar yang nga bzhin du smra
294b5(skyes rabs): bar byed do// thig lde blo gros ma nAs/ kye pad+ma b+hU ti ci'i phyir gus par mi byed/ 'di ni khyod kyis dga'o ba'i grogs mo'o// pad+ma b+hU ti rta ba rtsub par gung gdA na bdug gi grogs mo dga' ma rin tshun phreng ba mA/ thig le blo gros ma
294b6(skyes rabs): nas/ mau yin te/ 'di ni sbrang gi bu mo'o// pad+ma bA ti dag de tshen ni yang dag pa'i yul chos las shin tu 'daso snyam nas/ gsal bar smras pa/ grogs mo sbrang gi bu mo bdag ni shin tu gdung bas gzir bas shin tu 'khrugs par
295a1(skyes rabs): khar gyur to// sbrang gi bu mo nas/ grogs mo dga' ma dbug phyung zhig/ skyes bu dam pa'i gtam bsil ba bzhin du pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'di rnams khyod la brlan no// pad+ma b+hU ti nas 'di sol cig/ nor bu chu
295a2(skyes rabs): shel gyi rdo ba'i steng na yang sreg pa snyam byed do// pad+ma'i a na khyebs shog nyinyis po// 'dir ji ltar tsan gyi khur bas gtor zhing / grogs dga' ma khyod kyis nu ma dag gi bar no byin nas bzhag kyang de yang lhag par shin tu gdung byas
295a3(skyes rabs): gzizar nas yongasu skam par byed do// pad+ma bI ti sdug bsngal nas ha la 'di rnams sol la bdag nor bu chu shel gyi rdo ba'i steng du khyer cig ces smra/ gnyis po rang la bsams te ngu zhing / kye ma 'di'i sems gzhan du gyur to
295a4(skyes rabs): snyam nas gsal por smras pa/ grogs mo 'di ni ji ltar nor bu nu shel gyi rdo bI'i steng na thig pa'i rgyun mi 'chud par rnam par 'ab pa pa'i zer mi 'thor zhing chag so// pad+ma b+hU tI nAs/ 'di ni chog go/ bdag gi nI rin chen phyung bya
295a5(skyes rabs): las 'ongs pa'i bris sku blta'o// zhes smra'o// gnyis pa phan bltas te/ shin tu mi dga' bar gyur te/ ji ltar 'di la zug rngu yang med dam zhes gsal bar smras la/ grogs mo 'di ni ji lta ba 'di ni 'dri'o// pad+ma bA ti nas/ yanga? r-i mo
295a6(skyes rabs): bris pa'i gzugs brnyan de ga na zhes smra/ gnyis po nas 'di na med pa ma yin te/ khyed kyis mdun na mchi so// pad+ma can gyi yun ring du bltas nas ngu zhing bdag nyid bsams pa gang zhig bris sku'i gzugs brnyan 'di 'dra ba
295b1(skyes rabs): de ni kye ma brtse ba med pa'i tshig tsam la 'ga' zhig gis yang skye bo 'di rjesu brtse ba can ne zhes sgra gso snyam nas na mkha' la bltas te/ legs ldan mnga' lnga khyod kyis 'drir// mnga' ni ma skyes 'gyur pa'am/ 'di ni yon tan rjes
295b2(skyes rabs): chags pa sa// yang na 'dis bsreg mthu med dmU// stobs med rnams dang 'drar skyes nas// dpa' mthong mngon pa'i nga rgyulo// phyogs rnamasu blta bar byas nas/ gzhan ci zhig lta bar byed 'odar yang 'phags pa'i bu'i bris sku la 'khyud
295b3(skyes rabs): nas/ bdag nyid nyams par byed do zhes smra/ sbrang gi bu mo langs nas/ phyogs rnams la bltas pas ji ltar 'dis dri mo med po'i nA mkha'i mthil du byo rnam par rgyu ba yang ma mtshan no// slar yang bltas pas/ ya mtshan che nas/ grogs
295b4(skyes rabs): dga' mo ltos/ ltos 'di glog gis ri mi rab tu 'gyed pa bzhin du dri ma med pa'i na mkha'i khams na rnam par 'phro ba'i mtshan nyid do// ha la khyed gnyis kyis ci zhig ltos shig/ bdag ni gdung bas non no// sbrang gi bu mo nas/ ra'i rtse
295b5(skyes rabs): mos mngon par g.yog pa bzhin no// de nas thig le blo gros mas nges par bltas nas/ re zhig 'di ci zhig ces thig le blo gros ma grogs dga' ma la smra bar bya'o snyam nas nges byar zhug so// yang gzho nu dang bcas te rin
295b6(skyes rabs): chen phreng ba ma de bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rin chen phreng ba ma dang gzhonu dang / bzhad gad pa rnams kyang rab tu zhug so// bzhad gad pa nas/ b+ho na mnyam gzigs gzigs/ drang srong gi gnas kyi mtshan nyid 'dir yang dag par
296a1(skyes rabs): 'phrul bdu ba'i rang bzhin sbyin sreg gri du ba'i phreng bas bar snang khebs shing phan tshun dgra yongasu 'jug pa'i dud 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyang gnyen gyi 'jug pa khyad par can shin tu mnyes gshin pa phun sum chog
296a2(skyes rabs): badrang srong gi gan so// 'dun pa nas/ grogs po mtshor che ba 'di lta ste/ stag mo yang ni khong nas dul zhing mig nI rab btsums ri dgas phrug gu rnams ni lhag par byed// mnyes gshin rab dga' gtsug phud can ni mdongs rnams rab
296a3(skyes rabs): brkyang lteng ka rnams ni 'tshe ba skyab phyir skyong // seng+ge yang ni glang me gang zhig skyong ba'i phrug gu rnams ni rang gi bu bzhin srung bar byed// gang rnam sa kyi ni byams pa'i gnas bcas nags dang ri bo'i phug na rnam par gnas pa de rnams rgyal
296a4(skyes rabs): rig 'dzin ma nges par bltas nas/ bdag gi grogs mo dga' mi'i nye 'khor du phyin no// 'dir ni grogs mo dga' ma tsan rnon po shin tu chags pa zla ba bzhin du zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar rnam par mdzeso snyam mo// bshad
296a5(skyes rabs): gad ba ngo mtshar che nas/ b+ho na mnyam gzigs gzigs/ bud med 'di ni rin po che ltar 'di'i 'jam mdongs 'od zer rab tu 'bab pa skye zhing bskyung bas mnyel nas gzigs pa lta bu'o// 'dren pas nges par gzigs nas na mnyam pa
296a6(skyes rabs): rnams kyi khyad par can rnams ring du gyur pas khyod kyis mngon par ma shes te khyod rin po che snyom mam/ 'di'i lus la reg pa tsamo/ rin po che gzhan rnams mngon par 'dod / de ni rin chen lta mi byed/ rang lus de bzhin rnam brgyan pa/
296b1(skyes rabs): dashar gang pa nas yid kyi shIng rti'i me tog ni mthong ngo zheso// pad+ma can dang sbyang gi bu mo zur gyis blta zhing rin chen phreng ba ma ni shin tu ring du thog so zhes smra/ bzhad gdas nas/ kye na mnyam snyan par smra ba ni 'di lta bu'o// 'drer ba nas/
296b2(skyes rabs): k+She na mnyam snyan par smra ba 'di lta bu'o// 'dren pa nas/ snyan pa 'di ci zhig brjod ce na/ kye gang zhig zur gyis bltas pas rnam par 'phangs gyur pa// yid 'ong spyan las snyan par smra ba phyogs pa ni// g.yo med do 'dis chen steng gnas myos pa'i pha po
296b3(skyes rabs): yis// lusA la me to gI lA gnas pad+ma ltar 'di na sbrang rtsi'i// rig 'dzin me ni byed pa po rjes 'jug par mthong ngo // bzhad gung pa ni/ shin tu dga' nas rang nyid bsams te/ 'di ni mngon par gdod pa'i 'bras bu ste/ 'di ni ji sbyar thub pa mo sa
296b4(skyes rabs): pa bdag gis mthong ba de'i snya mo// rig 'dzin ma nas/ mthu chen po re zhig ji srid de la smra ba'i bar du mnyel so bar mdzod cig/ 'dren pa nas/ khyod ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bya'o// rig 'dzin ma shin tu dga' nas nye bar song ngo // sbrang ge lu ma
296b5(skyes rabs): nas/ grogs mo dgra' ma ltos ltos/ 'di na rin chen phreng ba ma'o// pad+ma can ma nas/ de gang na gad+ha na zhes zer te/ sbrang rtsi'i bu mo dang pad+ma can dag gi gcig pu nyid du mthong nas brgyal nas gar byed do// rig 'dzin ma shin tu radangs nas
296b6(skyes rabs): dga' ma khyod kyi yid kyi shing rta grub bo// sbrang gi bu mo nas/ grogs mo dga' ma dbugs phyung zhig/ rig 'dzin ma nges par bltas te/ kye ma bdag skal pa dman paM da shi zin/ ha d+hi ha d+hi 'dir su 'jug par byed ces yongasu 'khyud nas
297a1(skyes rabs): bltas so// kye ma skal ba dman pa yid kyi shing rta lag tu 'ong nas slar 'dor bar byed dam zhes smra zhing rig 'dzin ma nas/ gzho nu yongasu skyob par mdzod cig/ 'dir ni bdag gis grogs mo dga' ma mthar byed kyis
297a2(skyes rabs): gsod cing 'phrog par byed do// 'dren pa ni rta ba rtab bor kye ma rab tu myos so// gzhad gad pa nas/ na mnyam dga' ba myur du mdzod cig/ gnyis po yang nye bar drung du phyin to// rig 'dzin ma gzho nu'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ mthu chen po
297a3(skyes rabs): grogs mo dgra'u ma rje suM brtse bar mdzad du gsol// 'dren pa ni ngo tsha zhing 'jigs pa dang bcas nas bdag gi bsgrub par bya gang / khyod kyis nye bar bsgo bar mdzod/ rig 'dzin ma nas rig pa kun gyis pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa la/
297a4(skyes rabs): bdag gis ci zhigA ti bIr ston/ de ltar na 'di re zhig mthu chen po'i phyag las bdud rtsi'i rgyun bsil ba rab tu 'bab pa las grogs mo dga' ma yongasu reg par mdzod cig/ 'dren pa nas/ pad+ma can gyi mgo lnga log pas rnyog nas/
297a5(skyes rabs): zla ba bzhin 'dra 'di yis ni// 'dir ni rnam par nyams pa bzhin// dga' ba thob las rnams nyams sam// khyod kyi rnams nyams sdug bsngal 'phel// pad+ma can ni mig cung zad phye nas 'dren pa nas/ ma la ya skyes khur pa sor mos
297a6(skyes rabs): bzhin la byugs// ri dgas mig can 'di ni dkyus ring mig phye ba/ chu 'dzin rab tu dkar bas cha rnams phyed g.yogs pa// mkha' la chu 'dzin dal gyis 'gro ba zla ba'i dbyib so// rig 'dzin ma ni grogs mo dgo' ma 'tsho bar mthong
297b1(skyes rabs): ste/ shin tu dga'o// sbrang gi bu mo nas/ a ho gzhonu mthu'o bzhad gad pa nas grogs mo dga' ma yid kyi shing rta mthong ngo // rig 'dzin ma nas/ mthu chen pos 'di re shig/ mgro bo'i zug nye bar bzhi'o// 'di'i lus kyang phyag
297b2(skyes rabs): gi mthil gyis reg par mdzod cig/ 'dren pas lus rnams kyang byul nas shin tu mnyes te/ mi dga' ba da chog go// 'di ni khur gyi dub pa 'jam pa'i lus ni rab g.yo bzhin// yid 'ong dra yis 'gro zhing bung ba'i gshog pos
297b3(skyes rabs): rnam par bskyong ba// mtshan mo ma lA ti'i me tog phreng ba bya ba bzhin// 'di'i lus rnams rim gyis gsal por yang dag g.yo bar byed// grogs mo dag nas/ grogs mo dga' ma dbugs shig dbugs shig/ mthu chen pos
297b4(skyes rabs): khyod 'drir rje suM bzung ngo // de yis gzigs nas 'dir yod kyi shing rta rang gi lus bzhin du brjod// pad+ma can ni 'jigs shing nges por bltas te/ ngo che bas 'dar zhing langs nas 'bros 'dod pas ma nus te ring nas gar byed do//
297b5(skyes rabs): rarig 'dzin ma nas grogs mo dga' ma de tsam ma rings shig/ re zhig gsar du 'ongs pa la stan gcig la gnas nas 'dir bsnyen bkur bAr gyis shig/ 'dren pa nas/ dkar min mag can 'jigs bcas khyod ni sdug bsngal
297b6(skyes rabs): ba// cho ga cho ga lus ni gdung bas cung zad g.yo ba can// me tog phreng ba cung zhig kha 'bus 'dab ma rnams// bung ba rnams kyi rkang pa yang ni bzos mi nus// pad+ma can rang nyid bsams te/ ci ste 'di ni nags 'ongs sam/ yang ni
298a1(skyes rabs): yang nA 'di bzhin du snang ba 'am/ yang na rmi lam du snang ba 'am snya mo// sbrang gi bu mo nas/ grogs mo dga' ma 'di ni de yin te/ khyod kyis gzho nu'i sku gzugs thang sU nI ri mor bris pa la mchod pa'i phyir
298a2(skyes rabs): ba ku la'i me tog phreng ba gang zhig nyid kyi brgyas pa'o// zhes bstod do// pad+ma can ni 'dren pa la zur gyis blta zhing ri mo'i sku'i gzug de la pu'o// 'dren pas ri mo bltas nas/ 'di ni kho bo bzhin du ri mor bris pa zhig go// haM
298a3(skyes rabs): a haM bdag la gus pa cher mchi so// bzhad gad pa nas/ khyod kyi lha rnams gus pas bsnyen bkur bas da ltar de khyod la 'di bzhin du'o// 'dren pa nas/ ji ltar 'di bzhin du'o// bzhad gang ba nas/ lha rnams kyang gus pas/
298a4(skyes rabs): bsnyen bkur nas mchog gsol bar byed do// khyod ni dka'o thub ma'i mngon par 'dod pa'i mchog gang yang sbyin por mi byed do// grogs mo dga' mas legs par smraso// 'dren pa ni 'dzum zhing khyod kyi dri bzhin du mchog
298a5(skyes rabs): ster shes sam/ bzhad gang pa nas/ gal te khyod bdag gi rjesu 'jug na bdag bram ze yin pas sbyin par bya'o// 'dren pa nas/ bdag gis rjesu 'jug par bya'o// bzhad gad pa nas khyod de bzhin du 'di'i mchog tu bdag gis
298a6(skyes rabs): sbyin/ 'dren pa nas khyod ni ba shal rmongs pa rab tu shes pa'o// bzhad gang pa nas/ khyod mi shin tu mi bzod do// 'dren pa nas/ na mnyam rab tu gsal ba'i dgongs pa la// yang 'dis shin tu sbyin par byed de gzigs mdzod//
298b1(skyes rabs): bdag ni rab tu ba rgyud la tshul 'chos lus ni ngo tshas sdus byed ci// yid 'ong mig ni gsal por 'phangs shing skad cig nyid la skyong bar byed// bdag ni mi bzod lta bas blta zhing slar yang mngon 'dod 'dren par byed//
298b2(skyes rabs): byis pa'i blo'i dgongs pa rab tu spro zhing g.yo snang 'dir mI byed ces gsung so// yol ba'i nang du'o// mtsho chen po zhig grag gro// thams cad 'jigs nas nye bar langs so// ba'ang gang bas nye bar bltas nas/ 'din
298b3(skyes rabs): gong nas glang chen myos pa yang dag rgyug byed cing // 'dir ni ji ltar shugs kyi mi bzang sna'i 'khyil byas nas// chu rnams 'phen pa char 'bab bzhin du stobs kyi rab tu 'jug/ gdong la myos 'bab sbrang rtsi byed rnams rjesu
298b4(skyes rabs): 'jug/ yol ba l+ya co chos smra'o// bzhad gad pa ni shin tu 'jigs te/ kye na mnyam yongasu skyob por mdzod ces smras// pad+ma can ni shin tu 'jigs te/ grizho nu la kun nas 'khyud do// grogs mo dag nas/ mthu chen po grogs
298b5(skyes rabs): mos srung bar mdzod cig zer/ 'dren pa nas/ ma 'jigs shig 'jigs ldan ma dul glang chen myos// so ldan gnam lcags mche ba can// bdag gi brang gi ngo mtshungs par// rtag tu rab gsal 'di zung ngo // rig 'dzin
298b6(skyes rabs): ma nas/ da ni 'jigs pas 'di ga la byung // yol ba'i nas/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi mi 'jigs rab sbyin sa gsum rab tu tshim byed khyod ni gnyen// sdug bsngal chu gter dang klong 'khrugs las 'gro rnams yang dag sgrol ba'i gzing
299a1(skyes rabs): nyid do// khyod kyi phyag ni rab tu gsal ba'i rgyan gyis rol zhing kun 'khril so ldan so// brtun shing g.yo bas 'jig rten ma lus 'dir ni skrag pa'i gnas skabs ga la 'gyur/ gzhonu nas/ kye dga' ma bdag thong
299a2(skyes rabs): zhig/ glang po gsum po ni song / rig 'dzin brgod cing di ring yang khyod gang du yang mi gtong ngam/ gzhonu rang nyid bsams te/ gal te bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas skabasu 'ga' zhig mthong bar mi 'gyur ram/ bdag gi ni tshul dang 'dra
299a3(skyes rabs): ba ma yin no snyam nas/ de nas drang srong gi slob ma rab tu zhug so// rtab rtab par kye ma ji ltar ri dgas kyang 'dra da der shin tu skrag pas rab tu 'jug cing sems ni dngas par gyur/ glang chen rab tu 'jigs pas thub pa'i gzhonu rnams
299a4(skyes rabs): kyang gsal por du bar gyur/ pad+ma bA ti ni gang du song ngam snyam nas yongasu zhugaso// mthong nas shin tu mi bzod pas/ a tshangs pa kye/ a tshangs pa kye/ ji ltar dka' thub kyi tshal na 'gal bar 'jug go zhes smra/ thams cad
299a5(skyes rabs): shin tu 'jigs te/ grogs mo drag nAs/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i spyod pa'i bu'o// pad+ma can ni gzhonu btang ste/ dro che nas kha 'og tu phyogs nas gnas so yol ba'i nang du'o// 'di lag ldan gyi 'jigs pas bdag gi pad+ma pA ti nas
299a6(skyes rabs): 'byung zhes drang srong dus so// slob ma ni ngu zhing mkhan po yongasu skyob par mdzod cig/ yongasu skyob par mdzod cig/ pad+ma pA ti ni na yongasu sun 'byin par byed cing mchiso// grogs mo dag shin tu 'jigs shing shin tu mi phan por gyur to//
299b1(skyes rabs): snyam mo// gzhonu ni mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid sdug bsngal bar bdag tu ltu ngo snyam mo// bzhad gang pa ni mi bzod pas e re e re bram ze gdug pa can mi bden pa smra zhing ci'i phyir khyod du zhes dbyug pa'i shing gye nu du phyar te nye bar btu//
299b2(skyes rabs): bram ze ni a tshangs pa kye mkhan po yisu skyob par mdzod ces smra/ de nas thub pa ni khros te/ rab tu zhugs nas a 'di su zhig ces nges par bltas nas/ lag dang rkang par bcas pa rdobs shing / lha thams cad stongs sam gyi// dmod
299b3(skyes rabs): ba rnams ni yul gyur tam// gang zhig thub pa'i rigs rnams kyang // kun nas gnod cing yongasu 'jig ces smra// kye bu pad+ma pA ti e ma gzho nu gtsug na nor bu la pad+ma can bdag gis yid kyi sbyin par byas te gdung bar byed do//
