299b4(skyes rabs): gzhon nas/ legs pa'i drang srong chen po gang // bdag phyir de bzhin rjes gdung ba// kun spyod khrims las 'das gyur na// skyes bu rtag tu de bzhin gdung // bdag las kun spyod rnam 'gal na// 'di ni lha rnams kyi mkhyen 'gyur//
299b5(skyes rabs): bzhad gang pa shin tu 'jigs nas gnas skabs 'dir ci zhig sku/ lha rnams kyi/ drang srong nas/ thub pa'i skye bo'i lha rnams ni// gang dang gang bzhad gad pa nas// bram ze g.yo ba can phar song bar song / mkhan bro las mthu
299b6(skyes rabs): che ba'i lha gang zhig yod dam/ drang srong nas/ lha rnams ra lta nyid du sa stengs ltung bar bya 'am ci// chu gtar rab tu rgyu ba skad cig nyid la skam ma ma tsi// bskal pa'i me ni 'od zer 'bar bas rtsa rnams ma lus pa// sreg pa bzhin du 'jig
300a1(skyes rabs): 'jig rten rnams ni mthar bar bya 'am ci/ rig 'dzin ma rang nyid bsams te/ ji srid 'di ni mthong dug bzhin// 'di yis dmod dug ma grol ba// de srid 'dir ni bdag gis ni// nyes rnams rab tu gsal
300a2(skyes rabs): bar bya// snyam mo// nye bar btung de phyag 'tshal nas/ yo ba gcig gnang bar mdzod gnang bar mdzod// 'dir pad+ma bA ti dgon pa'i glang po che myos pas gsod pa laswa// mthu chen po 'dis bsgrubs pa'o// drang srong nas/ 'di yang su
300a3(skyes rabs): zhig yin// bzhad gad pa 'jig so bzhin du/ lha tshangs pas byin gyis gzhonu gtsug na nor bu'o// drang srong nas 'di ni gzhonu gtsug na nor bu yin na nor bu yin pa de bden nam/ zhes nges par bltas nas dus so// the tshom
300a4(skyes rabs): nicho go// 'di ni mtshungs med dpal drang ldan// rtags kyang nor bus rnam par spras// ji ltar dpag bsam ljon pa ni// bdag gis dug gi sdong por shes// thams cad du bdag dum nA ni mi bzod mi shes pa// bdag dman shin tu mngon
300a5(skyes rabs): 'dod la// gang zhig mi shes dbang gi ni// bdag gi sdig pa mngon par byas// thal mo sbyar nas kye mag pa skye bo las thos pas// nyes par byas pa 'di rnams bzod par mdzod cig/ mi shes pa'i dbang gis nyes par byas// bzhad
300a6(skyes rabs): gang ba ni bram ze 'tsho'o snya mo// gzho nus nas gong ma rnams la nyes pa ma mochiso// bram ze dga' nas/ bzhang gde ba la 'khyud// phan tshun khyod kyang bzod par mdzod cig ce so// drang srong nas/ a ho gzhonu ni bstan pa'o// bu mo pad+ma d+hA
300b1(skyes rabs): ring ngo tsha yang chog par mdzod// srog chags dbang phyug bdag por gyur// yang dag pas ni spro bar gyis// gzhonu rang nyid bsam pa/ 'di blo bur du byung snyam nas/ gsal byor smras pa/ kye legs ldan rje su bsgo bar mdzod cig/
300b2(skyes rabs): bdag ci ba dag gis// zhes sa'i dus 'das 'gro bas 'gro bar byed do// drang srong nas/ lag pa'i mu 'dzin gang bar gyis la khyod dang btsun mo gnyis kar gshegs shig/ gzho nus rnam par bsams te legs ldan bdag ni rgyal
300b3(skyes rabs): rig so// drang srong nas/ 'di yang yid kyi mtsho yi ni// chu skyes sbubs las yang dag byung / bzhad gad pa nas/ de bzhin bdag cag gis kyang tho so// 'dren pa nas/ legs ldan bdag la lci ba bdag gis rje su gnas pa me do// bzhad gang
300b4(skyes rabs): ba nas/ 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin pa rje su gnang ba ni ri mi 'ongs nas bag mar byas pa ni 'di'o// drang srong nas/ gzhan yang 'ga' zhig med dam/ 'dren pa ni/ 'dren pa nas/ ngo tsha dang bca so// drang srong nas/ 'di ci zhig/ 'dren pa nas de ltaro//
300b5(skyes rabs): drang srong nas/ de ltar 'gyur ba ci yin/ 'dren pa nas/ kye 'di nyid do// bzhad god pa ngu zhing / kye khyod la chags par gyur pa'i srog ma bsrung na da ni ji ltar drang srong gi rigs thams cad de bzhin du stongs par 'gyuraro// rig 'dzin ma
300b6(skyes rabs): ngudu zhing thams cad 'dis phyir spong bar byedado// drang srong ni ngu zhing khyod kyis lus dang 'dra bar 'dis ji ltar tshangs par spyod kyang 'joms par byed ma/ gal te khyod kyi de bzhin du bdag cag rnams la dga' ba mthong ba las/ slar/
301a1(skyes rabs): yang gzhan du blang bar 'gyur zhing / bdag la 'dir chen pos yongasu sun 'byin cing de yis bdag 'dir chen por yongasu bslu zhing bsreg nas/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas bya'i skye bo rnams dang ni me'i nang du rang
301a2(skyes rabs): nyid sbyin sreg tu bya'o// kye 'di na su su/ me khyer la shog cig/ bram ze nas/ bdag ni lta ba mi bzod pas/ sngon du me'i nang du 'jug par bye do// bzhad gang pa rang nyid kyi bsams pa/ khyod kyi de nyid legaso// 'dren pa nas rang nyid bsams te/
301a3(skyes rabs): thams cad kyis yong dag par brtun par bye'o// snyam mo// gsal por smras pa/ logs ldan bdag ni gan ste gang zhig/ cung zad mi sbyin zhes bya med// ci'i phyir shin tu snying rje bas/ ngo'i phyir bdag ni yongasu spong // pad+ma can ni 'dis bdag de bzhin
301a4(skyes rabs): du byas na mchog tu yang dga'o snyam nas// drang srong nas/ khyod dang bu mo pad+ma can lhan cig tu cho spyod cing dug ni mi spyod/ bzhad gad pa nas/ khyod kyi slar yang bdag kyang mi grol ba ma yin nam/ 'dren pa nas/ khyod ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs shig/ bzhad
301a5(skyes rabs): gong pa dang bram ze dag gar byeda'o// rig 'dzin ma ni bdag gi brtsams pa don grub snyam// pad+mo tsan+da ni byed pa pos bdag rjesu bzung snyam mo// drang srong nas/ chos mkhyen pa dang brtse ba yis/ gtsug na nor bus bdag bzhin du/ ri dbang bag mar
301a6(skyes rabs): byas kyang ni// ri bo dran gyur do bzhin min// de nas sbyin sreg gi khang par zhugs te tshig rnams ji lto ba bzhin du bsams te/ byin gyis brlabs nas thams cad yongasu zhug so// drang srong ni phyogs rnamasu nyi ma'i dus tshod du song ngam/ bltas
301b1(skyes rabs): nas 'di lta ste/ dus su song zhing zhing rtswa la'i nags tshal tshogs rnams sngon zhing chu klung 'gram gyi ri mo las// glang chen rigs rnams gnyis kyis myos shing mig ni zlum byed ri sul gnas rnamasu ni 'gro bar byed// shal ma kI rnams
301b2(skyes rabs): kyi ni yal ga sgra bcas sdud cing bcag nas khur ba rnams ni skyes pa yis// thub pa rnams kyi sems ni tshim byed ying 'phrog gu gul phye ma'i dri bzangs phyogs rnams khyab par gyur// 'di ni skye bo dam pa rnams kyi zla ba btsun pa zla ba
301b3(skyes rabs): yis// mchog tu gsal bar rab sbyar gar gyi sa gzhir gar mdzad gar tshegs kyis// gang gi legs bar 'dren byed chags pa drong bral rgyal ba rnams kyi ni// yum gyur rtogs pa mchog gi rin chen bla med de ni thob par 'gyur//
301b4(skyes rabs): zhes pa ni thams cad nges par zhugaso// yan lag gsum pa rdzogaso// / de nas sbrang gi bu mor rab tu zhugs te/ ngu zhing grogs mo dga' ma pad+ma can gyis ni lo gcig lhag song ste/ bdag skal ba dman pas grogs
301b5(skyes rabs): mo dga' ma slar mthong bar 'gyur mi 'gyur ni mi shes// dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'di na thub pa'i skye bos rab tu gang yang dag ni stong pa snyam du semaso// de la ji ltar bdag gis gdung ba bsal bar bya/ yang na sa phyogs stong par
301b6(skyes rabs): zhugs nas drag bor ngu bar bya snyam ste/ 'di ni nges par don du slar bya'o snyam nas yongasu zhugaso// skyed mos tshal 'di nas na tA ni'i ljon pa 'di ni grogs mo dga' ma byis pa'i dus su yang dag par bskon pa gang yin pa de ni 'di'o// mA
302a1(skyes rabs): ta bI 'khri shing kyang 'di'o// bdag ni skal ba dman te lhan cig tu byas nas grogs mo dga' ma pad+ma can gyis khyad par du nye bar bskyed pa'o zhes yang dag par 'khyud nas ngu zhing grogs mo dga' ma ni gang du song khyer rnam
302a2(skyes rabs): kyang me tog kha 'bus par rigs sam/ yang na de bzhin grogs me dga' ma yang nges par 'khrungs par gyur te ma/ zhes rtogs par byed do// ji ltar 'di bzhin du thos te shing rnams kyang mtshungs par mdzes par smra'o snya mo// yol ba'i nong du'o//
302a3(skyes rabs): a horma du byung ba chen po 'khrungs snyam nas sbrang gi bu mos bltas pa na/ ji ltar bram ze muny+dza'i bu de nas rab tu zhugs nas a ho chen po 'khrungaso// sbrang gi bu mo nye bar btud nas/ 'phags pa muny+dzi'i bu la phyag byaso// muny+dza shin tu dga' nas
302a4(skyes rabs): mthong ba'i byAde leg/ sa 'phel bar gyur cig/ khyod kyi grogs mo dga' ma pad+ma can la khye'u zhig btsa so// sbrang gi bu mo shin tu dga' nas/ muny+dza'i bu khyod kyis bdud rtsi'i char phab bo// yang de'i ming tsir brjod tsAng / byin gyis brlabs mAny+dza nas/
302a5(skyes rabs): pad+ma skyes zheso// sbrang gi bu mo nas/ dga'o dga'o// mony+dza nas/ 'di 'ba' zhig las yid gzhan med ngam/ sbrang gi bu me nas/ 'di yang yin mod/ yang gzhan dga' ba ci zhig/ mony+dza nas/ de nas rgyal po tshungs pas byin gyis khye'u yi bzhin mthong nas mnyes
302a6(skyes rabs): totelho gtsug na nor bu rgyal srid la dbang bskuro// steng gi bu mo nas/ ho dga'o dga'o// mony+dza nas de nas 'od kyi blo gros ma dang / rgyal po tshangs pas byin gnyis dka' thub kyi chel du gshegs shing bskyed do// de nas gzhonu gtsug na nor bu'ang yab
302b1(skyes rabs): kyi rje su 'jug cing gshog so// sbrang gi bu mo mi du zhing mony+dza'i bu bdag gi ma'ang de bzhin nam zhes sgra/ mony+dza nas/ gtam lhag mya ma lus pa smra ba rna ba la zhog cig dang / de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis gzho nu'i skyo ba yongasu bstsal ba'i phyir/
302b2(skyes rabs): pho brang gi skyed mos tshal du dka' thub kyi nags kyi bya be byed cing nags na gnaso// de nas yab kyi bka sI rje su gnas nas gzhonu gtsug na nor bu ni srungs ma med pa'i mchod sbyin bshams nas mchi so// bdag kyang der 'gro bar byed do//
302b3(skyes rabs): khyod kyi grog mo dga' ma la bdag gis ci zhig smra bor bya/ sbrang gi bu mo nas sngar yang drang srong gi gnas kyi rgyun du gyis shig/ many+dzu nas dman de slar yang bkra shis 'joms pa'o// sbrang gi bu mo shin tu 'jigs te/ bdag gis ci zhog smras
302b4(skyes rabs): snyam mo// de nas 'dir nang du rab tu zhugs shig/ skyes gzhan bsgyur bar bya'o// de'i phyir rab tu zhugs nas song ngo // de nas bran po rab tu zhugs nas par sdod par song / ci'i phyir lhag par 'tshang zhing 'bul bar byed/ bram ze'i khang pa der rgyu
302b5(skyes rabs): sing ci byed/ nges par bltas nas ji ltar bsrung kyang mi sdod par yongasu 'jug cing 'di ni 'dzin cing / 'di rnams ni 'jog cing / yang len cing / gzhan rnams ni sbyin sreg byed cing bram ze 'drang bar dka' ba rnams thams cad za 'dod nas ji ltar
302b6(skyes rabs): bram ze 'khyam po rnams seng+ge'i gdan gyi steng du sdod/ phar song bar song / la bram ze rnams par zur phar zur/ dmod pa'i rma rnams na nas gar byed// ngan po rnams nga la ci ste steg par byed ces smra'o// de'i blon po sna chen po lag bzangs nges
303a1(skyes rabs): par 'ong bar mthong nas 'di rnams de la slu'o snyam// de nas lag bzangs rab tu zhugs nas a re ri lus ngan po par zur phar zur/ 'dir spro bas don gang ji ltar 'dod pas ster ba la ci'i phyir slongs mo ba rnams yongasu sun
303a2(skyes rabs): 'byed par byed/ 'di rnams kyi don du yang dag par btsam pa ste/ gzhonu gtsug na nor bus 'gog pa med pa'i mchod sbyin thams cad rang len gyi/ yon 'di ni lha yis 'gro ba ma lus pa ni mngon 'dod yongasu 'gengs pa mtshan du bcings pa
303a3(skyes rabs): yin no// chog 'di la slongs mo pa rnams la de bzhin du cung zad ni los kyang ster/ sngon yang 'dis de bzhin du mdzad nas ji ltar 'dod pa 'dzin par byed do// de rnams kyi 'di blo bur du byung ba ma yino// 'di la rab tu zhugs nas dri ring gi l-I la song ngo //
303a4(skyes rabs): bran po ni ji ltar 'di yang rnam par khros na de bzhin du 'dir gzhan yang mi rnyed do// skyem nas/ de nas bros nas song ngo // lags bzangs yongasu zhugs te/ lha gtsug na nor bus sbyin pa rnams rnam par lta ba la bdag bskos pa yin pas ji srid
303a5(skyes rabs): blta'o snyam nas nges par bltas pa na shin tu dga' ste/ a ho di ring lci'i phun sum tshogs pa chen po ni gang gis ji lta ba de bzhin du ji ltar 'dod pa len pas kyang zad par ma gyur te// 'di lta ste/ gser gyi phung po rnams ni 'di na rab tu mtho zhing ri
303a6(skyes rabs): rab dang ni 'gran pa ltar// rin chen rnams kyi phung po 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba nyi ma'i 'od kyang zil gyi nom// mu tig mchog zlum do shal tshigs rnams bkod pa 'od zer 'tsher ba skar ma'i phreng ba bzhin// skye bo rnams ni gang zhig rang dbang blangs nas
303b1(skyes rabs): rang ma bzhin du dal bus 'gro bar byed// yongasu zhugs nas gzhan yang bltas pa ma// glang chen dbang po rnams kyis myos pa'i chang ni sa la bar med rab tu 'bab pa len byed pas// myur 'gro'i sras ni rnam par ring rnams rmig pa'i narnam
303b2(skyes rabs): nges par 'dred pas ngo mtshar rab tu bcas// shir+t+ti rnams ni rgya nAg pa dan mdangs ldan rnams ni rgyu ga cing bskyod pa g.yor ka'i sgra bcas la// bram ze rnams kyis rab bskyod 'khor lo'o mu khyud sgra yis sa tshan nor ldan rab tu g.yo ba ltar/
303b3(skyes rabs): brgya byin gyis mchod sbyin brgya rab tu byin pa de 'dir sa'i mthil du lha la bdag gis smra bar bya'o// snam nos gzhan yang bltas pa na// ji ltar mtshan nyid 'di lta bu naM ku ru'i rgyal po bzod par dka' ba gang zhig gis mi bzod par mi
303b4(skyes rabs): 'gyur ram/ 'on kyang des cung zad kyang mi 'gyur sku mo// yong su zhugs pa na der sbyin sreg gi khang por lha nyid rab tu zhug so// rang 'dod dpal dang byams pa yis// tshangs pa'i zhi ba las kyang rgyal// bden pas sa chen las rgyal nas// chos ni mngon
303b5(skyes rabs): sum bzhin du gnas// ji srid bdag nyid nye bar btud do// de nas rgyal po dang / pad+ma can dang / bskrad gang ba dang / mkhan po rnams rab tu zhug so// rgyal po dang / mkhan po dang / mchod sbyin rnams lag bzangs nye bar btu de phyag 'tshal te/
303b6(skyes rabs): rgyal po chen po rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig/ lha nyid kyi bka' yi rjesu bsgo nas sbyin pa'i sa gzhi rnams bdag gis bltaso// rgyal po nas de na yang ni slong ba rnams// rang gi khyi bzhin rab zhugs nas// ji ltar mngon 'dod
304a1(skyes rabs): yongs blangs shing // yid kyi shi rta ga 'gro 'am// lhag bzangs nas// khyu mngon par 'dod pa phun sum tshogs te/ dpal ni gang zhig sa bdag rnams kyis sa stengs nas// rab/ 'ab rnyed rnams kun la bde sa
304a2(skyes rabs): nyer bsnyen gyur// skye bo rnams kyi rab tu zhugs pas khyim khyim rnams da ni khyod pas kyang ni rnams shin tu lhag/ rgyal po nas 'di ni cung zad kyang ma yin te/ 'dir phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams ni thams cad kyi thun mong ste/ 'dir bdag
304a3(skyes rabs): gi ci zhig byin/ de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams ni mthu che ste rang dbang ba'i dngos po yang de bzhin du bdag gis sbyin pa'i gnas zhes sgrog par byed// gzigs mdzod// 'jig rten kun gyi spyi yi ni// phyi rol dngos rnams de dag gis// 'jig
304a4(skyes rabs): rten sred pas rnam bslus nas// bdag ces 'dir ni 'dzin par byed// bdag gis ni/ snying po med cing mi dran pa'i lus 'di yang // 'gro ba'i don grub phyir ni drag tu yongasu gtong / gang+gA 'd-i ni dzI wA dzI ltar mngon 'dod pa// de dang dwe yi de wA hUM
304a5(skyes rabs): ltar rab tu sbyor ce so// yoM lA bi'u nad du kA la kA le'i sgra'o// thams cad shin tu 'jigs nas phyogs rnamasu blta'o// rgyal po ni skabs ma yin por de bzhin du gnyid rnam par yur ro// 'jig rten rnams ni yongasu g.yo'o// mkhyen pa
304a6(skyes rabs): no gus shing 'bad pas sbyin sreg byed// a sha~M a shaM ShaT ce so// bzhad gad pa nas/ kye na mnyam ya mtshan che/ ya mtshan che/ rlung ni drang pos rnam par spyod pa yis// chu gter skye bo dang bcas chu rnams ni// dba' rlabs phreng bas yongasu
304b1(skyes rabs): bskyod pa'o// grwa bzhin nor ldan shin tu g.yo bar gyur// rgyal po nas/ na mnyam khyod kyis legs par rtags te/ brag chung mu'i phung po rlung gis yongasu bskyod pa'i// dpa' rlabs rab tu 'khrugs star sa chen yang dag rnam par g.yo// gang la
304b2(skyes rabs): de ring 'di rnams mtho dad dma'agyur gru bzhin byed// 'jig rten rnams ni rlung gis myos bzhin lus ni rnam par g.yo// pad+ma nAn ni ha bu pad+ma skyes gang du song ngam zhes smra/ de nas g.yog mos pad+ma skyes lag pa nas bzung nas rab tu
304b3(skyes rabs): zhugs nas gzho nu pad+ma skyes ni 'da'o zheso// pad+mo skyes nas/ 'angaglas pa 'di ci zhig/ lha mo ni bu'i lag pa nas bzung nas/ rgyal po'i drung du nye bar btud nas/ rje'i sras 'di bzhin du 'khrugs pa 'di bzhin du 'khrug pa 'di ci zhig/ 'dren pa ni
304b4(skyes rabs): pad+ma can gyi lag pa nas bzung nas/ dbugs 'byin ste/ a yi 'jigs can re zhig ltos dang / sngon ma mthong ba'i rmad du byung ba'i dga' ba'i gnas skabs kyi mthar thug pa 'di lta ste/ sa gzhi'i dba' rlabs rim pa mtho dang dma' ba rnam
304b5(skyes rabs): pa rib tu mang po rnams// khang bzangs gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan cod pan rnams ni bskyed pa'i rim pa ltar// sgo chen rab tu 'jug pa sprin rnams kyis ni 'byug sgra drag tu sgrog pa ltar// 'di rnams chu gter 'dra zhing mi mtshungs
304b6(skyes rabs): khyad par slar yang 'jig rten mi ltung tsam// gzhan yong lha mo khang pa'i phreng ba rnams ni 'phrod la 'gyed zhing slar yang langs// chu bo rnams ni gyen du 'phar zhing gzhan du'ang 'gro mi byed// sa chen mtho dang dma' ba rnam pa sna tshogs
305a1(skyes rabs): byed pa ni// me long nang gis gzugs brnyan rnam par g.yo ba rtogs pa ltar// lag bzang nas/ lha mthong lag so// shar phyogs rnams ri'i 'gram bcas 'og tu 'gro byed nub phyogs na mkha' la ni rab tu 'gro/ rnam par
305a2(skyes rabs): g.yo bas lho phyogs dma' bar ltung zhing byang phyogs 'di rnams shin tu mthon por 'gro// chu gter g.yo bas dbus ni 'og tu rab tu 'gro zhing mtha' phyogs rnams steng du rab tu 'gro/ 'di rnams kyang ni steng dang 'og tu rab tu reg ste chu
305a3(skyes rabs): 'dzin mthar thug phyogs kyi mthar thug pa// rgyal po ni ngo mtshar nas phyi rol tu nye bar byung ste 'jig rten pa rnams la dbugs 'byin pa mdzad // lag bzangs ni lha'i bka' yis ji ltar bsgo nas nges par zhugaso// rgyal po ni legs ldan nor
305a4(skyes rabs): 'dzin ma la mchod yon phul nas/ skye dgu rnams la ltas ngan gang yin de 'bras dag smin nas// bdag gi sbyin gnas rjes bzung skye bo rnams la 'byung ma gyur// 'dir ni skye bo'i mngon par 'dod rnams rab tu rdzogs phyi'i phyir// gal te skye bo 'di rnams
305a5(skyes rabs): nyes na'ang bdag gi mngon 'dong cha// mkhan po ni guswA pA dang bcas nas sbyin sreg byed// in+d+ra A gats+tsha ha rau A gats+tsha hA rI a ts+tsha mo ma d+ha ti the me She bri Sha Na ma pa Sh+ya me zhes so// me'i thal khung la bltas nas 'jigs pos phyir 'phor ro// bzhad gang/
305a6(skyes rabs): ba shin tu 'jigs nas kye na mnyam ltos ltos// 'di ni 'jigs shing kho'i sgo nas mche ba rab tu gtsigs// mig ni nyin byed gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra zhing rab tu dmar// shin tu 'jigs chen gang rgyangs nges par rab tu sgrogs// 'di
305b1(skyes rabs): ni sbyin sreg thab khung byed nas yang dag byung bar gyur// de nas srin po rab tu zhugaso// a ho hu tA ma ho data hUM/ zhes gar byed cing / 'byung bzhi 'di rnams goms pa'i stobs kyis rab 'jig cing // bar snang 'di rnams 'od zer mngon par
305b2(skyes rabs): 'bor bar bu bya// phyogs kyi 'khor lo lag pa rab rkyang bsdud byed cing // 'gro ba ma lus bdag gis rnam par g.yo bar bya zheso// rgyal po nas dge ba byed pa lnga bgegs mang ngo zhes brjod pa 'di bden pa 'di bden par 'dug go zhes bsrung //
305b3(skyes rabs): pad+ma can ni shin tu 'jigs byis pa'i gdong la gos kyi bka bo ste rgyal po'i rgyab tu 'ongaso// rgyal po nas/ kye sems can dgongs ci'i ched du 'dir 'ongs/ srin po nas/ khyod thams cad rab tu 'jug pa'i tshul khang chen po byas nas dgos
305b4(skyes rabs): ba ci'i ched du 'ongs kyang 'dri bar byed dam/ rgyal po ni shin tu mnyes nas gal te khyod kyi slong du 'ongs sam/ ci slong ba smros shig/ srin po nas/ zas so// bzhad gadra ba 'dren pa'i rgyab tu shin tu 'jigs nas 'ongs te tshul gyi khang
305b5(skyes rabs): par zas lnga song zhes smra/ srin po nas/ bdag gi zas ni gzhan yin nam// rgyal po nas smros shig/ srin po nas/ shu nI mdangs ldan slar yang ral gri'i lo mas sngon nyid du// rnam bcas rab tu shin tu mang po dron mo myadog na dmar po
305b6(skyes rabs): rnams// mi'i dbang po srin po rnams kyi bza' ba de rnams yin// mi yi bza' ba'i rig rnams bdag la nges par ci zhig bya// rgyal po shin tu mnyes nas/ tshur shog mkhas pa yid kyi shing rta rdzogs par bya// tshur shog bza' pa ji
306a1(skyes rabs): lngar 'dod bzhin lus 'di ni// pha rol don phyir bdag gis 'di ni nye bar bsrungs// sha rnams bcad pas bdag ni yun ring 'bras bcas 'gyur// pad+ma can du zhing rje'i sras khyod kyi di ring tshul lugs 'di ci
306a2(skyes rabs): zhig/ rgyal po nas lha mo skyes pa de'i 'bras bu dang bcaso// bzhud god pa nas kye na mnyam ji ltar gcig gi don gyi phyir 'jig rten 'di rnams yongasu gtong ngam/ rgyal po nas/ bdag ni de bzhin gang du yang // 'gro ba 'ga' yang 'dor mi byed
306a3(skyes rabs): de'i phyir na skye bo 'di// zug rngu'i phyir bdag nyid gtong // mkhan po nas/ bdag ni de lta bu'i mchod sbyin gyi cho ga 'dadi mi byedado// 'dir ni phyugs gsod len pa'i phyir// bgegs ni nges par rnam par zhugs// 'di yi cho ga rig byed las// 'di la phyog
306a4(skyes rabs): ni sbyin par bshad// rgyal po nas/ gang zhig dgos 'dod bgegs yin na// bdag ni bgegs kyang mchog tu mos// gong la yid kyi shing rta 'grub// cho ga de bzhin drug tu shog/ slar yang / kye bram ze mchod sbyin la// srin po phyugs rnams ci
306a5(skyes rabs): phyir rlung // yang na bdud rtsi spangs nas ni// snying po med pas ci zhig bya// srin po nas/ b+ho khyod 'dir ci'i phyir gtam skam pos dus 'phrog par byed// rgyal po nas/ b+ho 'dir mchog gi tshes grangs le// lus lnga ji ltar 'dod pa nye bar spyod cig/ pad+ma
306a6(skyes rabs): tsan ni ngu zhing skal ba dman pa bdag gi// lus 'di yang re zhig dang por nye bar bza' bar gyis shi go// rgyal po nas/ 'di ni bdag 'dod yin no// pad+ma can nam/ lus 'di yang lha'i yin mod/ srin po nas/ i mya ngan gyi 'jigs pa'i bog chags
306b1(skyes rabs): can 'dis ci zhig/ shums medo// ltos shig dang / mya ngan byas pa'i sha ni bska dang kha zhing tsha ba'i ro rnams yang dag bro bar byed// chags pa can ni sla zhing / khu bar byas bzhin rab tu skrag bcas de ni bskams pa 'dra// khros pa'i sbyar zhing
306b2(skyes rabs): rab tu tsha dang rtsub cing bud med zos nas brang ni tsha bar byed// mchog tu byams pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi lus ni mngar zhing dbang po thams cad mchog tu tshim// rgyal po shin tu mnyes nas/ ring po nas slong ba'i mngon shes can re zhig bdag gis
306b3(skyes rabs): mthong ngo zhes nas mtshon thogs te/ sha gcod par byas pa na/ pad+ma can ni lag pa nas bzung na/ rje'i sras ma bsam par ma byed cig/ ces smra zhing / kye sems can chen po 'phags pa'i bu yongasu thong la bdag long cig zer/ pad+ma skyes nas/
306b4(skyes rabs): b+ho la k+Sha sa 'phags pa thong la bdag long cig zer/ bzhad gad pa nas/ b+ho sems can chen po grogs dga' ba thong la bdag zo cig zer/ rgyal po nas/ ma 'brel pa des cho ga cho ga/ lha mo bdag gi chos kyi bgegs ma byed cig ces gsungs/ pad+ma
306b5(skyes rabs): can ni rmongs nas gar byed// bzhad gad pa nI gzho nu'o gdong gos kyi g.yogs par byeda'o// rgyal po nas/ b+ho sems can chen po gnas skabs 'dir bdag gi sha la nye bar sbyor bar gyis shig/ srin po ni bdag nyid bsams te/ 'di ltar khyod ni sen tshani
306b6(skyes rabs): bo ste/ bdag ni ma yin snyam nas/ nye bar za zhing gar bye'o// rab tu gsal bar smras pa/ a ha ha 'di shin tu ring por tshim par byaso// bzhad gad pa nas/ legs ldan 'jig rten skyong ba rnams yongasu skyob par mdzod// yongasu skyob par mdzad/ bdag gi na
307a1(skyes rabs): mnyam dga' ba'i srog 'dor bar byed do// mkhan po ni/ 'dir bsad nas ci zhig bya zhes nas nges par song ngo // srin po ni de nas re zhig nI mo// rgyal po nas/ kye dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'di ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin du nye
307a2(skyes rabs): par spyod cig ces lus gtad nas brgyal te grwar byed// srin po nas rang nyid bsams pa/ a ho mdzad stong che'o// sems can chen po yun ring por nyon mongs par mi rigaso snyam nas nges par song ngo // mi mngon tsam na zhugs nas/ brgya byoni
307a3(skyes rabs): kyis gzugasu bstan nas/ kye rgyal po chen po nye bor bzhengs shig nye bar bzhengs/ gi/ rgyal po nas/ bdag ni rjesu bzung zhing rab tu dga' bas lus la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin nye bar long spyod cig/ brgya byin nas bdag ni srin po ma logs
307a4(skyes rabs): bdag ni brgya byin no// slar yang legs par 'ongs pa 'di gang zhig bzhad gang ba nas dbugs phyung zhig dbugs phyung zhig/ kye na mnyam dga' ba 'di ni nges par lha'i rgyal po bdag nyid byon// lho bzhengs por mdzod cig/ kye/ 'phags pa'i bu
307a5(skyes rabs): dz+rad sbed 'do na lho bas lhag par lha rnams la sgrogs par bye do// pad+ma can ni rgyal po ltas nas ngu zhing 'phags pa'i bu 'di lta bu mthong nas/ bdag gi lus ma nyams par gnaso snyam mo// rgyal po nas/ kye/ lha'i rgyal po rab tu dgos pa
307a6(skyes rabs): 'i phyir 'dir byon// brgya byin nas/ khyod kyi bsam pa'i mthu mi g.yo ba la nor 'dzin da rab dag kyang g.yos te gang gi 'dir mi dbang khyod kyi bsam pa skye bo kun la gsal bar bya ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ rnam par spyod pa 'di ni bdag gi
307b1(skyes rabs): mig 'khrul pa yi no// bzhad gad ba nas/ kye/ na mnyam gzigs gzigs/ gzhan yang ya mtshan che ba 'dir ni sprin gyi dkyil 'khor la rlung drag pos bskyed pa lngar 'ur 'ur zhes rnam par zlog par rtsom par byed// rgyal po nas/ kye ma 'jig rten rnams sdug
307b2(skyes rabs): bsngal gyi ltung bar byed dam zhes gsungs/ pad+ma can nam/ 'dir gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang 'byung ngam zer/ bzhad gad ba nas gzigs gzigs/ ston ka'i zla ba gang ba'i 'od ltar dkar zhing skar ma'i phreng ba'o de shal gyis nye bar brgyan cing gsal bltar
307b3(skyes rabs): rin po che'i 'od zer khyad par du rab tu gsal pa nor rgyas kyi gdengs ka'i dkyil 'khor ltar dkar po yang dag par mthon nas byu // rgyal po ni shin tu ya mtshan che nas/ rnam par bltas te/ 'dir gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zheso//
307b4(skyes rabs): gangad pa nas/ kye bud med rin po che lha mo pad+ma can gyi dbyibs lta bu zhig sa gzhi'i mthil nas yang legs par langs nas byung // kye na mnyam dga' ba gzigs mdzod/ rgyal po ni ya mtshan che nas/ rnam par bltas te/ re ldan mthil nas mngon su
307b5(skyes rabs): du/ 'dir ni dpal mo bzhengs su mi ci// yang na 'di ni rnam gsal pa// sa chen lhag pa'i ska rags sam// de nas sa'i lha mo rab tu zhugs nas mchod yon phul te skyes bu chen po tshur gshegs/ mchod yon bzhes shig zer/ rgyal po nas/ kye khyed ni
307b6(skyes rabs): 'dir gsar du 'ongs pa ste/ legs ldan grong 'jig dang gnyis po bdag gis mchod par bgyi'o// brgya byin nas/ ji ltar bas sa rnam dag pas/ de'i chen por gyur pa bzhin// de bzhin mchod pas tshim byas kyang // chog tu dga' ba thob ma yin//
308a1(skyes rabs): rgyal po nas khyod 'di ring de tsam sngar yang rnam par g.yo ba ci'i phyir lags/ sa nas khyod kyis sems pa rgya chen mthong bas rab dga' nas// chu gA ter ri bo nags tshal mthar thug mngon par bskyod// khyod kyi ltad mo
308a2(skyes rabs): ya mtshan ngo mtshar lta ba yis// rab dga'i khur gyi lus non dbang gis yongasu 'drar// de nas da ni bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis slar yang gsal bar bya'o zhes/ 'dren pa'i lus yongasu byug pa byaso// bzhad gang ba shin tu dga' ste na mnyaM
308a3(skyes rabs): dga' ba ji lta bu de bzhin du mthong bar gyur to/ pad+ma tsan+da nas/ legs ldan gyi chos kyi mthu'o// brgya byin nas/ shin tu dka' ba spyad pa 'di yis las kyi tshul 'di ni cung zad las me do// sa nas/ lha'i dbang po 'di la dga' ba medado// gzigs//
308a4(skyes rabs): mdzod// kau shi kA 'di yis sbyin dus nas// 'di bzhin lus ni stong phrag smin par byas// sngon yang dri ma ba snyil bzhin spangs pa ni// bdag gis phyogs 'ga' yang ni de yod min// slar yang rgyal po mthong bas 'dir rmad du byung ngo // bdag ni/
308a5(skyes rabs): 'gro bar byed do zhes nas song ngo // brgya byin nas rgyal po rang gi bsod nams bsogs pa des// mtho ris su yang dag par gshegs par mdzod cig/ rgyal po nas de na slongs mo pa yod dam ci byed// brgya byin nas/ de med do// rgyal po nas
308a6(skyes rabs): gal te de bzhin yin na 'gro bar mi byed do// brgya byin nas der pha ma dag 'gro bar mos sam/ lci ba bdag ji ltar 'dod par ro// brgya byin nas de bzhin 'drir 'gro bar bya'o zhes nas yongasu song ngo // de nas ji ltar bud med pa'i legs
308b1(skyes rabs): ldan 'od zer zhes pa'i drang srong rab tu bzhugs nas/ a ho rgyal po chen po'i bsam pa rab tu rgya che'o zhes rab tu zhugs te/ kye rgyal po chen po bde legasu gyur cig/ rgyal pos phyag byas nas/ legs ldan ci'i phyir blon/ drang srong nas
308b2(skyes rabs): 'dir khyod kyi btsun mo dang bu'i ched du 'ongaso// pad+ma can ni 'di ci zhig snyamo// rgyal po shin tu dgra' nas legs ldan bdag gi lus la sogs pa 'di slong ba kun gyi rang dbang ngo // de nas yol ba las tsA tse'i sgo'o// kye re zhig mchod
308b3(skyes rabs): sbyin gyi cho ga'i btsun mo gtong ba med/ rgyal po nas/ slong na sbyin par mi bya zhes/ 'di ni chos kyi cho gar med// bzhad gad pa nas/ phar zur bram ze gdugs pa phar zur par zur/ rgyal po'i btsun mos khyod ci zhig bya/ gzhan slongs/ rgyal
308b4(skyes rabs): po nas de skad ma zer gyi/ drang srong chen po bdag snying yang // ji ltar 'dod bzhin legs ldan long // drang srong nas/ bu mo pad+ma bA ti dang / bu pad+ma ut+ta ra chur shog cig/ khyed gi nyes rgyal pos byin no// pad+ma can du zhing rgyal po chen po bdag po
308b5(skyes rabs): ni yin mod kyi// 'on kyang rgyal po'i gdung rgyud chad par 'gyuro// rgyal po nas/ bdag ni mi sbyin zhes pa cung zad kyang med do// zhes bshad zin to// pad+ma can nas longs shig/ de bzhin du ngu nas ci zhig b+hi bu pad+ma skyes chur shog/ 'phags pa
308b6(skyes rabs): bus bdag cag yongasu btang zin gyis/ yab la leg su ltos shig/ phyi nas ni mthong bar mi 'gyu ro// pad+ma skyes nas ci ste phyi nas bdag gi yib mthong bar mi byed/ pad+ma can nas/ pad+ma skyes gang gi phyir ni// 'dis bdag cag yongasu
309a1(skyes rabs): btang nas gzhan du 'gro'o// pad+ma skyes nas yum ni ci byed pad+ma can nas/ bdag cag byin nas 'gro'o// pad+ma skyes nas/ yab kyang de bzhin du 'gro bar byed dam/ pad+ma can ni pad+ma skyes kyi dron ni mi shes par shes nas bu
309a2(skyes rabs): yab lA/ phyag 'chel cig zer/ pad+ma skyes ni thal mo sbyar nas/ yab bdug gi yum 'di tsam bshums ci ste/ bzhad gang ba nas/ kye ma khyod ni snying rje med// gang zhig 'di bzho ni cho de yis// kha shums shing byis pa yongasu btang // hA zhes
309a3(skyes rabs): bad+ma bA ti dang / hA bu pad+ma ut+ta ra// khyed cig gnyis po dag yino// bram ze'i bu bdag cag gi rje su 'gro bar bya'o zhes rmongs nas gar byed do// drang srong nas shog shog/ bu mo bdag cag rnams 'gro bar bya ba ring por 'gro dgaso// rgyal po pad+ma
309a4(skyes rabs): skyes kyi spyi bo la bsnoms lo/ bshom shing / nags sam yang na grong khyer ram// ri bo dang ni rgya mtsho 'ang rung // khyed cag nyal zhing gau ny-id log kyang // lha rnams kyis ni srung bar shog/ lha mo khyod ni gar gnas der// gzhonu 'di la rdeg mo
309a5(skyes rabs): byed// lha mo ni bsting tshig gis 'phags pa'i bu de bzhin du'ang mkhyen nam/ rgyal po nas/ khyod ci srog ni yongs 'dor kyang // drang srong chen po bka' ma 'da'// me'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi// mchog gi thub pa tshig byas pa'o// bsod nams
309a6(skyes rabs): yongasu bsgrub byas pas// 'jig rten kun gyi mngon 'dod tshim// drang srong nas bu mo long shig/ bdag cag 'gro bar bya'o// rgyal po nas/ lha mo gshegs par mdzod cig/ pad+ma can ni phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal rigs skyes pa'i mthar thug par//
309b1(skyes rabs): bdag kyang de bzhin 'jug par shog ceso// pad+ma skyes nas/ yab kyi nga la sngon ni rta sbyin zer nas ma byin pas da khyod da la nam ster/ rgyal po ni bshums shing pad+ma can la 'khyud nas bu de thub pa 'dis khyod lnga ster par 'gyur gyis//
309b2(skyes rabs): pad+ma skyes nas/ yab pa/ 'dri na nga'i rta dang glang po tshe dang / glang po'i khyi dang / rnga'i sgra 'od rnams tshags gyis shig zer/ rgyal po rang nyid bsam pa na/ skabs 'do ni bdag gi zug Tu ni// srog la bab kyang de bzhin min// ji ltar pa'i
309b3(skyes rabs): mnyes shin bi'o// pad+ma mchog ni ring du 'gro// drang srong nas/ bu mo shog/ bdag cag 'gro bar bya'o// pad+ma can ni rgyal po la blta zhing / bu'i lag pA nas bzung nas song ngo // rgyal po nas/ brtsi ba'i zhags pas legs bsnams bzhin//
309b4(skyes rabs): gang gi bdag kyang shin tu gdung // na mnyam dbugs phyung shig/ dbugs phyung shig/ bzhad gong pa rta bas bzhin du langs nas// kye/ mi ster ci zhig zer// rgyal po rtab rtab mdzad nas rna bsams pa/ da ni bdag gi pha mi dag blta ba
309b5(skyes rabs): bya'o snyam pa na/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams rab tu zhugs nas ngo mtshar che/ ngo mtshar che/ lha'i yab yum dag na mkha' la bya ba mdzad pa gcig gzigs mdzod// drang pa'i gshog pa'i cha yis bskyod bzhin rgyal mtshan phreng ba can//
309b6(skyes rabs): gauzhal yas khang 'dras ri rab lhun po'i rtse mor rnam par gnas/ lha'i drang srong rnams kyang mngon par dga' brgya phrag rnams kyis bstod dang 'di dag lha'i gnasu nga ni rab tu zhugs par gyur/ rgyal po shin tu mnyes te gzigs nas
310a1(skyes rabs): phyag 'tshal zhing de bzhin tshig su bcud pa 'di nyid klog go// slar yang gzigs nas bshums shing / yab ni rnam sad lam du ring du gshegs shing / yum krung rjesu gshegs// / pad+ma skyes dang lha
310a2(skyes rabs): mo grong khyer spangs shing gnyis skyes khyim du song // da ni 'di ni stongs gyur ri ba~M shin tu dben pa'i nags tshal gyi// gnas la bdag kyang rten byed blo ni 'gro bar shin tu rings par gyur zhes gsungs nas yongasu zhugs pa ni/ bzhad gang
310a3(skyes rabs): pa nas/ kyo na mnyam khyod kyang gshegs par mdzad na/ nam bdag bram ze yongasu 'dzin par byed dam/ 'dren pa nas/ khyod ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhi no// kha zhad gad pa nas/ bram ze yang gal te khyod kyis 'ga' zhig gi bran la mi ster na rjesu
310a4(skyes rabs): 'gro'o// rgyal po nas/ khyod bram ze yin mod/ de bzhin du bdag ster ba'i bdag po yang khyod nyid do// pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams nas/ kye gzhon gtsug na na nor bu khyod kyang bdag cag rnams yongasu 'dor ram/ nor ldani raM phug khyod
310a5(skyes rabs): nyid ni// bsam gtan gyi spyan 'byed mi byed// g.yo ba med pa mtsho bzhin nags kyi lha rnams kyis ni lte/ rgyas pa'i rnams bsdus nus gang gi zlos gar rab sbyor lo// nye bar yongasu rtsom mjed tsan+d+ra go mis rab sbyor dang / gal te 'go'
310a6(skyes rabs): mig chags pa dang bral motshungs gyur 'gro rnams la// yang dag skyes sam sa chen yun ring gnas pas bden par smras/ 'dir ni thams cad nges par zhugaso// yan lag bzhi pa rdzogaso// // de nas rig 'dzin pa rab tu
310b1(skyes rabs): zhug so// rtsed mos rol cing na mkha' la rgyu ba na a ho lha gtsug na ner bu'i grags pa rgyun mi 'chad pas phyogs ma lus pa khyab cing gang ba 'di lta ste/ gtsug na nor bu'i snyan pa'i grags pa chen pos phyogs rnams thams cad
310b2(skyes rabs): rab tu mdzes par brgyan// de yis rna ba'i rgyan pa zhin gos dang bcas bzhin kun nas rgod bcas bzhin// tsun tshogs rnams bdud rtsis glang dang zla ba'i 'od zer 'tsher bas rnam par byug pa ltar// do shal rnam par 'phyang ba 'od zer
310b3(skyes rabs): 'phro ba'i tshogs kyi byub cing rnam par g.yo ba ltar// ltos ltos/ de'i grags pa nges par 'phel ba ni// phyogs phyogs mi 'am ci'i bu mo rnams kyi glu len cing / ri bo'i rtse la grub pa rig 'dzin rnams ni bstod cing sgrogs// sa 'og mthil na
310b4(skyes rabs): gtsug na nor bu'i 'od zer rab 'bar ba// klu rgyal rnams kyi gdeng kwa'i dkyil 'khor zhi nas nyan par 'dod// rig 'dzin ma nas pad+ma pA ti ni yugs mi ma yin bzhin du bu chung dang bcas 'khor thams cad yongasu spang ste/ bdag pos bkas
310b5(skyes rabs): drang srong chen po'i rjesu 'brang zhing da lta ji ltar gyur ta ma rig pa 'dzin pa nas/ de bzhin legs ldan 'od zer can gyi gnas brten nas/ ri bo gangs ldan mi ringa'i sul dag na slar yang gnas// drang srong chen po nga yang yab ni srid 'byung
310b6(skyes rabs): yid gcug so// de'i phyir 'di ni gzhan gyi lag tu 'gro bar mi byi'i phyir/ drang srong chen pos de nyid slong brar mdzad cing zhugs par ngaso// rig 'dzin ma dga' nas/ pad+ma can ni sngon gyi rigasu zhugs te/ de ni sdug bsngal gyi khur bkur
311a1(skyes rabs): dka' ba ni med do// de nas da lta lha gtsug na nor bu ji ltar thos sam/ rig pa 'dzin pa nas de yang pad+ma can gyi gang du khyer dang gnas pa mi shes shing / de dang nye ba ni de bzhin ri'i phug tu ya tu zhugs nas so sor gnas pa
311a2(skyes rabs): gyur de yi rnam par spangs pa'i grong khyer sA ka tA ni mchod sbyin phun sum tshogs pa rnams// shin tu mi bzang bzod par rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos mthong nas nye bar bskor bar byas// rig 'dzin mu nas rje'i sras 'di'i dga' ba'i gtam
311a3(skyes rabs): 'od sdud par 'gyur ram mi 'gyur// rig pa 'dzin pas 'di ni bsam gyi ste lha'i 'o// rig 'dzin ma nas rje'i sras gang du bas par// rig pa 'dzin pa/ rgod cing 'di khyod kyi smos shig/ grong zhig ma la ya'i rtse mo// rgya mtsho dba' rlabs 'pher ba'i
311a4(skyes rabs): mdang si shAn nam// ri rab bang rim rnams yang dga' zhing ya mtshan zhig gram yongasu sa rtol ri bo 'am// gang zhig sgeg cing gsal lA grub pa rnams ni rab dgA'o ri b+ho gang ldan rtse mo 'am// sa gzhi thams cad bris pa bzhin du na mkha' mthil
311a5(skyes rabs): nas lta zhing 'gro bar byed dam ci/ rig 'dzin mA nas/ shin tu phul du byung ba'i gnas bdag la yod de gtsug na nor bu mthong ba de ru de bzhin du babs par bya'o// rig 'dzin ma nas/ legs ldan rnams ni mthong bas kyang // dag gyur mngon par
311a6(skyes rabs): brjod pa legs zhes nas yongasu zhugaso// ri phug 'di ni chu be dal gyi 'bab pa yi// chu 'thor zer ma bsil zhing rlung ni 'jam pos bskyod// ljon shing gzho nu'ang yan lag rnams ni kha 'bus pa// gang de skyes bu seng+ge'i nya 'khor gnas yi no// /
311b1(skyes rabs): rig 'dzin mas rnam par bltas te/ 'di ni nges par phyag bya ba'i gan so// zhes gnyis pos phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'dzin pas nges par brtags nas/ 'dir ni de pa dA ru ljon pa'i bsil sgrib 'og/ nor bu mu tig rdo ba dag gi steng na/
311b2(skyes rabs): ni// pad+ma'i stan can+da mngon sum bzhin du skyil krung mdzod// gzho nu gtsug na nor bu nye bar bzhugs par 'gyur// rig 'dzin ma nas/ a ho daM ni shin tu brtan pa zab pa brling ba'i mdzad pa can no// 'das gangs ri thams cad dpal gyi
311b3(skyes rabs): gdu bar byaso// rje'i sras 'dir me tog 'di rnams gang nas byung // rig pa 'dzin pas steng du bltas pa na ye mtshan che ste/ mkha' las lha rnams me tog char 'bebs shing // sems can chen po mngon par mngon par mchod par byed//
311b4(skyes rabs): de bzhin mchod pa'i don du ni// bdag cag kyang ni me tog 'tshol du dengs zhes naso// de nas rab tu zhugs pa na 'dren pa ji lta pa mthong sde spyan cung zad phye nas a ho nad med pa'i bsam gtan bzhini 'di lta ste/ rnam par rtog bcas
311b5(skyes rabs): rnam par dpyod dang g.yo ba'i brlabs// dang po yin te dga' bde g.yo bcas gnyis po'o// bde ba la chags 'jig pa'i nad can gsum pa'o// rab tu zhi ba ro gcog mthar thug 'di ni bzhi bzhad gad pa nas ra mnyam khyed rang gcig pude
311b6(skyes rabs): bzhin du dang po dang gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / then pa'i bsam gtan gyi bde ba thob nas bdag cig pu 'gengs shing thum por bsdams nas tshong pa bzhin du rnying pa thob nas gnas par byed ngam/ bram tha la yang bsam gzhi
312a1(skyes rabs): cig kyang ma byin zhes zer/ 'dren pa ni bzhad cing na mnyam pa 'di ni sgom pa'i rjesu 'jug ste/ gzhan la sbyin par mi nu so// phreng ba'i yon tan bdag nyid bzhin// gal te bsam gtan 'jug 'gyur na/ 'jig rten
312a2(skyes rabs): rten kun gyi don bsgrub phyir// yid kyi shing rta cis mi skye ba// bzhad grad pa nas/ ji ltar bsam gtan gyi bde ba thob par 'gyur ba logs// 'dren pa nas gnyis min rten cing 'dod lha'i mtshon rnams bcom// bde ba 'di ni rab dbang yo byad
312a3(skyes rabs): na// g.yo ba rnams bsil mtshon chu shin tu dngas// bsil bzhin rang gi sems las rab tu ste// bzhad gad pa nas/ 'di ni gzhan zhig / yul gyi bde ba yang gzhan zhig gam ci/ ci 'dren pa nas// khyod ni bdud rtsi dang dug bosre
312a4(skyes rabs): bar byed dam ci// bsam gtan bde bas yid kyi bsal bar byed// yum gyi slar yang dbang med sem byed cing // 'dod chags zhe sdang ma yis rnams bcings nas// dmyal ba'i me yis sreg par byed pa ltar// bzhad gad pa nas
312a5(skyes rabs): gulo te de bzhin du yin na badrug kyang bsam gtan byed do// rgyal po nas/ de bzhin du mdzod cig/ bzhod grad pa bsam gtan byed pa na rna bar cung zad tho so// kye ngu ba bzhin du thos par byed// 'dren po nas/ bsam gtan ya mtshan
312a6(skyes rabs): che'o// bzhed gang pa nas khyod kyis ci yang ma thos sa mo// rgyal pos cung zad thos te/ 'di ni drag pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad nges par nud med ngu zhing 'dug/ bzhad gang ba nas/ ji ltar shes/ rgyal po nas/ yan lag mchog rnams dbyangs
312b1(skyes rabs): mnyam zhing // rnam par 'dren rnying snyan dang 'dzum// bskyod pa rno zhing rnam par gcod// skyes bu rnams ni rnam par rtsub// na mnyam mi ring bar mnyen pa bzhin du'o// bzhad gad pa nas/ 'di'i dbyangs sgrog tshul ni sngon thos pa gcig 'dra ba snyam mo//
312b2(skyes rabs): rgyal po nas/ bdag kyang de bzhin du s+thA mo// de ni dka' thu bya ma mnar ba zhig ngu ba yon nam/ der mngon par 'gro bar rig so// bzhad gang ba nas/ kye/ na mnyi ma de ltas nas/ ci zhig byed zer/ yol ba'i nang du'o// legs ldan 'jig rten
312b3(skyes rabs): rnams yongasu skye ba zhig yongs skyo ba zhig zer/ rgyal po nas skye bo 'di bzhin du ma nur pa ci zhig nye bar blta bar rigaso// khwazhud gang ba nas/ kye khyod ji ltar dus thams cad du gsar bu bzhin du pha rol gyi bdag nyid sdug bsngal bar byed
312b4(skyes rabs): rgyal po nas na ma nyi ma/ 'khor po ro rang du slar yang ni// bdag nyid de bzhin skye zhing skyes// sems can 'ga' zhig gnyen min pa// gang na'ang de ni gcig yid min// gnyis pi rta baD+ha b+ha porA langs te yongasu zhugs pa nA bzheng gleng pan
312b5(skyes rabs): kyo 'di nI g+hu mo pad+ma can la ci zhig rje smra byed pa ma yin nam/ rgyal po na re khyod ci zhig sgra// gang na lha mo pad+ma can gang la'o skol mnyes kyang phyogs tsam zhes zer/ de nas pad+ma can sha ba ri gnyis dang rje su 'gro zhing rab tu zhug so// shA ba ri dgas
312b6(skyes rabs): nas/ song mi khyod song zhes skad chen pos smra zhing khyod mi 'gro 'am zhes mdo mU ta ka zhes pa nas bud med rnyed pa 'dis nga'i bu chung de'i nu ma mo nun pa'i ma ma byedo zhes zer gnyis pa nas ha kye Na Te ka la lo la kA 'di ni 'u cag gnyis kyi thob bo//
313a1(skyes rabs): ltar 'gro ba de lhur 'gror chug zer/ pad+ma can du zhing kye ma ji ltar 'phags pa'i bu khyod ni yongasu skyob pa'i ngang tshul de lta na skal dman bdag gi gnas skabs 'dri lta bur 'jug pa las yongasu skyob par mi byed dam we
313a2(skyes rabs): sgra/ bzhad grang ba nas/ kye ji ltar the tshom byed/ lha mo pad+ma can no// rgyal pos de la bltas nas rta ba rta ba pAr lha mo mA 'dzegs shig/ pad+ma can ni brtags nas 'phags pa'i bu 'am su zhig yin/ yang na bdag gis 'dir 'ba'i zhag la
313a3(skyes rabs): 'phags pa'i bu'o zhes nye bar mthong ngam/ rgyal po ni bAshums shing lha mo 'di nye bar mthong ba 'di ni bdag yin te/ nye du'i skye bo sdug bsngal bar bya'o// bzhad gud pa nas/ kye lha mo ji ltar thad gzhan yin snyam du sems shig/ 'di ni
313a4(skyes rabs): na mnyam dga'o// pad+ma can ni gnyis po la bltas te/ shin tu sdug bsngal na sa la 'gye lo// sha ba ri dgas nas/ shog mo khyod shig/ bzhad gang po ni dbyug pa gyen du sbrengs twe/ ha na de bran mo yi bu sdug pa can gyi shaM bA ri dgas/ dbyug
313a5(skyes rabs): pakyog po lag 'gro khros pa 'dra ba'i dbyug pa 'dis khyed cag gri mgo gzhom par bya'o// zhes zer/ rgyal po na re na mnyam de bzhin du ma byed cig/ ji ltar gnod pa byed pas bshes gyur pa// de ltar phan pa mdzad pas mi 'gyur snyam/ ga
313a6(skyes rabs): las de'i bzod par gyur pa yis// 'gro ba mtha' dag zlo ga pa'i rgyu nyid do// sha ba ri dgas phan tshun bltas nas shin tu brtan te g.yo bar go la 'gyur// de ltar na bdag cag 'gro bar bya'o// 'di ni bdag cag dbang pos sprul pa byas zer/ 'jigs
313b1(skyes rabs): bas gyur byed cing nges par zhugs te song ngo // 'dren pa nas/ a yi sgyu mo 'dir ci'i phyir ji ltar 'di 'dra ba'i skabs zhugs/ pad+ma can ngu zhing 'phags pa'i bu dag gi skal ba la dri bar mdzod// bzhad gleng pa na kye lha mo gzhonu pad+ma skyes ji ltar/ pad+ma
313b2(skyes rabs): tsun phyog so rnams bltas nas skul ba dman pa bdag la nga brjod gtam ci zhig// rgyal po rtab rtsub por bci tso zhes sgra/ pad+mi can nas/ bu pad+ma skyes de ring gang nA zhes sgra/ bzhad gad pa na re/ tsi tsi kye rtse mo smros shig/ bid+mi can nis/ ba
313b3(skyes rabs): gi bu gang gi phrogs pas glang gis yang shin+d+ha tu mi bzad pa 'dir gnas zhes bshams shing gnod pa shin tu ming ba dgon pa'i gnas 'dir bdag gis gzhin ci zhig sems par byed// gzhad gang bya ngu zhing kyi ma yongs
313b4(skyes rabs): bA med pa'i grwa shin+da rjes de ring med par byas/ zhes rnam par bsams te/ k+She khyA m+bi ji ltar 'di btsun du sdug bsngal spyod pa dang pyad/ pad+mA n+dan nas/ bdag me tog b+hu bir phyir gnas nas 'ong ba dang phrad// rgyal po nas/ lha mon
313b5(skyes rabs): zhig drang srong chen pos khyod ma mthong ba dong khro bar 'gyu ro// de nas bzhengs la de bzhin du 'gro bar mdzod cig/ bshad gleng pa nas/ kye ji ltar sgra ri btson ra nas lag tu 'ongs po la slar yang khyod kyi ji lta ba bzhin du der 'jug gam/
313b6(skyes rabs): rgyal po nas/ namanyam 'dzi rna chos kyi lugs ma yin// pad+ma can rgyas zo la bltas nas dri zhing 'phags pa'i bu khyod kyis bdag slar yang yangasu 'dor ram rgyal po nas/ ji sbyar khyod kyi bdag g.yengs chen ze'i spyir bar byed
314a1(skyes rabs): gzigs mdzod/ don gang gis yongasu btang nas// slar yang len par 'dod pa na// dper na khyi bzhin gsal por ni// slar yang skyug pa zu byed dam// shin tu yun ring gnas gyur kyang // bdag cag nam zhig 'bral
314a2(skyes rabs): bar nges// de bzhin du yang gsungs te/ bsags pa thams cad mthar mdzad cing // mthon po rnams ni dma' mor lhung // 'dus pa'i mtha' ni 'brel ba ste// gson pa'i mtha' yang 'chi ba yi ni// gzhan yang lha mo kun gyi rang
314a3(skyes rabs): bzhin yun ring gnas kyang rnam par 'bral// 'chi bdag zhags pas 'dzin cing rnam parar+ya kha gdags rgyu// gal te chos phyir 'di ni da ltar rnam bral kyang // yang dug 'dus pa bas kyang shin tu dga' bar 'gyur// pad+ma can nas 'pha
314a4(skyes rabs): pa'i sras gang gsungs pa der bdag 'gro'o// gal te bdag 'gro yang rkang pa'i sna mi 'gro'o// rgyal po nas/ lha mo dang tshul 'od yis bdag gi bka' ni sgrub par mdzod// ni mnyam drang srong chen po'i gnasu lha mo bskyal bar mdzod
314a5(skyes rabs): cig/ bzhad gad pa nas/ na mnyam ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o// pad+ma can ni dru zhing kye/ gau ta ma skad cig pa zhes par mdzod cig/ bdag ni re zhig 'phags pa'i bu lta bu'o// bdag ni skal pa dman te slarar+ya yang bdog gis mthong
314a6(skyes rabs): bar bya ba ga la yin zhes chags shing nges par bltas 'phags pa'i bu bdag la'ang legs par gzigs mdzod/ slar yang bdag gis khyod mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po nas lha mo nges par bstan pas ci zhig/ 'dus pa thams cad 'di
314b1(skyes rabs): bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur te gzigs mdzod// dper na lam la lam zhugs rnams// 'gro zhing lam du 'dus 'gyur nas// tshogs kyang phyogs gzhan 'gro bar byed// de bzhin mnyen 'dun tshogs rnams so// bzhad gad pa nas/ kye na mnyam snying
314b2(skyes rabs): rje med par ma byed/ kye lha mo'i dbugs 'byin par mdzod cig/ rgyal po ni bshums shing ji ltar bdag gis dbugs dbyung bar bya'o// slar yang 'byung 'gyur yang dag 'dus pa thob ce 'am ni slar yang khyod ni smras po ni/ pad+ma skyes
314b3(skyes rabs): kyis 'dir ni blon po dang ni dpung tshogs thams cad bcas par 'gyur ce 'am/ lha mo'i gyos sgyug bdag gi yab yum dag ni rab tu dang bas di ring thob ce 'am/ mnga' ris shin tu rgyas par sgra 'am ji ltar bdag gis dga' bas rab
314b4(skyes rabs): tutu dbugs dbyung bya// yol ba'i nang nas 'dri bzhin no zhes so// thams cad rta ba rtab por gyur to/ slar yang yol ba'i phag nas 'di bzhin no zhes pa ni ci zhig/ 'di bzhin gang la rig 'dzin rnams// dga' bas legs 'ongs na mkha'
314b5(skyes rabs): las// me tog rnams kyi char phab ste// 'di ni gsal por gyur pa'o// rgyal pa ni ngo mtshar dang bcas te/ lha mo 'dir yang 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas gal te bdag la 'di lha mo dang bcas pa mthong na brdzun gyi dam bca' zhes 'byung bar
314b6(skyes rabs): 'gyur ro// pad+ma can du zhing phyag 'tshal te/ khyod la lha rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur mod ces zer nas lta zhing yongasu song ngo // bzhad gad pa rje su zhugs te song ngo // rgyal pos gzigs te/ bud med rin chen sbyin par btang /
315a1(skyes rabs): yid ni 'gro zhing bya ba byas// bdag gi gtsugri rin chen 'di// spun bzhin du ni don med nas// da ni dam pa slong ba su zhig 'byung snyam pa na/ de nas bram ze gcig zhugs nas kye bdage slong ba po zhes yongasu zhugaso//
315a2(skyes rabs): pad+ma can gyis bltas te/ gau ta ma bram ze 'di nI ci zhig slong bar byed do snyam du bdag snying gi sems so// bzhad gad pa nas kye lha mo 'di yang bram ze ste/ thams cad du bdag cag bram zes gtong bar mi byed de 'di na yang slob bo//
315a3(skyes rabs): yang na nags tshang tshing gi dpag tu lha mo lta zhing sdod cig bdag gis nye bar 'gro bar bya'o// bram ze nges par bltas te/ 'di ni lce gtsug nA nor bu/ gang yin pa 'di yin te/ gcig pu nyid kyi phun tshogs kyis// sa gsum rnams
315a4(skyes rabs): ni khyab par mdzad// bskal pa 'chags dus gnas pa yi// legs ldan pad+mo'i skye gnos bzhin zhes zer nas// kye rgyal po bde yigasu gyur cig/ rgyal po nas/ bde bar 'ongs sam 'dir zhugs shig gsung mig g.yas pa 'phrigs
315a5(skyes rabs): bar gyur nas bsams pa/ ji ltar migu gi g.yas 'gul zhing // gang zhig lhog par mngon gsal byed// gang ba rgya chen bsngags 'os pa'i// gsal bar slong ba por gyur nges// bram ze chen po ci slong bAr byed gsungs shig
315a6(skyes rabs): ces so// bram ze ni ngo tsha bzhin du bdag ni nges par 'dod pa che'o// rgyal po dga' ba dang bcas te ngo tsha ba chog go// bdag nyid kyi bzhin du 'di thams cad kyang khyod kyi'o// bram ze nas/ gzhan don ro cig shar ba yi so// 'gro ba'i gshes
315b1(skyes rabs): gnyen zhi mdzad pa// bdag gi mngon 'dod khyod bzhin du// khyod kyi gtsug gi nor bu ste// bzhud gad pa rta ba rtab por nye bar btud de/ kye bram ze khyed la ngo tsha ba'ang med do// na mnyam dga' ba'i lus kyi gnas skabs kyang 'di bzhin du sdug
315b2(skyes rabs): bsngal bar byed dam/ rgyal po nas/ na mnyam de bzhin du ma byed/ ji ltar bdag gi mchod pa'i gnas khyod kyis rgyang du 'phen nam/ 'di ni sbyin bdag 'dir bdag slong mo pa/ grogs po phyin ci log tu ci phyir byed/ 'di ni 'gro ba myang
315b3(skyes rabs): 'das rgyur 'gro ba'i// bdag gi kun mkhyen gzhon pa'i mcho go yino// gzhan yang yid bzhin nor dang slong ba'i skye bo bdag/ phun tshogs yon tran slong ba'i skye bo 'phags// yid bzhin nor ni nor tsamya ster byed kyi// slong ba'i skye bo
315b4(skyes rabs): yon tan kun 'byung ngo // kye bram ze gtsug gi nor bu 'di ni ji ltar 'dod par bton nas khyer cig/ bram ze nas/ lha yi gtsug gi nor bu ri rab kyi// rtse mo lta bur su yis bskyod par nus// rgyal po nas/ rno ba yaus bsnun cing the ni cig/
315b5(skyes rabs): gzigs mdzod// chu shing snying po med pa ltar// rnam par nyams gyur bdag med pa'i// lus 'di gzhan don 'gro ba yi// dga'i 'gyur gang gis skye ba med// bzhad gad pa nas// yongasu skyob zhog/ yongasu skyob zhig/ nags tshal gyi lha
315b6(skyes rabs): rnams gdugs pa can gyi bram zes na mnyam dga' ba ni gsod par byed do// lha mo rtab rtab por gyur nas 'di nas gzhan yang mthong bar 'gyur ram zhes 'ongaso// bram ze ngo mtshor te/ ci ste nags tshal gyi lha rnams 'ongs
316a1(skyes rabs): sa ma snyam mo// pad+ma can nas 'phags pa'i sras bya ba 'dis ci zhig byed// rgyal po nas/ yid kyi shing 'dri'i 'bras bu dang bcas so// pad+ma can ngu zhing 'phags byi'i bu'i yid kyi shing rta'i 'bras bu dang bca so// bram+b+ha ze'i
316a2(skyes rabs): 'dod pa grub po// rgyal po nas/ shin tu bdag tu rmongs pas chog go// gzigs mdzod/ 'khor ba'i chu gter sems can rnams// las kyi dba' rlabs shugs kyis bskyo ba// mthon po dag ni dma' mor 'phangs// de la gang dang gang gis
316a3(skyes rabs): bsnyen// bram ze nas/ shin tu snying rje chen po la ltas nas bdag kyang yang dag par brtse bar skye na gtsug gi nor bu re zhig zhog cig/ pad+ma can nas/ bram+b+ha ze de bzhin du rjesu 'jug go// bzhad gad pa dga' nas legs par smraso// rgyal po
316a4(skyes rabs): shin tu mnyes nas kye bram ze khyod kyi gzhan du smras nas 'di bzhin du rigs sam/ bram ze nas rgyal po bdag cag gi yul du mA ri'i nod zhugs te/ de'i phyir blangs nas 'dis spro bar byed do// rgyal po ni rtab rtab por ji ltar bram ze zhes
316a5(skyes rabs): gsung / bram ze nus/ kyo rgyal po/ srang dang so so'i khyim rnams dur khrod mi bzad bzhin// yan lag brkyang zhing lus 'dzag shing gi phung po bzhin// ri rab kyang ni khyi dang mkha' 'gros sgyu ma rnams// rab zhugs 'di ni ku ru'i yul du phyung
316a6(skyes rabs): bar gyur// rgyal po nas/ sdug bsngal lo// kye/ bram ze mA ri'i nad de la rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i thabs gang yang med dam/ bram ze nas/ 'cha nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i tshad du 'di bzhin lha'i gtsug gi bu slong po 'jig rten po rnams kyi bdag
316b1(skyes rabs): btang ngo // rgyal po shin tu mnyes nas skye bo rnams la phan pa bya ba'i phyir bdag gi gtsug gi nor bu slong bar byed do zhes kun nas phyung nas/ gtsug gi nor bu bkan nas rtsa bar rnam par bcings par phyung nas ni// 'di ni tshad chen ri bong
316b2(skyes rabs): 'dzin pa chen po'i 'od zer lta bur dkor// 'gro ba'i don rnams yang dag bsgrub mdzad gnyis skyes la byin nas/ mi drag 'gro ba kun gyi nad rnams 'di yos sel bar shog/ ces byin te brgyal nas gar byed// pad+ma can du zhing ha 'phags
316b3(skyes rabs): pa'i sras ha mthu chen po mgon med rnams kyi gnyen khyod kyi bdag cig pu 'dor yongasu 'dor bor byed dom zer/ bzhad gad pa nas/ han mnyam dga' ba 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen brtse ba chen po yongs skyo bo shig/ dpag bsam gyi shing
316b4(skyes rabs): yongasu 'dor zhing chu gA ter yongasu ska mo zhes zer/ blam+b+ha ze ni gzhan du 'dir sdud nas ci zhig byed/ 'di ni sems dpa' chen po de yi mngon par 'dod pa bdag gi bsgrub par bya'o// snyam nas yongasu zhugs nos bltas pa na drer thub pa cig
316b5(skyes rabs): 'ongs so// bdag ni sdig bu mi bzad pa dang ldan pas ji srid 'dis myi mthong ba de srod bdag 'bre sgo snyam nas zhug so// de nas drang srong 'od zer tsan rin tshun phreng ba ma dang bcus tI rab tu zhug so// ci sti sgra chen gnas skabs ma yin 'di ltar
316b6(skyes rabs): spung ning ci ste sa chen g.yo bar byed/ ci ste rlu rnams kyang ni rlub cing ci ste phyogs rnams kyang ni skye bar 'gro bar byed/ Ni s+t+rai nyi ma yang ni mtshams min gza'i bdage zas 'dzin cing ba tsam nas gnas byed cing / ci ste nyi ma'i gung la dzi
317a1(skyes rabs): 'dir ni yul rnams mun pas yang dag sgrib par byed// 'di bzhin du ma'i bdag po la ji ltar sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa zhig go snyam nas bu mo rin chen phreng ba ma dA ltar pad+ma pA ti gar song / rin chen phreng
317a2(skyes rabs): bA ma nas/ chu klung dal gyi 'bab pa'i 'gram du me tog thur song ngo // drang srong nos 'di myur du ltar 'gro bar bya'o zhes yongasu zhugs pa na zla bar cung zad thos nas a yai ji ltar ngu bi'i sgra 'dra ba zhig go// dr-ir ro zhig bdag 'gro bar bya'o/
317a3(skyes rabs): zhes nas yong su zhugs nas bltas pa ni/ rin na phreng ba ma ngu zhing / logs ldan pad+ma can ni ji ltar ngu zhing mchi so// 'di ltarA go ta ma'o// drang srong mas 'di las gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang ngo // rin chen phreng ba mas+dza nges par blta so nas
317a4(skyes rabs): hA bdag gsod 'di ni lha gtsug na norA bu ste sa la 'gyel nas mchi so// drang srong nas/ hUM bdag gsod bdag skal pa dman pa mi rtag pa ni stobs che'o// skye ba'i dpag bsam shing bzhin du// rtag tu 'tsho bar byed pa'i// de ni 'di mnyal zhing
317a5(skyes rabs): 'gyel// phun tshegs dris par skad cig tsam// bu mo pad+ma b+hU tI 'di zhig/ ji ltar ba de bzhin du ngu bar byedado// bzhad gad pa nas/ legs ldan gzigs gzogs/ drang srong nas/ 'di ji ltar yin/ bzhad glad pa nos/ ljags ldan gtsug na
317a6(skyes rabs): nor bu'i sbyin pa'o// drang srong nas/ hA dpag bsam gyi shing 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pu zhes zer/ pad+ma tsan la rin chen phreng ba ma la 'khyud nas grogs mo dga' ma 'dir shog/ gnas skabs kyi mtha' 'di la ltos shig/ hA bu pad+ma skyes yab
317b1(skyes rabs): kyis kyang yongasu 'dor bar byed do// de nas pad+ma skyes dang / lagu bzangs dag yang rab tu zhugs te/ 'di ni nga'o// pad+ma skyes la ni 'dirwa blangs nas// bzod par dka' las rgyal bar byas// rje'o lta zhing 'gro bar byed// de las yid kyi
317b2(skyes rabs): the tshom tsi// pad+mA skyes nas/ oMdz+nyA sna chen po yu mo dang bcas te yab dang mjal bar byed do zhes zer/ lag bzangs nos/ gzhonu de ji lta ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes zer/ yongasu zhugs pa na pad+ma skyes rtswa babs bzhin du 'gyel bar
317b3(skyes rabs): gyur to// adz+dzA daM'i rkang pa la ci na ma cig gis rmu gso shes zer/ lag 'jigs nas// myur du bltas te rang nyid bsam pa dang / sgeg pas kun nas 'gye lau te/ ji ltar 'di ni sbrul yin te/ sa yi ser ga 'dir rta su zhugs te song ngo //
317b4(skyes rabs): bdag gi mngon par 'dod grub pa 'di nyamaso snya mo// yang na myur du lha'i drung du nye bar 'gro zhing sleb ma thag tu gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od zer gyis drug med par 'gyu ro// snyamo nas gsal bar smras pa/ gzho nu myur du mdzod cig/
317b5(skyes rabs): yab yum dag dang mjal bAr bya'o// zhes smras+t+ra pA nA/ nga'i rkang pa nI s+thid sil sI la mchi so// grwa nyid kyang blo lus paM yang 'dar zhing mchi so zhes zer/ lag bzangs kyi rna bar cung zad thos te/ ji ltar 'dir yang ngu ba'i sgra
317b6(skyes rabs): zhig go snyam nas brtag pa ni/ de ci ste 'di ni lha mo bshums pa yin nam/ 'di ni rin chen phreng ba ma'o// 'di ni legs ldan 'od zer can no// snyam mo// shin tu spangs nas 'di thams cad ci'i phyir du zhes yang bltas pa na/
318a1(skyes rabs): de rnams ni du zhing lha ni gzims nas bzhug so// a ye lha'i dbu ni ci'i phyir 'di bzhin du song / nges par bltas nas hA rgyal po chen po ji ltar 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabasu gyur zhes lha mo la lta zhing / khyed
318a2(skyes rabs): kye spyan ni btsums shing mchis// de ring 'jig rten snang ba med// smad byed dang bral na mkha' bzhin/ dbu'i gtsug kyang stong par snang zhes 'dren po'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nAs/ 'dir ni lha 'ba' zhig gshegs par ma zod
318a3(skyes rabs): de gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od zer dang bral bas da ni gzhonu yang gshigs par 'gyu ro// rin chen phreng ba ma pad+ma skyes la 'khyud do bu pad+ma skyes ya bA la gzigs mdzod cig phyi nas nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// pad+ma skyes
318a4(skyes rabs): nas/ yab 'di bzhin du ci ste/ pad+ma can nas/ bdag ni skal pa'i rang bzhin no// pad+ma skyes nas/ yab bzheng mdzod bdag gi yum yang ba shums shing mchiso shes brgyal zhing gar byed do// pad+ma can dang / rin chen phreng ba mAM bo dag
318a5(skyes rabs): kyang hA bu hA gzho nu/ hA bu chung khyod kyis kyang bdag cag yongasu 'dor ramA/ lag bzings nas/ hA bcom mo// skal ba dman pa 'dir phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal rigs stongaso// bzhad gad pa nas/ bu pad+ma skyes dbugs phyung zhig drang
318a6(skyes rabs): song nges pa re bltas pas ngo mtshar bar gyur nas/ 'dir ni tsan chus yis theg le'i zer ma'i mkha' las yan lag mchog char 'bebs shing // bung ba dang bcas me tog rnams ni ring nas ldeng zhing rig 'dzin rnams kyis 'thor bar
318b1(skyes rabs): byed// klu rnams kyang ni dal gyis 'bab cing chu klung dal gyis 'bab pa gting za ba rnams kyang ni// zil pa'i 'od zer 'gyed cing lha yi rnga rnams 'dir ni ri bo'i phug rnams rab myos byed// thams cad ya mtshan che nas blta so// pa
318b2(skyes rabs): nas// 'phags pa'i sras kyi sku ni lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i ched du lci'i 'jig rten du len par byed do// zhes zer nas drang srong gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ legs ldan bdag bka' yis rje su lhan cig 'gro'o drang srong nis
318b3(skyes rabs): gnang bar mdzod cig zer nas/ lag bzangs la lta zhing / bdag gi skyeg shing sta gonr-i gyis shig bdag gi gtam gyi phyi ma yin no zhes zer/ ngadra gad ba nas/ kye/ lha mo thang cig gzhes cig/ bdag kyang nA mnyam dga' ba rje su
318b4(skyes rabs): lhan cig 'gro'o drang srong nas dA dung yang ngus nas ci zhig byed ma mthong ngam ci ste/ 'di yi thugs ka rab tu 'gul zhing spyan yang 'brig par byed// 'di yi zhal ni mtsho yi pad+ma bzhin du rnam par 'dzum// 'di yi sku ni ba spu g.yo zhing
318b5(skyes rabs): phyag kyang skyob par rtsom// 'di'i spyan ni 'jig rten rnams dang lhan cig 'gyod pacom bshad pa nas/ kye lha mo 'khrug par ma byed cig/ na mnyom dga' bas kyang 'dzin par byed do// pad+ma can nges par bltas nas/ 'dir bdag gi skal
318b6(skyes rabs): pos dbugs 'byin par byed do// zhes pad+ma skyes kyi lag pa nas bzung nas bu dbyugs phyung zhig// khyod kyi ya ba ni 'tsho bar snang zhes zer/ rin chen phreng ba ma nas/ kye rgyal po chen po'i 'khor rnams dbugs phyung zhig zer/ rgyal po
319a1(skyes rabs): bkan nas rtsa ba gces pa'i tshig su bcad pa nyid klog cing dal bus gas par byed do// pad+ma can nas/ 'phags pa'i sras 'di ni gzho nu pad+ma skyes te/ 'di yang 'bring bar mi byed dam/ rgyal po nas bu pad+ma skyes 'dir shog
319a2(skyes rabs): gsung / lhag bzungs nas/ bdag gi skabs 'dir ji ltar bya// lha 'di ni bdag gi ngal bas nas stong pa no// sbrul gyi mche bas bzung ste brgya lI nas mchiso// rgyal po ni rti ba rta ba por 'di ci zhig/ pad+mo n+dan nas/ hA bu pad+ma skyes kyisau yab ma
319a3(skyes rabs): mthong mu zer/ rin chen phreng ba mu nas/ hU grogs mau dgo' ba khyod kyi yid kyi shing D+ha ma rdzogaso zhes zer/ bya zhang glad pa nas/ kyai gzhin n+d+he nIm+b+ha pa med pa zlor/ lag bzangs nas// lha yi gtsug gi nor bu gang ni/ bzhi ga ba nas/ bram ze
319a4(skyes rabs): la byin no// lag bzangs nas g.yo sgyus bcom ste bzod par rab tu dka' ba'i g.yo thabs nges par yi no// lha ji ltar dgra rnams 'tshe ba'i phyir gtsug gi nor bu ster bar byed/ rgyal po nas/ bdag la phyis kyang gdung ba med do// drang srong
319a5(skyes rabs): nas cis shes zer/ rgyal po nas legs ldan gang gi bden pa 'di dang snying rje'i bsam pa'i 'bras bu dang / de byin bdag la nem yang rje su gdong ba med gyur na// de yis da ltar de bas nus mthu shin tu lhog gyur pa'i// 'gro ba phan phyir
319a6(skyes rabs): bdag la gtsug gi nor bu 'byung bar shog ces gsung ba dang / glog 'khyug pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad rtab rtab por gar byed do// pad+ma skyes kyang nye bar lang so// drang srong nas/ a ho sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rnam par
319b1(skyes rabs): dag gyur te/ nyi ma 'od zer stong phrag rnams ni 'phro zhing gsal ba ltar// slar yang mi'i bdag la gtsug gi nor bu 'khrungs gyur nas// gang gi mthu nI rab brkyang dug gi mun pa mngon par bcom// pad ma skyes kyang du
319b2(skyes rabs): ni pad+ma bzhin du rab tu 'dzum zhes zer nas thams cad rtsub rtab por gar byed do// pad+ma can ni rgyal po la lta zhing pad+ma skyes la 'khyud nas slar ba dag gi mig phyed par gyur to zhes smra'o// bzhad gang ba nas/ na monyam dga'i
319b3(skyes rabs): rdzu 'phrul mngon du mdzad do// rin chen phreng ba ma nas/ 'di 'dra ba ltar yod pa bdag cig rnams dga' mo yin no zhes zer ro// lag bzangs nas/ gzhon nu yab yum dag la phyag 'tshal cig zer/ pad+ma skyes ni thal mo
319b4(skyes rabs): spyir nas phyag 'tshal bar byed// rgyal po nas/ chos dang ldan par gyur cig ces gsungs/ pad+ma can nas/ ya ba ji ltar byar gyur cig zer/ drang srong nas/ lha mo dang gzhon nu yong 'dir bdag gis 'bul bas rgyal po
319b5(skyes rabs): tho zhes par mdzod cig zer/ rgyal po nas/ khyad ji ltar gsung ba bzhin du bya'o// thams cad shin tu dga' nas gar byed do// drang srong nas 'di bzhin du byas pa khyod kyis bzod par mdzod cig zer/ 'dren pa nas/ rjes su
319b6(skyes rabs): bzung ba la bzod pab yul gang la yin gsung / yol ba'i nang nas/ khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyis skye dgu'i yid kyi shing rta rdzogs par shog/ mya ngani tha~Mng la chu gtor dang ni ri bo 'dzeg pa'i skabasu shog/ chu gter sgrol
320a1(skyes rabs): bar gzings dang mi bzad mun pa rnams kyi snang bar shog/ 'jigs chen skyabs gnas dang ni dbul po rnams kyi dpag bsam shring du sh+log ces zer ro// rgyal po nas 'di gang zhig/ drang srong nas/ 'di yi lha
320a2(skyes rabs): yi tshogs rnams mnyam du khyab 'jug/ dbyung phyug tshungs pa dbang po zla ba stsogs// lha rnams kun gyis mkha'i khang bzangs gnas shing thams cad 'dra bzhin nam mkha' khyab par gyur// chen po de rnams gang rnams kyi ni rtswa
320a3(skyes rabs): 'phrul rnam par 'phel zhing sor po dkar po yis// phyogs rnams rab tu mdzes shing khyab pa rtsigs logs ri mor bris pa bzhin du dzad gyur to// khyed kyi ya ba yum dag kyong na mkha'i bzhon pa la gnas nas bu dang bcas
320a4(skyes rabs): shing chung maR+Sha bcas pa shis pa brjod par bya'o// rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas phyag byaso// legs ldan ci'i zhig bsgrub par bya ba gsungs shig/ drang srong nas/ khyod ni med gyur mnga' ris sdug bsngal gnas// slar yang
320a5(skyes rabs): gshegs shing slar yang skyong bar mdzad// do rangs ka'i grong khyer gshegs pa'i phyir// mkha' bzhon 'di yang dbang po sa khyod la bsgyings// rgyal po nas/ gong ma rnams ji ltar gsung ba bzhin du bya'o// thams cad shin tu dga'
320a6(skyes rabs): zhing zhon nas gar byed do// yongasu zhugs pa na rgyal po nas/ a ho mkha'i bzhon pa ni shin tu mgyogs te// ngang pa'i gshog pa rnam par bskyed pas rgyu ba'i tshogs ltar chu 'dzin rnams ni ring por gyur// ri bo'i dbang po rnams ni glang
320b1(skyes rabs): rkyen dab smos bzhin mngon du phyogs nas rgyu ga cing 'ong // 'di ni dbang byos dkrigs shing 'khor lo bAzhin du na mkhi' ma ni pa nI rnam par spyo par byed// nyi mI'i dkyil 'a byor gyi ba'i 'od zer tshogs pas bskor zhing kyang
320b2(skyes rabs): phyogs 'gro bar byed/ rlung srod nas// dir ni bzod dka' grong khyer skye bo'i gnas bcas khyod las ni// bad+ma ris dkrugs shing 'jig N+Doni kun 'tsho blta zhing phyag bya'o// 'di rnams kyang ni skye bo'i gnas ban+d+has tu 'as
320b3(skyes rabs): b+h+yos+yA n+d+has// bdag nyid dzim+b+ha bzhin du grong khyer swa ki t+yA gnas// skor yod khyod kyi dga' ba'i byA ba ci zhig// yod pa sku byar gyis shig/ r+m+mam+b+ha pi nas/ 'di las kyang dga'o bar bya ba ci zhig yod/ sgyu mo bad+d+ha b+hU tI bu'i zhal dang / dgas
320b4(skyes rabs): bo'i gau ta ma/ gzhon zhing mkhyi'u bzhon pa l+ya gnas yab yum lha cho gas 'khor bcas mothong // dga' ba'i blon po sna tshon dang ni skye bo'i sdug bsnga lA mA lus pa// rab tu zhi gyur gzhan+da ni tsi ga bsgrub bor bya zhing bya bya ci// 'on+da
320b5(skyes rabs): klung dga' byur bya ba yod de/ bgro rnams dram chos 'byung zhing rab tu sbyor ba'i spyad mo chen polegs spyod yon tan rnams kyi'o chi bdag yid k+Shi shing rta 'bras med sh+log// thub pa'i skye bo'i gtam gyis 'brel 'tshogs
320b6(skyes rabs): zhing bdud rtsi'i tshor rnams kyis// bsil zhing dge bas zla bi'i snang bas rab tu 'gro zhing don byed shog/ gang zhig snyan dngags bden pa rnams kyis dus ring dga' byas shaM lU zhi'i sras rnams kyis// dus ring nas ni nor gyi khur po
321a1(skyes rabs): ring nas skye bo'i sems ni rab tu dga' bar mdzad// slar yang bkur gnas mthong bar gyur nas dpal ldan chags pa dang bral zhes pas mdzad gyur pa/ 'jig rten kun tu dga' ba sna tshogs zlos gar
321a2(skyes rabs): 'di ni gar gyi sa gzhir thob par shog/ ces smras nas thams cad nges par zhug so// yan lag lnga pa rdzogs so// / gzhon nu gtsug na nor bu'i skyes pa'i rabs zlos gar gyis bstan bcos 'jig rten
321a3(skyes rabs): tu dga' ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po can dra go mis rab tu sbyar ba'o// dam pa rnams kyi tshul la brten nas pa Na Di ta chen po karti tsan dra dang / yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis pal yul
321a4(skyes rabs): grong khyer du legs par bsgyur ba'o// /
322a1(skyes rabs): bus tu dag 'i grog la dga' ba'i ltam mdzad pa bdus
322b1(skyes rabs): rgya gar skad du/ nA ga man+danA ma nA Ta ka/ bod skad du/ klu kun tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i zlos gar/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo// dga' ma dga' ba'i zol las skyes pa'i spu long dag gis bsgribs pa'i lus
322b2(skyes rabs): 'dzin cing // 'dzum dang ldan pas rgyal ba'i byang chub dag la bgrod pa me tog snyim pa ni// gshog rgya rab bskyod sgra sgrogs sbrang rtsi ri bas sbrang rtsi re bas bsten cing de'i// rkang pas bsnun pas kho zum tshogs phye ge sar gsal bar gyur pas khyed
322b3(skyes rabs): la bsnyungs// bsnam gtan zol dgra nye bar po zung nas skad cig mig phye su la sems par byed// skyob pa yin yod lus med mda' gzir skye bo 'di dag sbyang ba min la ltos// snying rje wAn+ti brgyus te khyod las gzhon pa'i brje med skyes bu ga lA yod//
322b4(skyes rabs): bdud mo rnams kyis byang chub la 'di phrag dog gis brjod rgyal bas khyod la bsrungs// gzhon yang gzhu bkang 'dod pa dang ni/ gsang brdung zhing sgra sgrogs bdud kyi dpa' bo dang // sbyin 'khyog rab 'dor glal 'dzul log su lta ba mtho ris bu mo'i skye
322b5(skyes rabs): bo dang // grub pa yan lhag mchog bdud rnams dang mtshar byas spu langs lus can nor lha yis// bya chub 'thob la bsam gtan g.yo myed ces bltas thub pa'i dbang pos khyod la bsrungs// shin tu mangs par 'gyur bas dga' bar sa
322b6(skyes rabs): temado 'dzin pa'o// ring bdag po'i dge' ston la phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa/ dang ldan dga' ba'i lha'i zhabs kyi pad+manye bar bsten pa'i rgyal po'i tshogs rnams kyis gus pa dang ldan par bos te/ bdag la smras pa/ ji ltar kha bo tsa/
323a1(skyes rabs): gI rje dpal ldan dga' ba'i lhas/ sngar med pa'i dngos po brgyan rnam par bkod pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes rabs las btsems pa/ klu kun tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i zlos gar mdzad pa ni kho bo cag rnams kyi nyan pa po brgyud pa las thos te/
323a2(skyes rabs): sbyor ba dag ni mthong // de'i phyir rgyal po de nyid la gus pa dang / kho bo cag lnga rje su bzung ba'i blos sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du khyod kyi zlos gar dag byos shig ce so// de'i phyir re zhig tshon gyi bkod pa dgra byas nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhon yongasu rdzog
323a3(skyes rabs): bor bya'o// 'dud pa'i skye bo 'di dag gi yid ni kun tu tshim par gyur to zhes bya bar bdag gis 'ongs te/ gang gi phyir/ dpal ldan dga' ba snyan ngag mkhan po mkhas la 'dud pa 'di dag yon 'dzino// 'jig rten du ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid
323a4(skyes rabs): ga zlos gar bdag cag mkhas// 'dir ni dngos po re re dag kyang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'i gnas yin na/ bdag gi skal pa rgyas pas yon tan kun gyi tshogs 'dus 'di la smos ci dgos// des na re zhig khyim pa mo 'os te klu dag la gnas
323a5(skyes rabs): bar bya'o// yongasu bgrod cing phyir mngon par phyogs te bltas nas 'phags ma re zhig 'dis/ de nas gar mkhan ma ngu zhing zhugaso// mdo 'dzin pas mthong nas/ 'a phags ma klu kun tu dga' ma zhes bya ba'i zlos gar bya ba yin na ci'i
323a6(skyes rabs): don du rgyu med pa nyid ngu bar byed gar mkhan mas jo bo ji ltar mi ngu ste/ gang gi phyir re zhig yab ni yum dang 'grogs nas rgan po'i dngos pos yid byung ste/ da ni khyod kyis gnyen mtshan gyi khur dag 'dzin por brjod zhes thugs la gzhag
323b1(skyes rabs): nas dka' thub kyi nagasu gshegasaso// mdo 'dzin pas bdag kyang yongasu btang nas ji ltar yab yum nag su gshegs/ rnam par bsdams nas de nA da ni ci zhig rigs par 'gyur/ yang nA bdag bla mi'i zhabs kyi rim gro byed pa'i
323b2(skyes rabs): bde ba yongasu btang nas ji ltar khyim du 'dug par byed/ ji ltar sbyin gyi bzhin pa bzhin// dbang phyug rim pas blangs btang ste// pha mI'i srid zhu sgrub pa'i phyir// bdag kyang nagasu 'gro bar bya// song bar gyur te skabs dbye ba'o// de nas sbyin
323b3(skyes rabs): kyi bzhon pa dang / bi ng+gu Sha ka dAg zhugs te// 'dren pos/ chags pa'i gnas zhes bya bar bdag gi rig/ 'jigs ces bya bar bdag gis ma rtogs min// byA dang bya min rnam par dpyad rnams la// phyir phyogs gyur par sau la su sA ma rig
323b4(skyes rabs): pA ma'i sri zhu byed pa bdag gi ni// lang tshe dbang po'i dbang du gyur pa 'di// gnas te gus pas 'di ltar nyid gyur na// de ltar smad par 'os kyang dga' byed gyur// bi d+hA Sha kas khro ba dang bcas pa rau// kye gang gi tshe gson bzhin du shi
323b5(skyes rabs): ba'i rgan rgan 'di ltar nags na 'dug pa la 'di snyed kyi dus su sdug bsngal nyam su myong yang khyod ni yid byung bar ma gyur to// des rab tu dang bsdu da dung yang re zhig bla mi'i zhabs kyi sri zhu la chags pa lngas phyir bzlog
323b6(skyes rabs): la rgyal srid kyi bde pa nyam su myang bar byos shig/ 'dren pa nas// ji ltar yab kyi mdun sar 'dug mdzes pa de ltas seng ge'i khri la yod dam ci/ yab kyi zhabs dag nyed pa las byung bde ba de ni rgyal srid dag la yod
324a1(skyes rabs): dam ci// bla ma'i lhag ma dpyad pa'i dga' ba 'dis sa gsum spyad pa dag lnga yod dam ci// bla ma'i btang ba'i rgyal srid nges par gdung byed dag ste des nas yon tan ci zhig yod/ bi d+hA Sha kas/ bdag nyid kyis
324a2(skyes rabs): rtogs par e ma 'di ni skye bo bla ma'i sri zhu la chags pa zhig go snyam du bsams nas/ des na 'dir yang re zhig brjod par bya'o// gsal bar kye grogs po nges par rgyal srid kyi bde ba 'ba' zhig gi ched du bdag gis 'di brjod
324a3(skyes rabs): pa ma yin te/ gzhan yang khyod la bya ba dag yod pa nyid do// 'dren pas/ 'dzum dang bcas pas bya ba bdag gis byas pa nyid ma yin nam ltos shig/ rigs par 'os pa'i lam la blon po rnams sbyar dam pa rnams ni bde la
324a4(skyes rabs): bzhag de bzhin gnyen gyi skye bo bdag mtshungs nyid byas rgyal srid dag kyang bsrung bar byas// yid la reg pa las lhag 'bras ster dpag bsam shing yang slong ba rnams la byin// 'di las gzhan po'i bya ba ci zhig khyod kyi sems
324a5(skyes rabs): la gang zhig gnas pa smos// bi dU Sha kas/ kye grogs po shin tu thub chod ldan zhing nyamos par byed pa'i lha// ma btang ga 'di mthun pa'i phyogasu nye bar gnas pa la gtso bo dang gnyen dag yang dag par gnas kyang khyod med na bdag
324a6(skyes rabs): ni rgyal srid legs par mi rtog go// 'dren pas ma ma tang ga'i rgyal srid len par 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i dogs pa yod dam ci/ gal te de ltar gyur na de las cir 'gyur// bdag gi lus la sogs pa thams cad gzhan gyi don nyid
324b1(skyes rabs): du yongasu bsrungs pa ma yin nam/ gang yang rang gis ma byin pa de ni yab kyi ngor yin no// des na don med pa'i bsam pa byidas ci zhig bya/ yab kyis rjesu bstan pa nyid lhur bsgrub par bya'o// bi d+yA Sha kAs/ kye yab kyis ci
324b2(skyes rabs): zh-ig bstan/ 'dren pas/ ji ltar nyi ma mang por yongasu spyod pas dka' thub kyi nags 'di yam shing dang ku sha dang / me tog dang / nye bar mkho bya'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang stong bu dang / tsad mang ba dag ring du byas par gyur gyi/
324b3(skyes rabs): de'i phyir me lA ya'i ri la song laM bsti gnas 'ga' zhig rtogs shig/ ces yab kyis bdag la rje su bstan to// de'i phyir re zhig ma la ya nyid du 'gro'o zhes te song bar gyur to// bi d+hA Sha kas mdun du bltas nas kyi grogs po ltos
324b4(skyes rabs): shig ltos shig/ brlan dang bcas shing stug po'i tsan gyi nags kyi khrod nas yongasu bskyod pa dri bzang rgya chen pos bskos pa can ri'i ngos mi zad pa las babs pas dum bur 'gyur ba'i chu rgyun las mthor ba'i thigs pa
324b5(skyes rabs): bsil po 'dzin pa ma la ya'i rlung 'di ni des par lam gyi yongasu dub pa dag sel zhing / dang por grogs par 'dod pa'i dga' ma la mgrin pa nas bzung ba bzhin du grogs po mdza' bo la spu longs rgyas par byed pa 'dra'o// 'dren
324b6(skyes rabs): bas kun tu bltas nas a ye bdag cag gis ri ma la yar sleb par gyur to// brtags nas/ e ma 'di ni dga' bar bya ba zhig ste/ de ltar yang / dga' ldan phyogs kyi glang po 'gram pa'i ngos bdar tsan dag ni chag cing
325a1(skyes rabs): zag/ chu gter brlabs rnams rab tu bsnun pas phug dang lung pa dag ni cho nges sgrogs// grub pa'i bud med bgrod pa rnams kyi rkang pa'i skug rtsis dmar ba mu tig rdo// bsten bya ri bo ma la ya 'das bdag gi sems ni
325a2(skyes rabs): ci yang sred ldan byed/ de na tshur sheg/ 'di la 'dzegs te 'dug par 'os pa'i bsti gnas dag par bya'o// 'dzegs te mtshan ma bsal bar byas nas// bdag gi mig ni g.yas pa g.yo// 'bros bu 'dod pa 'ga' yang med// thub pa'i
325a3(skyes rabs): gsung brdzun ma yin/ 'di ni ci zhig 'chad 'gyur ke/ bi d+hu ShaM kas kye grogs po lnga dga' pa 'ga' zhig nye bar ston to// 'dren pas/ nges po rA ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin no// bi d+hu Sha kas/ kyi grogs po ltos shig ltos shig/
325a4(skyes rabs): khyad par dang bcas par sdug cing snum pa'i rkang thung gis nye bar myadzes shing / bA'i mar gyi dri'i snying po can gyi du ba drag tu 'gyur la/ ri dwags kyi tshogs 'jigs pa med cing lam du bgra ba ba te gnas pa 'di ni dka' thub kyi nags
325a5(skyes rabs): tshul bzhin du mtshon no// 'dren pas/ grogs pa yang dag par mtshon no// 'di dag ni dka' thub kyi nags tshal nyid de/ gang gi phyir/ gos kyi don du shing shun rnams bcad rtse ba nyid kyis shin tu che ba min// ril pa rnying pa chag pas mtshan
325a6(skyes rabs): ma'i chu rgyun dag ni mkha' ltar rab tu dang // 'ga' zhig dag na mun 'dza'i ska rag khye'us bcad cing dor bar gyur pa mthong // rtag tu thos pas ne tshe dag kyang rig byed tshig 'di rab tu sgrog par byed// de nas tshur sheg rab tu zhugs te/ nye bar
325b1(skyes rabs): mtshon par bya'o// rab tu zhugs te gar drag byed do// 'dren pas/ e ma thub pa'i skye bo rab tu dga' ba rnams ni rig byed kyi tshig rgyas pa la the tshom rnam par dpyod par byed la/ khye'u yi skye bo rnams ni ji ltar bsher ba bsher ba'i
325b2(skyes rabs): yam shing dag spyod cing // dka' thub pa'i gzhonu ma rnams ni ljon pa gsar pa'i kyor 'gyengs par byed pa'i dka' thub kyi nags tshul ni rab tu zhi ba dang dga' bar byed pa nyid du// 'di nyid na bung ba'i sgra yis legs par 'ongs sum
325b3(skyes rabs): zhes ni brjod pa bzhin// 'dri dag mgo ni 'bras bu dud pas 'dus pa byed pa bzhin// char rtog char ba 'thor zhing bdag la mchod yon ster bzhin// yan lag ldan pa yis kyang mgron gyi bsnyen bkur ji ltar bslobs/ de'i phyir
325b4(skyes rabs): dka' thub kyi nags tshol 'di ni 'dug par 'ongs pa shig ste/ 'dir gnas na bdag cag gi sems bde bar 'gyuraro snyam mo// bi d+hA Sha kas/ kye grogs po 'on kyang nges par ri dgas 'di dag mgrin pa cung zad bsgrogs
325b5(skyes rabs): g.yo ba med pa'i kha las cung zad zos pa'i rtsa kham nang na gnas pa zag cing rna ba gcig rab tu bslang ste btad nas mig zum pas nyan par byed pa lta bur mtshon no// 'dren pas rna gtad nas/ gnas thob rab tu gsal ba'i/
325b6(skyes rabs): gros can gdangs snyan dag gis rnam par bzhag pa 'dzin byed pa// bung bi'i sgra bzhin nges par yid 'phrog rgyud mang dag gi rgyud langs sgra dang ldan pa yis// gsal zhing rol skegs tshig ldan glu ni kun tu 'khyog pa'i lus can
326a1(skyes rabs): rI dgas 'di dag rnams// so'i bar na gnas pa rtsa'i/ dA ma ni gcod pa'i sgra drug bsdams nas nyan par byed// bI d+hA Sha kas/ kye grogs po dka' thub kyi nags che lnga 'di na su zhig glu len par byed// 'dren pas//
326a2(skyes rabs): ji ltar sor mo 'jam pa'i mdab mas mngon par bsnun pa'i rgyud mangs shin tu gsal ba ma yin par sgrogs shing glu yong snyan cing phra ba gtso bor len pa de ltar bdag rtog pa ni gnas 'di na lho dag mnyes par byed cing
326a3(skyes rabs): lha'i bud med rgyud mangs dang ldan pa'i glu ldan par byed do// bi d+h+waM ShA kas/ kye grogs po tshur sho ga/ yu 'u cig kyang lha'i gnas blta bar bya'o// 'dren pas legs par brjod de/ nges par lha ni phyag bya bar 'os pa'o// nye bar
326a4(skyes rabs): song ste 'phral lo 'dug nas grogs po gal te na skye po 'di lta ba'i mi 'os pa srid do// des na re zhig ta ma la'i grel pa 'di'i nang du 'dug ste lha lta ba'i skabs btsal bar bya'o// de ltar byas te/ de nas mA l-i ya can ma dang / 'bangs
326a5(skyes rabs): mo zhugs te swa la 'dug nas rgyud mangs sbreng bar byed do// 'dren mus glu len pa/ gau ri rab rgyus pad+ma'i ge sar gyi// dngul ltar dkar ba'i 'od can bcom ldan ma// khyod kyi bko' dri ni drag gis bdag gi ni// mngon par 'dod pa rab tu
326a6(skyes rabs): grub par 'dod// 'dren pas sna gtad nas/ e ma'o glu/ oM ma'i rol mo// 'di la gsal byed kyi dbyangs rnam pa bcu po 'dis gsal bar thob cing / myur ba dang bar ma dang dal ba'i stobs rnam pa gsum rab tu gsal bar
326b1(skyes rabs): yongasu bcad de// ba lang gI rta mA la sogs pa rnam pa gsum gyi rim pas ngal gso bar byas pa de kho na'i tshogs kyi rje su 'brang ba'i rol mo'i cho ga yang dag pa gsum bstan to// 'byangs mos/ rje'i sras mo nges par yun
326b2(skyes rabs): ring du glu dag blangs nas khyod kyi lag rtse dag yongasu ming la lam/ 'dren mas/ drung mo bcom ldan ma'i mdun du rgyud mangs sgrogs par byed pa de kho na'i tshogs kyi rje su 'brang ba'i rol mo'i cho ga yang dag pa la bdag ga la
326b3(skyes rabs): ngal// 'bongs mos smod pa dang bcas par k+ShuM brtse med mya 'di yi mdun du rgyud mangs bsgrags pas ci zhig bya zhes bdag smra'o// gang zhig 'di snyed kyi dus su skye bo gzha nu ma'i dka' thub bsnyen gnas nges pa la gnas pas
326b4(skyes rabs): bstan kyang da dung khyod la dang bar mi ston no// bi dU Sha kas thos nas/ kye grogs po 'di ni nges par gzhonu ma sto tso'i phyir mi lta/ 'dren pas skyon ci yod/ gzho nu ma lci ba ni skyon med pa nyid do// 'on kyang gal te na bdag cag
326b5(skyes rabs): mthong nas 'jigs te/ ngo tsha gzhon ma la rnyed sla bas 'dir yun ring du mi sdod pa mi sri do// des na re zhig 'khri shing gi dra ba 'dis bsgribs te blta bar bya'o// gAnyi gas po ltas so// bI d+hu ShA kas/ ya mtshan dang bcas par kye
326b6(skyes rabs): grogs po ltos shig ltos shig/ ngo mtshar ngo mtshar ro// rgyud mangs kyi rna ba'i bde ba skyed par byed 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ rnam par shes pa'i rjesu mthun pa'i gzugs 'dis mig gis yang bde ba skyed par byed do//
327a1(skyes rabs): phyir 'di su zhig yin/ ci lha mo 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ yang na rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo 'am/ yang na grub pa'i rigs las 'khrungs pa zhig go// 'dren pa rnam par blta zhing chags pa dang bcas par
327a2(skyes rabs): grogs blo 'di su zhig yin zhes bdag gis ma rtog so// bdag gi 'di tsam shes te/ gral te mtho ris bu mo yin na 'phrog byed mig stong ldan des don byas 'gyur// gal te klu mo yin na'ang 'di gdong yod tshe sa 'og zla bas
327a3(skyes rabs): stong ma yin// gal te rig 'dzin ma yin gzhan rigs las rgyal bdag cag rigs ni 'bras dang btsas// gal te grub rigs las skyes de phyir grub pa 'jig rten gsum du grogs par 'gyur// bi d+hu Sha kas 'dren pa la bltas
327a4(skyes rabs): dga' ba dang bcas shing rang gi rtogs par e ma'o// yun ring po nig nas yid srub kyi spyod yul du lhung bar gyur to// bdag nyid la smon cing / Ang na ma yin te bram the bdag gi'o// 'bongs mo s+t+waM/ mdzub pa dang bcas
