327a5(skyes rabs): bar kye bdug sgru'o// brtse med ma 'di yi mdun du rgyud mangs bsgrags pas ci zhig bya zhes te rgyud mangs bI pha nga so// 'dren mas bu mo bcom ldan ma gau ri la ma smad cig/ kye ding bcom ldan ma bka' drin mdzad pa bzhin no//
327a6(skyes rabs): 'bangs mos/ rje'i sras mo re zhig ci 'dra ba ba dag smros shig 'dren pas/ bu mo nges par deng rmi lam du bdag 'di bzhin nyid du rgyud mangs bsgreng ba la bcom ldan mas gsungs pa bu mo khyod kyi rgyud mangs bsgreng ba mkhas pa/ byad
327b1(skyes rabs): bar du 'phags pa 'di dang / bdag la thun mong ma yin pa'i gus pa bu mo'i dngos po lnga rnyed dka' ba 'dis bdag shin tu ches par gyur to// de'i phyir yun ring po ma yin pa na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bas lag pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//
327b2(skyes rabs): zheso// 'bangs mos dga' ba dang bcas par rje'i sras mo// gal te de ltar yin na rmi lam du zhes ci'i phyir brjod lha mo 'dod pa'i mchog sbyin byin pa nyid yin no// bi d+hu Sha kas/ nges par bdag cag lha mo lta ba'i skra bsu bab bo// de'i phyir
327b3(skyes rabs): tshur sheg nye bar 'gro bar bya'o zhes te nye bar btud do// bi d+hu Sha kasa?/ mi 'dod bzhin du khyer nas jo mo drung mo bdag bden par smra ste/ 'di ni mchog byin pa nyid do// 'dren mas 'dzag pa dang bcas par 'dren ma la mtshon te/ bu mo 'di su
327b4(skyes rabs): zhig ceso// 'bangasA mAM/ gzhon dang thun mong mA yin pa'i rnam pa 'di yis na// 'di nyid bcom ldan mas bka' drin mdzad pa yin nA ma snyam mo// 'dren mas chags pa dang bcas shing ngo tsha ba dang bcas par+ya blta so// 'dren pas
327b5(skyes rabs): gAyo zhing yangs pa'i mig ldan dbugs ba byin cing // 'dar zhing mkhregs sdug nu ldan 'khrul byed dam// lus 'di dka' u ba nyid kyi shin tu ni// ngal gyur slar yang ci slad gdung bar byed// 'dren mas// bu mo shin tu 'jigs pas
327b6(skyes rabs): 'di la mngon du phyogs te 'dug par mi nus zhes te/ logs bltas nas 'khod do// bai dU Sha ko sau/ jo mos khyed kyi dka' thub kyi nags tshal 'di na gang zhig mgron po 'ongs pa la tshig tsam gyis kyang phebs par smra ba ma yin pa
328a1(skyes rabs): 'di 'dra ba'i kun tu spyod pa yod dam ci/ 'bangs mos rje'i sras mo// mgron po la bsnyen bkur bya ba rigs pa yi no// de'i phyir ji ltar mthu chen po dang ldan pa 'di dag la gus par bya ba la rmongs par gnas/ yang
328a2(skyes rabs): na khyod bzhugs shig/ kho mo nyid kyis jo ltar rigs pa dag bya'o// 'dren ma la mtshon te jo bo legs par 'ongs sam/ jo bos stan yongasu gzung bas phyogs 'dre brgyan par mdzod cig/ bi dU Sha kaus/ kye grogs po 'di ni legs
328a3(skyes rabs): bar sla'o// yung tsam zhig 'dug ste ngal bso bar bya'o// 'dren pas/ khyod ni rigs par smra'o// gnyi ga 'khod do// 'dren myas kA[:]ye bzhad gad kyi byang tshul can ma de ltar ma byed/ gal te dka' thub pa 'ga' yim ma rdzo
328a4(skyes rabs): 'dri las byadagra dul bA ma yin pa dang ldan par dog par 'gyur ro// de nas dka' thub pa zhugs te/ rigs kyi bdag po kau shI kas bdag la bka' bsgos pa/ mnyes pa shin shr-I Na Di l+ya/ yab kyi bkas/ rgyaganyen gyi
328a5(skyes rabs): dbyig gzhonu sbyin gyi gzhon pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur par 'gyur pa dag ri ma la ya 'di nyid kyi 'ga' zhig na gnas pa sring mo ma la ya can gyi khyim thab kyi slad du blta ba'i phyir di ring 'ong ste/ blta zhing
328a6(skyes rabs): mau la ya can gyi nyi ma gung gi mchod sbyin gyi dus yol bar 'gyur srid do// des na de bos la shog cig ceso// des na bdag re zhig gau ri'i khang pa nyid du 'gro'o// 'gro zhing sa la rnam par bltas nas/ e ye rdul dang ldan pa'i phyogs/
328b1(skyes rabs): na rab tu gsal ba'i 'khor los mtshan pa'i rjes kyi phreng ba dag snang ba 'dra su zhig gi yin/ mdun du bltas te sprin gyi bzhon pa la nges par brtags nas 'di ni skyes bu chen po 'di yi yin nam snyamo// gzhan yang / mgro la
328b2(skyes rabs): gtsug tor 'di gsal smin ma'i bar na mdzod spu 'di ni rnam par mdzes// mig ni pad+mar rje su mthun zhing brang gdengs 'phrog byed dag la 'gran par byed// lag pa 'khor los mtshan pa ji ltar skyes bu dag ni su zhig 'di// rig pa
328b3(skyes rabs): 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i gnas dgra ma thob 'dug pa yin nam snyam/ yang ni the tshom gyis ci zhig bya ste/ shin tu gsol bar 'di ni sprin gyi bzhon pa yin par ngeso// ma lA ya can ma la bltas nas oM ye 'di yang rgyal
328b4(skyes rabs): po'i bu mo'o// gnyi ga la bltas nas gal te phan tshun rje su 'tsham pa 'di dag 'brel par byed nu byed pa po ni yun ring po zhig nA rig pa byed par gyur to// nye bar btud nas khyod dge bar gyur cig/ 'dren pas bcom ldan sprin gyi
328b5(skyes rabs): bzhon pa phyag bgyid do zhes te ldang bar 'dod do// dka' thub pas mngon par ldang mi dgos so// kye mngon 'ongs kun gyi bla ma nyid ces pas/ khyod nyid bdag cag gi bla ma yin no// des na ji ltar bde bar bzhugs shig/ ma la
328b6(skyes rabs): ya can mos/ jo bo la phyag 'tshalo// dka' thub pas de mthong nas/ rje su 'tsham pa'i bdag po'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ rgyal po'i bu mo// khyod kyi rigs kyi bdag po kau shi kas bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi mchod sbyin gyi
329a1(skyes rabs): dus yol bar 'gyur gyis myur du sho ka cig ceso// 'dren mas/ mi dga' bar bcas byar/ gang tha mas bka' stsal pa nyid do// rang gi rtogs par/ kAcig ni ma'i gsung dang gzhan// mdzab bo lta ba'i rtse dga'
329a2(skyes rabs): bzang // 'gro 'am mi 'gro 'gal ba lA/ bdag skyong chang mo lhag par 'gyur// shugs phyung shing langs te ngo che dang bcas par 'dren pa la blta zhing dka' thub pa dang cig spong bar gyur to// 'dren pas// sbed pa dang bcas par shug
329a3(skyes rabs): byung nas 'dren ma la blta zhing // tshang ri'i khyon gyi khur ldan zhing // dman bI dag tu bkro ma 'di// gzhan du 'gro yang bdag gi nI// snying la gom pa bkod par gyur// ras mos/ tsu ra sh+log tshur sheg/ rje'i sras mo zhes te/ ma
329a4(skyes rabs): \u0f7fna ma lce/ rdor dang baHsa pa spong bar gyur to// bi d+d+he / sa/ kyi ga shig ban+d+ha dAr+yA byA ba dag mthong ngo // da ni nyi ma gung gi nyi mu'i gdung ba kyis 'gyur du bzhin du dudag gis skye zab me dgu sgru sgrung byed do//
329a5(skyes rabs): 'di nas song ste/ gang gis bram ze dag gi mgron du sbyar bar bya nas thub pa'i skyo bo las dngos rnyed pa'i rtsa ba dang chu ba la sogs pas sgrog bzung bar bya'o// rkyen bAs/ steng du bltas nas/ a ye bcom ldan 'od zer
329a6(skyes rabs): stong phrag ldan ni na mkhri'i dkyil na 'dzegs te ba nug so// de ltar yang / gdung bas de dus ldan la brdar thang chus dkar ba'i 'gram pa 'dzin byed cing // rang gi rno ba bskyod pa'i rlung ni yang dag chags pas bzhin le g.yo
329b1(skyes rabs): byed pa la// lag pas gtor bri'i chu thigs snying khar khyad par du spyan glang po'i bdag po 'di// da ni bzod dka' zug rngu drag pos thug pa lta bu'i gnas skabs 'dzin par byed ces te gnyis song ngo // mtshan ma dang po'o//
329b2(skyes rabs): dode nas 'bangs mo zhugs te/ rje'i sras mo ma la ya na ma/ bdag la gsungs pa/ bu mo me tog gsarA pa can bdag gi ming po jo bo bshes gnyen gyi dbyig 'di ring yun ring du thog so// de'i phyir skyong la 'ong ngam mi 'ong rtogs shig
329b3(skyes rabs): ces so// yongasu bskyod de phyi rol du mngon par phyogs shing bltas nas/ 'di nyid nas 'ongs pa 'di su zhig yin/ nges par brtags nas ci drung mo 'am/ 'brangs mo gnyis pa yang zhugaso// dang po mas nye bar btud de/ grogs mo drung
329b4(skyes rabs): ma khyod kyang ci'i phyir mgyogs par 'gro bar byed/ gnyis pas rje'i sras mo ma la ya can mas bdag la gsungs pa/ bu mo drung mo bdag gi lus kyis me tog thu ba'i yongasu ngal pa mi bzod do// ston+da ki'u gdung bsdu byas pa bzhin
329b5(skyes rabs): du bdag yongasu gdung bas shin tu lhag par go zer bar gyur to// des na khyod song la chu shing gzho nu'i mdab mus bsgribs pas tsun 'khri shIng gi khang par zla ba chu shel gyi rdo la mal stan chas kyis shig ces so// ji lhor gsung
329b6(skyes rabs): ba bzhin du bdag gis kyang byas te/ de'i phyir song nas rje'i sras mo nyid la sbran par bya'o// dang po mas/ gal te de lta yin na myur du ched dag gyi shig/ der song na de'i gdung ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// gnyis pas brgad nas rang gi rtogs
330a1(skyes rabs): bar gang zhig 'di 'dra ba'i gdung bdag ni de ltar bus nye bar zhi bar mi 'gyuraro// rnam par bkru zhing dga' bar bya ba can 'khri shing gi khang pa mthong na de ni shin tu yang lhag par 'gyu ro zhes bdag
330a2(skyes rabs): rtog go// gsal bar grogs khyod song shig/ bdag gis kyang rdo ba'i gzhi bstar pa bdag rje'i sras mo la sbyin par bya'o zhes nas song sti 'jug par byed pa'o// de nas sred pa dang ldan pa'i ma lA ya can ma dang / 'bangs mo yang
330a3(skyes rabs): zhugaso// 'dren mas shugs nar phyung nas bdag nyid kyis rtogs par skye bo de la sems khyod kyis bdag po ches/ de ltar phyir phyogs par byas te/ da ni khyod nyid der 'gro ba'i phyir na/ oM ma khyod ni bdag nyid rgyas par byed pa
330a4(skyes rabs): zhig go/ gsal par/ bu mo bcom ldan ma'i gan su 'gro ba'i lam dog bdag la ston cog/ 'a bangs mos/ N+ye'i sras mo tsun 'khri shing gau khang par gshegs pa ma lagaso sam/ 'dren mos/ ngo tsha dang bcas par buM mo khyo
330a5(skyes rabs): kyis legs par dran par byaso// de'i phyir tshur sheg de nyid du 'gro bar bya'o// 'bangs mos/ byon cig byon cig rje'i sras mo song bar gyur to// 'dren ma gzhan du song ba na/ 'bangs mos phyir bltas nas mya ngan dang bcas
330a6(skyes rabs): bdag nyid kyi rtogs par ma 'di ni snying gis stong pa zhig ste ji ltar lha mo'i gnas de nyid du 'jug par byed do// gsal bar de na tsan 'khri shing khang pa yod pa ma yin nam/ des na 'dir byon cig/ 'dren mas/ skyengs pa'i 'drum
330b1(skyes rabs): dang bcas pAr de ltar byed do// 'brangs mos canu 'khri shing gi khang pa de ni 'di ljag so// des na nang du zhugs te zla chu shel gyi nor bu'i rdo la rje'i sras myo zhugs par mdzod cig/ 'dren mas/ de ltar byas te shugs nar phyung nas
330b2(skyes rabs): bdag nyid kyis rtogs par/ bcom ldan me tog gi mtshon dang ldan pa gang gi gzugs kyis pham par byas pa de la ci yang mi bgyid par gnod pa ma byas shing bud med du gyur pa dgra la bsnun par bgyid/ ngo tsha ba
330b3(skyes rabs): dang ma mchis sam zhes te myos pa'i gnas skabs kyi gar byed do// gsal bar nges par byas nas bu mo ci'i phyir yab mngab stug pos nyi ma'i 'od zer sgro bos pa dang ldan po'i tsan 'khri shing gi khyad pa 'di dag ding bdag
330b4(skyes rabs): gdung ba'i sdug bsngal skyel bar mi byed/ 'bangs myos 'dzu mau dang bcas par gdung ba'i rgyu ni bdug gis shos te/ 'on kya nga rje'i sras mo/ bdag la thugs mi che bas khA sA len par myi 'gyu ro// 'dren mas/ bdag nyid
330b5(skyes rabs): kyis rtogs par 'dis tshon yang ro zhog dri bar bya'o// gsal bar/ bu mo re zhig de dag gici/ de'i rgyu ci yin pa dag smros shig/ 'bangs mos/ rje'i sras mo 'di ni khyod kyi snying po la 'dod pa'i mchog/ 'dren mas rtags
330b6(skyes rabs): pa dang bcas shing dga' ba dang bcas par langs te/ mdun du gom pa gnyis gsum song nas de gang na gang ni/ 'bangs mos langs te/ 'dzum pa dang bcas rje'i sras mo lags/ 'dren mas ngo tsha dang bcas pas
331a1(skyes rabs): 'dug ste kha 'og tu bltas nas 'khod do// 'bangs mos rje'i sras mo bdag ni 'di skad brjod par 'dod de/ 'di ni khyod kyi snying la 'dod pa'i mchog gdung ba'i rgyu yin pa gang gis na can 'khri shIng gri khang pa rang bzhin
331a2(skyes rabs): sa bsal ba yang khyod kyi gdung ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mi nuso// 'dren mas dga' drang bcas par 'bangs mo la 'khyud nas/ bu mo drung mo khyod ni nges par drung mo ste/ gzhan pa ci zhig dri bar bya/ des na smros shig/ 'bangs mo
331a3(skyes rabs): 'i sras mo da lta nyid khyod la smras pa yin no// des na mchog lta bas byas pa'i gdung ba 'dis re zhig gdung bar ma byed cig/ gal te bdag bdag drung mo yin pa pa/ de lta na de yang rje'i sras mo mthing ba med par yud tsam yang
331a4(skyes rabs): gzhan du mngon par dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di yang bdag gis shes pa nyid// 'dren mas mchi ma dang bcas par bu mo de lta bu'i skal bA bdag la ga lA yod/ 'bangs mos rje'i sbas mo de skad ce la gsungs// khyab 'jug gi
331a5(skyes rabs): byang gi gzhi lnga dpal mo 'dzin pa yang bde bar ji ltar 'gyur// 'dren mas/ skye bo legs pa dag snyan pa byor nas/ gzhan smra bar byed dam+b+ha tsi/ bu mo bdag gi gdung ba 'dri bas kyang 'di shin tu lhag par gzir pa ste/ gang gzi byin
331a6(skyes rabs): chen po de la tshig tsam gyis kyang dga' bar ma byas pa bdag tshul dang mthun pa ma yin par mkhyen to zhes ngus so// 'bangs mos mchi ma dang bcas par rje'i sras mo bshums shing / langs nas yal mdab blangs nas
331b1(skyes rabs): btsir te khu ba snying khar byug so// rje'i sras mo// bdug smra/ mA shums shig/ nu ma'i ngos la byugs pa'i tsan yal mdab kyi thang chu 'di ni nges par rgyun chad med par 'babs pa mchi mA'i thigs pa 'di dag gis dro bar byas
331b2(skyes rabs): bas khyod kyi snying kha'i gdung bA mi sil lo zhes te rlu shing gi mdab ma drug gis g.yel bar byed// 'dren mas+dza/ lhag pas bzlog cing / bu mo ma g.yob chu shing gri 'dab ma'i rlung 'di ni shin tu tsha'o// 'bangs mos rje yi sras
331b3(skyes rabs): mo 'di yi skyon du ma byed cig/ 'di ltar snun zhing sdug pa'i tsan dAn 'khri shing yal mdabu dang 'gyogs pa chu shing gi mngag ma'i rlung 'di shin tu bsil yang khyed nyid kyi dbugs kyis tsha bar bya'o// 'dren mas mchi ma dang bcos
331b4(skyes rabs): bar bu sdug bsngal 'di nye bar zhi ba'i thabs 'ga' zhig yodang+ga dam/ 'bangs mos rje'i skyes mImAM gal te de nyid 'dir 'ongs nas yod pa nyid do// de nas 'dren mo dang / bi d+hA Sh+Ta kra dgra zhug so// 'dren pas/ phyir dkar dang dkar min
331b5(skyes rabs): mig gi bId kyi bsti gnas shing de rnams// ya wa ga la chags ri dgas lpags phyi'i tshogs kyis sgrog pa bzhin byed cing // thub pa'i sngon du bdag la bltas pa gang de nyid kyis bdag ni becom gyur na// me tog ma dang
331b6(skyes rabs): can khyod kyi don med mnga' 'di dag ni ci smad 'phen par byed// bi dU Sha kas/ kye grogs po nges par khyod kyi brtan pa gang du song / 'dren pas/ grogs po bdag la brtan pa yod pa nyid ma yin nam/ gang phyir/ zla bas
332a1(skyes rabs): dag pa'i mtshan bzlas min namra ci zhig ut+pal sngon po ma bsnams sam+ba// rab rgyus d+hU tibi me tog dri ldang srod lnga'i rlung dag bzod pa min nam ci// pad tshul sbrang rtsi byed pa 'dir dir sgra ci
332a2(skyes rabs): zhig bdag gis mnyan num// gdung ba dag gis gnod med bdag la mi brtan pa zhes gang gis khyod rjod byed// yang na grogs po A tra'i rigs bdag gis yang dag par ma brjod do// lus med kyis 'phangs pa
332a3(skyes rabs): me tog gi mda' ni bud med snying gis kyang bzod pa ma yin nam/ gang gis na de ring khyod kyis mdun du bdag gis brtan pa yin no zhes brjod par bya/ bI d+hASha kas/ bdag nyid kyis rtogs par 'di ltar bstan pa med
332a4(skyes rabs): pa nyid du yang khas len cing / 'dis snying la gdung ba chen po gnas pa dag gsal bar byed do// deng bdag gis rmi lam du shes pa ni dga' ma'i mchog de nyid 'dzub mos des na re zhig ji ltar yang 'di g.yeng bar bya'o// gsal
332a5(skyes rabs): bar kye grogs po dang khyod bla ma'i bsnyen bkur myur ba nyid du byas nas ci'i slad du 'dir 'ongs/ 'dren pas/ grogs po gnas pa dag dris te gzhan su zhig la 'di smra bar bya/ ding bdag gis rmi lam du shes pa ni dga' ma'i
332a6(skyes rabs): mchog de nyid 'dzub mos ston cing tsan dan 'khri shing gis khang par zla ba chu shel gyi stan 'di la 'dug nas mdza' bas khros te/ bdeg la 'ga' zhig smod bzhin du ngu zhing 'dug pa bdag mthong ngo // des na rmi lam du dga'
332b1(skyes rabs): dga' ma dang 'grog pa'i dga' ba nyam su mong bar gyur pa'i gnas 'di nyid du nyi ma bskyal bar 'dod do// de'i phyir tshur sheg de nyid du 'gro bar bya'o zhes te song ngo // 'bangs mos ring ba dang bcas thos nas rje'i sras mo rkang pa'i
332b2(skyes rabs): sgra 'dra ba dag thos so// 'dren mas ring ba dang bcas par bdag nyid la blta zhing / bu mo bdag gi spyod pa 'di 'dra ba 'dri mthong nas 'ga' zhig gis bdag gi sems rigs par 'gyu ro// des na shing mya ngan med par dmar po'i
332b3(skyes rabs): khrod 'dir 'dug ste/ 'di dag su zhig yin blta bar bya'o// de bzhin du byaso// bi drA Sha kras/ 'di ni tsan dan 'khri shing gi khang pa ste/ des na 'jug par bya'o// gar gyis rab tu zhugs par gyur to// 'dren pas tsan+da dan 'khri shing
332b4(skyes rabs): dag gi khang+ga pa ni// zla ba nor bu'i rdo dang ldan mod kyang // zla bzhin mA bral 'di la bdag mi dga'// zla 'od dang b+hal mtshan mo'i sgo bzhin no// 'bangs mos mthong nas rje'i sras mo dga' bar 'phel bAr mdzod cig/ khyod kyi snying
332b5(skyes rabs): sdug de ni 'di nyid do// 'dren mas mthong nas dga' ba dang bcas shing rtabs pa dang bcas par bu mo 'di mthong bar shin tu 'jigs pa'i phyir/ 'di dang shin tu nye bar 'dug mi bzod do// gal te na 'dis bdag mthong bar gyur/
332b6(skyes rabs): tote// des na tshur shig bzhin du 'gro'o// byin pa 'dar ba dang bcas par rkang pa bkod nas/ bu mo/ bdag gi byin pa dag 'dar ro// 'bangs mos rgad nas/ shin tu skrag ma 'dir 'khod kyang khyod su zhig gis mthong / shing mya
333a1(skyes rabs): ngan med pa dmar po'i khrod na gnas pa dag rjed dAm/ dres na 'di nyid du 'khod la 'dug cig/ de ltar byas so// bi d+hA Sha kas/ brtags nas kye grogs po zla ba nor bu'i rdo 'am de 'di yin num/ 'dren mus
333a2(skyes rabs): mchi mig dang bcas par shugs rings phyung ngo // 'bangs mos rje'i sras me 'di 'di zhes pa'i gtam dag thos so// des na nges por brtags la mnyen par bya'o// de bzhin byas/ bi d+hu Sh+Ta kas/ lag pa bskyod cing / kye grogs po zla
333a3(skyes rabs): ba nor bu'i rdo 'am de 'di yin nam byas na/ 'dren pas/ yang dag par mtshon cing lag pas bstan nas/ lag g.yon yal mad pa dag la rnam par dkar po'i gdong pa bzhog nas ni// shugs ring sdug 'byin yid la khro ba
333a4(skyes rabs): nges byas smin ma dag/ cung zad bskyod cing yun rings thogs pa bdag la bsam pa gsal byas pa'i// dga' ma gang du bdag gis mthong ba'i zla ba nor bu'i rdo 'di'o// de'i phyir zla ba nor bu'i rdo 'di nyid lo 'dug par bya'o// byi
333a5(skyes rabs): dU Sha kr-is/ gang khyod gsung pa'o// gnyi ga nye bar 'khod do// 'dren mas bsams nas/ 'di sems par byed pa de su zhig yin/ 'bangs myos/ rje'i sras mo ji ltar yu bu cag gis bsgribs nas 'di dag mthong ba de bzhin du/ khyod
333a6(skyes rabs): kyang 'di dag gis mthong ba yin pa srid do// 'dren mas/ 'di ni rigs te/ 'on kyang mdza' bas khro ba'i dga' ma'i skye bo snying la byas nas rjod par byed do// 'bangs mos/ 'di 'dra ba'i dogs pa ma byed cig/ da dung re zhig mnyan par
333b1(skyes rabs): bya'o// bI d+hA Sha kAs+ya/ bdag nyid kyis rtogs par 'di yi gtam 'di ni mngon par dga'o// des na 'di nyid 'phel du gzhug par bya'o// gsal bar/ kye grogs po de nas ngu ba dang bcas pa de la khyod ci zhig smras/ 'dren mas grogs
333b2(skyes rabs): po bdag gis 'di skad brjod de/ zla ba chu shel rdo dag ni// mchi ma'i chu yis dran pa 'di// khyod kyi bzhin gyi zla ba dag/ shwar pa 'di yis khu ba bzhin// 'dren mas/ khro ba dang bcas par drung mo 'di las kyang gzhan mnyan par bya ba
333b3(skyes rabs): yod dam/ mchi ma dang bcas par tshur sheg 'gro bar bya'o// 'bangs mos rje'i sras mo de ltar ma sems shig/ gang gis khyod mthong ba des gzhan su yang brjod do zhes bya ba la bdag yid mi che so// des na gtam gyo mthar
333b4(skyes rabs): thug pa re zhig brtags par bya'o// 'dren pas grags po rdo ba'i gzhi 'di la de nyid bris te/ ri mor gyur pa de dang bdag nyid rtse zhing 'dug par bya snyam mo// des ni ri'i ngos 'di nyid nAs/ ldong ros kyi dum bu dag ldong la sheg
333b5(skyes rabs): cig/ grogs pos gang khyod gsung ba'o// de ltar byas nas/ kye khyod kyis kha dog tsog long zhes gsungs nas/ bdag gis ni ri 'di las rnyed sla ba'i chen kha dog lnga yang blangs te mchis so// des na legs par bris shig
333b6(skyes rabs): ces te gtad do// 'dren pos grogs po legs par byas so// blangs nas mngon par bris te spu longs dang ldan par grogs po ltos shig ltos shig/ ma nyams bim+ba ltar mdzes mchu// mig gi dga' ston dga' ma yi//
334a1(skyes rabs): bzhin ras ri bong can gyi bzhin// dang pos mthong 'dis sems dga' byed briso// bi d+hu Sha kas/ ya mtshan dang bcas par 'dri ni ya mtshan che ste/ kye grogs po mngon sum du gyur pa mA yin
334a2(skyes rabs): yang de ltar mngon par 'bri ba ni ya mtshan che'o// 'dren pas 'dzum pa dang bcas par// dgo' me 'di yang kun rtog la// gnas pa dag ni nye ba nyid// de bltas bltas shing 'bri ba gang // 'di la yi mtshan ci zhig
334a3(skyes rabs): yod// 'dren pas/ shugs rings phyung zhing mchi ma dang bcas par gu mos par gtam gyi mjug tu gyur to// des na tshur shog/ re zhig jo bo bshes gnyen gyis kyang blta bar bya'o// 'bangs mos yid dbyung ba
334a4(skyes rabs): dung bcas shing rang gis par 'di yaM ga tam+b+ha ni srog la yang ltos pa med pa bzhin no// gsal bar NI yi sras mo der me tog sArA pa can song bA ma yin nA ma/ des na galpa taM dzu bo bo shes gnyen gyi dbyig 'di nyid du
334a5(skyes rabs): 'ong ba srid do// de nas bshes gnyen gyi dbyig zhugs par gyur to// yab kyis bdag la bka' sprulnga pa/ bu bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gzhonu sprin gyi bzhon pa bdag gis yongasu brtag pa byas te 'odi nyid na nye bar
334a6(skyes rabs): gnaso// 'di ni bdag cag gi mag par 'os pa yin pas/ de la bu mo ma la ya can ma sbyin par gyis shig/ bdag ni byams pa'i dbang du gyur pas gzhan pa'i gnas skabs 'ga' zhig kyang sems par byed de
334b1(skyes rabs): gang gi phyir/ gang zhig rigs 'dzin rgyal rigs thigs le shes rab dum pa'i 'dod pa dag dang ldan// gzugs ni zla yod ma yin pha rol gnon pa'i nor ldan mkhas shing dul la gzhon/ gang yang snying rjes sems can don la mngon
334b2(skyes rabs): sbyor srog kyang kun tu gtong bas des// de lnga mtshungs med sring mo sbyin la dga' ba dang ni chags bral dang yang ldan// ji ltar sprin gyis bzhon pa 'di gi ri bsti gnas dang nye ba tsAn 'khri shing khang pa 'di nyid na gnaso zhes bya ba
334b3(skyes rabs): yod bdag gis thos so// des na tsan 'khri shing khang pa 'di nyid du 'gro bar bya'o// bltas nas zhugs te gar byed do// bi d+hu Sha kas/ rings pa dang bcas par mthong nas kye grogs po mu shing gi 'dra ba ma 'dis ri mor gyur pa 'di
334b4(skyes rabs): bsgribs cig/ grub pa'i rgyu la tshab bshes gnyen gyi 'di 'dir nges par 'ong ste/ gal te na mthong bar 'gyuraro// 'dren po de ltar byed do// bshes gnyen gyi dbyig nye bar btud nas gzhonu bshes gnyen gyi dbyig phyag bgyid//

341b3(skyes rabs): par gyur to// 'dren pas bltas nas mig 'og tu ster zhing smras pa dag la kun tu smra bor byed// mA la stan+da dag la bzlog nas 'khod cing stobs kyi 'khyud pa dag la 'dar bar byed// grogs po rnams ni phyir song tshon
341b4(skyes rabs): gnas gang ga las 'thon pa nyid du 'dod// mi mthun nyid kyis di ring bag sar dga' ma bdag gis shin tu dga' slad 'gyur// ma la ya can mA la blta zhing dga' ma ma lA ya can ma hUM zhes ster byid drag gis
341b5(skyes rabs): so so'i tshig la sgra bcad sten pa gang yin dang / sus 'di zla bo nags me 'bar bya lta bus gdung bar gyur pa gang yin pa dang // nyin mtshan shin tu mang bar yid gzhan med par bsams pa ga yin dka'
341b6(skyes rabs): thub de'i// 'bras bu gang dag da ltar dga' ma khyod kyi bzhin 'di lta bu 'di nyid do// 'dren mas bsgribs te bu mo gzugs bzang ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ nges par snyan pa smra ba yang shes pa zhig go// 'bangs mos
342a1(skyes rabs): brgad nas a I mdza' bo'i phyogasu lhung ma 'di ni bden pa nyid de/ 'di la snyan par smra bar ci zhig yod/ 'dren pas/ drung mo skyed mos tshal me tog gi 'byung gnas kyi lam drag ston cig 'bangs
342a2(skyes rabs): mos jo bo tshur sheg tshur shAg 'dren pas 'gro zhing 'dren ma la mtshon te/ khyod dal bus dal bur shog tsog/ nu ma'i khur nyid khyod kyi rkeng pa dal slad gyur na do shal gzhan gyis ci// byin pa zung ni tshad ra'i khur gyi gdung
342a3(skyes rabs): bar byed na dril chung 'dis kyang ci// rkang gnyis dag gis byin pa zung ni khur nus mon na rkang gdub ga la zhig/ rang lus nyid kyis brgyan pa khyod ni nyon mongs slad du rgyan dag ci la mdzad// 'bangs mos 'di ni skyed mos
342a4(skyes rabs): tshal me tog gi 'byung gnas te/ jo bo zhugs shig/ thams cad du zhugs par gyur to// zhugs nas 'dren pas e ma skyed mos tshal me tog gi 'byung gnas kyi dpal ni 'di nyid na'o// 'khri shing khang bzangs bkod pa
342a5(skyes rabs): byas mthar tsan dan dag las zag pa rnams kyis bsal bar byed// rgyan gyi khang pa dag dang nye bar mgrin sngon rnams kyi sgro ni gsal bar rje su sgrogs// 'khrul 'khor gyi btang chu yi tshogs ni me tog rdul dag babs
342a6(skyes rabs): por gyur pa'i tshogs pa rnams// rol par khyed pas ser ba 'di dag yal ga can gyi kyo ra 'gyengs shing mgyogs par 'bab// gzhan yang 'khri shing khang bzangs gzhi glu yi rtsom pas mu chor du byed cing // me tog
342b1(skyes rabs): rdul gyis gsal bar dga' ston rtags gis ni reg gyur te// lhan cig spyod pa dang 'grogs sbrang rtsi'i ro ni rdzogs par 'thung byed pa'i// bud pa 'di dag kun nas chang 'thung longs spyod nyamasu byed pa bzhin// bi d+hu ShaShA kas
342b2(skyes rabs): skyes pa khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/ bu mo khyod shis par gyur cig/ 'dren pas/ grogs po de tsam gyis dus su gang du 'dug/ bau d+hA ShA kas/ grogs po de tsam bdug ni mgyogs pa nyid du 'ongs te/ 'on kyang bag ma'i dag
342b3(skyes rabs): ston la 'dus pa grub pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i chang 'thung rnams lta ba'i dge mtshan la 'di snyed kyi dus su bdag 'dug par gyur to// des na grogs po yang re zhig gzigs shig/ 'dren pas blta zhing ji ltar khyod
342b4(skyes rabs): ts+tshed pA bzhin no// ha ri tsan dan gyis byugs lus can lha'i me tog phreng ba rab tu 'dzin// nor bu'i rgyun gyi 'od dag reg pas dang zhing bkra bar byas pa gos dang ldan// grub pa skye bo dag dang lhan cig spel byar gyur pa'i rig
342b5(skyes rabs): 'dzin 'di dag rnams// tsan+da dan grib bsil dag la dga' ma'i 'thungs lhag tu gyur chang dgra 'thung bar byed// des na tshur sheg yu bu cug kyang shing ta ma lI'i bsti gran su 'gro bar bya'o// yongasu song ngo // bi d+yA Sha
342b6(skyes rabs): kas/ 'di ni nges par shing ta ma la'i gnas so// bu mo bzhin 'di ni ston ka'i chad pa dag gis yongasu nyams par byas pa bzhin mtshan to// des na shel gyi rdo'i gzhi 'di nyid la nye bar 'dug cig/ 'dren paso//
343a1(skyes rabs): grogs po yang dag mtshon no// dga' ma'i gdong 'di 'gram pa dag/ mdzes pas zla ba pham byas nas// gdung bas mngon par dmar ba'i mig/ pad+mo dag las rgyal 'dod bzhin// ma la ya can ma'i lag pa bzung nas
343a2(skyes rabs): dga' ma 'dir 'dug cig/ thams cad 'khod do// 'dren pas/ 'dren ma'i gdong bstegs nas blta zhing / bdag cag skyed mos tshal me tig gi 'byung gnas don med par lta ba'i dge mtshan can rnams kyi khyod yongasu ngal bar byas te/ rang gi phyir/ smim//
343a3(skyes rabs): mami'i 'khri shing rab mdzes shig/ mchu yi yal 'dab dmar po can// bzhin 'di dga' ba'i skyed tshal te// 'di las gzhan pa nags 'ba' zhig/ 'bangs mos/ 'dzum pa dang bcas par bi dA Sha ka la mtshon nas khyed kyi rje'i sras mo'i gdong ji ltar
343a4(skyes rabs): sngags pa thos ma/ bi d+hA Sha klas drung ma de lta bu'i khengs pa 'dzin par ma byed cig/ 'dzum po dang btsas par bdag gi nang na yang skye bo lta bar 'os pa ni yod pa nyid// phrag dog 'ba' zhig su yang bsngags par mi byado// 'a bangs mos 'dzum pA dang
343a5(skyes rabs): bcas par jo bo khyod bdag gis sngags par bgyi'o// bi drA Sha kas/ dag ba dang bcas par 'tsho ba dag tu bya so// bu mo khyod kyi gang gis na slar yang 'ga' zhig gis bdag la ji ltar khyod ni 'di ltar spre'u ser skya'o zhes mi brjod pa de ltar bka' drin
343a6(skyes rabs): mdzod ceg/ 'bang so mos/ bag ma la gnyid ma log khyod do rang gnye du 'gro zhing mig zum pa dang ldan pa mdzes par bdag gis mtho // des na de ltar nyi du 'dug cig/ bi dU Shakas de ltar byaso// 'bangs mos ri zhig shing ta ma li'i yal mdab kyi ba
343b1(skyes rabs): rims kyi khu ba'i rje su mthun pa dag gis 'di'i bzhin nag por byaso// langs nas yal mdab blangs te 'chir bar gar byeda'o// 'dren pa dang / 'dren mas bid+yA Sha ka mthong bar gyur to// 'dren pas grogs po bdag cag rnams gnas pa la
343b2(skyes rabs): khyod nyid kha sbyar ba ni skal ba dang ldan pa'o// 'bangs mos shing ta mo la'i yA la ma dab kyi thang chus hrI d+hA Sha ka'i bzhin nag por byaso// 'dren mas 'dzum pa dang btsos pas bid+yA Sha ka mthong nas 'dren pa la blta'o// 'dren pas 'dzum pa'i me tog rgyas
343b3(skyes rabs): bi 'di// khyod chu'i yal mdabu dag la mthong // 'bras bu lta byed bdag gi nI mig la smano migra mdze saM ma bi d+hA Sha kAs/ bu mo khyod kyi tso zhig byas/ 'brangs mos/ kye bsngags pa byaso/ bi d+yA Sha kas/ lag pa gdong la byugs te/ lag pa la bltas
343b4(skyes rabs): nas khro bo dang bcas pas shing gi dbyug pa 'phyar te/ 'bangs mo'i bu mo 'di rgyal po'i khab yin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ 'dren pa la mtshon na gyi khyod kyi mdun nyid du bdage 'bas kyi bu mos smra phab bo// des na bdag 'dir 'dug ste ci zhig bya/ gzhan du
343b5(skyes rabs): 'gro bar bya'o// song bar gyur to// 'byangs myos nges par jo bo bdag la khros pas/ re zhig song la 'di dang bar bya'o// 'dren mas bu mo drung lho bdag gcig pu dor nas khyod gang du 'gro/ 'brangs mos 'dren ma la mtshon nas 'dzum po dang bcas
343b6(skyes rabs): bas khyod gcig pu nyid yun ring du 'ong ba shog cig/ song bar gyur to// 'dren pas/ nyin byed zer gyi reg pas yongasuM dmar ba'i mdzes pa 'dzin byed cing // rab 'phro so yi 'od zer rnams kyi ge sar dag ni gsal bar byas/ a ye mdzes ma khyod
344a1(skyes rabs): kyi bzhin 'di bden par pad+mo dang mtshungs te/ khyon krung 'di la sbrang rtsi byed pa 'byung zhing rnam par spyod pa med// 'dren mas brgad nas gdong dung par gyur to// 'dren pas de nyid brjod do// de nas 'bangs mos zhugs te/ 'phral
344a2(skyes rabs): la nye bar btud nas nges pa'i rgyul che ba bshes gnyen gyi dbyug 'di don gyi bzhin du gzhonu lta bya la 'ongs par gyur to// 'dren pas/ dga' ma khyod bdag nyid kyi khang par stong zhug/ bdag kyang bshes gnyen gyi dbyig bltas nas myur du 'odra ba nyid// 'dren
344a3(skyes rabs): ma 'bangs mAM dang 'grogs te song bar gyur to// de nas bshes gnyen gyi dbyig rib tu zhugaso// nus dang ldan lo dri ma bcom// sprin gyi bzhon pa dag la ni// khyod kyi rgyal srid dgras khyer zhes// ngo tsha med bdag ji ltar gleng // de lta med kyi ma brjod par

344b1(skyes rabs): byas te bgrod pa'i gzhal yas khang dag kun nus rab 'dud pas// dbyar bzhin nyi ma'i 'od zer sgrib cing nyin par dag ni nags pa nyid du byed pa yi// grub pa 'di rnams khyod kyi gsung dag thob na 'di nas phral du g.yul la 'gro
344b2(skyes rabs): byed cing // 'phyar ba'i sgra brlag 'jig bcas rgyal po'i tshogs 'dud khyod kyi rgyal srid rang gir 'grub par 'gyur// yang na dpung gi tshogs kyi ci zhig bya// drag tu nges par phyung ba ral gri'i 'od zer tshogs kyis ni// ral pa'i tshogs kyi mdzes par

344b4(skyes rabs): mngon par brjod// yang na re zhig 'di skad ces gsal bar 'dzum pa dang bcas te bshes gnyen gyi dbyig de dag ci/ dpung pa'i stobs dang ldan pa khyod la 'di las shin tu lhag pa dag kyang yod// 'on kyang gzhan gyi don du rang gi lus dag kyang

344b6(skyes rabs): dga' bar bya bar 'dod pa de lta na nyon mongs pas 'bangasu byaso pa'i dung ba can 'di la rje su brtse bar byos shig kha shes gnyen gyi dbyig gis khro bar rgod pa dang bcas par ji zhig ltar 'di bdag cag la phan par byed pa 'am/ 'phongs
345a1(skyes rabs): ba yin pas rdza su brtse ba ji ltar mi byed/ 'dren pas bsgribs te gsar pib+h+ri khro bsu 'phangs pa'i snyoms dang ldan pa'i 'di re zhig bzlog par mi nus te/ de na re zhig 'di skad ces/ gsal bar bshes gnyen dbyig longs
345a2(skyes rabs): shig/ nang du 'jug par bya ste/ de nyid du khyod la rtog spro bar bya'o// nub kyi phyogasu bltas na ji ltar nyin par yang yongasu gyur te// de ltar yang+ga da ni bcom ldan 'od zer stong phrag can 'di ni// mtshan mo med par gnyid kyi rgyu yis bAcing sA pa'i
345a3(skyes rabs): gtu ba sil zhing pad+mo'i mdzod de dag las/ rab mchog rang gi zer gyi phyogasu 'gyongs bya ba gcig pus thams cad ma lus tshim byed pa// rgyun du bstod pa'i mu tshor ba ni ldan grub pa rnams kyi bltas pa gang gi ngal dub ni// gzhan pa na r+m+ma ny-idadu gyur nyi ma gcig

345a5(skyes rabs): gyur pa// dga' bas ga rU pa dge ni khrims lugs kyi// gnas dang gnasu 'gyel pa slang byed cing // spyod pa thaMd mi bdag rje su mthun// sgo srungs kyis kye jo bo khyod gang du gshig ste// nyug rum pas/ lha mo bshes gnyen dbyig gi yum gyi bdag la gsungs

345b3(skyes rabs): gcig gi sgron mi'i dga' ston 'di la ma la ya can ma dang / mag pa lnga yang 'ongs nas dga' ston de la 'os pa rnams cung zad nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zheso// des jo bo rgyal po'i nu mo'i mngon du song zhig/ bdag kyang bshes gnyen dbyig bod pa'i slad

346a1(skyes rabs): t+yA sgrogs byed pa// thos pa'i lam 'gogs sgra 'di ji ltar drag tu sgrogs par byed pa de blta bar// rab 'phar grangs med dung dang ldan+da bi'i rlabs 'di dag nI nye bar 'ongs bu 'dra// ba shes gnyen gyi dbyig gis/ gzhon byung ba nyid
346a2(skyes rabs): yin ma ltos shI ga/ l-i shi'i yul ma ba dag ni zos gyur pa'i// lag wAn chu srin drigs pa'i dri bzang s+yA kyi// chu dang ldan pa rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs ljidi// rin+da tshun 'od zer dag giswA smras te mdzes// 'dren pas/ khashes gnyen gyi dbyig sngon gyi
346a3(skyes rabs): dus kyi chu 'dzin ni// dkar ba'i sgrib byed kyi sgribs pa/ mA~M l+yA yA'i rtse mo 'di// grangs can+da re rtsa'i dpal dgra 'dzin// ba shes gnyen gyi dbyig gis// gzhonu 'di dag ni rI ma la ya'i rtse mo ma yi ni te/ nges par 'di dag ni klu rnams kyi rus pa'i tshog so// sprin gyi bzhon

346a6(skyes rabs): klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas bya khyung la smras pa/ sprin gyi bzhon pas gus pa dang bcas par dang por nga zos zhig ces pa'am ci kha shes gnyen gyi dbyig ma yino// sprin gyi bzhon pos smad pa dang bcas par gzhon ci/ bshes gnyen gyi dbyig 'di brjod// khyod
346b1(skyes rabs): kyi mngon par 'debs pus smyu gu nam+b+ha lag 'gro ma stong phrag rnams kyi mahA la ltung bar byed cing phyugu rnams kyang lbu bu nye bar 'gro'o// de ltar bdag gi rgyun chad par gyur na khyod nyid kyi rang gi don nyamus par 'gyuraro// des na gang gi don du khyod sa thog tu
346b2(skyes rabs): mngon par 'babs pa de'i don du nyi ma sor rgya mtsho'i 'gram nA gnas pa la re nga nyid kyis bskul te gting bar bya'o zhes sprin gyi bzhon pas sdug pa de ltar ku'i rgyal pos kyi rnams legs par bsrungs lho// gang gi lci ni stong phrag gnyid nad no// gang gis
346b3(skyes rabs): sbrul gcig bsrung ba'i phyir sbrul dag la// ding bdag bdag nyid ster zhes smra ba yi// lce de de lnga gcig kyang med dam ci// bshes gnyen gyi dbyig gis// de dag kyang bya'i rgyal pos khas blang so// de ltar nyi ma sau re re rnams bzhag sgribs gyur pa'i// glang zhig sprul/

346b5(skyes rabs): pa mi gzo rnam par 'jig/ lus ngan dag gi ched du yang // rmongs pa dag/ ni sdig pa byed// kye ma klu rnams kyi rgud pu 'di ni mthar thug pu me do// bdag nyid kyi rtogs par rang gi lus yongasu btang bras gdengs can gcig tsam yang bdag gi yong su

347a6(skyes rabs): ma ma 'di ltar shin tu smre sngags 'dod cing bdag rab tu gdung bar byes rgan mos nges par brtags nas/ bu'i lus la reg cing / kye hud bu sdug khyod kyi lus nyi ma mthong bas shin tu gzhon pa 'di ji ltar na snying la brtse ba med pa'i mkha' lding gi nges
347b1(skyes rabs): bar za bar 'gyur/ 'grin pa nas bzung ste ngu bar byedo// dung gi gtsug gis yum smre sngags kyi ci zhig phan ltos shig/ dang po gang tshe skyes pa na// mi rtag nyid kyi pang du byed// mA yis phyis nas ma mas bzhin// de tshe mya ngan rim pa ci// rgan mos bu sdug yud tsam
347b2(skyes rabs): zhig 'dug dang / re zhig khyod kyi bzhin blta bar bya'o// ni ra sa tshur shog tshur shog// gzhonu dung gi gtsug// de dag brjod pas khyod la ci// nges par bu la chags pas rmongs pa 'od dag gis ni rgyal po'i bya ba mi she so// dung gi gtsug gis bzang po 'ong ba 'di nyid do// king+ka
347b3(skyes rabs): a pA ga nyid kyis rtogs par nges par bdag gi dung gi gtsug gsod pa'i rdo dang nyaM bar khrid zin to// de zhig gsod pa'i rnags 'di byin te ga sod pa'i rdo bdag bstan par bya'o// sprin+da gyi bzhon pos mthong nas/ a ye 'di ni budad+ma me// dung gi gtsug mthong nas nges
347b4(skyes rabs): 'di ni 'di'i bu yin par rtags par bya'o// des na nges par ci'i don du ngu bar byed/ kun tu bltas nas nges par 'jigs pa'i rgyu ni ci yang mi mthong ngo // des no 'di'i 'jigs pa gang las 'byung bar 'gyur// ci zhig nye bar btud nas dri bar bya'o// yang
347b5(skyes rabs): na'adi ni 'di ltar rgyun du cho nge 'don pas gA la tI 'di nyid las gsal bar 'gyuro// de so na yul 'dab can gyi sgribs te mnyan par bya'o// king+kA ras mAchi ma dang bcas par thal mo sbyar gzhon dung gi gtsug 'di ni nges par dzA bo'i bka' yin no// zhes bya
347b6(skyes rabs): ste/ mi bzad pa dang 'dra ba dag smra'o// dung gi gtsug gis bzang po smros shig/ king+ka ras klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyis khyod la bka' stsal to// dung gi gtsug gis gus pa dang bcos par spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas rje yis ci zhig bka' stsal/ king+ka ras gos
348a1(skyes rabs): dmar po zung 'di dag gyon la gsod pa'i rdo la 'dzegs shig/ gang gis gos dmar po'i rtags kyis nye bar mtshon pa dag mkha' lding gis bzung nas zas kyi don du 'khyer blar 'gyuraro/
348a2(skyes rabs): sprin gyi bzhon pas mchi ma dang bcas pa 'di nyid sdug pa nor rgyas kyis yongs su btang ba zhig go/ king+ga ras/ dung gi gtsug 'di lo cig/ gros zung dag gtad do// dung gi gtsug gi gus pa
348a3(skyes rabs): dang bcas par blangs te/ mgo la bzung nas rje la gus par byed do// rgan mos bu'i lag na gos dag 'dug pa mthong na brang brdung ba dang bcas par kyi hud gnyen bshes gang gis 'jigs pa rdo rje lcang
348a4(skyes rabs): ba 'di nyid do// brgyal bar gyur to// kaung+gi ras nges par mkha' lding 'ong ba'i dus la nye bar gyur to// des na myur du 'bros par bya'o// kang+gi ra song bar gyur to// dung gi gtsug gis yum dbug
348a5(skyes rabs): phyin par mdzod cig/ rgan mos dbugs phyung ste mchi ma dang bcas par kyi hud kyi hung bu sdug yid la re ba brgya yis thob pa/ khyod bdag gis phyi nas gang du mthong bar 'gyur/ mgri
348a6(skyes rabs): bzung ste/ sprin gyi bzhon pas mtsho ma dang bcas par/ kun du rmongs shing yang yang mchi ma'i rgyun gtong smre sngags mang du brjod byas nas// bdag gi bu sdug skyob pa bu zhes
348b1(skyes rabs): drug tu phongs pas mig 'phen ma'i// ma yi phyung na nye bar basbyin pa'i bu 'di brtse ba dor nas za byed pa// bya yi bdag po'i mchu nyid ma yin snying yang rdo rje dag la byas sam sAm+b+ha// dung gi gtsug
348b2(skyes rabs): gis// bdag nyid kyi lhag pa snga ma'i gdong yongs su mchi zhing / yum shin tu 'khrugs pos ci zhig phan dbugs phyung zhig/ rgan mos/ mchi ma dang baucas par ji ltar dbugs phyin
348b3(skyes rabs): par gyur// ci bdag ni bu gcig pa can+da no zhes byas te brtsa ba dang bcas par klu'i rgyal pos ma bsams so// kyi hud brtse mdu mthar byed da lta brtse bA med pa'i snying canA khyod kyis 'di ltar
348b4(skyes rabs): rgyurgyas shing gson pa'i 'jig rten nA bdag gi bu sdug gocig pu dran no// rnam pa thams cad du skal ba zhan pa bdag bcom par gyur to// brgyal lo// sprin+da gyi bzhon pas/ gzir zhing mgrin par
348b5(skyes rabs): srog phyin te// rang gi gnyen gyis yongs bting ba// 'di ni gal te ma bsrung na// brdeg gi lus kyi yon tan ci// nges nu re zhig nye bar 'gro bar bya'o// dud gi gtsug gis yum bdag nyid
348b6(skyes rabs): brtan por mdzod cig/ rgan mos kyi hud bu sdug rnyed dka' ba rnyed pa dung gi gtsug/ gal te re zhig klu'i 'jig rten yongs su srung bar byed pa nor rgyas kyi khyod yongs su btang ba de la su zhig gis khyod yongasu skyo
349a1(skyes rabs): par 'gyur/ sprin gyis bzhon pas 'phral la nye bar de skye bdag go/ rgan mos 'jigs par bcas par stong g.yogs kyis bu g.yogs nas sprin gyi bzhon pa la nye btung da/ bi na pa'i
349a2(skyes rabs): bu bdag la 'tshe ba gyis shig/ bdag ni khyod kyis zas kyi rgyur yongs su brtags pa'o// sprin gyi bzhon pa mchi ma dang bcas par/ e ma'o bu la byams pa'o// 'di yi bu la byams pa yis// 'khrugs
349a3(skyes rabs): pA 'di ni mthong gyur nas// snying la brtse med lag 'gro yi// dgra yang brtse ba byad dam snyam// dung gi gtsug gis/ yum skrag pas ci zhig phanra/ 'di ni nges par klu'i dgra ma yin no// ltos
349a4(skyes rabs): shig/ klu chen mgo blo bskam zhing khrag gzugs pa'i// zar mas byugs pa gtum po'i mchu dang ldan// gang na mkha' lding dge ste grang na yang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gzugs can dam pa 'di
349a5(skyes rabs): rgan mo sna bu sgrog bdag ni khyod gsod pas 'jig rten thams cad mkha' lding nyid du mthong ngo // sprin gyi bzhon pas/ gya yum mi 'jigs shig/ bdag ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i gzhon nu ste/ khyod kyi bu bsrung
349a6(skyes rabs): ba nyid kyis don du 'ongs pa yin no// rgan mos dga' ba dang bcas par bu slar yang de brjod cig/ sprin gyi bzhon pas/ yum yang dang yang du brjod pa 'di yi ci// las nyid kyis rdzogs par bya'o// rgan mos/
349b1(skyes rabs): spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas bdag gi bu yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig/ sprin gyi bzhon pas/ yum gcig gsod rtags 'di ni bdag la gsol// rang lus g.yogs te khyod kyi bu yi ni// srog dag bdag srung
349b2(skyes rabs): phyir bi na ta smyos kyi// khwa zas dag la bdag gis skul bar bgyi'o// rgan mos rna ba bsgribs te tshig de zhi bar gyur cig/ khyod kyang dung gi gtsug drang / khyad par med par blangs nyid do// yang na dung gi/
349b3(skyes rabs): btsug pas kyang khyod shin tu lhag pa nyid de/ gang zhig gnyen gyi skye bos kyang yongs su btang ba bdag gi bu lus sbyin pas kyang bsrung bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro// dung gi gtsug gis ya mtshan dang bcas par A ma'o//
349b4(skyes rabs): sems can chen po 'di'i spyod pa ni 'gro ba dag las bzlog pa zhig s+ho/ gang gi phyir/ gang gi spyad du kun gyi ba shes kyis gtum po bzhin du sngon tshe khyi shwa zis gyur cing // gang gi ched du gau ta ma yis
349b5(skyes rabs): lnga phan byas tA la'i byin po rab tu bsad// gang gi don du mkha' lding 'od srung bu 'dis nyi ma so sor ltos 'phye 'joms byed pa// srog de nyid ni rtsa bzhin gang zhig brtse bas gzhan gyi don du ster ba
349b6(skyes rabs): byed pa mtshar// sprin gyi bzhon pa la mtshon nas kyi bdag nyid chen po khyod kyi bdag nyid rab tu rtsom pa'i zol med pa'i brtse ba dang ldan pa dag bdag la bstan to// des na 'bad pa 'di yis
350a1(skyes rabs): ci zhig bya/ ltos shig/ bdag lha srog chags phra mo rnams// skye ba dang ni 'chi 'gyur te// gzhan gyi don la nus ldan pa// khyod 'dra 'byung ba ga lnga zhig/ des na 'dis
350a2(skyes rabs): ci zhig bya// zhan pa 'di thong zhig/ sprin gyi bzhon pas dung gi gtsug gi lag nas bzung ste/ gzhon nu dreng gi gtsug bdag gi gzhan gyi dom phum sum tshogs pa sa yid la re ba'i skabs su yun
350a3(skyes rabs): rnyiring po nis rnyed pa dag gi bAr chad bya bar mi 'os so// rnam par rtog pa med par gsod pa'i rtags dge byin cig/ dud can gyi gtsug gis/ sems dpa' chen po don med pa'i gdung ba 'dis
350a4(skyes rabs): ci zhig bya// dung gi gtsug gi dung skyong gI rigs dung lhar dkar pa dri ma can du byed dam ci// ci ste khyod bdag la rjes su brtse bar byed pa de lta na bdag cag gi yum 'di ji ltar 'tsho ba stong bar mi 'gyur

350b6(skyes rabs): zhig bya/ nges par mkha' lding 'ong ba'i dus ni nye bar gyur to// mi'i mdun du pus mo btsugs nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba bkod de/ da ni yum khyod kyang log cig/ yum zhig gang dang gang du bdag/ rab tu skye ba nyid 'gyur ba/

351a5(skyes rabs): hunyug rum pas/ gos zung gcig po 'di ni lha mo bshes kyi dbyig gi yum gyis gzhon nu la bkur ba yin no// des na gzhon nus 'di yongs su bzhes shig/ sprin gyi bzhon pas langs nas blangs te

351b1(skyes rabs): bar bya ste/ de ltar yun ring du thogs pa'i sprin gyi bzhon pa phyag 'tshal bar byed do// nyug rum pas/ ji ltar gzhon nus bka' stsal pa bzhin no// song ngo sprin gyi bzhon pas/ gzhan gyi don du lus gtong ba'i//

353a1(skyes rabs): mag pa sprin gyi bzhon pa song bar gyur to zhes thos so// tshul 'dis dogs par gyur te/ des na myur bar song la ci 'di rang gi khyim du 'ongs sam/ ma 'ong shes par gyis shig ces so// re zhig de nyid du

354a5(skyes rabs): bsrungs pa bzhin no// song bar gyur to// sprin gyi tog gis/ lha mo klu dag gi gtsug gi nor bu yin pa yang srid do// de nas rung gi gtsug gos dmar po dag bzung ste zhugs par gyur to// mchi ma dang bcas par brlago/ kye ma brlago// myur bar rgya mtshog
354a6(skyes rabs): 'gram du go ka rna la btud nas lto 'phye chen po gsod pa'i sa gzhi der ni bdag phyin na// rig pa 'dzin pa kha dang sder mos snying kha bcom pa de// khyer nas mkha' lding dag ni mkha' la rab tu song bar gyur// kyi hud rgyu med pa'i gnyen gcig po// kyi hud
354b1(skyes rabs): mchog gi snying rje can// kyi hud gzhan sdug bsngal ba can// kye khyod ni gang du gshegs bdag gi tshigi lan byin cig/ nyams pa dung gi gtsug mngal ni gnas pa nyid na ci'i phyir ma shi/ khyod kyis ci zhig byas// klu rnams skyabs las grags pa
354b2(skyes rabs): gcig ma thob// bsngags par 'os pa rje yi gsung ma bsgrubs// gzhan gyis bdag nyid btang bsrungs mya ngan 'os// kye ma kyi hud smad bdag bsluso bslus// des na rnam pa 'di ltar gyur pa bdag ni skad cig tsam 'tsho zhing bdag nyid la nye bar
354b3(skyes rabs): brgad par mi bya'o// re zhig 'di'i rje su song ste brtag par bya'o// yongasu 'gro zhing sa la bltas te/ dang por sa gzhi khyab byas de nas mdun du thigs pa rigs pa grol ba dag tu ltung // rdo rnams la lhang brdabs shing 'thor gyur thigs phran ldan pa'i thang
354b4(skyes rabs): la srog cha Da rnams kyis dkrigs// khams kyi ngos la mtshon ka shing rtags dag gi rtse dang phug rnams dag la chags gyur pa/ khrag gi rgyan 'di'i rjesu legs par 'brangs te mkha' lding lta 'dod bdag ni 'gro bar bya// yuM gyis thos nas skrag pa dang bcas
354b5(skyes rabs): par/ rgyal po chen po su zhig du ba'i bzhin dang ldan pa 'di ni 'di nyid du myur bar 'ong zhing bdag gi 'khrug par byedado// des na re zhig 'di su yin shes par byos shig/ sprin gyi togis/ ji ltar lha mo smra ba bzhi no// dung gi gtsug gis kyi hud 'jig rten
354b6(skyes rabs): gsum gyi gtsug gi nor bu gcig pu khyod bdag gis gang du blta bar bya/ btsam par gyur to// btsem par gyur to// sprin gyis tog gis thos nas dga' ba dang bcas par brgad nas lha mo mya ngan thong shig/ 'di'i gtsug gi nor bu 'di sha la cha Da pI/

355a2(skyes rabs): nges par yugasa'i sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar 'gyur ba ma yino// ma la ya can mas dga' ba dang bcas par yum khyod kyi shis par brjod pa yiso// zhes te zhabs la gtug so// sprin gyi gtogs dung gis gtsug la nye bar btud nas bu khyod kyi

355a5(skyes rabs): bdag ni klu dung gi gtsug ces bya ba'o// zas kyi res la bab nas klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyis bi nA ta'i bu la bsnying so// mang pos ci zhig bya/ gal te khra gI rgyun gyi lam 'di rdul gyis bsgribs te mtshan dka' bar 'gyuraro// des na mdor bsdus pa bshad
355a6(skyes rabs): par bya'o// sems ni snying rje dang ldan pa// rig pa 'dzin pa su zhig gis// rang nyid mkha' lding la byinas// bdag gi srog ni bsrungs par gyur// sprin gyi tog gis/ spyan gyi tag gas/ mnyes gshin gzhan la phan pa la zhen pa de lta bu bdagi bu las
355b1(skyes rabs): gzhan pa su zhig yod/ kye bu sprin gyi gzhon pa yis ces gsal bar brjod cig/ kyi hud skal pa ngan pa bdag bco mo// yum gyi kyi hu 'u sdug khod kyis 'di ci la byas/ ma la ya can mas/ kyi hud ji ltar bdag la mtshan ma ngan pa ni bden pa nyid

355b4(skyes rabs): phyin par mdzod cig/ yum dbugs phyin par mdzod cig/ gnyi ga dbugs phyin par gyur to// yum gyis bu mo longs shig/ rings par mi khyod cig/ bdug cag kyang sprin gyi bzhon pa med par 'tsho 'am ci/ des na re zhig dbugs phyin par gyis shig/
355b5(skyes rabs): ma la ya can mas dbugs phyin nas kyi hud rje'i sras khyod gang du bdag gis blta bar bya// sprin gyi tog gis/ kyi hud bu bla ma'i zhabs kyi bsnyon bkur gyi cho ga shes pa khyod bdag gis gang du blta bar bya// khyod kyis bdag gi rkang pa la// gtsug gi rno
355b6(skyes rabs): bu gtug tu bcug/ 'jig rten gzhan du 'gro na yang // dul ba'i rim pa ma dor ro// gtsugi nor bu blangs nas/ kyi cung khyod kyi bdag la 'di tsa mi kho na bstan par bya/ snying la brlan nas a ha ha// gus pas shin tu ring nas 'dud cing mgo btud bya/ b+hag tu bdag gi
356a1(skyes rabs): nas byag tsha khyod kyi ni// gtsug gi nor 'di rtsub pa min yang bdar ba yis// bdag gi snying ni shin tu 'joms par byed pa ci// yum gyis kyi hud bu sprin gyi bzhon pa/ gang khyod ni bla ma'i zhabs kyi sri zhu bor nas gzhan pa'i bde ba nyid la sred pa ma
